bsgrubs nas/ 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te rigs pa bsgrubs nas sta de las langs te/ sems can rnams lo rang tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems

can su mkhas shang shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyu mas 'dun par byas te/ de dag gi soms dang/ 'gro ba drug tu skyo ba dang/ 'gro ba'ang kho bos ma shes so// gang dag de la skyabs su dong ba de dag

ga spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang sngangs ba dang 'khrug par kho bos byed ma nusan/ de las spu ba 'am bskyod par lta ga la nus/ deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang/ bu li khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas tadage sbyong

go'u tam mdangs de la skyabs su dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdunan 'khod de/ kho bos de dag dang dbal ma zhus so// de'i phyi'i stobs dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa// dbang phyug dang ldan pa

khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shag/ shAkya'i bu mdangs de srog dang bral la// de la sems can gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhag par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag po'i phyogs
pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/ de phyin chad bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas bdud mo 'od ces bya bas 'dzam bu'i glang 'di gang nad ngazhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing
chos 'chad pa la nga ltas pa dang/ de nas bdud 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong/ sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa thos so// thos nas denu zing zhes byed cing sbyangs nga ra gyur to//
nga nas des bdud sdage can de la 'di skad ces smras so// ma lus zhing na 'di'i gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas rang nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol 'a ma ldan yun ring lon
slade pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar// khyod kyang ma riges khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro// gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum naskyabs/ 'di la zhe sdang cung zad sus bskyod pa// de ni mos shing
bde ba nyams par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// de na 'phrul chen pasod nams rab kyi mtshan//
mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu ra// sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis la rtsod ra bya ma nus// sdig can gyis smras pa// pa ga gyi bo dag la dbang byas te//
khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro// de yis rang por ma thogs yul stongs byed// yu bu cig kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud zhugs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras
so khyod ni rab tu 'byor par 'gyur ba'atsho/ dazhus khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan// de na rab tu dpung nyams chadan// de rang ci'i phyi'i thams cad mkhyen la sogs// bdud ral gri zla
ba zhes bya ba des 'ad skad ces smras so// de na su la'ang yod kyis khro ba med// ma gnas de na bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang// khams gsum da ga las than cang 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan
gyis gsad par mi nus so// sdig can gyis smras pa// 'dod khams 'ad na sems can gang 'bod pa// 'dod la rtags shang nga rgyal dregs pas myos// de dag gaMng phyir rtag 'brang
phyag bar n te// de dag tshogs pas tshul de mi sod// de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying po med cing skya ma ge rgyu 'dra/ dngos po kun shes srid pa rnam
bar btul// srid par ma chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la bgags byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig can gyis smras pa// ma ya 'jig rtan 'din de yang yod/ bza' btung zhapo
sman dang gos bstan cing// tshor ba gsum yang de yisoms la yod// ci'i phyir de la kharlag par bya mi nus bdud sred spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can lto 'phya chen po
rnams kyisazha// rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul yod pa// don grub 'phrul la ngashas mi rigan// dal ji ltar ba rlag par bya bar zhus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ sa ri la zas bcad byas//
dol rdo ba dag kyang 'thadzes// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod// bdud shes mag rtses bya ba des 'di skad rtsos smas so/ khyed kyis gang tshe de la bgags byas
don bres pas cung zad 'tshigapa 'am// khyed la khro gnyar bzhin yang bstan byas sam// dalas khyod kyi tshig na mngon byas sam// sdig can gyis smras pa// de na sosor brtags pas rtag
tubazod// 'dod chags spangs sha zhe sdang gtiyug brel// den sazhus can kun la byams sems ldan// 'dre bar spyod pa la yang de rtag go/ bdud thubadaka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// kun
sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa// de la bdag cagashasha tan bgegs bya mod// des na skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar zhus// sdig can gyis smras pa//
stobs thob byed cag la yA grogs yin te// khyed rnams bag yod byas la de ri chos// thams cad phyogs su ri yi 'a phung pa dpa/ sa 'ad ma lus byin gyis churab+hArlab bo// mkha'

las mi bzad skyug pa'i brag char dang// lcags kyi phye ma'i phung porab tu dbab/ lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' brgya// de lus phye mar brlag cing dpag par bya/ kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang/ gdung

bungs lage thob rnams pa ba la// 'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gas// shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya// de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du tha mas cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so// de nas bang de dag
thams cad kyis mgrin gag tu 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin 'dong bar bgyi// rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la/ sdo dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo// bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang stobs kyi yul ded

ma thams cad bstan par bya na/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma de rtsal mi 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston to/ khyed rang gas ragi par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bye pa rang gi gnas su dong nas/ go phages te bdud bye pa ri re 'ang yang

kyi ga yog stong ste do ya lad zlum pa mang po grog pa/ lag cha sna tshogs ba/ go rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dang ches te/ dre'i nub mo 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te/ yul oM g+ha maM g+ha d+ha'i drang thad kyi nyam
mkha' la 'khod nas/ gling ba'i nga li'ajig rten gyi khams 'di ni lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi 'am ci dang la 'phye chen po dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang
grul dus gang dag bcom ldan 'das la sogs ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa mad par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'angasoms ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom

ldan 'das dgrongs su banu gnas / de dag kyang las chadang/ gochasnatshogs chas te de nyidi na 'khod do// bdud sdig can debang phug chen po 'a gzugs su bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang

phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bcob rgyud kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tuson pa/ ga 'og lnga brgya yod/ gangs kyi ra'i so la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces

rgyas go/ go'u ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/ ma lasang mngon par shes pa dag la gnas// aM ga maM g+ha d+han de 'dug de rang ni// rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod/ brtan por
sna tshogs gsal pa'i gtam rnams kyis// de dang khyod du lhan ci smra bar byas// der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang// gdon mi za ba rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can

gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ de nyid dus snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas deng mi mtshungs blo bsam du nga las khyed nyon cig/ bdud

yul bdud kyi rigs chen 'joms pa'i rgyu de mi ston par// rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan deshAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu kha ma byams bzhin// de la slob ma rgyags spangs
gdon mi za bar snga dron/ grong khyer dag tug yong ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na// de dag glu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzung// de thos shAkya'i khyu mchog can s yad

spro med pa ra bya// bdud gzhan zhig gas smras pa/ glang chen rdza mo seng ge ma he stag gtumasgra drag dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong ba phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag cha mtshon

thogs gdug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong na// bslad cing ma dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro// bdud gzhan zhag gas smras pa/ lam srang bzhi yodo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong gangs
'khod// sna tshogs mtshon rnonamada' chen mda' zhags bla dgas ral gri thogs// nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra drag sprin las lu yang 'babs// de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du

marungs 'gyur// bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang/ rnam par sbrul pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen

lo'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ bdud kyi sgra'ang mi 'byin/ phyogs bzhin ma dang ra'ong med/ sngon nag po'ang med/ dus ma ma'i pa'i rlung yang mang de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang

byin gyis klu gang yang tha na char thigs pa gcig tsam yang ma 'be bas so// yang de'i tsho nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por

0 bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ dazhas tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i shugs pa dang/ grong khyer gyi sgo don bdud gzhon nusha'i tu dor la/

bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad 'dra ba lnga bcuglu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas/ srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i

bu la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dag sbyong gar byos shage/ shAri'i bus smras ra/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ bdudo gzhon nu de dag thams

cad kyis gom bskyangs ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu' dpyad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// skye mched dag gas gzhi tu chog/ skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus// skya mchod dag ni gsod
pa skye mched dog gis mthar dbyung ngo// phung po byas pasashin tu chog/ phung po byas pas bdag cag bslus// phung po byas pas gsod pa ste// phung po byas pas ngas mthar dbyung// 'di lta ste/
bahar/ bahar b+har ba ha/ mar tI ba ha/ sa phyab ha/ A u pa hasAhA/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras
ba dang/ de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu bo de dag shin tu dga' sta/ 'di rab tudad nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag de rang bzod par gsol// 'gro ba'i gnyan gtsage ston pa'i mchog
khyod de// phung bo khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad// bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud bzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis/ srang gi dbus der tshe dang

ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
bsang sems kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcunas/ glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ khams 'di dag gas gzhi tu chog/ khams nyidi dag gas bdag
cag bslus// khams nyid dag na gsod pa sta// khams nyid dag gas mthor dbyung ngo// tshor ba dag gas shin tu chog/ tshor ba dag gis bdag rug pasus// chor ba dag ni gsod pa ste
chor ba dge gas mthar dbyung ngo// sams pa dag gis shan tuchog/ sems pa dag gas bdag cag bslus// sams pa dag na gsod pa ste// sams po dag gse mthar dbyang d// 'du
pad+ma shes byas pas shAn tu tshig 'du shas byas pa sa bdag rug bsdus// 'du shes byas pas gsod ba ste// 'du shes byas bas mthar dbyung ngo// 'khor ba dag gis shAni tu chogo/ 'khor ba
dag gis bdag rug bsus// 'khor ba dag gis gsod pa ste// 'khor ba dag gis mthor dbyung ngo// 'di ltas/ a ma ba a ma ba/ A ra dza/ ra na dza ha kaM mya thA/ oM ma shA/ ga ga nab

sAhA/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing klu'i dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang/ de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shan tu/
dga' ste/ yang rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras M so// 'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags lam thub dbang sras// 'khor ba'i nyis la mnyam lha chos kyi sgron// sdug spangs bdag cagaramo gus pa/
skyes/ sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun dong skyabs song// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcude dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ de nas dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu ga nga po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po 'i khab kyi grong khyar por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/
de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcunas/ klu'i dbyangs kyi bar du sta/ 'di skad ces smras so// rig pa byas pas shani tu chog/ rig pa byas pas bdag cag bsus// rig pa byas pas gsod pa
sta reg bya bdag gis mthar du dbyung ngo// bdag bo dag gseshani tu chog de bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus// bdag po dag na gsod pa ste// bdag po padag gis mthar dbyung ngo//
'khel ba dag gsashazhi chog 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bsus// 'khor ba dag na gsong pa ste// 'khor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo// srid pa kun gyis shin tu choge/ srid
pa kun gyis bdag rug bsus// srid pa kun na gsod pa su// srid pa kun na ngas mthar dbyung// 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tuchog/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag
lug bsus// 'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dras mthar dbyung// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chudag mgyogs 'dra na// byas pa'i sku bos mi shes te/ rnam
mkhas gzugs kyi drags pas chos// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mkhas sgra yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dra yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas rig ga dregs pas myos//
ya/ grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu dug mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// ma mkhas chos kyi dregs pas myos// ma mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas khams kyis
drags pas myos// mi mkhas longs spyod rdzogs pas myos// ma mkhas bde ba' drags pas myos// mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos// ma mkhas 'dod pa'i drigs pas myos// grogs ngagatsho
'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byas pa'i skya bos mi shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi drags pas myos// 'di lta ste/ kha ba/ kha ba/ kha ba/ mud dzAn/ a brja
ba brta/ kha pa/ pramArta/ tshor brtasAhA/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig/
'di dag smras pa dang/ de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dga' we tu dga' ste/ 'di rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// khams rnams sgyu ma'i smag rgyu 'dra ba dang// tshor ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas
bskyod pa dang// zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan// mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sumachi// bdud gzhon nulcabatsungo de dag thamos cad kyis srung gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan

pa byams ma'i bu gang bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i de'i mdun du 'dug go/ yang de'i rmi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por

bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ grong khyer gyi sgo den bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang pa/ btsun pa'i bu'i chu dud 'chang ba lnga bcuglu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gi lag pa
gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long zhage/ dag sbyong gar byos shig ]ras 'byor gyis
smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos por byas nyon cig/ de dag gse gcom paskyangs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug tsang klu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so//

dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin// 'dus byas ga yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med/u0f38/ smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther zug ming// chos kun myur du 'jags par bo dang
ldan pas shes/ sdug sngal tshes gza'i byams ba thams cad gar chags la// rig kun sdug bsngal khur pa'i tshor ba dag kyang med// ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam sgom bstag/
byed pa// de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan 'di gcige so 'dushas skrangs pa dag/ bdag tshad ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ srog dang gso ba
gang zag dang ni byed po med/ bdud kyi ga o dag thong la sems na byang chub sngos// nam mkha' glog bzhin dpang po dag la rnam shes 'byung// rig dang tshor dang sams pa thams cad bdag med de
tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas na yang yod ma yin// byas pa'i sde rnams bsdus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med// yang dag mtha'an stong zhing
mthar rnams kun dang bral// byang chub lam sbyong des na 'a dren pas byang chub b.ris// rmongs byed chos 'di nyidi ni chos su skyob pas gsungs// 'di lta ste/ su mun+te/ suN+Din/ sa la sa le/

'a sa mi a ba ta sa la/ ta tha pas laM/ b+ha ta ko TaM/ sa la swAhA/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug ming glu dbyangs kyis tshags su bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang/
de nas bdun gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shani tu dga' ste mad rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di'adra'i chos ma thos// gti mug mi shes rmongs pas sdig las rtsi
bgyis pa// rgyal ba'i sras la bdagacug mngon sum dang bshags nas// 'gro la phan phu'i sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa 'a phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ yang de'atsho nas nigs rgyas kyi mthus srung de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang//
srang sa de'i dbus na gnas brtan Ara'i bun byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po na nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ gang bo zhi lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ rab 'byor yishar phyogs su

bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu da bag tshad phyed phyed tsaman 'khod do// nyan thos chen po bzhi bod ngag gi debus kyisa'i phyogasazhu/ khu lnga bcus 'khor b.ling chu pa na 'dzam bu chu bo'i rigs ra 'dab ma

nub masngon po/ ze bag dpal gyi snying po/ snying po'i mu tige/ ni lha' spos bas lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba las skyos pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de las snang ba byung ngo// snang

ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar te/ srang da na pad+made 'phang du mi gsum gyikhrun tsam du snang// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du na ba d+ma de 'phrang du lha'i dpag tshadalnga

par snang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du pad+ma ra'i 'phang dpag tshad brgya bar snang/ 'go tshani gyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad byed par snang ngo// khang de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang
don dang/ tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems 'gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so// sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i drung
zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa// gcig pus bdud kyi snga ni dbung dang pazhan par bcas pa bcom// sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nyag ga rtsig 'gro pa
dag la phan phyir byon par the tshom med// mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang gi pa chos don thar 'dod pa// tshul shes ngang nas skyos dang rta rgyal mchog 'di'i ston bas brtul// 'gro ba kun la
zi lan don rag mkhas dam chos gsungs ba che// thub pa skya mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de rang gshegs// dus su gshegs pa ston pa dge spyod rgyal po bslab gsum 'chad/[&]da/
med tshos ston rag pa lha dang mar bcas 'gro ba skyob// 'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa yi shes chen po'i sgron// dar ba gsung ba du ma gsum spangs de rang 'ad kun ston// sdug bsngal
'bongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing// 'jig rten dgo slad ma bsAl blo gros mnga' bas spyod// ma rag pa yas bsgrubs pa'i mig can dag la yang// dam pa'i tshes kyi lag na ji bzhin
rab tu sbyig/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'a khor 'du 'daren tshogs gyur kyis// don gyi dam pa gzigs ba gzugs bzang mchog ma la// stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma 5zhemkhyen pa/
smra ba'i seng ge ring po mi thoms 'di'i gshegs so// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs nan// dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing// mngon par shes pa drug
mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba// de ni chos kyi rnga chen rdung du yang dag gshegs// dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa// don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po//
pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyi'o// drug gi sa bon skya khasang ga 'dis gshegs so// 'dod baspyod pa'i lha'i sa drug ga bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad ng 'ad deb ga byung
nga khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod// bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgrangs// rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos// bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod
byed/ 'dod pa ma rtag chuya zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tusu// dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa// nams kyang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bag med zhi

pa'i phyir mi 'gyur// dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam// rga dang na 'ami'ajig pas kun bzhi rung// khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs// spyani dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// rten cig
sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spangs la// bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar deng// song ste de yi bka' la rab tunyon// legs bshad den
khyed kyi don chen tu// shes rab rnam grol rab tuzhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan mnyam pa don chen no// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma las tshugs
bza su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di deg phyung ngo// mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba rten mongs mod// rab tu bsgoms chos la rnam par sgoms// ma 'khrul soms dang rnam par thar 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab
spang ba'i blo gyis shog nag po btsugasum mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod pa mchog la rnam par sgom ba gyis// des zhi dang las thar pa yi// sha'i tunam thar ma thob par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugs

kyi rnam rtog sogs la chags// thar thug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por blta// de dag gzhi skye ba'i rgyud mi 'chad// de rnams ngan song sa la shan tu'abab// rtag rto khams gsum bdag med rdzus med cing//

byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur// rgya dang 'jig 'grol chos 'di thams cad la// nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams

sgom byed pa// de dag 'chi med rnamod na ba'ang med// ngan 'gro med cing ma sdug phrad pa'i ng med// gang rnams dbang po dag la yid chachags// lam de mchog sta shan tu dag pa yin// daltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin
du bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par bcom ba 'gyur// gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spangs pa'i// ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa// tshul gcige rnam par sgom bar byed ba rnams de dag la ni
lam mchog 'di bshad do// bdag po med pa'i byed pa mod gyur pa// chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su// smon pa spungs na bun med pa ni// byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg da ra 'gyur//

de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang ma ma yin pa de dag tshogs te 'bad rung 'khed do/ la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la na dbang byed kyi cha byad du/

la la na dbang phyug chen po'i cha byed du/ la la na srid mod kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la lan brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu

rtswa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byad du/ la la na mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung

gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyima' u0f7a khyad du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la lan lha ma yan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam mkha'i

ldang gi cha byad du la la nami 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la na 'phye chen po'i cha byad du/ la lan ni bo che'i cha byad du/ la la ni gsar gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/

la la rin po tsho'i shing zho pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la na gzhan mu stags can gyi cha byad du/ la la na 'khor lo rin po che'i bud du/ la la na nor bu rin po cha'i cha byadadu/
la la ni glang bo chas srungs kyi bu 'i cha byad du/ la la na rta'i rgyal po spun gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byad du/ la la na bud med rin po tsho'i cha byad du/ la la na tshong dpon btsun pa'i chu

byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po cha'i cha byad du bdag nyidi mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la na sngo zhing kha dog sngo la/ byung phrug dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan par
bdag nyidi mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyirib/dugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dmar bo dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing/'ang da du tu la'i srid tsam gyi
nam mkha'i dkyil 'khod de// la lan dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang phrul dang sdud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang/ rgya la mtshan dang/ ba dan ser bo dang/ chu dag gi 'phreng ba thogs
gang 'khed do// la la na le brgan kha dog le brgan la/ gsar gyi gos dang/ phyang phul dang/ lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan mthang kha thogs shing 'khodado//
la khan dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po' chen 'babs so// la la na lha'i drang srong ga kha dog tu bdag sa 'di ma
par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'a bab sa so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bangs so//

la la ni dri za'i kha deg gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo// la la na lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po chu sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te/ sa la chag chag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu nag

po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do/ la la ni lha 'a bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byon no// la la na kha dog sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de/
legs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la na// khacom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de lags su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
bya ba'i phyi'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so// la la na grong dang/ khang pa dang/ khyas dang/ skar khung dang/ rta babs dang/ bsal khang dang/ lam gyi bzhi mde dang/ sum mdo dang/
khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ sgo khang dang/ shing khang dang/ gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cu thal mo sbyar tu/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis

gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te/ dag sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su 'ong bar mthong ba de'i tsho rab tu 'khrugs taM/ zlag cinge srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor bar 'dug go/ 'og min gyi

lha grangs med dpag tu med pa 'i bar du 'og ma'i nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+madi'i khor yug tu 'khod do// bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de da ga thos nas kun tu bltas na 1 rgyal po'i khab

kyi grong khyer chen po'i srung gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byang ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangs med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar/

[– ]'khod par mthong ngo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis stong du bltas na/ 'ded ba na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas tham[']cad na 'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i lha bye ba phrag brgya stong gangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma
rgyad 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo// de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal 'di yid la bdanas yid la gcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus rdul te/ lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug rung/
skad che na bos bos te/ bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur yod kyis nga yi tshig la nyon// ngal stobs med bdag lul 'da'i dbang med// mthu stobs yon tan shin tu du mar da//
skye bo bstan bya'i 'jig rten 'di'i 'jug go/ lha ma dga' ba'i pad 'dare byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par lta bar dang/ bder gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tshu ngag 'a/ yon tanarang mchogazhi
ba'i lam du 'go/ 'a ni 'jig rten gsum po glu la dge sbyong skya lan te// lha mchang po thams cad ya de gcig pa du 'khor bar 'dug da na 'jags pa'i skad kyang mun du ra yachar phab ste// chen s
bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dar pa rlag gyis// da nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi ban byang chag 'di nicig khyod kyi chos rig na// bdag sde
brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci ya phyi'i mi 'gro// bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dab la gzugs mthong bas bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skya bas rab mchog gzhan med// de
nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu du nang ba dong mchog tu khros pas zhonapas/ bdud sde'i can la 'di skad ces smras so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// bdag gi stobs mthu mad pa'i ng ma shes
sam 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sngo ga/ ngo mtsho'am 'dzam bar mi bya 'am// bdag cag stobs 'di'an tu brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus nga// pad+ma'i drung du nye bar der
dong ste// chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shani tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jags shang skag gyur to// lus na dri nga stobs dang brtson 'grus stor// ji tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa// de yi

bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong// de nas bdud ga zhan zhag gas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig na khyed nachos kyi spyod pa spangs shang sde ge byed dga'// sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i
ldan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog// grong khyer 'di'i byan bdag cig myur du dga' zhing dung bas blta// 'jage rten gsum mchodo srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong// de nas nam mkha' de

de nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras yo/ khyed kun tshogs pa sa gus shing dga' ldan nga la tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud jag yade 'thun/
spyod de khro sbangs rab dga' thub pa 'a gsungs mchog la yang dga' dad spyod// sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud

[E ]thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ bdud la la zhi 'a khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das

la mchod pa'i phyir 'khad tsang 'khod do// la la na tshangs ba'i cha byad du/ la la nadabang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la na srid med kyi bu'i cha byad du r-i la la ni dga' ldan pa'i

wA byad du/ la la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i cha byad du/ la la na gzhon nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi khu'i cha byad du/ la la ni' legs skyel

po'i cha byad du/ la lan mig mi bzang gi cha byad du/ la la yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i cha byad du/ la lan nyi ma'i cha byad du/ la lan zla pa'i cha byad du/ la lan

skar ma'i cha byad du/ la lan lha ma yAn gyi cha byad du/la la zhinamakha' lding gi chospyod du/ la lanam 'am ru'i cha byad du/ la la ni lce 'phya chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni rin po cha'i cha byad du/ la la ni

gsar gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byad du/ la la nirini bo che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rags kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stags can gyi cha byad du//

tsa0 la la na 'khor lo rin po cha'i cha byad du/ la la na nor bu rin po che chapyad du/ la la na glang po che sa srungs kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la lan rtab rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po

chab cha byad du/ la la na tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po cha'i cha byad du bdag 'de mngon bar sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la lan sngo zhing kha dog grol

nga phrul da ngargyanadakar pos rang rgyun par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugos dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dmar po dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shange
'a phrang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ byang phul dang spud pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang/ rgya la mtshan dang/ bdanAsar bo dang/
mu ga ga 'a phreng ba phyogs shing 'khod do// la la na le brgan kha dog la ban la/ gsar gyi gos dang/ phyang phu dang/ lhab lhub sta/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danamathang kha thogs
shing 'bod do// la la na rimar zhing kha ra kha dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la na dekayazhing kha dog dkar la/ mu dge dmar bo'i char 'bebs// la la na lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu
bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' 'das me tog gi char mngon par 'a babs so// la lan bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su ma ngon par sprulanas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna
tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la lan driza'i kha dog gse lha'il snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo// la lan lha'i bu'i kha dog gas rin po che sna tshogs kyi stod du spos chu thogs te sa la rlag/

chag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog lta/ smos stsa tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs par byed do/ sbrul la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to// la la na kha dog
sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyang bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'a ra la la/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de lags
su mgo bar phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so// la la na srung dang/ khang pa dang/ skar khung dang/ rta pangs dang/
bsal khang dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ sgo khang dang/ gzhal med khang sba tshogs su 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la

sgyu mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud snga'i can gyis gang gi tsho/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de 'tsho/ rab tu 'khrug
taskag cing chos nas rab tu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la byin chad grogs mdade// bdag gi dpal dang thams cad stor// bdag ni bdud kyi tshul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus
tha ma partsam par bya// bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad// pad ba cad dang kun 'akhrugs te// de nas sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de na tha ma 'a'i stobs yazhi zho/ bdud sdig can gyis
de ltar bsams nas/ rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/ srang ga pad+ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong bo yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma zhus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcad par 'dod

na de dag kyang ma mthong/ [” ]pa nga'i snying po la lag pas brdab pa la 'dod na de'ang ma dmags te/ dper na glog snying yang na de mgas pa bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na grib ma snang yang ma dmigs pa

de bzhin du pad+ma re 'ang snang mod kyi mi demags so// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi de mge sa shing rig par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu sngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drugatsang
rgyal 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de'ang ma nus so// yang stobs chen po'i drag shul byas lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu bskyod par 'dodon rig bar yang ma nus te mi dmags so//
'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhag nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na ma dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang lag par ma rung zhing mi dmigs nas/ de 'ad snyam du sems taM tshanas sams
can 'dug pa rnams brtags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang me dmags shing reg par ma rung ngo// de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi
mthus de'i lus shang na pa bzhin du bdar te gdong mchi ma can phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gi zhi 'gro kun bsdu par de rang skya 'di byas// 'di ltar bdag ni

'dun 'dir slad pa zhan skad cig myos par song/ g.yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad// der bslad brlag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro/[”]/bdag gi gnas su 'a gro bar 'dod

lan der yang 'gro bar mazhus te/ de rab tu skrag cing dus nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong// dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog

zad bar 'i gyur du 'ong gis 'di'i ma snang bar byas te/ ris sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcige gas kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong ba'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhang ma mdzad kyi phyi rol tu
'chi ba'i dus khya'o sAman/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du ma gu' pa gtsang ba lngas btus par bdag gis mthong bar rab tu khros
gang sgrug ste/ skad chen bor du zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis ma mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor
los sgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur to/ das bdud sdes can la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i phyi'i khyod dang bya ngan pa de kyis ngu ga dong sbru char 'bod// 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su
0 ma 'jigs myur du song// 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sa ba// 'ad la bsnyen bkur zhang 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud stag
can 'di snyam du bdag nyidi tshig snyan pas/ ge sbyong go'u ta ma'i skyabs su song la/ b.runges pa 'ad las pad ga grol bar bya'o snyam du sems te/ donas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na/
bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang thag ka mchog skye ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba las rab tur par mdzad pa de la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub ma gon myur du 'jigs chen mi bzod bcings pa 'di las khrol// da range sun chad bde gshegs gtso

mchog skyabs su bdag mang ste// gti mug gis na bdag ljongs khyod la khres shange 'ongasachen bgyis// mngon sum khyod bzhago spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyis// gang gatsho bdud sdesi can tshig snyan pas/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong pa de'i tshon/ bdag grol ba snyam du shes so// gang gi tshe 'a khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe yang mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcangs ba bdag gse shes te/

gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro ma nus pa de'i tsho/ bcom ldan 'das la ma blon dang skyabs su sems bskyed nas/ yang bdag nyidi grol bar shes so// lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcanges pa dang grol ba shes te de nyid na
dug go/ 'dus pa chen po zhi po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////gong du smos pa 'i bar du sta/ nyan thos

chen po bzhi bo de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khye chen bor bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba/ pa dud gzhon nu de dag gas dge sbyong glu nga zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig ces skyod pa ma yazhi ba byed du bcug nas/

nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa 'a 'am gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu dbyas kyis gang gi tsho tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de ba/ sa chen po 'di ni nga tug los go/
skad cig de nyid la lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yazhi dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lu'adi chan po brgya stong mang bo bcom ldan 'das kyi

bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong tshatshig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi kha lo sgyu mtshog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi bgazhas gyur te// nyan thos de dag la ni spyi la

ma ka deng byas ba// 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur// de nas lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am rudang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/
srin bu bye ba khrag khrig mang bo gdod mchim can gyis khacom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khong nas 'di skad ces gsol to// da ltar bstan pa 'di la gnas// bam ldan
'das kyis kun gzags te/ bstan pa'i chos srungs slad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa// 'di ltar nga nyidi der song ste// bzhon dbung ba rtsas
pa'i bdud btul// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas de dag thams cad kyis ma yin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol ti/ bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs shagi/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyab/ bdud kyi ul pa sam gyis mi khyab/ klu'i yul bsam gyis ma khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis
mi khyab bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma su la rtag/ lul thams cad kyi nang na na sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan la

bzhugs bzhin du/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang/ chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bsgom pa dang/ lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral ba dang/
sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can

gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad ngal gsod par
0@#// gsham yang sgru'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod pa ma nus so// des na 'dina'adug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrige rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang gdul bar nus te/ bdud

g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so// yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam ba ra sprul pa'i byin gyi

rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan bas/ de dag la snying brtse pa'i phyir 'gro bar byas te yongs su spyad do// de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tudage ba'i

rtsa ba'i sa bon skyod bar 'gyur ro// jitsam na gdan las bzhengs par ba yod pa dang/ de nas 'od ma'i tshal zung ba'i lha mo mdzes zhes bya pa (bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad
cas gsol to// bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams// rig shin tu ma rungs pa// bye bas smra ba'i sang ge bskor zhing mchis// zhe sdang
rab 'bar ba'i mtshon thogs te// khyod dgongs smad du 'khrug pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon po nag pa kun tu deng ma gshegs// 'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par mi bzhud cig/ gang tshe bcom ldan
'das gangan las bzhengs pa de'i tsho/ gtsug lag khang gi lha mo sgang pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni
0 stong po// mtshon char bcas te mchis pa// bsam med de dag khyod la sdo// thub chen de rang ma gshags shig// mang gi tshe [“] bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tsho/ sman gyi lha mo
grub ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na/ kyi hur chos kyi lam stor cong// chos kyi tshul ni
rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi glu yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yon can gdug pas shin tu gtams// sa 'di'i
bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung gyur pa lags// ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i mthu na bdag la ma mchis// khyod pa rlag bgyi slad 'di ni rab tu ma bzad mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos can ral gri
sa re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/ khad bar gshegs pa 'jig rten srungaslong bdag gi tshig gson to// stobs bcu grub pa'i bzhud pa de 'di grong khyer ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang/ de na shang gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje bsnying rje ba'i ngu zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad don
grub thub pa 'di bzhazhi rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur nan// mgon po khams gsum 'di dag thams cad de'u'i mig na stor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' 'ad la sbrul gyis dad kharunges rno ba'i mda' dang
mtshon thogs shing// khyod dgongs skad du kha nasam 'bar rgyu yas da ni der ma gshegs// de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de spu cher ngu zhing/ bcom ldan

zla 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalazas 'di skad ces gsol to// grong khyer bzang po la de ni bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po// mda' dang glu gra mtshon cha'abar ba thogs te snying rje
med par lta// gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams// khyod dgrongs slad du 'dan mas kyis gtsang ma'i zhal na ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'dras sgo

khang du byon pa dang/ der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i lha mo ta la'i snying bo zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra char du zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad duranges bar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'dus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan shul 'di sang gi rnga mo glangaNon smyon pas bskog/ dag sbyong rnams la brtsi slad bdud kyi rnam mang gnod par
brgyad// 'di'i ston pa khyod dgongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson// smra'i dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtsa snyad du ma gshegs shig/ bcom ldan bdud thul khyod kyi bstan pa rnam zhig
dang / sgyu ma brgyad pa cha mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas// lha mo klu dang ma 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' sgrog nas shar tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos char zhag pa dang
'api rtan 'a khrus/sa 'gyur dang/ nam mkha' skur ma 'od stor zla gyur ma yong nas// 'phro mchog kyi ma ma pa zad klad pa deng drag rdzob// bder gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi shudamachi//
mthong ba 'di la di'id nyams gang// chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i re sa rgyas 'grongs pa brlag/ chos kyi rgyu yang bskam par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'dzage rten du// ma rung
'gyur bar nye gnas tsho// ma dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang// 'di dag kun na 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas/ gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad
ces gsol to// thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol// smra mchog de ring nga drug par ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi/
'dren pa bdag ga tshig gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma pazhud// sems can thug brtsa' sad du 'dar gzhes te// sems can skyo bas gtsos pas 'jags thar mdzod//
dam pa brnyes nas sgrol ba rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas do bzhun gshegs pa dgongs// sems can mang po sdug bsngal dums gdungs// srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig/ sku
mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs// kyi ma 'dod la chags shing byas pa'i sde// de rnams zhi bgyi slad du chos ma yod// skye mched dbang po don na rang bzhin stong// de nas bcomaM ldan 'das
sgo khang du gshegs pa dang/ de nas sa la lha mo gzi brjid mo ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig sku gzhag cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'adas kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug/

nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni// rgya mtsho bzhi bltams pa ya khug su la cing// dbu dang nus pa khor yug ri rab tsam// spyan yang gang+ga'i bye ma snyad stsal to//
sngon zhi rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta// gnas dang gos dang mal zas skom dang// de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsam// rang byung mchog rab lan
mchod pa mdzad/ khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang na thos pa rtag tu ba ston// bar 'dzan mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// bya bar dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas
spyad sems can du ma nyon mongs thor par mdzad/ gang sngon khyed kyis smonalam btab pa ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/ rmubo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral/ 'jig
rten la yang shin tu chos bstan to// sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bskam par bya// sems can mang bo grangs med grong khyer gzud// sems can de dag dgongs pa yongs rdzogs shing// byang chub dam
pa la ni kani tu khod/ 'di ni lam khor sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos pa shig ma gon pos bzod par bzod// 'dirag sgrol cig dam pacas dgongs su gsol/ khaskal pa bye ba mang
bo'i chos ston to// mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rtan sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi chu yi khrus// mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'din 'ga' ma mchis//
bdag dgrol 'jig rten 'du deg grol bar mdzod// sring gsum rgya mtsho nas kyang 'gro ba sgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol//
denas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang dugshegs pa dang/ skad dug de nyid la lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srani bo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyazhung gdong mtshan can gyis
'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis bder gshegs ston mthong ba/ zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul// chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na/ de la 'ad lta bu ya bgags
ma byung// ston pa 'dan shan tu dus ngan lag/ rgya chen blo yas rang byung nyen bcus te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs sman mdzad slad du// 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing//
smra ba'i sangag 'don bzhugs bzhin du// sdig can dag ni bye ma stongs/ khod ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jigs par byed// sangs rgyas dang 'a bo grong du deng ma gshegs// de nas lha mo
gzhan zhig gas 'di skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// de dag yul gtsag 'kher la bskor gyur pa// 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de nas ma rung
@# @#/// bar n gyur ta re// de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// ded dpon 'di'i ni thugs rje'i skad// shin tusems can don mdzad spyad// de na de rang grong khyer

'di'i khamag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go/ yang de'i tshe lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong
mtshim zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bdag 'di la rnam pa mang po byed de/ lul na skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan
'grol/ la la ni gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan snyol/ la la ni bdag gi lus sa la rdob/ la la nas rtsom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la na shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni

lag pas brang rdung/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gro ldog/ la la na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod ri phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni bcom
ldan 'das la me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ gos dang/ phyang phrul dang/ gsar gyi skud pa dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ ras bcos bu dag mngon bar 'thor ro// de nas lha/
gzhan bye ba mang bos mgrin gcig du skadamathon bor 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi// bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab spyad// zad pa'i dus de 'dra'i na khyod skyes kyis//
0 btangasnyoms mdzod la ma gshegs bzhugs su gsol// sngag ma da khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung du mdzad// lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa'i n tu nyung// bzhi tu yun ringe chos rnams

ston cing khyod bzhugs la// srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol// dge ba'i las rnams pa spyod cing sa bon yongs smin te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'osems can du ma la// khyod kyis thug
rnabaskyed de so sor rab ston la// chu bo las ni 'jig rtan nyam thag sgrol bar mdzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dbus son 'khyams gyur cing// 'khor ba'i dgon par shan du lam stor ba// de dag la ni
lam mchog so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod// chos kyi 'khor la dam pa gang bskor ba// de na khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad/ rlabs chen thugs mnga'
ring du bzhugs su gsol// 'gro ba rnams nam gon mang ma gyur cig/ de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gas 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam 'dren brgya lam ma nung gyur na// 'jig rten 'di'i
ma lus ldongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir na yong ya thams cang ma mas 'gyur// jag lus sems las skyes dgas bon dag/ bdag cag bag yod
gyur pas 'dir btab ste// de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du
sogs 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sa 'di'i bya ba'i bdud rnams nyer lcags kyang// thub pa rlabs chen thugs mang nam yang na// ma rung ma 'grubaskyod
cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur// dpag tshad sum cu drug tu ma phyogs dang drag shul ldazhu pas rab tu bskor// rna sbrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgo mang
'dzags pa bdud kyi snga// byang chub snying po lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag 'gyur na// da ltar don b.ros grags pas khyab pa de lo ga la bgags shog byed// des lha mo

[%? ]gzhan zhagi du zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sngon byung ba na bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag da dung mi ni// 'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sgo shan tu da dung cha bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa
'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dgos// de brlago na na 'a jig rten 'di dgashAn du snang med 'khyam par 'ong// de nas brgya tsani dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dug gas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to// blo zhan bdag rug ga ni tshig gson to// dag ba bzhugs shig grachogo thugs rje can// lha mang bya ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs// de la

chos kyi bcud kyis da ga tor tsami// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs
kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// deng khyedam 'jags khyedan ma skrag cig/ bdud rnams thams cad bzhen bcas cag car du// tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nusan// nga ya lus kun la ni
smos ci dgos// deng ne'ajig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste// nga las rtag tus 'di'i chos bshad do// lam rnams stor ba la nang nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya// ngas sngon bya bar

dka' ba mang po byas// zas dang skom dag shazhe tu rgya chen byane// kha gnas dang sman la nga mi nyung sbyin byin pas// ngal deng su gnod pa byed par nus// ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang// lhab lhub

phyang phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang// bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang// ngal su zhage gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu bo bu mo branamang dang// yad 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal sridi
dang sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byan gyis// nga lus po 'di pa phyi'i 'jig par 'gyur/ mgo dang sna dang rna ba mag gnyiso dang// lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lag becas// ja ya srog
kyang lus can rnams la btang// su zhig nga la 'tsho bar byed par nus// ngas na sangs rgyas bya ba rab mngal// gus ldan bdag gse lag nas shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang
bzod la dga'// ngal su zhig rlag par byed par nus// ngas sngon shan tu bya dka' mang po rnams// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tung yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang ngal 'khrug med na//
la rnam par 'tsho bar su zhag nug/ nyon mongs sa btul nges pas sa rgyas// sems can thams cad la ni byams sems ldan// khro med phrag dog tha ba nga la med// nga yi
mdunand 'di su zhigenus// ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// sa bdud pham bya ba pham par byas// khyed kun rnam par thar pa nges par bya// grong dus phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig/
sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na// sangs rgyas l la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun nas bsogs// zhing
rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bye// bsod nams yashes dag gse gnas pa rang// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas// sas skyes dag gse dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i

lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbya'i dang srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnamakha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lo 'phya chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khri'i brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med
bdag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'degs so zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar chen po rmad du
byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshol la// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi de rab tu bsAl lo//
skya ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so// ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to// gzhi chu stags can rab tu dad pa bsgyur to// chu bo bzhi bskams so// chos kyi
sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do// byang chub kyi lam bstan to// bzod pa dang des pa la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la snyan skul dodo/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du tshud par
mdzad do// ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa 'jig rten skyo ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te// sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gri khyer du rab tu btsud do//
de nas lha dang mid dag gas bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas// bcom ldan 'das
kyi phyir lam de phyag bdar byas so// lha'i gos dang/ ma tog dang/ lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so// lha'i mi tog man da ra dang man dar ba chen po dang/ pa nu sha ka dang pa ru
sha chen bo dang/ ma sha ka dang/ many+tsasha ka chen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzesachen bo dang/ ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pangs kun tu g.yogs so// gang du bcomo
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i sa gnyis su lha'i mi brgyasna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon pa sprul te/ lta 'is bcos bu dang/ chu ge ga le phrang ba dang/

lag rgyan dang/ rnargyan dang/ mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to/ ganged dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzong bu grang zhing zhi ba'i chudang zhing rtog po tshad la yan lag brgya da dang ldan pa'i chos kun tu gang pa//

khor yug tu mi bo chasna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang dag sgrug te/ bar snang la 'apa ni bo chesna bdun gyi gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ kha dan dang/ gser kyi skud pa dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba bzang

zhang gsar gyi phyi ma dag gi char yang phab bo// dad pa dang/ sku'i phyi ma dang/ a ka ru dang/ rgya mos dang/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ tog la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab po// gor shasha

dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'achar yang lam der thab go/ lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gsar gyi skud pa dang/ mu tig ga 'thung ba dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan te/

grong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyi re lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
bzhin du lam nas gshegs so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de nas sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing
tshangs pas 'dul pa de dag gsan/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs pa mthong ba nas/ gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang/ gang dag sred med kyi bus
'dul ba dang/ gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang/ gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang/ gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis
'dul ba dang/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang/ gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag gzhon zhus 'dul ba dang/ gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag sang gis 'dul
ba dang/ gang dag glang po chos 'dul ba dang/ gang dag klos 'dul ba dang/ gang dag lha ma yan gyis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gas/ bcom
ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gsan/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
kyi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs pa mthong// sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo/

[n ]@#/// yang de'i tshigangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa'i drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/ de g.yog lnga brgya dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo drung
na sdod bas/ bcom ldan 'das drang grong gi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ rtsod lam dang/ bkod pa de lta bu s lam de nas gshegs shang

lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong sta/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du soms so// bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang
mi mis mchod par snang ngo// 'di ni lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan gang ma khas pa de la
lu ngas ji ltar brtag snyam sa/ de nas 'di ltar bdag gis bsu la rags dang/ rus dang/ gnas dang/ brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sams so// de nas drang srong skar ma la/
dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// thos ldan yade 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzan mchod pa'i rigs par snang// ye shes chos don ldan zhang thub mchog bzod
'ad lam rab mkhyen// khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor// yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mtha'i 'a spo ba'i legA bshad mnyan// de nas bram za'i khye'u
0/de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phya'i nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// khyodasu zhag/ khacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan bram ze'o/ gsol pa/ khyod kyi gdung rus
ci bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni go'u ta ma'o// gsol pa// khyod kyi brtul zhugs/ bka' sul pa/ dra'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo// gsol
pa khyod kyi spyod pa cu/ bka' sum pa/ ngan yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do// gsol pa// khyod kyis rab tu byung nas ji srid len/ bka' stsal pa//
ma rig pa byung nas ji sride lan pa/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no// gsol pa// drang srong chen po skar ma bshad pa lung bstano pa'i rogs pa gsung ma/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' sum pa/ sgro btags pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyis shes pa ste/ de la sAng po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gas gsol pa 2 mkhas pa rnams
dga' bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la rtan cing rdzasung+g+hala'i rgyu skar nyashu rtsa brgyad
brjod pa 'di dag go/ de la mdzuban sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i tshod kyis lus la srid duadzub bcu gnyis mchis par dag par bgyi// klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang
dang rkang pa'i mthal la mdzub gang dang badzub bcu bzhi ste/ skar ma rnams kyi gnas so// gang de dgan gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan ma 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la btsas pa de dang de na gda' 'o//
'dabang gang zhin/ de bshad par bgyis thub pa chen po gson cig/ sazhi drug la na su btsas pa// de yi gdong gi sor bzhin// g.yas phyogs na na smyo ba mchis// spu can gnag la
mdog kyang dmar/ longs spyod bdagacing grags dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te// smin drug la na myos pa yi// mtshan ma nyidi na de lags so// gang zhag lan sor bzhi na//
'gyu ts+tsa ba 'di nyidi gang ba de// snar ma la ni skyes pa ste// shes shing rtag tuchos la dga'// mkhas shing longs spyod phunasum tshogs// rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun
sum tshogs// dag rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms// mgul pa yazhimadzub phyadan// gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba// den mgo la rgyas pa ste// dpa' nang lengs spyod ldan pa'o//
mdzub kyi phyed po gnyas pa la// g.yon la sme ba gangamachis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blun shang longs spyod bdog/ mchan khung g.yon na smanagam chis// nang so la na skyes
0pa ste/ nor dang 'bru yang 'byor par 'gyur// de shis pa'i rgya yang chung// jiltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes// mtshan mchog dgazhi rab tu gda'// phyag gi mthal na 'khor ni// nyam
lta bur rab tumadzes// dbu skadag na thogs med kyang// rgyan du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku na chu zheng gab pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis nyon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang gi snying
gamachi// skag la skyes tethal mo srid// tshul khams 'chal cing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.yam la dga' ba'o/ 'og ba gam brang ngam rgyab gcige na// gang la bya sran 'dra ganga' ba//
ma chul skyes te nor dang ldan/ btsun 'ang chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na// gang la rma 'apagada' ba na// de na spyi la skyes pa ste// sa sna tsha zhang tsheyang thung
lta ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la rmi ba gadra' ba na// dbo la de skyes longs spyod can// khrims ldan 'chi'athos mtho ris mchis// ma bzhi la na skyos pa dag/ sme ba dmar po chu sob/'a//
sku zhangagayo ngan sgyu ma lta// bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan// gang ga mtshan n smra ba na// gda'i par gyur pa nges bar yang// nag pa la ni skyes ba ste// 'dod chags rtag tu glu gar gda'//
mtshan gyi 'og gam snying nan// sme ba ser po rab tu ba/da'// sa ra la na do skyes te// mi mkhas brgal zhing mang po sdang// brlagase7nemedzub gang na// skye ba dmar po de bzhin te// sa ga
[r ]@#// la stangashar ba mchog/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor// mkhas shing dpa' la dag yang thul// rtag tu de la gnas pa ste// ngo tshashes shange brtan dang ldan//
'bos nas namatho si chi// brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do// gang la bya sana'adu gda' ba// lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can// sa dang los spyod ldan pa'o// gang ga bama'og gnyis
nan a ba gda' ba snon la skyes/ mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal// dbul zhing snying rje a mchis so// pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na// gang la rna chung gda' ba de// sgrubs la skyes te dbang thang

can spyan du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid// chu stod la nasmyos pa dag/ sme ba dus mo'i lha nga na// sbyin pa bgyid na chos lam 'tshal// 'chi 'phos nas na mtho ris mchi// chusmad la ni su rgyas pa// dku 'do
la na smra ba las// de ltar gda'ab shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// ma pa gnyasi bo gda' ban// gro bzhan la sku 'dos spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad mod sems can byamA//
'chi'i bos nas na zhi glo se mcha// spyi bzhag bo rdzongar la// gda' ba mon grur skyes pa ste// de na khro 'onge 'dod chags chung// longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// ngas lan mdzub den// smra ba/
nag po rab tuganga'/ mon grel skyes blunub ste// de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur// ljongs 'og gi mdzub gang na/ rma 'dra mchis ba khrums stod la// smun shade gzhan la gnod pa bgyid// de na dbul
na rkun po bgyid// gang la sme ba mdzub gangan// khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste// spyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang// shes rab 'a jag med snying rjer ldan// gang ga rkang pa gnyis ka la//
ba phra mo gda' banA/ nam gru skyes pa ma rabs to/[” ]/'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag par yang// skye ba sngon po gda' ba na// rtag tu stobs ldan nar ma mchis//

tha skar la na da skyes te// rkang mthil spu ba mchis pa'i// bla nye la sta snying brtse med// gsod ma gshing ma'i ngang tshul can// shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi// gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba na// skar//
ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'dzag rten na na rnam shes 'das/[” ”]sems can rnams la rol 'bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pa gangal
chogs 'dus pa// nga na byas pa'i rmongs pa ste// sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas// khya dang sbrul deng rus sbal dang// srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang
skyes pa// de dag bde la rton ma yin// ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang// thar pa khyod kyis rtsod pa bzhi/nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na// ci phyir nga la khyod ma 'du// de nas drang srong sgar
ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan 'das la me tog gas gtor zhes/ de rab tu dga' na 'daskad ces gsol to// drang srongam a ba zug/sa su ni// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shan tu gda'// khyod kyi
gdung rus ma 'tshal na// lta 'am 'on tu khyod ma lags// gsung dang dbyas dag 'as pa na// tshangs pa chen po bzhin ngu gda'// spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis// sngon gyi
rAng srong rnams dang 'dra// thub bca'adra bun sum tshogs// 'disngon ma mthong la thos nas// khyod kyi ston gang dbasmA// khyod kyi gdung rus pa lags gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa pha rol tshu rol mi shis gang// man na lan gang gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings// rin thar pa'i snod ma yin// pha rol phyin drug nga ya rtses// bram ze mngon shes drug dang

ldan yang dag dga'i bya drug smra zhing// dbang po drugazhi rnam par gzhag/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum// byang chub sems na zhim skyes pa// nga 'a nga na'i ba
tu byang// mchanam rnams nangs ma dmigs// mtshan ma med par rab tu bsgoms// sems can med cing srog med pa// bdag med stong par sngon sangs rgyas// chor ba gsum dang 'du byang gsum//
stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms// nga ya ye shes pha rol song// nga ya tshoge 'ad mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkhas bzhazhim chags par// byang chub phyir na sems bskyed pa// de dag bzod
stobs phun sum tshogs// ye shes 'di 'dra 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams la rnam 'jug cing// rnam par smin pa 'dod mod la/ de bzhin nyid las 'gal ma byed// de dag byang chub rnyed
mi dka'// chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing// ba la tshu rol ma brten par// yang dag mtha' na 'dare bsgoms// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang
mad dmigs pa dgan rnam par spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang ga mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la// rang gi sems la the tshom spongs//
nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su// nga 'drar sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chags su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog
dang bcas bas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam du bzhugs par mthong nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas drang song skar ma la dga'

bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas[”]ting nge 'dzazhi thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting nge 'dzazhi thams cad kyis ma 'phrogs par

gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bo che tog ces bya ba thob po// de nas drang srong sar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyas na mo tog thogs te/ bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag gis mtshon par bstod do// yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi yi shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyas na 'jag rten
kun snang mdzad// rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gsar
gyi kha go gsar dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsal gyur pa'i// yon tan dag gas sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs
rnams bcom par gyur/ tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyun de range mthar phyin to// sman pa chen pos sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis rab brgyan pa// sems can snying bo sangs rgyas
'gyur ba'i 'dren pa de 'ang bshad du gsol// bdag gas lta ba'i lo bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur pa'i mi ya dam pas lung bstan gsol// sdug bsngal
chu bos bdas pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho
lta bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu na sems gzhol bgyi/ drag tsang mi bzad snub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun// dus gsum gyi na bdag ga lus
dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de rang zhi bar gyur cagi sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyis zhi bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'da' bar shog/ sems can thams

can nd zhar gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams pa shog/ ngo bo stod kyis ye shes dbang po sAng po ldan pa thob gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gsad par chad cang sdug bsngal dag gis gtsos pa rnam ga de dag
bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog/ sems can re res kyang na yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad bor gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis rig pa ra shog/

de dag sdig pa rnams spyas lta ba mnyam pa nyidadu bstan gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skye ba dran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can de kun chos thub srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgyal gyur cig/ thams

cad chos kyis pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog// bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char yang 'bebs shange 'dug gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi spun gyi char chus 'au0f38gas ra ra'akhu
bar shog/ bdag gas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol te gus par byas nas so sor bshags// bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta
ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis ma khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod namArung da mi mchis deng nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi//
sems can tshad du spyod ba kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzud par bgyi// bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can
[z/ ]tsha/ mtsho rnam par sbyang na bgyi// gang du byang chub reg 'gyur 'ang yang rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa' sa la rab tu gnas par shog
sla ba'i sa nga ge nges par mngon pa shes pa lnga rnams thob bar shog/ 'dren pa tshegs med pa shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos
kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhan/ cha tog sal ma gtor ba nam mkha' la na gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin ma rnams lhags pa kun kyang dpang byas shag/ sa rnams
g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ma tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i stang logs su gtor ba dang/ ma tog sde dag thams cad
bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi stang du gdugs gcag tu gyur nas 'dug sta/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zang mad rang mchog tu dga' ba dang/ pa de bde bas tshig
pa skyes par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ btsem ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyas la gtugs so// drang song chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs

gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tug yos so// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa
gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang/ yang mi skyo nang ltad mor gyur to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis// bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yod

dga' bar gyur cing// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas ma tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la ga dugs su gyur te gnas pa dang/ sa ga chos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i phams can de dag thams cad kyis na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to//

de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzan las bzhengs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gas ting nga 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing med pa mchog tu dga'/
ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phrang pa dang/ byug pa dang/ na bza' phyang phrul dang/ rgyan ji snyed pa de dag gis gter to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i ts+tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsungs// mnyam pa med pa'i mthus nas g.yos shing// nam
mkha' la yang me tog ga dugs gcig 'dug/ khyod ni 'jig rten yin pa'i ston dbang ngo// rkang gnyis dag ga gtso bo sangs rgyas su// bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshodamanyam ba// khams
gsum snying por 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag

sa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ca 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa zha/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhinge cha tog/

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ ban mod pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med sgos lcang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur te// khyod kyi tsho'i tshad ni bar gyi

skyabaskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhange de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med tsang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su gyur te/ khyod kyang de na thag
pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro// 'khor ji snyed lhag pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba lung bstan pa de mthong nas/ bcom
0 ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson par gyur to/ bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te// de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyis mas mi brjod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// 'dus ba chen po ri'i
go cha tog ga gzungs las drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas bdud bye ba dag gad snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i sgo de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas

brgyan to snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bya ba de dag gi sems kyis kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'ad 'du ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ji lta

bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus ba gnyasi grong khyor gyi sgo rir nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por

gshagos so// bdud bya ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhi'i du/ bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shani tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gangs med pa dang ldan pa// bkod pa'i mchog
rnams dang/ bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang/ sa'i phyogs de dag dang/ rtsig pa de dag dang shang de dag dang/ sa'i sa de dag brgyan to/[}]

bdud bya ba de dgadang ( bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la dag ni tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bskyar te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsigs pa de dag gi skar khung/
dang rta babs dang/ ba gam dang/ skyod shang ga nang na me tog dang/ thos dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ gsor dang/ dngul dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tage sna tshogs kyis sbrus pa dang 2 gos dang/

za ras dang/ ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang/ lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phang/ sal snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs na dkrol nas/ bstod ra dang yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan

tshu 'das la mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/
zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i tham pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i thim pa de la rig ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jag
rten gyi khams 'di rab tugayos so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'a jage rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'cho dang/ zla ba dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang dbang
phyug chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbya'idang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma'am ci dang/ lta'aphya chen po'i dbang po dag dang/ sa dang/ chudang/ rgya mtsho chen po
dang grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor gyi lha dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'ud nga/ bu mo dang/ lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang/ 'og man gyi bar nas bzung sta/ sems can gza brjid che ba

gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shang/ me tog dang sbos dus

kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyi ma'i bar gyis/ com ldan 'das la gtor te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma tog dang/ bya ma bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha ra ra na yang sangasaN+yas kyi zhing rdul phra rab/

kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa dang/ stong pa dang/ ma steng pa rnams su/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu ma tog dang/ phyi ma dang/ rgyun de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo// myur du sad par gyis la 'dadig ltos// byang chub phyir na bag yod spyad pa spyod// khyod kyis 'khor ba'i
gcong rong 'khyams pa ya// 'jagi rten thams cad jagan bsgral par byos// yongs su sman dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis// g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thod la// 'di'i na sngon gyi dam bcas yade la byos/
