byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshags// bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de//
pang na chos kyi 'khorale myur du skor/ 'grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpal mchog dngos bo yang dag ston pa mdzad// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas// byang chub tun de rang
lub yang ston// rang byung mya ngan med pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la// de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab ltes te// rim gyis byang chub tu na nga 'gyur bar byas// yang

de'i cha'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ nyan thos dang/ nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gas ston pa de la bltas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhisashang 'dug pa mthong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan

'das kyi snyam legs su 'khod pa dang/ bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo// de nas me tog dang phyi ma'i rgyun de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su

dag kha dang/ yongs su ma dag pa dang/ stong ba dang/ ma stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sas rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dba' sems dpachan/

bo dang/ nyan thos chan bo gang dag gnas pa de dag gi sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'ad lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa
'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu/ yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'ad lta bu'i sgra 'dadang/ ma tog dang phyi ma'i char 'dang ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dbang chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dag ba'i phyogs btang ste/ mtshar cher 'dzazhi par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ sangs

rgyas kyi rgyan dang/ lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang/ lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cha mad 'di dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu snang ste/ 'dal
sa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam bar dagatsang/ rdul bsags pa med ces bya bar yang gangs rgyas kyi shang ga yon tan bkod pa 'di
'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ ga sa pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du'ang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhazhi
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas shan tu lham me/ lhan ne/ ltang der bzhugs par byung ba na ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang

zabyang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang/ phyogs bzhi'i lta zhang 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mimajed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug

par mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyud dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo// dunas byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen bo de dug dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du

tshu soms te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang/ brtag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la'ang blta ba dang/

phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyi'i der 'dong ngo// der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i ng thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul nyid thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs ra kya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus

rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig tshud tsam de nyid la 'jag rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i phyin te// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni nas kyang/ byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tumadang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad thams cad sa dang nam mkha' bar ma lus
par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyis rgyamathun pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhazhugshegs
pa shAkya thub pa la ma chod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gse na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so// la la dag gas na mu tag gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gas zhi gsar
dang / dngul dang/ ba skrun dang/ shel dang/ rdo'i snying po dang smug dang/ gor sha sha dang/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying bo dang/ shing ta a la'i lo ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas
so btsacho ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gas ni lhab lhub dang/ phyang phrul dang/ rgyan dang/ ras dang/ ras bcos ma sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gsan rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sA chogs sgrung ngo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gse na spos sna tshogs
@#// kyis bdugs so// la la dag gas na rin po cha'i 'phreng ba sA tshogs gtor to// la la dag gas nasal snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol le// la la dag gse ni glu dang/

gar dang/ la mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gas na sa phyogs der sgros mus tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo// la la dag gse na zhe po che sna tshogs kyi stod rnams rin po chesA chogs kyis bkang

ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/ tshe tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs

so la la ngag gse ni rin po cha'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang/ rgyan dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'ong ba stod de thogs so// la la dag gsan bdag nyidi tshangs pa chen po'i

cha byad du mngon par sprul te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas ta'akhod pa nas/ rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// la la dag gas na song ga'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das

ya la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mag gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thag thogs
med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po la rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang/ rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag bar sbyong ba dang//
rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bya'i gyarlabA kyis//
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshags nas/ srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod ba ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthal gyis pad+ma'i snying bo la rag par
mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so// bang de drangs te g.yos pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang/ ri'i khor yug chen po dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ rgyam chen bo dang/ bdud kyi
gnas thams cad rnagazhal med khang dang/ gnas khang dang/ lam dang/ stana rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang/ bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang/ bdud kyi
bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jages skug cang skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun bde skad ces 'dzor to// rgya mad rkyen mang par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag
gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang/ bdag cag kyang khang ba 'di nas 'chi'apho ba' chos 'byungobar mi 'gyur grang/ bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis
mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sAgs ma lnga can du gyur zhu 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// de nas rang gi yul na gnas
bya// pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na'akhod bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub par skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan chung shan tu
ba lham che/ lhan na/ lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo// thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzag rten gyi khams 'di deng/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems
pa can gazugs ngang/ kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gas yongs su gnas sems can gcig kyang ngo ma shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan

'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par mthong ngo// de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang gang ltar

bdag cag jo bo dang ga mog tu b.rus pa ga' dadaba'ang dra ba'i phyi'i der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas yang de'atsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'il dud bye ba phrag brgya bo di dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas
par/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba/
btud nas 'ad skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnam par dad sems kyi// bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi// bdag khrel 'di nas myur du 'chi/ chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' su la ga/ 'gro ba dang ni'ong ba yang// ngas na su yang bzlog pa med// gal te laman ba shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'ad skad ces gal
to/ rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar// gang tshe bdag 'chi'atshal tshe// bdagazhi bcang ba lta dag gis// ba cinges par mthong ngo ga'u tag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni rtog
ba rgyun spangs to// grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa// ngas ni 'tsho ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings pa thar par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di thams cad s dang nam mkha' la gnas pa 'asems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di ngag bka' stsal to// 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang//
phatshom thams cad rab spongs la// skad rgyag ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams nang nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing mos pa//
'byor pa dang// byang chub spyod pa shani tu dkon// 'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkog/ gang du bzod pa stan byed pa// de yi dus rid par dka'// gang du
'jig rten sdug pa yi// rtog pa thams cad rab sgong ga/ stong pa nyidi na sgom pa dang/ sems zhi dul bar byed pa da ken// ji ltar ngas sngon spyad pa yi// byang chub spyod ba red bar dka'// de las ma
tog tsam mchod 'di// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa/ 'asred pa ba bcanges las rnam grol zhing// mun pa'i phung po sel ba pa// lam
gyis chog ni bstan par bya// dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsung ba 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams na pha rol rgol/ rgya mo can gyi srid pa spongs// rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing//
lasdom pa gsum la yang dag nos// khams gsum gyi ni nyon mongs gang// de dag ma lus rnam par chos// dkon mchog gsum gyi rogs mchod dang// chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams//
sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma ragi bsgrabs pa'i sems// bye brag tu na ra ba thongs la// khams gsum pa las grol ba yi//
zhi byed bzod pa thob par byas// phyin nileg zhi rnam cazha yas// so so'i skya bo bslad pa rnams// dngos po med la rtog byed pa// de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin// mag ni gzugs la chags pa
yis// lus dang ngag dang sems nga sgrubs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'kher bshan tu rten par gyur// 'jig rtenan zhigang mkhas gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams/
de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzha los thar par byed// 'chi'i pho skye bar rab shes pa// des pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro//
0 byang chub sems dang ba 'dzageb med pa// rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dgu/ sems can sradi pas bcings pa rnams// yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las

grol zag pa med// yang dang yang du mi skye ste// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed// sdig pa dag na myur du shogs// sdig pa ma lus rab sdongs la// 'jigs pa
mad par ba rol song// srid par yang dang yang skyes pa// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po rab
spangs te// sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor nuse// btung ba'i dam pa btung bar byos// stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig/ dam

ba'i don la dngos po med// rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyade mad/ 'a'adi ltar dbang po drug stong sku// byed pa po na 'od la med// de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang// dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med// tshor
badrug dang sred pa drug/ rig pa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong ba yin par shes par byos// rang bzhin gyis na dngos med par// dngos po nyidi la brtag par byos//
skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// 'di ni rjes kyang med pa ltos// gangags chos kun tshul gcig ste// dus gsum du yang dngos med par// shes pa de dag nad med de// de ni bla na med pa'i lam//
nom pa po nub sum nges grol la/ sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing// tshurol pha rol rnam grol ba/ 'du ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das

kyi bsod nams kyi gong sa rnams dang/ ma 'jags pa'i shugs dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs

ba de'i mod la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang/ mi stong pa snyags ma lnga can gang+ga'i klung dbag dumed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byi tha snyad rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag

grags par gyur nas/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni dung zang mod pa'i dga' ba dang dad pa rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang

ngag par rdzogs par pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ la la dag gse ni ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ gzungs sna tshogs thob po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med
zla dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang/ tshig dang/ ya gi 'du dag thos nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dgan/ theg pa gsum bo dag gas

nges par 'byung ba thob bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen bo skar ma la dga' bas bad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skasaM
sam tog gag kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen pa rga shamya ngan gyi// 'dam du byang ba'i
'jig rten thams cad la// rab tugazugasaM ta ma rgya rgyur bcas kyi// 'jig rten du na chos kyi zam pa thogs// thal mo sbyar ba sems can chen rgyas// rab tu bltams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas
su chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol// rang gi mthu rtsal rnam par bstan du gsol// mtshungs ba yod pa ring mngon 'dzegs te// mgon po shes rab can gyi thabs rnams kyis// sros

chu'i sprin gyi char pa rab phob la/ nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol// phyogs bcu dgu ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang// drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dang nga du de dag kun
bzhugs kyis// thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod// chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang// ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod
la/ bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol chubo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// ma yi sang gas de rang bsgral du gsol// khyod kyi chos rnams shan tu thugs su chud// srid gsum mtsho
las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol// shani tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi khaman ba da ba la// 'gro ba gzud mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston/ 'jig rten nyis pa'i/
dri ma bsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bur sprul pa khrom skas de las pa skya'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te rang dang po la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas/ bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi skyon gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas/ sems can grangs med
dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang/ gshas gtso ba rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar par 'gyur/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/

nam mkha' dang ma tshungs pa'i yi shes khong du chud par 'gyur/ 'ad la sdig can khyed ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can

khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang/ ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyi'i chos bstan to// de nas bdud sngag chun gyis de'i tsho tshigs su

bcad pa 'di smras so// phyis sdig mo byed la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags mang na// ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyi'i chos kyang ston/ de ste khyod la tha brgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni// thub dbang khyer
kyi thar pa ba'i dra bdag la 'dir shod rug/ pa com ldan 'a das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga na ma la mang 'gyi gnas na zla ba bcu gzhas ba// de na yang na bdud khyod nga la gsad par ragatu
00 gyur/ de tshod la len dang tha ba cung byed tsam yang med// nga na ba 'od dang ldan te pha ba ma lus med pa yin// nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas// nga gsad phyir
ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas// de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yaM zhu zho myur bskams byas// khyod kyis nga la gnod pa du ma rim byas// dun bsam gtan zhugs na khyed kyis bud mod
khrid de 'ongs// nga na bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tsho zas kyang bcad par byas// khyod kyis de tshang la rgyal sa de mngon par rab tubatab/ nga na byung ba'i nub mo 'a der yang mun pa byas par
gyur/ de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun tu bskor// rdzu 'phrul byas nasong ste rje char drag po phab// sa na 'dem do 'phang tsag rdob dag gis gang bar byas/ zhi ba'i gnas na gnas

pa'i tshe yang sgra na rab tu byung// nga na shin tu dka' ba spyod tshograng ba'i rlung dngan 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tubatang// nga na gsad bar byaphyang khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang// de tshe

khyod kyis nga yi bras la drag po'i dug kyang btab// nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba yi// rdo rjadang na gzham lugs spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab// 'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la

mngon par gnas pa na// khyed kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'jami ljab dag gis rab tu bskus// de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste// da gsad phyir na khyod nyidi mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/
@#// 'on kyang khyod kyis nga ya yod la gnod byas cung zad med// ngas na khyed btul nas na byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang ngo mtshar bor ta'adar 'ongs nas niya pa
ma 'am// sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srungs mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas// khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma nad byas nas kyang// sAng rje ba'o ti 'da'i 'o ngos da la rgol 'dze smra byed dam/

pa ngan zun ma zos pa'i tsho yang khyod kyis su// nga ga sad phyir na glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang// sa steng nga la lhas byin gyis na rdo la 'phangs pa dang// kye ma ngas na zla ba gaMsum du rta

chas zos pa dang// phyar ka gtang phyir ngu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang// ma mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'ongs rnams ba 'dang ba dang// kha zas dag na myur du gdug ba'i dug dang sbyar ba yi// de la

sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin// khyod nyade dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sdor bcas 'ongs nas su/ gang gsad phyir na mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang sdigs// 'on kyang 'od re na khyod kyis nga

yi spu gcig ma g.yos na// ci phyir khyod na rgyags par gyur nas 'di na da dung 'dug/ rtsi sa bdun na stong brag bya ba rgol du yang btsud kyang/ sems can khrag khrig dag na 'di ru yang dag lhags nas su//

zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga la dbang yon te// nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa 'a yid kyis gzhas par bya// nga na snying rjes kho nas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzazhi byed pa// khyed na shin tu gtum po da la

rtag tung gags khyad de// thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga ya dpang yan gyis// da ltar tha ma 'dus la nga na sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya/ rnam thar soms kyisis can rnamA kyi don yang spyad par bya

skyas bar gyur pa'i ng bzod pa yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ dang la phug rog tha ba rab tu khre ba'i yade med de// khyod ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dang khyod nyidi zhe phyir
'jig rten gsum dag tu// mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad bar bya// de khyod kyi sngage pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis/ 'jig rten mgon bo nga la don myur du
dung bar byos// khyod ni rtag tu 'ad na gnod par bya ba rab sems kyang// khyod dgrel phyir na nga snying rtag tu byams pas ra ra tu dang// sdug pa'i blo gros 'or la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang//
rang bor ma thogs khyod na byang chub tu mang lung bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la khros te 'khrugs shing rnams nas/ de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang/ bdag gi mgul pa pachung pa
lngas bcangs pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das dgrong ba'i phyir/ rang khros pa'i mthus shazhi tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yad du 'ong ba'i ma tog tu mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shange 'tshol gzhes te/
chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug ga drang thad kyi sang ga bar snang la shan tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byan gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kha ba/so la pa/ ma tog gi gdugs 'ad de ga ga las mchis/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'gas/
bcom ldan 'das de dag gas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'dzag rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rang tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'a sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs ra ra sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de de ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa// stobs dang 2 mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul

thams cad mthon por byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma rang du gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'bal ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin

gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa dang/ dgra dang phas kyi rgol pa thams cad shAn tutshar gcod par byed pa// ngo tsha mtshar dang/ bkra ma shis pa dang/ rtsod ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ mu ge
0 dang 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang/ 'thab pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ 'chadeb dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ char ma 'bab pa dang/ dus ma yazhi par zhange grang ba dang/ rlung dang/ tsha ba dang/
nad dang/ sgra mi snyan pa de thams cad rab tu zha bar byed pa// lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ mdang/ ma ma yin pa thams cad 'dun bar byed pa/ rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs
ba rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi rten la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu ston pa// khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs
dang yul dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ yul 'khor thams cad 'dun ra ra byed pa// gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ nyin par dang/ mtshan mo dang/ rdzu pa gcig dang/ zla ba phyang deng/
dus dang/ lo thams cang 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'phu dung/ sman thams cad grub par byed pa// bzo dang/ las kyi mtha' dang/ gnas dang/ byin gyi
rlabs dang/ dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yade kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ba/ rig pa dang/ dran bdang/ blo gros dang/ mos pa dang/
dpa'i ba dang/ brtan pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa// chos thams cad la sgrub pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa// 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis
chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po son par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa ra ba tsal bar byed pa// sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa// phyir mi ldog
ba'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i mas byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/ ma skya ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa dang/ dbang bskur pa'i chos dang/ lcang chub la
gzhol bar byed pa// gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzan pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/ sems can thams cad la snyape chen pos khyab par byed pa/ phra rol tu phyin pa la
zla 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa// chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi res soms can thams cad tshim par byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa mtha'
dag yongs su rdzogs par byengang/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar bar byed pa// phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su 'jog par byed pa// chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje
tshu lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do/ ]'das pa 'a de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos ma nyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi sAng bos lus 'joms pa zhes bya pa'i gzungs thag dang/ tshig rab tudabye ba
la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so// byin gyis brlabs so// gartsami la gcig rjes su dgyes so// gang dag de ltar phyogs btsunas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
gzhos la/ chos kyang ston ba'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi Ang pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rang
tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so// byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes ba tsha dzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyikhamA gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyidi rdo rje lta bu ba rten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag

rgyu dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug ba lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// gtsage la gcig rjes ludagyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis/ so so'i sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rug gas sngon ma thos pa chos ma'am/

nyidi rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos byas ng pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang bo bgyid panas/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam
gyis ma khyab ba dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i sbung ba bgyi ba nas/ zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ sa mnyam pa nyidi rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos
kyi snying pos lus 'a joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ ga ra yatu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa// phung po'i

lhag ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i de byanges su mya ngan las 'dus pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo
phal po che dang/ lha dang/ ma rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad du/ de bzhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo// de ltar phyogs cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho ba zhes pa de dag
thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa//
sa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhazhe gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ ngan par spyod pa'i las

las bzlog pa dang/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang/ bla na med pa'i a shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phu'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'dzoms pa
zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgyu dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ g.ye gal gnag rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jag rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus na/ byang chub sems dang/ 'i tshegs kyis bskor rung/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa 'di rdo rje lta bu brten

pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa du lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi

snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tudabye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad dus gcig tu

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang/ chos de'ang nyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha'i yul dang/ bdud kyi yul thams rud dang [7]
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang/sangs rgyas mang bo 'dus pa sngon ma thos ma thong ba blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang/ nged kyang lhan cig tu'ajig rten gyi khams ma
mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen bo de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la'ang phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ chos nyan par dzothogs pa ltan/ de bzhin du

[R ]bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyade rdo rdzolta du brtan pa'i chos kyi snying
bos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tudabye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtsug na/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshod chod pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// der bdag cag gas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa/
0 bzhas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de'ang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'i go/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'dza?g rten gyi khams der 'a jug pa'i

gnas dang go skabs kyi bya'i de ltar the tshom ma za zhig/ de ltar shem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi yi
nas la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa na mtha' yas so// rigasakyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so//
rigs kyi bu ngag yongs su brtag pa gzung// sems can gang la la sas gyi khams su bsdu ba bsdus pa khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i soms can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang rarab tsam du
gyur zin kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams rtsed yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go
skabs yangs to/ soms can de dag phan tshun mig rgyang gis kyang mi slobs so// yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang grwa ba 'am gang par yang mi mngon te//
@#// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang grwa ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i
khrams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gtsug lag steng du 'jog nus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng dusa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bye ba 'am gang bar
mi mngon/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yong gang cung zad gshar bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegA

lta ba bshAkya thub pa des chu khams de thams cad sgra'i rtsa mo gcig tu chud par nus la/ sku'i rtsa mo gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad chud kyang dri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu drug gzhan yang

la ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la/ ma'i khams de

khu/ thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shan tu yangs te rang bag yul bzhan du rgyug/ rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yong gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin

po gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des spu'i khung du de gci+ig tu 'jug zhus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad spu'i khung bu de gcig na gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'igo/ rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang

sa de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des gang phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cud kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gsad du 'jog par

nus te/ rdul gcig la sems rtsade dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams rtsod pas kyang gnasashin tu yangs par rgyalta/ phan tshun gnod pa'i ng med la/
rdul gcig gi rtsa mo de'ang bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon te de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba de ni thabs mkhas ba de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can

rnams kyi skye mched drug dang/ spyod pa nye bar len pa dang/ smon lam dang/ byin gyi rlabs dang/ tshig galam gyi sgra dang/ ya gi dang/ tshig brjod pa dang/ 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang/
phung bo dang/ dpyod pa dang/ gsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa jisnyad pa dang/ gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' chu nas gzus te/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na

srid pa 'grub pa dang/ 'chi' bo dang/ skye ba 'byung ba drang/ sa 'a khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skang cig thang cig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyid pa
dang/ se mas can thams kyi dus gsum dugatogaso ba'i sbu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum dugatogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa dang/
khyade ba dang/ sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyad pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub padis skad cig gcig 'a rnab tu mkhan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par khrel pa dang/ mngon par shes pa'i yi shes 'ad lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi ma shA' yongs su mkhyen to
rigs kyi bu rag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug nga 'i ye shas 'a na khas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis soms can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad mang pa dag

ka 'di lta bu dang ldan no// mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa rig na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub se mas dpa' brgya stong gangs ma dadapag tu med pa dag
smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// 'dud pa chen po rin po che tog ga gzungs las/ mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o/ pa ya nga de'i tsho shar phyog

legs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' na de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul/

rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs bar chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i dbus kyi gang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi cha sa su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang

rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyod pas pad+ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khong ngo// de la sogs bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu

med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi ba'i 'dzag rten gyi khams su byon to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang nyan thos bye ba khrag khrage brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byonato/ byon nus kyang pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs legs nas de bzhin gas ba rin chen tog ces bya ba
byon nas de pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying bo la bzhugs so// yang de'i
nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med sa bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying bo la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshogs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba
byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// stong ga phyogs legs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer ces bya ba// byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'

chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangs med dpag tu med pa b+hA'i klung ga bye ma snyad kyi sas rgyas kyi 'dre ga rdul snyad dang thabs cig tusangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'thul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
de nas gshegs par rgyas pa dang/ sems kyi skad dug ga/gol songs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems nar 'a chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod nams dang/ rdzu 'dzul
gyi stobs kyi byan gyi rlabs kyi pad+ma'i stan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i

thu'i la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo// gong du smos ba bzhin du sbyar te 1 la kha ngagabs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bshong ba byas so// la la dag chos nyan ngas bskor nas sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar ta' khod do// la la dag gas na rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// sa nga de'i zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sa thal mo sbyar par ng gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu

ki/ dngasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyad du sa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na lus par dbyangs kyis nga kang sku 'di skad ces smras so// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thub ba zla ba kun nas gzhag/
sngon chad ma mthong ma shes pa'i/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'dasnang// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang pas// zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste// zhinganams
kun gyis phyag byas so// gang nas mas can smad pa yi// zhing na snyigs ma lnga can 'di'i/ thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang mi gshegs// derd bdudangamatshar gcad cing//
ba po'i phyogs na rang gzhon dang// spong ba dag ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de la don du kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tudang byos la// bdud snga rab tu 'joms pa yi// chos nyid zhi bar ba nyon la//
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byas// theg pa chen po'i spyod ba'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs thams cud zad bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di derang mnyan par byos// gdan
rnams la bzhugs nas su// sung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyi'i// de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams na spyan drongs shig dam chos yun ma gnas bya'i phyir// sgrub pa thams cad
zhi byed pa// chos rnams thams cad bsdus pa yis// gzus 'dug zhanagyis mi thub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bad pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa desnyed kyis mgrin gcig tu
skad ces ba so la to// sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das rnams bda' bgadan 'di dag la bzhugs te 'deng thugs chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'a mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa/

mi gtsug pa'i skye gzun pa 'o/ dpa/chos thams cad sdud pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa// bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgrung

bar bgyid ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dzoms pa/ khu thams cad tshar gcod ba/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes la ba dzud pa// 'dzam gas pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/

dgra thams cad srung ba/ bla na med pa/ byang chubs mas dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mos pa ma brjed pa gcod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang yi shes la mkhas pa
kun tu ston pa// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang/ byin gyi rlabs dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang [.]bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang pa 'i yi shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas/

[c]mkhyang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying bo 'dzin pa 'ibar gyi gzungs 'dasems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang/ kha dog dang/ longs spyod dang/ stobs dang/ grags pa dang/ bde ba la reg
par gnas pa dang/ spobs pa dang/ dran pa rnam par 'a ral pa dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang/ dgra thams cad pham par bgyi ba dang/ la tog ma ngon par 'grub pa dang 1 bslab pa 'a dzan

pa dang/ dran pa'i snod du gyur ba dang/ spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub yang dag par thob ra ra bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'di 'dar bdar na cig la
bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjesasu gzung ba dang/ unarang du gnas pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rlab ma 'chol ba dang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi se pa na mtha' dag bstan pa dang/
yang dag pa'i mtha'adang/ nam mkha' dang/ de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang/ chun pa dang/ snang ba dang/ dmigs pa dang/ ma dmigs pa dang 2 tshul dang/ pha rol dang/ rtog pa dang/
rnam par rtog pa dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang/ chos thams cad ma skyabangang/ mi 'byung ba dang/ ma 'gag pa dang/
mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos bo ma mchis shang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyar ma mchis pa dang/ sa dang/ chu dang/ mo dang/ rmang/ nam mkha' dang/ rnam par shes pa 'i khams dbyer ma mchis
ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'di'i bdag rug la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'a'i thos ma thag tu sems can bya ba
khrag khra bo brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan pa byed bar gyur cig/ sems can grangs med
[59]@#// dbab/tu chod ba dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems brgyud pa dang/ pa'i mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ lung bstan pa thob bar gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ chos bstan pa'i phyir cang ma kha/sungapar gyur pas gnang nas ba'i snying bo de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtog
pa sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba ra 'gyur ba dang 1 dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyur dran pa dang/ dad pa dang/ dang ba dang/ mos ba med par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs
rgyas pa com ldan 'das rnams ni bong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri pagatogs pa'i soms can rnams kyi sa mas da nga sems las byung pa rnams la 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/

lta ba ngan pa dang/ rgya lo dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa dang/ 'jage tshogs la lta ba dang/ btsom dang/ nye bar len pa dang/ srid pa'i srid pa kun gaTha 'anyis pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang 3sems can

so so nas 'di snyam du bdag cag gcig pu de bzhazhi ga/ shegs pa'i spyan snga na chos nyan pa'i phyi re 'dug go/ 'dan gzhan ni su'ang mad do// bdag cag gcag pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug sa thams ca da kyig

gongs te/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyi'i tshog ston bar nga zhed do// 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi
yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyide la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// yang de'i rmi gang sangs rgyas kyi 'dem lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad brten te/
thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin ga cig tu 'daskad ces gsol to/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag rug la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag caga' bshad
du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas pa rtsom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos zhan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des/ sangs rgyas kham ldan 'dis gzhan rnams

lamachod pa'i phyi'i/ spos bkod pa las shan tulhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byon gyis pa rlabs po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
lhag ma rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lagan rin po che dang/ ma tog dung 'phung ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa sba tshogs dang/ gdugs
dang rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub sna chogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad phyogs

banu' 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dra'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar thag tu nyon mongs pa can stegs/
bya@#/// ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag bas rdzogs pa 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs rgyas/ sems can bsam pa nyams pa 1 lam ral du skyor ba
zla ma rag pa'i chun pa dang rab rib kyi lang tog gis nyon mongs pa 'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dag pa dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ thabs mkhas pa
[R thams cad kyis yongs su spangs nga/ mtshams med pa byed pa// dam pa'i chos skyong ba/ 'bags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i

slang du/ snying brdung ba dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang/ dro ba dang/ rlung dang/ tshab dang/ la ba dang/ chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong khyen dang/ grong
rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul dang/ yul 'khor du skung gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtsub pa dang/ nyung ba dang/ ro med pa shazhi tusnyad pa ma mthun pa'i zas
za bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dgeba'i rtsa ba bskye dpa'i spyad daspomapa snub pa/ reg na ma bde ba/ sha na dang/ shing bal dang/ gso ma'i ras dang/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ra dang/ ri'i

su la dang/ nags stug po dang/ grong stong pa dang/ dur khrod du gzhis par bgyi ba nas/ rtswa 'a mal cha dang/ gso ma dang shang ga 'dab ma rtsub pa/ dri ma zhim pa/ regan mi bde ba'i mal cha spyang par
bgyi'o/ bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas/ sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang
dbang phyug ga ba tam bgyi'o// bram ze rnams la na rig byed dang skar ma'i gtam dang/ blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha' gtam dang/ sman pa rnams la ni khams dang/ sman dang/ sgrub
ba'i gtam dang/ chod pa rnams la ni nyo tshong gi gtam dang/ dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon bar zhen pa'i gtam dang/ bud med rnams la na la deg dang/ rgyan dang/ bu dang/ phyag ra dang/
'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang/ dge sbyong rnams la na bzod pa dang/ des pa dang/ las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o/ sems can yongs su sman par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob po thob par
bgyi ba dang/ mngon sum du ma bgyis po mngon du bgyi bar gzud do// ma thar pa rnams thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par

bgyi ba'i smad du/ yul rgyu bar bgyi'o/ de la rtsod kyi sems can ' de dag zhi de na bdag la gshe'o// mi snyan pa thor nod[° ]/phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyab bdeg la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa
'debs so// kha gsag dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ skya dang/ g.yo dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ zhe gcod pa dang/ bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur po 'debs so// bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag gsang
@#// ba'i phyir mtshonadang/ dug dang/ ma dang/ 'khor lo dang ka mda' bo che dang/ mda' dang/ ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ dgra sta dang/ rdo dang/ mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so//
bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang bo chadang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ ma bu dang/ spang kyi dang/ phag rgod dang/ rman po che rnams kyang 'gyod do// bdag ga gnas dang/ gnas khang
dang gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang bo dang dwa nga bas 'gangs so// bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du zhugs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dar tshul ma yin pa

khyad du btsud de/ thabs brgya stong du las bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no// bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sol ba dang/ chos kyi
gru gzhag pa dang/ bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/
ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dore 'as pa chen po mdzad nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul mun ring du gnas par bgyi
pa'i sgyu ba dang// bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba 'phul bar bgyi ba dang
dgu dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ chu ga dang/nad dang// las kyi dmag tshogs dang/ 'ching ba dang/ 'byed pa
dang rgol ba dang/ dus ma yin par grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ char dang/ rlung dang/ lus dang/ dag dang/ yad kyi nyes pa dang/ lta ba ya nga ba rab tuzhi bar bgyi ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ i dang sbrum ma yin pa thams cad 'dun por bgyi ba dang/ khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul khor thams cad srung ba dang/ g.yo ba dang/
dug dang/ byad dang/ rmongs byed dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan ba thams rtsad gzhil ba dang/ 'bru dang/ smanadang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar
'tsho bar bgyi ba dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang/ byang chub kyi sams rab tu spyod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
gzud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mos pa dang/ dpa' ba dang// brtan pa
dang smobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang/ dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ngag
khacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyadi rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/
tshig rar tu dbyog la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di bshad cing byin gyis nga rlabs so// gcag la gtsag dbyas pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs sun/
bzhugs shang gnas pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'jar dra pa'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyus kyi 'ang 'di srung pa'i slad du/ chos ma nyam pa
nyer rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa' chos kyi rnam gras 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
yunarang du gnas par bgyi ba dang/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa she sa kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad
bdag gas gsol ba btab pa la zhugs brtse bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i dam pa 'i chos kyi tshul kun ring du ba/nas shing/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang/ mi
'jigs pa'i chos can n 'gyur ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang/ chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyid pa'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/byan
gyis brlab tu gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes ba mdzad du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin du bdag cag gas sangs rgyas kyi

zhing 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag skyong bgyi ste/chos gyi tshul yun rang du gnas pa dang/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas/ sgrib pa chod pa'i yo shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro

bar ba gyi ba'i slad du phyin gyis brlab cing/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snyang pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgyadang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dabashang kyis/ gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i saMms can thams cad nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ oM gar/ oM ga ra g+haM ga ra/pra b+haM ga ra/ b+ha ma ma hA/

mahUM g+ha sa/ a khe/ a kha/ oM bde/ do ma/ ro man/ ke bat+te/ ke Are/ sa ma bA ha ne/ sa man b+ha dre/ d+harma d+harma/ da cha ke dza pA le/ a tu nu pa la pAl b+ha dre ga Ne ga Na/ wa ran/ ha la ha la

gi lo te li ke/ dzaM b+ha ba te/ Da ka sa/ Da ka Na Te/ Daka ba'an/ ga Na ba ra b+hiran/ shi rinaM/ bzhi pa to/go ba hi/ tshur ma tra dzur/ dzu she/ a gre a ba ma sa skya ta thA da na/ hu lu ha la/ tsan+d+he/ sa ma d+ha ma/

d+ha tshe dkatshuru mu tshuru/a tsita/ tsal mil/ latsa bA hA/ tsu lu tsu lu ma Na bA ha/ ku lu ku lu/ sa ra sa ra/ ku bya ku tu ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu Ta tu Tu/ ma hA sa t+ya/ hrid ya muny+tsa she su pu shedu ma
ba ra ha ri/ a b+ha ya/nutsani ka rakaM kA a ya mas pa ba ha/ tu tilaM/ ma ma la/ pAsha ka/ shasha ra sha shu ra/ lo ka ba nA ya ka/ badzra badzra d+ha re/ badzaM bA taM ka badzra ma de/ badzrad/

tsakA badzra e/ tsakri tsa ba te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ pur ta re/ hu hur/ g+haM ga ba pa re/ shA ra/ sha rtsi la/ tshu ru/ mu re man+ta Ni/ mthANaM/ ga ga ra Ni/ mu dra Ni/ sa ra pa mo han/ rtswa d+hi ri ya ni/

chu khe shwa ra la ya na/ ngashany+dzan d+ha pa pa tsa/ tsa la sa ma/ sarba sa t+ya/ a d+hiSh+Than/ a d+hit+taM sadi rgyun tu ma hA nam ma no/ pA la ra ti 1 o dzo gi/ ba tsa ni/ bA na ha ra/ bu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru

mu ru/ ha la hil/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA da pa ha/ hahit+taM/ A yur ha na/ kan kadza lA ba sA ga ra da no/ a h+phu han/ marga a b+hi ro han/ pA la sa kyi/ a roT ba te/ hi la ha la/ ya tha ba dza swA gra 5

ba ra'u hud yAl sa t+yA/ pa ra ba'o/ mArga a g+ho 'o daa tsa la bud // dwa nga pra tsa tsha pa ya/ ba bya hrid ya/ casgra tsa ra/ a tsa le/ sho d+ha ni/ pra kr-i ti nA ra gi/ a la a la la/ snga ba sa ra
dra de/ sarbat+ta ta thA sa t+yA nu ga te/ a na ba ra ba te/ a kha ta/ oM gu ra/ sha ma ni breny+tsa yo hi a hi ta/ a b+ha hi/ na re ba ya ba/ i tsa ra mAn kal na la gu sA re/ tI ratwA//

she/ d+harma ko ya/ dzA la tsan+d+he/ sa mu dra pa te/ ma hA b+hu ta bu ya/ sa mu dra be gA ba d+hA ra Ni mu dre Na/ mu kha chu dra/ su ra pra tisaM bo d+ha[7 ]su u tra a brtan saM brtan/ sa ma mo ha skar/ ba khyu ta

cas/ ra sa na klu ti chu du tos/ ya ka tsi ta pra ti pa ba ha/ ba hab hab ha kwa twA ka ba tA/ sha la pra tu skya hri da ya na mu dri tidA ra na na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dA ni dzA lA/ daN+Dil/ shu kra sa hAd+hi ga/ mu dra ti sa

dza du ja ba da dza kha ba ta/ su ma ta ra tsa/ ma hAd rgyu ta chu dra ta/ ya ka rIrtasha de tan nadishA ta pu ta/ a ba ma to 2 sa tsa ne/ go sha sa tsa na/ bu dra tA 1 tsAr// a d+hiSh+Than dAka nga/ shAnA r+ya thu ma sU

du skyug mu a/ a ba tA ra/ ma hA ka ru Na sa mu du taM sarba samyaka ka pra ti pa ta tsAranA tan dzul du rnyam ne saje chun pAkhe b+ha/ ma hA ka ru Na sa ma dz+ha/ dzA na labyA ba len ma tI t+yag a b+hi gAri ba la
na a d+hite sarba b+hu to pa tsa yA ya swAhA/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'ang skad chasa'o/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
nyams chud la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum smras nas/ 'di skad ces kyang sbas so// kye ma thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar
che'o kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngomatshar 'o// kye ma'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa' chos kyi snying po sa
lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam gras ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
bya'i gyi las ston ba/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ chos kyi

phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ goms can thams cad kyi snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ 'byung ba chen
bo thams cing dang/ 'dubyed dang/ skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can nyams chud bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ da lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T+Tha thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan nga 'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'ad bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

da pa' chen po gang+ga'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to// yang de'i cho zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar

ti kun tu rnam par ngelas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis byan gyis brlabs dang/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams
kyi 'kho'o// 'di 'dra ba na rid par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs tshe// mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byon brlabs pas/
00jug rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang// mchog tu red par dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang// dag rnams kyang n pham byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyan ma 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas
kyis byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyi'o// bzod dang des ba rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang na yul 'khor skyong// 'di na ngan byas zlog
byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang rab ston pa/ pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed
ra thabs dang la shes spobs pa rnams// 'a la bar bya phyir tsan gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs na sdud byed pa// gzungs na gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang chub las las mi g.yo ba//
chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed rang 'gi/ gzungs la ya de gnyis thams cad na// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'ad ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no//
chos smra rnams nasrung ba dang// nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis mi thub pa ma gzungs// bdag gis da yang bshad bar bya// sgrub pa mod ba 'grub pa dang// sems can rkums
kyi phan 'phel phyir// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+ga'i klung gi bya
[7/91 ]/ma snyed kyis ma gzhi gcig tu 'ad skad ces smras so/ bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis nga rab bo// rigs kyi bu kham/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ ngag slopa
a dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsAn nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gas khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ma rtog sbatshogs bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ ro bro ba
sna tshogs kyis la ngas su bskor ba/ ras dang/ rgyan dang/ ras btsas bu sna tshogs btang ba/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgrungs pas shan tubargyan ba'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge 'i
grwa reg na 'jam pa la 'dugs/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su'ang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yang 'khrug par ma byed do// de'i lus la'ang dbugs

mi gtong ngo// klad pa na bar byed ma nus so// ma na ba dang/ lce na ba dang/ son ba dang/ rus pa na ba dang/ mgul pan pa dang/ dngung pa na ba dang/ rgyang na ba dang/ rgyu ma na ba dang/ lton ba dang/ chu so na ba dang/ brla nu

khrub dang/ byan pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de na gnas med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang ma 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi ma dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am skad 'gag par gyur na'ang/ des/
gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur ro// chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la'ang su'ang khams 'khrug pa 'am
skad 'ab/gas par byed nga ra mi 'gyur ro// gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang ma dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang/ khams 'khrug pa dang/ skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang
bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor can ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas 'di skad
ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol de gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/'di lta ste/ shAn+te/ a sa ma ro pa me tIso ma ba te/ e hi/ na ba kuny+tsa

ban ba kuny+dzabe/ u la sho d+ha ni/ba ha kha ba ha kha/ na ra ba ta tha tA/ par tshod/ ba ha sa/ ba has 1 a mU la/ a tsa la/ tsa tsa le/ pra tsalA d+ha d+hi le/ a ka na ya pa ri datsan+tani/ ba ra se/ ba ra sa tAMni kha

ga su/ra drin sta ba su ra drin b+hU ta ko Ti pa rits+tsaMd dzu la kha dzu la kha ba ye dz+wa la kha na ma klu zhwa/ kaka kha/ ha hU~MhahA/ hu hu hu hu/ smachu ba da na/ pa rits+tsaMd na/ a ma ma rgya/ ma ma khya/ ma ma sa mu dra/mu dra ba kha/ saM ska2

ma pa ri ts+tshed/ bo d+hi swA k+Sha te ba mo ma hA ba ma/ b+hU ta ko TaM/ A kAshAsha sa pa rad swahA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag

dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang lto 'phya/
[s gn ]na po'i dbang po dag dang gams can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes du ba bzhi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang shad
skang du kyi ma gzungs 'dazhi stobs che ba/ drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dag thams cad bzlog pa// mi 'jigs pa dang/ nad dang/ mi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa thams cad yongs su shur pa/ra
byed pa nas/ sgrub pa med pa'i gshis dang bsod nams dang ma shes chen po bsags pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do zhes pa ka' lato// yang de'i

tsho tshangs da phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha' las 'das pa'i lo sa dang/ spud pa dang/ rgyan dang/ ma rtog dang/ spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/
byug pa rgya chen po rnams kyis lus brgyan nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa byan gyis brlabs kya sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol te/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhange ma lus pa 'di'i dpyangs kyis go bar bgyis la/ der bdag la pa gags cung zad kyang ma 'byung bar dbyangs kyi rakyil 'kher gya nag brjod pa
rnam par gdon ma 'tshal ba bstan pa rab dag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig srung
ba bshad par bgyi ste/ can s slad ma'i dus na bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ lha 'am/klu 'tshe klu mo 'am// klu than po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'a 'khor tum/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/
klu'i bu 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/ sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha ze rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha khra' 'khor tam/ shaza' 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i bu/
'om sha za'i bu mo 'am/ ma 'am/ a ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos skya ba dang// chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i dgrwa phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ ban chos
zla ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcige tsam la'ang 'tsho'am/ gnod par bgyid dag/ 'jigs par bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong
ngamatha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis la na/ bdag gis bdud nas/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang/ chad pas bcad pa dang/ tshur gcad pa dang/
rmugs pa dang/ res pa dang/ rmongs par bgyi/ bro 'tshal bar bgya na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi ba'i/
[@#/// dbyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tugasol/ 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gse rung mi gang

bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas brgya bya'i gtsug phud 'dzan ces bya ba 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar bya rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'dus brgyan nus ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/ de nas brgya byin
gtsug phud 'dzin gyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ chazhi de bzhazhi gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig/ chazhi 'dir bag med par
@ ma byed cagi/ bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tsho zhagi/ de ci'i phyir zhi zha/ byas pa rnamA ni spros la dga'/ de bzhazhe gshegs pa spos ma mnga'// de dag skyo 'jag mtshan nyade kyi// 'dus byas
dag kyang ston pa mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa na gzungs dang/ ya gi dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa/ cha zhi de bzhin gshegs pa na/'dalta sku/
tshu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyide mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas/ de bzhazhe nyade la 'gal bar ma mdzad de/ nam mkha'i la na 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig lta'i mtshan nyid sgrog brtags pa med de// ji lta/
'du byed rnams la nam mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par ma rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng 'dod pa'i yon tan la spos par mi mdzad/ ma rtog rnam par ma rtog/ ma gnas na ngon par mizhin
de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skye ba bo la ma yazhi/ gso ba po la ma yin/ skyes bu la cha 'azhi/gang klog la ma yin/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la' so bar mi mdzad/ mngon par
mi zhenan/ chozhe khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zlo bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rtog ste smos shage/ khyod la des mi sdug pa'i/
'bras bur gyur ta re skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyas pa'o// rgyas bu dam pa 'di'o ji/
bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud med ces tshig tum rjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin
gyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdog la thugs rje bar dgongs te bzod par gsol 'di skad ces smras pa sa bdag la 'bras bu mi
sdug pa thob bar ma gyur gi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ltad mo can gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar m bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par sman pa ji tsam
gas pa tshod bag chod gyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu gal te des sa dzagis gyi bu gal te des slar ma bshags su zin// tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'don pa'i mngal sung rab pang la
po yongs su blangs pa ra'agyur ro// de bas na rags kyi bu ru zhes kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dpyad kyi dkyil 'khor//
gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod kyis stobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur rnam
par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen ngo rnams dang/ lha dad klu dang/ gnod
'a sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di rong du gnas par 'gyur
ab dang/ chos smra ba rnams dang/ chos nyan pa rnams dang/ nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dang pa stsal du gsol/ gang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas/ mi dang mi ma lags pa'i

bar gyas de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyud par dad pa stsal du gsol/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang/ mna' bsgag pa'i phyi'i dbyangs kyi skye phyir/
nas sa des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so// yang de'i tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag nug kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa

'bul go bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dusan gzungs 'ad gzung bar bgyi'o// rab tu bstan bar bgyi'o// dam pa 'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi// chos smra ba dang/ nyan pa de dag dang gzhan tan dang ldan pa de
dag kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad
ba 'bul gyis/ skyes bu dam pa gzungs gsungs shayi/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ a ma la/ ba ma la/ ga Na shAn+te/ hA ro/ tsan+d+he/ mahAtsan+d+ra/ tsane ha/ tsa ma ha so mi sgra ma/

a lo ha/ ba ba ha 3oM ga dza na tra/ kha kha/ mA la pa ra tshod 1 yak+ShatsanA/ pi shA tsatsan+de/ a brtan/ saM brtan/ saM kA ra Ni/ dza b+han// sta na mo han/ ud tsA tun/ ham ha/ hamo ha/ ma hAsaM ku'o/
kha kha sha ba/ a ma la 2 a ma la/ pa ri brje/ a sA ra le ba sAhA/ gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing// mang bo tshogs par mi spyodan// mag ma mthong zhing mgo yang 'ag sa/

yan lag tha dad 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ a tsa tsa/ A bag/ tsatsa/ tsak+kha tsak+Sha tat+tA kha tsa tsa/ na kha ga/ tsa tsA/ tsa tsAyA/na tsa da/ mA la tsatsA/ tsa mu la/ tsatsa ha/ ma nA la tsa/
hazhwa ho/ A ba AgatA/ dezhasatshas ba'i dbang po thams cad nas/ sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'ad skad ces smras so// stobs chen
bo'i stobs kyi shugs gnotu 'dzoms po'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de ban pa cha man pa ra soms ba'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/
tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can M/ snying rje med pa/ byas pa mi gabro ba/ sems can la 'tsho ba rnams
sam/ bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor glegs lta zhang skabs tshol ba rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs 'tshol
du zhu bar 'ong ba dang/ btsunamo dam pa dang/ bu dang/ bu mo dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang/ blon bo dang/ shor ba dang/ dbung dag pa dang/ 'kher rnams dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas
pa kyi bstan la dad brgyas pa dang/ bung mad dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma chos smra ba dang/ chos nyan pa rnams dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/
bsam gtan dang/ kha don la 'grus pa rnams dang/ zhal ta byed la brtson ba rnams la sa pasatshol du 'ong zhing/ tha na sems kyis skad cagi gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tsho 'am/
gnod par byed dam/ 'jigs par byed dam/mdangs 'phrog gam/lus la dbugs gtong ngan/ snang ba sems kyis brtan/ bdud nas/mi dang ma ma kan pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag/
yig mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// de dag gi tshagi kyang long bar 'gyur/ snying yang bskams par 'gyur/ sha bkra can du gyur lus rulatsang rwa nga bu dang/ rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su
bar 'gyur/ de dag sa gas bar ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhi'i gtor bar 'gyur// rdul gyis kyang de dag g.yogs nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms khor

'gyur ro// gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag gas sa'i khung du 'jug pa ra 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tur pa ga tshod brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa ra 'gyur ro// gang dag tshun rgyu ba 'a 'byung bo
cung pa'i soms dang ldan b/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gra mngon par ma dad bar gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kha mgo par dad pa'i rgyal bo rgyulags nas/ zhal ta byed por brtson pa'i dag
slong gi bar la 'tsho'am/ gang dag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshol pa bdun du 'ag sa ra nas/ de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// yang

yul gang bdud kyi tshogs kyis ma thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ba der bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang/ bsgyur ba dang/ sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/ der chos 'dod pa'i
[@#// sems can thamasacad yongs su sman par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskrad par bgyi'o// yul de na 'thab pa dang
rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma 'gas pa'i char pa dad/ rlung dang/ grang ba dang/ tshab dang/ nad thams cad snar ba zlog par bgyi/ bde ba dang/ 'dum
ba dang/ lo legs ba dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba mthun pa rnams bsgrub bar bgyi'o// chos ny+tsA ba rnams dang/ chos nyan pa rnams lazhadamamachas pa dang/ grags pa dang/ rod pa dang/ bsti stong

chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshatshangs pa chen po dbyings dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa/ tshangs pa zhing du ni tshangs pa kun gyis
bkur/ bdud kyi nang du zhu ba dud kun gyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du na rgya byin gyis bkur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/ 'bags skyes po dang/ mag mi bzang dang/ yul 'khor

srung dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ srod mad kyi bu dang/ lham ya'i dang/ lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni dedag kun gyis bkurab/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa/
bud mad kyi gzugaso dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa gnyis named
bzhi gyi nor bu ran bocho thog sa so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyas dang ldan bas/ de pa zhazhi gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khe mi 'dzum par bltas te kug na ma
yani ba'i dngos bo brjod du med pa car yang ma yin pa ra ba ltas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs ba shAkya thung ba des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyed kyi
mag mi 'dzums bar ci'angs yan la 'a bar dung la ci zhig blta/ rtsa 'du la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang cu'ong ma yin pa zhes bya ba' chos grab yod dus/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/
gtiyug gnyen mongs pa rnams yod de zhes bya ba mang ba dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog pa'i bar du
rgyas bar bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ramachim bsan/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te a rag pa ma mchis na srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po
dadag la nga las skye bar 'gyur/ tsanam mkha' las skyes zhes ban/ nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la khra/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhinate/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad na nam mkha' lta bu 'o// ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma tshan/ mtshan nyidi ma yin/ mun ba ma yani/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yazhi/ rnam par go ba ma yin/ rnam par ragi ba/
bya/ ma yan/ grub pa ma yin/ brjod ba ma yin taM kaci'ang ma yan pa/ cha shas med pa// dngos po thams cad spos pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi ngu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid
kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams na yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa'o// dra ba med pa 'am gang ba med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pa rol dang tshu rol la rig pa med pa'o//
cha shas med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams brjod du med pa 'o// ma ga zhing rnam par gzhag ba med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang/ dngos po dang/ mtshan nyid thams
chad 'ad pa 'o// tshig ga lam dang bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad na sgro btags ba med pa sgyu/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so/
bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i phyir/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ gal sangs rgyas kyi
[cg ]chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos bo ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ thabs dang/ pha rol gnod pas khyed ji ltar bdag la 'tshe/ bdag ga

bdud kyi yul 'joms/ bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/ 'gro ba chad pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa dang/ tsa'ing ma yin pa'i skya ma la slob tu 'dzung/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyed kyi bsang

ba la slob na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba spyod pa yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong ngo// gang gasmad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs med dpag tu med pa 'a sangs rgyas la rtsom ldan 'a das dang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams dang/ nyan thos che na po rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po rnams dang/ brgya bzhi dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul
'ang mthu che pa'i lha dung/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus sa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di gang

bar bgyis/ snying med pa 'das kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad ma pa 'ad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul la dra nga bar gyur ba de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga rnamA

shad/ yang de'i tsho bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang/ bdud kyi 'a khor grangs med du bag tu med pa dang/ de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ srazhe bo dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za de da ga thams cad kyis kyang

mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad ba na bar gyur te/ lus kyang rul sung dra nga bar gyur nas/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo// de ba zhazhi gshigs pa/

shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngage can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byas shog dang/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa 'tsho/ khyod kyis nga gsad pa 'a bya'i de ba ga tshod brgyad cu tshun
@#// chad kyi sa dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdos bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/ da ltar ba dud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te/ gsad pa'i bar du bkyi bas/ de bas na khyed yongs su gdul ba dang/

zhi bar bya ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ de bzhin du bdud rnams nas/ ma dang ma ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang/ zhi bar bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'ong

ba dang 'gro ba med pa ru'ing ma yazhi ba'iskya ma la bslab par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi'i pho dang skya ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang/ phung po'i lhag ma yod pa'i bar du mya ngan las
