'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dar 'i grangs mod dpag med pa nas/ ma dang ma ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyi/
sdig can khyod deng ban mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusams skyod cig/ de ltar na khyod klad pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chor ba 'di las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ mthar gyis sangs

rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/ bdud kyi yul las ches khyad du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnamA kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ yang de'i tsho bdud drug khra borgyad stong dang/ bdud kyi 'khor
grangs med dpag tu med pa dang/ sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyin/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di'ang thob
par 'gyur/de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i bar du klad pa na bar gyur kyang/ bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems ma bskyad do// de nas
tshangs pa chen po dbyas dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sdun sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o// sangs

rgyas kyi zhang snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzud par bgyi sgo/ da yang shAkya thub pa khyom nub kyi bar du bdag gas bstan pa 'di la chos kyi

tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o// gang du byung ba der shan du lhag ra ra byung bar
bgyi'o// grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang/ yul de dag zha rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog

par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o// gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis ma thub pa'i gzungs kyi rnam grangs 'di ni tho na bris nas 'chang ba rnams dang/ gang na chos smra ba sang ge'i khri la mchis te//
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba de dag gsi der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag
'gugs par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs der mchis nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang sba bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba me da a ba me/ oM ba re/ oM ba ri/

ba ra kuny+tsa/nA da nAd/ bud+d+hArAb ha/ dza lu ka/ ma kha ya/ a la/mi la/kal/ ma la/ kAt+tatsa ra mu dre mu dre mu khe swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos skya ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi

tshig 'de dge dran par bgyis la/ bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shan tu yongs su dag pas thos te/ der ma mchis na 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus

bar 'gyur zhing/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang ma 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mams la/ chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos
blang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa de dag gnad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa deng/ bya ba ngan pa dang/
tha tshom thams cad bas kha par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'chang ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub par brgyad pa der/ bdag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas
'thab pa dang/ rtsod ba dar/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ char mi 'bab pa dang/ dus ma lags kha'i rlung dang/ tsho ba dang ltas ngan ba dang/
bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang/ ma ring mi ma lags bo dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de na bkra ma shase pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang//
sdang ba rang/ bar ng ba dang/ zhe gcod pa dang/ ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang// kha ba dang/ tsho ba dang/ dri ba dang/ reg na mi bde ba'i dug re thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// der tshab dang mu
le'aganodo ba rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/ glang bo che dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ ma he dang/ spyang ki dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ rkun po dang/ g.yon can dang/ mi dang a ma lags pa'i
'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya'o// der sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa'i slad du/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rodang/ zas dang/
skom dang/ gos dang/ gos mal chasna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ lul ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog ba dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ 'chad
bder bdag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa'i slad du/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ yade bde ba thams cad
bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang chos 'a do ba dang/ dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyis/ 'di na bdag gse sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar
smon lam btab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu 'amathu 'ar nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyis bdag la gde bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i tshod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa sangs rgya sa la com ldan 'das thams cad kyis/

tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di skad ces bka' su la to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dir gang gi phyir brgya byan dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams
cad dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zad ng/ lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/
nged kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dgatshangs ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'ad la zhi bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshongs pa
dbyangs dang ldan r la grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ tshamuNe/ muN+Da/ pa rin+tid/ hamU ha hamU ha/ saM ra ska ba la kyi (sham kha/ pa ra pA ha/ tsa mA ra ya btsadasu ba kha a mA la/ pa raM des

[j]bud+d+ha a dkA ta mAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang/ brgya byin dang/ rmongs ba dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang//
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ gzi brjing che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dngas ma yin pa rnams dgug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'disangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su
gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs kyis/ khyod 'dis skyes bu'amathu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus la 'gyur ro// dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byad 'di
lta bu s chos kyi tshul bsrung bar bgyi'o// bud med rnams kyang yongs su bskyang bar bcu'i// bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzazhi tam/
klob gam/ kun chub par bgyid dmag bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ma khud mad gang 'dalta bu s sems yongs su skyo bar gyur to/ chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di'achang zhing klog pa nas/ nyan pa'i bar du bgying na de 'dod pa la spyod kyang mngal du ma chags so// yang bud med gang bar sarashang smad par gyur pa longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa dang
bral ba des chos kyi rnam grangs de bklags na/bsam pa thams cad thub cing bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang/ sems can gyi bsam
pa yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la 'bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyise bka' stsal pa/
gas kyi bu de bzhinate/ srung ba dang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ gzungs kyi le'us drug pa'o////yang de'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shazhi tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa shAkya thub pa dngaha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i drapal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ nge su tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byad dang skad cig gas bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo// de bzhin du sbyar te// brgya byin gyi gzugs dang/
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'adabang po'i gzugs dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thab bral dang/ rgyal chen bzhi dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yazhi ngang/
skya nam mkha' lding dang ma 'am bu dang/ lce 'tshe chen bo dang/ srin po dang/ ya dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang rgyal 'ges dngo/ bram ze'i rogs dang/ rje'u rigs dang//
ngamangs rigs dang sang ga dang glang bo chadang de ma he nas/ dung 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ngo// skad cag gas bya dang/ shang dang dar dang/ 'bras bu dang
gos dang/ mal chadang/ sbrum bu dang// snod dang/ phyang phul dang/ rgyan dang/ sman rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rin po che'i gzugs dang/ yud tsam gyis dag slong dang dag slong ma'i gzugs dang/ skad
cig gas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snangago skad tsami gas kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs dang/ gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir snang ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba de
la/tshe dang ldan kha byams ma'i bu gang bos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di kha dag dang/ rtags dang/ dbyabs dang/ gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang bo re'is kyi bu 'di mthu rab tu che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam bar bya ba'i blo gros dam paMcas pa'i stobs kyi
yul gang la gnas nas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed tsang/ shes rab kyi male sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi nad yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa grangs med

dbag tu med pa dag na bsal ba dang/ soms ji lta bu byung/ spyod pa ji lta bu dang/ ri 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang/ gang la skyabs su song ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
khar zhugs nas 'dul pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam dang/ dbyabs dang/ gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems na
nya// rnams theg pa gsum las phyir ma ldog pa la 'god pa dang/ sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non/yo byad dang longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi/
chags pa spang pa'i phyir yo byad rnams byin nas phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang/ nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te phyir ma ldog pa la 'god pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sha'i
tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dus nyan gcig la gang+ga'i klung ga byi ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar byas te/ thag pa gsum la phyir ma ldog par 'god pa'i dam
bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yan 3bgrod pa ma yin no// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin
par bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu chen po'i mthu chen po brtsams nas ji srid nug lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag ga pha rol tubla na med pa yang

ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed pa'i bskal pa na gros med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de// byang chub sems dpa' sha'i rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'das bskal pa

gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas bskal pa gras med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so// gang ngo sa gsol pa// 'di ji srid cag na sangs rgyas kyi nang gang du bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal ba chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu skal pa chen po

sgrol ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying bo zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skye dgu'i tshul stong phrag bzhi bcu thub ba na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i semA

can rnams kyi nang du than mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal me tog rgyas pa mtha'
yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// des bzhi khri'i sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po dag la sems can rnams yongs
su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tuphung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngon las 'da' bar 'gyur// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu/
dam pa 'dis sngon goms can yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam ris su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad

dunam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag khar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/bdag
bya// gas sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang/ pha rol tu

phun pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing dub na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa

yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o// ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi

kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang/ gzhan dag na'ang sems can gang dag mtshams chod pa byed pa dang/ the tshom can s 3mi bde ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de

ngag nas 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye sa la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du de dag thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir ma ldeb ga pa la so sor bkod nas/ de nas

tshags sku ga dod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyis bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta burgyan du bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas

'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams M ston pa 'di lta bu dag kyang mnyes par bgyis/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje

chen ro dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu 'ang mthong/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi sAng bo lus 'jon

pa zhes bya pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyis brlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di'ang chos mnyan pa'i smad du skyod ba ni bdag cag gas rod pa legs par
rnyed ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po chatog gi gzungs las/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u so bdun pa'o///yang de'i tsho de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas/

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la ngos de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rags kyi bu dag brgyabyani dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham
gan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas/ mi dang mi ma yazhin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa la 'dir lhags pa thams cad ngas spro bar
bya'o sangs rgyas bas ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa 'di dang/ brgya bzhi dang/ rmongs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/

lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ mi dang/ ma ma lan pa 'dus pa 'ad lta bu na dgon no// de bas na khyed kyis 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ma 'os pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang/ chos kyi/
bla[© ]// tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rabis 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyad so so ru rang rang gi smon/

lam thob cig/ yang de'i tsho bdud dag sbyong ma tog ces bya bas ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khra ngo byur bur bkang sta/ bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po
rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/ bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skado ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa
rgyu thams cad dang/ gang gzhan yong su dag 'di'i 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ la tog dang/
myu gu thams cad kyis byur bur yongs su gtam zhing rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di 'bul na/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi sde
tso ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su gtams pa 'di bzhes su gsol/ 'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di'i bud
mang kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang/ sgom dang/ 'bras bu dang/ me tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dag kyang yongs su sman par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa

0/ des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad
kyis ma bral bar bdag gas rim gro bgyi na/ bdag gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces/
bka' stsal to// skyes bu ngan pa khyod 'di ltar sems na ngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad khyed kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs so//
khyod kyi bro bo ma tog dang 'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'ding bzhes so// khyod kyang me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang/ jitsam 'dod pa dang/ gangag phyir
'dod pa red par gyur cagi/ khyod kyi re ba yod kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub pa gyur cig/ 'byor pa'i ng sun sum tshogs
par gyur rug/ de nas bdud dag sbyong ma tog gis yang gsol pa// gyong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ ra brag gang dgan bdud kyi tshogs kyis ma thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang
ngas ston tam/ 'chad dam/ tha na glogs bam la bris te bas snang brgyad pa'i grongadang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal deng/ ljongs dang/ robrag de dag rtsubadag gnas par bgyi'o// de dang de dag tu
bzhi/ @#// shang na pa rnams kyis rtog dang 'bras bu nas/ 'bru dang ma tog cha bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o// dengag thams cad n me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i pho mas can rnams kyang
par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas mtsho bas pa ma gtogs par/gal te de na sems can me togo dang 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas ma 'chol ba'i slad du 'gum
pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyis/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur ba'i// gang yang sems can rnams la tog dang 'bras bu 'chol ba de na bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ma tog dang 'bras bu de dmigs 'tshal nas sems can de dag gcig la gagi phan pa dang/ mnyan pa dang/ snying rje'i sems su gyur pa de na bdag gi ba ba ba pa bas

tsha[“ ]rgyalaM khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur go// gang ma tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de zhi bdag gi brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ gangasams dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs

pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// ga nga cho ga dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang ra degs kyang chos 'tshol bar gyur cing stong ba nyid la gnas ni/de na bdag ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur

'gyur// gzhan yang chos kyi rnam gras 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can gyi 'bras dang 'gro dang gnas dang/ til dang/ mon sran snga'u dang/ mon sun gre'u dang/ rgya sran dang/ sran chu dang sranam dpo/kha
g.yo tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad du bdag gas nan tanar bgyi'o// 'bru dang la rtog mang po de dag gas kyang mdzod dang bang ba rnams thams cad yongs su gtam nga ra bgyi// de nas mas can than
bya dang ri dgas dag gse kyang 'tshal bar gyur na de na bdag g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'i rgyur 'gyur ro// der bdag gis bu ram shang dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ bal po'i
sa'u'i khu shugs shin tum kho bsgrub par bgyi'o/ der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang/ bum pa dang/ bya skyogs rnams yongs su gtam bar bgyi'o// gang de ni than bya dang ra dgas la

sogs bas 'tshal na'ang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ blan khong pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das naMms dang/ byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag gis byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes ba mdzad du gsol de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// de bzhin gsheg

pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di lta bu'i ma bu chen po byed nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ spro ba brtul ba de lta bu s
sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis sha// de nas bdud dag sbyong me tog gas/ de pa zhin bshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs 'byin pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'dam spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi/gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de ra bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs de na

'gyu dang/ smanadang/ 'bras bu dang/ me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu snam bag can dang/ kan tu che pa dang/ shan tu mang ba dang gzhi tu ro

bda' ba dang/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi/ sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bgyi/ soms can rnams kyi mdzod dang/ bang ba dang/ bum pa dang/ rdzam dang dang skyogs

rnams shin tu yongs su gang bar bgyi/ than ga ngo bya dang ri digs kyis de la 'tshal kyang de na bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang ]ba dog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'a'i

khasal ba stong thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'dalta bu dag gas tshim bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs bar gyur pa sU les ma lnga dang ldan pa grwa ngasam

mchog dang gtum ma chag pa gdaklung gtsum steng rnams su bskal pa stong re la'ang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di la bu bgyi zhing/ de nas la dod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar bgyi'o/ bdag las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'dasa'arig naradu ga smonalam gyis 'gags pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig

lags so// 'di la sto/ tsa kha/ tsa ma kha/ bri bri ta ha sta/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ sma ra asmakan/ sarta ba pa ba sa pe/ sa ras re'u/ sa ra ma henaM/ sa ra badzin+d+he/ ta ra pa la asma kan nyi shu/ du hu/

shu shu/ a saM ga dza re/ ta kha ta kha ta kha/ pA khu pA he/ u pa nA ma/ san tar pA ya/ ba dza pA/ dug sha/ o sha d+hi/ d+han d+harkyen/ tsan+da/ ak+Sha ya dza la b+ha han/ sma ra as kazha/ samyaka pra ti pan
na ba yam/ sa ta ta kA laM/ ya sa ma/ ma ma u0f7ama ma da dza pa re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag smin par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra bgyi ba'i slad du/ gang dang gangan
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di deng gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad la de dang de dag tu bdag gnas pa ra bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis nge
gal legs so zhes bya ba byashino byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang bdud 'khor dang bcas ba de dag thams cad dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs

pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ lha dang/ rgyu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' snange dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za dang/
ma dang dacha ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dare gtogs pa'i mams can thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin ta skyes bu dam pa khyod bud med kyi
gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smazhe bar byed pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legs legs so// kho bo cag gi bsod nams dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/ pha rol gnon
pas skyes bu'i mthu de lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par sAng partsa ba can su
gro/ de nas bdud dag sbyong me tog 'khor gang yazhi pa des ma gzhi gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o//

skyes bu dam pa khyod zhum bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tsha khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston ci//

[o bdud dag sbyong me tog gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag de bzhin du gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gas sa la sa bon rnams pa ta pa ste/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ dra kun tu spyod par gyur ba de'ang bdag cag

la phan ba dang bde bar gyur phyoge/ de nas de ba ni gshegs pa shAkya thub ba del/ bdud dge sbyong ma tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag zhu khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzazhi ba chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid
ba lags to/ 'danyid du thog mar u ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad dunan tan cher bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/
de nas bdud dag sbyong la rtog gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs bshAkya thub pas/ bdud dge sbyong ma

tog la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pango'i gdong langs shuge/ khyod kyis de dang byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkras ba'i
sdug bsngal gyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'a de bkrol nas sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin dri ma da dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang// stobazhing mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las

rob grol bar// rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring po ma thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba gi/ sangs rgyas dagra shul blo gros shin tu brtan pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas mdun dag sbyong ma tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde
[n/ ]dang skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las lad+ma
te thal mo sbrunas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dirigatogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
bad pa la dgongs su gsol/ bska la ba pa zang po byung nas bkag gas de ba zhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ga sbyan sngar sems can longs su sman par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste// soms

can rnams kyi nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhir la tun bar bgyi ba'i smad du/ budachad kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byan blangs te/ rtswa dang rtsa ba snatshogs kyi nang du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi longs

sbyong du bgyi ba dang/nad rab tu zhi ba'i slad du snyan bcud kyis len brgya rtsa bzhi'i gyur de// rtsa ba'i snyan brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ mar la sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ 'bru mar la

sbyor ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ bkrusman brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ snyan nd mad ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi nas/ ska pa'i phyi ma dang/ ral bu dang/ snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to// sems can
yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang/ nad zhi ba bgyi ba dang/ sa mas tsana rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dzage zhabs 'brang dang bcas pa la kun
pad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gas/ bdag la 'di skad ces bka'i sul to// ma 'os

pa'i dus na skye dgu 'tshol brgya thub pa na/ de bzhazhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya

ba 'byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam byas sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ba chen po 'byung sta/ der skyong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de 'a 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gas ra thub kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' spyal to// de 'a bo/ tu 'od srungs kyis kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal sa

de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen bo gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sman chen po la chud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cing/ der lang bdal gas

sems can kun gyi smad pa dang nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtsa dang/ rtsa ba dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lo tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du su kha to//
nga na sems can gang dag gas yang dag bar gyur tu 'tshal nas/ sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong ba dang/ bdag med par so sor
rtog pa gang 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhang 'dare skyes bu'i mthu chen po bgyud

pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gapa'i klung gi byim snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bas+sol pa gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyad du/ bdag gas bud mang kyi gzugs kyi spro ba chen po dang/
stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa 'di la bu dang/ sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang/ bsnyed bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bu s bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'a phal ba bgyid do// skal pa
za chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong ma tog 'di'i grigs su'ang gyur cig radag cag ga3se kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par

a bgyi'o// bud med rnams rab tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang ]rgan po rnams kyi steng rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud 'a sa byin pus

pa zas dang/ skom dang/ kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa sbyarab bgyis te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ bdag bla na med pa nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub mngon par rdzogs pa pa'i tshang rgya bar 'gyurazhin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung bstan du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces

bka' stsapa to// khyod ni 'jig rten nad pa rigs sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed nga// pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang dam pa der// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'i rgyal ba 'gyur// de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzan ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis smon lam btab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub bas de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ khyod na ri dang sa 'dzani gci'i pu ste// khyod ni ra ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur// rgyal ldan zhape mchog phun sum tshogs par ni// ya shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan ba thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dela'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis 'diri ni

thabs dang shes rab kyis// ma rtog 'bras bus sems ca na ches byas nas// zhing mchog rnam par dag ba sgo ldan du// 'am ma chog pa bde bar gshegs pa ra'agyur// de bzhin du byang chub sam sa dang bar thal ba
ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

[E/]kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skya bo byang chub yongs su sman byas nas// skyo bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags bag/ mo yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs bar/
'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la gso zhing rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su snyan

par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te/khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing// rnam dag zhing
mnyam nyid mthong ba// zla ba'i 'od ces bya pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sgrab pa med pa'i sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la

yongs su sod pas sems can yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' sul to// mi gnas ye shes ston ba rgya ngan med// yang dag byang

nub lam mchog don smal/ gas+sab ba bsal cing chags pa chod bzhin du// rtsa shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan ba thob par 'dod pas
[n j]bung chad kyi gzugs dang ldan pa mo ga la yongs su spyod nga sa sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la na// ma rtog sbyosa mchog dag gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhape mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas sbos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon
lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bkaTasul to/'jig rten du'i smag gos la btsud nas su// dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas// sngon bor snang ba'i
sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu// rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang/ nags tshal dang/ 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong drug cu

rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su sman par bya ba dang/ dung mod yongs su snyan par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang/ de dag tshigs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ pho mtshan gyur te mo mchan thob pa kani tu rnyed par sla la/ mo mtshan gyur tepo
mtshan thob pa na tu red par dka' ba'i phyir ro// danas klu dang klu chen po bye ba khrag brgya lung bstan pa thob pa la 'dod nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang tshigs su bcad

ba re rag so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// de bzhin dulham zhi dkrigs phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ bye ba phrag brgyad nu dang/ lha dang mi'i bu mo ma'i khru gas pa bye ba khrag khra ge brgya stong bdun cu dang/ bdud dang
bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu ba nutsadabu nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyalarags dang/ rdzo'u 'gis dang/ dmangs 'gis dang/ skyob pa

dngabud mdadang/ khye'udang/ bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi khyi ma snyed kyi bar dag sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa nas/ tshigs su bcad pa re res so so'i lung
bstan pa thol go tshe dang/ ma ma yazhi ba dang/ de bzhin du lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma ya na dang/ nam mkha' sdod dang/ ma 'am ci dang/lce 'phya chen po dang

gi dgas dang/ sha za bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma brgyad po dbazhi bskyod par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir ma log pa'i
sa la gnas par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag natsang chub sems dpa'iting nge 'dzazhi dang/ bzod pa dang/ gzungs sna tshogs lob gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las
'das ba dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te thog la zad par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag na nyen thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thog ba las sams bskyedazhas/
sas rgyas nyid du kha ma ldog pa'i sa la gnas khagyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal
ba lanani dudam pa'i chos yongs chu bo zung sar 'bya'i// gang dag chos kyi kha grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang ya gar 2nA si nas/ 'chang bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rigs pas yongs su
bskyang bar bgyi// 'dus pa chen po ri bo na tog gi gzungs las/ lung bstan pa 'a la 'a nye brgyad pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la zhan gshegs pa shAkya thub
bas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangadag thugs brtse bas dra ba'i skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang/
zas dang/ skom dang/ snyan dang/ yo byad kyis sems can rnams shan tu tshim par bgyis te/ bung med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
bu sman mar bcu ba dang/ zhes 'di dag sems can yongs su sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sams bgyung ma thag tu rtsi'atshal ba dang/ gang gi slad du 'tshul ba dang/ jal bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang/
khres dang/ skom dang/ sman dang/ yo byad rnams sgra la pa 'og/ bshams ba 'byor par gyur ba' 'di la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ zhis skyes bu dam pa 'di

ga skyes bu chen po 'gi thu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang/ sems can rnams la longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pas 'chi gro bgyid zhus bar 'dadig la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
bya thugs rje chen bo dang/ ba sod nams dang/ ma shes dang/ bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ya de la mdzad pas/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyi/
bsam pa dang 'di la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byashigyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spyi no/ 'di lta ste/ [0f7c] ti ba kha/ d+hito la ba/ mu na ba kha/ sad rkyab pa/ bu tshu akhang ka ra ba pa/ na ra sa ba ba/ ma hA kA ru Nal ba/ mahUM bra ti ba ba/
a mo ham pa/ dutib kha/ k+khi to pa ba/ sA la la ba la/ kha ba kha pa/ bA u pa la/ brtab ba/ a d+ha na pa ba/ a ma ba kha/ a hanaMkha ba/ ta tha b+hA ba ba/ b+hu ta koDa se la/ ri ba ti ba pa/

dri zhu ga la ba ba/ tra la na ba kha/tid+ha tu ka kha ba/ ti la mo ka kha kha/ uklu ba pa/ ramA a d+hiSh+Than kho ba/ ba ba ba ba ba ba sa ma hA/ oM nus ma hA/ tata ta Ta TaDa sha sad+d+haM/ sa ka shi la
[j]chu la ad+ha na ba sAhA/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di deg sems can rnams kyi longs

spyod pa dang/ kun spyod bar bya ba dang/ yongs su snyan bar bya ba dang/ khyed kyi byang chub kyi skyod ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zung zhige g.yad de 'tsho dge sbyong ma tog dang/ dpal gyi lha modang
rtsi'i lha mo grub ba'i blo gros dang/ lha chos 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa mas 'a rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa dang/ yongs
su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'ar skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par brgyaba'i skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags tshig 'di dag gsungs pakhan/ byin gyis brlabs 'das bdag cag sems can thams cad la mi gro brgyad zhus so/ bdag cag bla na med pa 'a u0f7a la shes
sgrub par nus so// bdag cag gas sems can thams cad yongs su sman bar bgyi ba 'i slad du/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rig gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson 'grus dag po sa spro bar bgyi'o/ yang
so'as can thams cad lasAng rdzaba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rim bcas pa la gnas bar btsa'o/ lha 'am klunas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhage de bzhazhe ga gegs
pas byan byas par bas pa'i dam btsos kyi skul 'das mchil bar bgyadedam/ zhig pa bcud dam/ rnam bam rung khar brgyad la/ bdag cag ga dem ba 'tshos ga rang du gnas
bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gal te ma bzlog gamananatan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gas dusagasum du gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur// bdag cag bzhi med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la rgyur chag kyi gis bo dag lha nas/ ma'i bar gang la la zhagi dge slong dag/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bstananam/ dge bsnyen tsha la 'tshe
kha la gal te bdag cag gas de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gas de dag gi 'khrug pa zhabar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma khabyas na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub don dug nyar
'khu ba'i rogs kyi bu 'am/gos kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang/ chab dang/ dug rang/ mtshonadang/ khyud dang/ ramis zhag gtsug ba dang/ zhag gnyis ba dang/zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhibs
'jags ba nas/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lus srul po dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs ragis dang/ sang ge dang/ stago dang/ dadang/
bkres pa dang/ skom ba dang/ 'tsho ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gseba' jags shing skrag par gyur ba las/ sa sany+tsas thams cad kyis zhi gyis brlabs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs

bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshe'i 'ad de ga dran n sngon gyi las kyi sgra le ba na cho ga togos te// bdag cag gas de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar bar ma bgyis na/dus gsum/
du gshegs kha'i sangs rgyas thamAtsad dgachag gse bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig// de'i tshogs
dag sangs rgyas kyi gang 'doragatogs ba 'di sangs rgyus bzho ldan 'das thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byazhe te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so legs
so khyedakyis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed zhus so// dazhas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka'agul to/thub pa gshags pa 'di dag la
nadad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyod de// de ring gzhan gyi don pa'i dga' bar gyur du byang chub sems gzhol byos// sngage can khyodazhirang gi yul nas rab tu grogs mdamathu med kyig/ thub la lan
khyod kyis sngo zhing b.rogs bar byed pa btang bar byos// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol ba/ khyod tshig gas byang chub du mad dad pa'i sa mas gcig bdag ma bskyod// thub pa ma gsungs/
bzhugs shag bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag snyan mag bdag cag gi yul nas dpung dang bzho bar bcas par gsal bar bgyi// phun sum tshogs 'dzin/
bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang cha mchis// 'dus pa chen po ni bo che tog gi gzungs las/ snying brtse ba'i le'uste dgu ba'o//g.yang de'i tshade bzhin gshegs pa la

tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji ltar 'das pa de bzhin gshegs ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byogataM/ nyon mongs bcu/

snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshula'adan legs par byin gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba na pham par mdzad/ byams ba chen po dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can

rnams lan gzags/ sngage ba'i lta ba las rab tu thar bar mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad/ zhi ba'i lam la na bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu ba rten ba'i tshes kyi snying pos lus 'jo

ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig ra ba pudabye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshad/ nag po'i phyogs na pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan na latsugs pa de bzhin du/

nga ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang/ sems can la thugs brtse ba'i sgang du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs la 'khor dun mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa zhig khyod nub zhas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bda'i su zhig
mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'da'adzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'dra bar ba gyade bar gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su sman par brgyadi bar 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'di'i gar bgrang
bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gsasu'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bayAkya thub bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mnad
ra ba'i dris la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas ba'i byang chub sems da pa' bzod pa thobang rnam sam/ brgya byi'i zham/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'og rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang/
kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dA wa dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lo 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gang su'ang rung// chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa

rnamaMs dang/ gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa chos kyi tshul 'od la mngon par dad pa'i brgya bzhi dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jage rten skyong ba nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po la de dgagalegag tu
gzusakyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtadamaramadzod gi de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dra mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs
thubya/ pa chod bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' sul to/ grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus ba thams cad nyon cig/ de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'asangs rgyas rnams 'a jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no// sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das thams cad skad cig tusangs rgyas kyi zhing gtsag tu 'dus pa

'di'ang shan tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang/ sems can thams cad rdzas su gzung ba dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshulakhyan gyis brlabs pa dang/ bla na med pa'i las la dgod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dmar 'chos kyi tshul un ring du gnas par bya ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi 'og rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas/
'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dus gsum du gtogos pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so// chu'i khams thams cad dang
ma' khams thams cad dang/ rlung gi khams thams cad dang/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad byan gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ gang dag sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang//

[d/ ]nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'i dbang po dag dang/ gdag gad gzi brjid ra par s mas na rnams dang/ gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams
cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongs su smazhi ba bya ba'i bya'i chos kyi tshul da byin gyis brlabs te/khyed kyi lag tu sha'i tugatad kyis gnas
'di'i dam pa'i chos 'da myur du ma 'jig pa dang/ nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la rgyas shage/ 'khar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo dad pa gang dag/
'dus pa chen po 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'adzazhi ba nas/ mgar bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyaganam/ dge bsnyan ma 'am/ dam pa'i chos
bzhi pa'i gang zab de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rags bar khyed kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ chos smra ba dang/ chos la dga' ba dang/ bsam gtan la mngon bar
dga' ba dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ dam pa 'dis 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba 'a phyir/ yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du rgyas shagi// de ci'i phyir zhi zha/ de bzhazhi gshegs
ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur ba'i di bzhi'i gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang/ nyon mongs pa can sAgegs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
bya@#// du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang/ mi nub par bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i/
bar gyi bya'i/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do// de ba zhi du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcurasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams

cad kyang/ nyon mongs pa can snyags cha lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cag gas 'dus te/ sems can la bzha ba'i phyir ga zungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rkyab 'chad ror 'gyur/ chos

kyi tshul 'di'i nga byan gyis rlob ma'agyur zhing/ chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ brgya byani dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong pa thams cad kyi lag tu gtod par 'gyur ro//

de bzhin du nged kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang/ ga nga bzhi ba na gnas pa' bo rgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang

'jig rtan skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yan dang/ ma mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tut+tani shugatan kyis/ cinas myur du ma

lag ci nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shage// rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ srung bar gyis shog/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ ragis kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang dam bcas

pa'ichos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dul ba chog bo'achos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ban glegs bam la bris te 'char bar byed pa'i bar dang/
chos smra ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ bsam gtan la mngon par ba na ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'dzazhi ba de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya// ra mo bya'o// mchod par bya'o/ de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs bste/ grong ngam/grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ longs sam/ 'brigs sam/ pho brang 'khor dang/ dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi

khyim gyi bar dugangan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chad dam/ lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/tha na legs bam la srasi tu 'chang na/ chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang sems can dmangs

'phel bar 'gyur// khyed des mdangs dang ldan nang gatha kharjid dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ ba rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ khyed kyi g.yog 'khor dang ga zhal med khang 'phal bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal

bo rnams kyang bsrung bar gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/de dag ga lul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu gling gi rgyal bo rnams kyang chos kyi bcud des ches
nas gcig la gtsagi ban pa'i soms dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par sman ba la'ang gtogs par yid ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/ ser sna med pa'i sogs dang/ ban pa'i
dngos po'i sems dang// sems can thams cad la snying rdzaba'i sa las nas/ yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdagab dag ga yul la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/'dzam bu'i

gling 'dareng skya bo rigs pas gang bar 'gyur/gzhi tu legs par 'gyur/ shan tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ rgya po mang bos gang zhing sa 'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ khrus bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang/ shin tu

zhim pa dang/ lo ma'i snyan dang/ ma tog gi sman dang/ nor dang/ 'bru rnams shani tu 'byor ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas pa skyed pa ra 'gyur ro 'thapa ba dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nadadang/

pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dug dang/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang/ phyi ma le ba dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin bu ma rungs pa dang/ ridags dang/ bya dang/ spyang ka dang/ dus ma yazhi pa'i

rlung dang/ char ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang/ 3na mo dang/ mtshan mo daraM/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ lo dang/ dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa mas can rnams kyang phal

cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di zhes ga'i phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du rgya bar 'gyur/ de dag kyang khyed kyig yog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag

rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mapa'i ng phan yon cheste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po'i skyon gyis brlabs te/ grags pa
'phel 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ lan grangs ga zhan kha myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus bar yongs su zad par 'gyugo/ mdor na tshe 'di'i
bud med kyi dgo po myos gyur bdas ba thams cad byang kha'agyurahi/ mtshams med pa byed kha dang/ dam pa 'chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa ma gtogs par/ gang ga zhan lus dang
ngag dang/ mad kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang/ 'dus pa chen po sangs

rgyas thams cad kyis can gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang nyon mongs ba'i grwa ba ba ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmages pa
'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ malag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ bsam pa thams car mun sum tshogs ba dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi lags pa ra spyod ba thams cad 'phul

par 'gyur ba dang/ lta ba na ba thams cad song ba dang/ dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod la dar/ zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur bo/ tshul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam gradA

'di spyod bar 'gyur ba der/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis babs pa 'dus pachan po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i che chus sa phyogs 'ashin tu rnam par 'gyur/'bras bum ngas dang ldan pa dang/

[zi/ ]@#// Anitu nam pa dang/ rodang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ ro med pa spong bar 'gyur/ ma tog dang 'bras bu shan tu 'byor pa dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ khang ba dang/ mdzod dang//

rdzaphru dang/ bya phyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang/ zas rang/ skom dang/ snyan dang/ yo byad rnams ni cu 'byor bar 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang dag zas dang skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag

'a shin tu nad med pa dang/ nor dang ldan pa dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ dge ba tshol pa la mngon par brtson pa dang/ sdig pa'i lta ba

yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de dag 'dan sar sha de'i ngos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur to/ de dag gse khyad kyi gsog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyis/

chos kyi stobs kyis 'go sa bzhi'i skyo ba'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shagi/ sems can rnams kyi chos kyi don la tshud cig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
yon thams cad la mchod byas par 'gyur ro// nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi tshul 'ad gzung ba dang/ bshad pa dang/ srung ba'i phyir/ sas rgyas
kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bzang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ brgya

[z/]tsan gyi dbang pon/tshangs ba'i dbang po dang lto 'phya chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi nang dazhi gzhas pa khal cher gling bzhi ba 'don gzhas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bkas sgrol mdzad do// tshang de'atsho byang chub sems dpa' chas dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu cu rtsa bdun
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gnas la de dag skams cad kyis mgrin ga[@] tu 'di skad ces gsol te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thamasad kyi 'das bdag cag gas kyang dus gsum du
gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'igs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o/ snying rjes sogog can yongs su smazhi
khar bgyis nas/bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i skad du/ bdag cag gas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thong ngam/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khul dang/ bo bang ba khor dang/
dgon pa'i gnas su rgyas khar bstan par bgyi'o/ dam pa'i chos kun du gnas ba'i bgyi ba'i smad du/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smazhe bar bgyi'o/ lar de sangs rgyas kyi ri 'da'i
gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba bya'i ti/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ba zhin gyis shagi/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs
[a]@#// pazhus/ lto 'phye chen po 'i debang mo'i bar thams cad dang/gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dug pa sems can gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu tsa bzhi
de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu'ang skad ces ma sol to// bdag cag gse kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i skad du/ 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas/
'a rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o yang dag par bstan pa brgya'i// sems can longs su sminabar bgyi'o// chos 'tshal ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrubar bgyi'o//
yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gas kyang 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/

u ge dang/ pha'ol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma yin pa'i dang/ char pa dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ gdug pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ romams ba dang/ sra ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tshaba'i dngos bo rnams rab tu
na bar bgyi'o/ bde pa dang/nyams dga' ba dang/ la lags pa dang/ 'dul par bsgrub pa rab@#// chos kyi tshul mun pa'i dug nas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tanacherapagyi// chos nyan pa'i rgyal bo de dag/
kya shan tu yongs su bskyang bar ba bya'o// bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bsems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya pa
byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legs so legs go/ khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shage/ bdag dang 'gan dang/ gnyis ka'i phyi'i nan tan byas shage/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar khyed kyis sa mas can yongs su smin par bya ba dang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang/ dam pa 'chos lun rang du gnas par bya pa'i pa

brtson na/ khyed rang bor ma thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbus kyi glang ba ni pa 'don gnas ba'i brgya byan dang/ tshangs pa

dang/ 'jig rten skyong pa dang/ lha'i dbang po nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'il dang/ gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo gru gnas 'dug pa 'di
skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis byan gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra'ang rags pas khang pa ra bgyi ba nas/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khul dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/
dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zapa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag yang chos sgrub pas gnas nga tsho/ chos
@#// kha 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyan dang/ dge bsnyan ma dang/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs bam

la bAs te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang/ bsam gtan la brtson ba de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bas sta du bgyi/ blamar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang/ gdugs

dang ba danadang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ byug ba nas/ sman dang yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa 'am/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyidi nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi
bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gse chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par shes nas/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyas bas stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par ba gyi'o// de ci'i slad

du zhe na/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhi gyis brlabs pa 'ag srungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi ma gras 'di'achad pa'i tsho/ chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus

dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ rang shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing/ tshogs dang mthu thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag ga'i yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang/ rtsod
ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ muge dang/ nad dang/ rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma lags pa'i chu/ charapa dang/ grung pa dang/ tsha ba dang/char ma 'kha pa pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/

ltas ngan pa dang/ sdong ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ brlad ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang// 'o ma mchis pa dang/ ma dag pa'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shani bde ba dang/ la lags pa/
dang/ nyams dga' ba dang/ nad mamachis pa dang 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang/ char ba dang/ grang po dang/ tsha ba rnams dus dus su 'byung bar bgyi'o// mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo dang/ zla ba
dang zla ba phyed dang/ lo dang/ dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang// rgyu skar dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba rnams kyang legs ba ra rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang/ chu mig
dang rdzing dang/ leng ka'ang shan tugatam bar bgyi'o// gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par 'gyur ba de'ang bdag cag gse bsal bar bgyi'o//grongadad/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag gas 'dab ma dang/ yal ga dang ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro dang/ lo tog rnams
shin tu snyam pa dang/ bda' ba dang/ kha dog dang/ ro chu zhing mang ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/ sems can rnams la nor dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub kyis ma brel bar bsgrub par
bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i soms dang/ sngag pa yongs su spong ba dang/ dpal dang/ bsod nams 'byung bas tshe ring bo 'grub par bgyi'o// grod dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong
[za @#// rdul dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ pho brang 'khor gang dag na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam/

tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ mchod pa dang/ bag stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag cu/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gse bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang
bar ba/ de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/ phan ba bsgrub par bgyi/ ltad mo dang/ bkra mi shis pa dang/ lta ba ngan pa dang/ byed po ngan pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs ngan pa dang/ smon lam nganaM
ba dang/ skyabs ngan pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsog dang/ g.yo dang/ sbyadang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ khro ba dang/ sar sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i
lA pa'i lam drang bo dang/ dad pa dang/ dul ba dang/ kun sdom pa dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang/
blon po dang/ rtsis pa chen po dang/ grong rdul dang/ shas 'tsho ba dang/ ljongs kyi mi rnams dang/ rigs bzhi rnams dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing

yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o// kha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad
par 'gyur ba nas/ glegs bam la bris te gzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/ sems can de dag la bdag cag gas de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang/ brtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul
yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du/ bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byan
bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyad kyis de bzhin du byas shage/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rogs mi zhub bar nan tan byas na/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ brgya byanadang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mag mi bzang dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ lus ngan po rnams la bka' su la pa//

bzhin bzang dag du sems can la snying rje ba'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can snyags ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bla na med pa yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par/

sangs rgyas te/ sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang/ g.yonatsa na byas gtseoM pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya pa'i phyi'i/ ngas bdud kyi phyogs na pham par byas/
dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni sdug pa sngal las yongs su thar par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi char ni pha ba/ ngas bdud bya ba na pham par byas so//
bzhin bzang dag gang ga phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med

glu ba rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang/ sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can longs su sman pa'i bya ba dang/ ma dag ba'i las thams cad ma lus par thad par bya

ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos chos

thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byon gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhazhi du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shage/ gang

nga'i ma pa'i chos kyi tshul yang da ga pa srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang/ gang lung 'bogs pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ dran pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ bshang pa dang/

gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang/ tshangs bar spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang/ gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas/ 'du shes/

dang tshor ba 'gog ba sgom pa'i bar dang/ gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba nas/ ba ngas rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i bar gyi tshogs dang/ gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi

dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta na byed pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'ad 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de thams

cad khyed kyi lag shugatad do// gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do/ ma 'ongs

pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'du 'dzani pa nas/ tha naglegs bam la bras te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grod ngam

dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tukhrus byas te/ gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su smos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshog

btang ba'i sa nga ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lo'i rtsa mos 'chad dam/ tha na glegs la bris te klog pa der/ gal te khyed chos mnyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa
rnams yongs su bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ gnyis ka'i mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir ma dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang/ lam baspyod pa la rmongs pa byas
par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs bas 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa 'i chos kyi tshul
'di rab tu nub par gyur pa na/ grong ma/ grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/ sa sam/ ra brogs sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ngagon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/

bram ze'i khyim mtsha/ chongad pon gyi khyam mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan zhag/ dge bsnyan ma chos skya ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lagashan tu byags nas gos gsar pa 'chol te/ ma tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs

btang ba/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i sang ga'i khri lo 'dug sta/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu'achad dam/ bas te klog pa de ra chos nyan pa 'am/

ga chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang/ bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ gat+tase ka'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongs su snyan bar bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul
bo yang dag bar 'bar bar bgyi ba 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor tader ma mchis sam/ gong nas/ dmangs kyi khyae gyi bar de dag

yongs su bskyang ba dang/ sems can de dag gi zhor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bang ba mang bo rab tu gang ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i

bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ oM gu ha/ oM gu ha/ oM duSha/ dz+hag bu ra ha/ nayA mi kha/ kha kha kha ba kha ba/ klan na kha ba sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag
chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba bsrung pa nas/ nor dang/ 'phrudang/ mdzod dang/ thang ba mang bo rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad dudar ma mchis na/ ya ngam las 'gal par 'gyur ba lags so//
de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yan thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs

so zhes bya ba rab tu byan no// de nas ko'u sha kas 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ grong ngam grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'ad ni sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gas sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha ba tshwa kha/ a ba tshwa kha/ nal g+ha/ a chung dzA/ a mU ba ha
a khat+tA a kha asha kha/ dzi na pu khe swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di ni bdag gas bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas/mi dang mi ma
g.yazhi pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mams pa'i dus
na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag bas bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ u kha na

ba na ba sa ba na/ sa mu dra saM 'di dzA tawA ts+tsha tu/ ba ru Na pa ba rA dza swAhA/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po' bags skyas bo la legs so zhes bya ba rab tubyin no// de nas mag mi
bzang gas kyang 'di skad cos gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ga bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar bdag gis blo bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ jo lo ga/ a to ga/ a ma ma/ mog/ a ma sA rAtshan tsha ya

u dza hAhA/ de nas ma dang ma ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mag ma bzang la legs so zhes bya pa rab tu byon to// de nas yang yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar
dang ma mchis nga 'a dus na gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung po ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis blo bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste//

ba'i dzakha/ kha ba dza ba ra sku kha/ k+Sha sar/ mu ka ba ha/ A A ba Da wahA/ mi dang ma ma an pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byon no// de nas lus ngan pos kyang bde
skadeces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gsasangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i bar gyi dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ kA d+ye/ klu kla ka// kho ka dre/ su til+la rje/ a nA ya na klu dre/ grid klu // sA ga ra grong klu/saM gu

su zhu de/ d+ham klu ya mu dre Ahu/ ma dang ma ma yin pa'ibar gyas rgyal bo chen bo lus ngan bo la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byon no// yang de'i tsho glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khachos 'di'i gnas pa'i gnod

sbyan gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyes brgyadang/ gzhan yang glang bzhi ba gzhan na gnas ba bzhi khri dang/ gzhan yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra wa dang/ lha ma yazhi dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/

mi 'am cad ng/ 'bu chen po rdzu 'phrul cha ba/ gza brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar

dunub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ngamo/grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ khrigs sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brangangam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/chong dpon gyi
khyam mam/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slongangam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang da pa'i
ragis kyi bu 'am/ rags kyi bu mo gzhi cu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag share tu phyugs nas/ gos gsar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su rtas bcos bu sna tshogs pa ri ba/ spos sna tshogs

'a kyis bdugs ba/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gtam brgyan pa'i sang ge'i khri la mchis te gzungs kyi phyag rgyab chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam

la bros te klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong dums paskor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa dang/ chos smra ba bsrung ba dang/ rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang/ sems can gzhan yang bsrung
ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam grong rdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/
pas der sems can rnams kyi nor dang 'bru dang/ mdzod dang ]bang ba mang po rab tu gtam mam/ der ma mchis sam/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ nu ga dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi
ngamag tshogs dang/ dus ma lags pa'i cher dang/ rlung dang/ shani tu grang ba dang/ tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na/ bdag cag gis 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang/ 'khus pa dang/ ma mnyes bar bgyis par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang/ lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang/ lus rul bar 'gyur ro// bdag
cag g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs ba'i dus na yang gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'ad 'bar bar bgyi'o//
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ yongs su sman par bgyi'o// na par bgyis pa'i
las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam gras 'ad bstan par chos s ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o/ chos nyan pa dang/ chos smra ba de dag ga nor dang/ 'bu dang/ longs spyod dang/
kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/ mi dang mi sna
lan ba de dag thams cad la legag go zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
'di ci lags/gang bdud bye baphrag brgya bo 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems
dpa'i ltadamohan gyis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'di ni/

ma no// bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob sta/ 'khrug cade yade ma dga' nas da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du'ang glags lta zhing skabs

tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhazhi dug log khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang/ gsog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyas brgya po de dag kyang

g.yog dang bcas par dkona mchog gsum la da ba ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yang mi dga' nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du/ 'di dag pa'i

bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhag pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang/ dag pa'i rtsa ba ma skyas pa dang/
ma dag pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang/ dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ma 'dod pa dang/ smon lam btab pa 'i phyir sems mtshams mi sbyor/ dad par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/

rab rtagatong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang/ gzungs zab mo 'dalta bu thos pasargyu de nyid kyis shi chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa
[dj]rab tu red bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' lad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal tes mas can dag ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags

par gyur na'ang de nyid de dag gi ban chod pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAni tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngomatshar to// yang de'i rmi bdud ra pa zhes

bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa 3dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa/ dkonagag gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa red par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung bstan pa

thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyanasngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs nas kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
stobs bskyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zharim lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang sku 'di skad ces sus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am cidang le'aphya chen po dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yan pa dang/ bdud g.yog

dang bcas ba rnams kyang bdag gi tshig gson cigaM/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma can thams cad rnam bar spyodal/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad gongs
[p? ]/su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhange rab tu nyon mongs pa can sIgs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshams ma mas pa bgyid pa// dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa// ma dag pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sa mas

can rnams kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang/ ngan song gsum las shAnatu bzla ba dang/ theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang/ ting nge 'dzani dang/ gzungs dang/ bzod pa la dgod pa dang/
