tsha gas dang 'a thams cud la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dag skyong ga dge 'dun chen
bo dang thabs ci tu bzhugs to/ des gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'atsal te/ bcom
0ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa dang/ mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman ba dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

ba'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje l thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gi/

sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'ad bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal kha can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs ba/ byin gyis
brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sAnge brtsa ba'i phyir nga'ang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zu zhig/ ta wA/ dza ya dza ya/ ma hA dza ya ba til bud d+ha a d+hiT+Thita yaM/ d+ham

a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hig me dzA na a ba b+ha so sa/// lag na rdo rje'adi dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi
nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig 'di deb gong gis lus la btags sam 2 glogs bam la bras pa de'i lus la da pag tshad stong tshun chad du phyi rgol ba gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshon dang/ dug dang/
dbyig dug gis ma tshugs so// rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo// phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der ma zhus gnod par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ gis
[r]@#/ dkyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di gar bris te 'chang ba de nga sring 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang/ dug dang/ chu dang/ rigs dang/ dug sbyar
ma gzhan gyis ma tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ ma rdo 'chos pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung

'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis ma phog/ thams cad du'ang nga rgyal ba skya bar 'gyur ro// gnod pa med cing ma snang la ma skyes par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang/

gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ byin gyisabarlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ya/ dza yota ta mo/ d+harma a ba b+has na/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha/ bo d+ha bo d+ha na/ bo d+hani/
tathA ga ta/ a dItaM/ a ba rdo ha Ni/ a ro bya nidza ku su ma sa re/ sa ba ra tri Da/ da dA put+tA pA sha ra ba d+d+haM/ o hanaM dzam b+hani/ stam b+ha naM/ stam b+hin/

sa rje a ro tam+b+heNaN/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud d+has+ya/ ma hA ka ru Na Na/ ba d+ha ra Ni/ sang d+d+han tuman+d+ra pA de swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag gse rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'anga'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnamA

brjod par bgyi'o// tang thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Da paN Da paDa/ dzA la dzA la dzA la/ badzapu har pa ha ra/ praha ra d+ha ra ng+ha ra d+ha ra/ har ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su mo/ ba la
ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pA ya pA te ya/ a kra ma/ a kra ma/ ba kra ma ba kra ma/ a myol ma tsal/ kha ga tsAr Nin la ba tI/ badza dra ha ri Ni/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzra kA ya/ budad+ha a d+hiSh+Tha/
bud d+ha ri ma hadu sgyu/ ud tsakan d+he/ ma hAte dza bti/ ma tsa le ma tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+han/ ka kaMr/ kA sa na/ sa mA hitaM/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ri tsa ra/ glu glu// badzra mA lA
ra sa ris ra/ ka la ka la kha ri Ni hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi go 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gsungs pa ste/ su zhig gi sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal pa
can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'an/ ya dgas
sam/ zha za 'am/ brjod byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ phyud dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'a ma/ ma mo'i gdon nas/ gong ma'i gdon nam/ sgom byed dam/ sgom byed
kyi gdon nam/ dri za'i gdon de dag thams cad rlugs par bgyis so// rengs par bgyis so// tang// badzra badzra badze/ han ba[P]ha na badzra/ khA da khA da baji/ spu Ta ya ma Na ya/
skya Na ya/ badzoN/ i daM gu han/ hU~MhU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT wa Da/ gra sa gra sa gra sa// pA ta ya/ pa ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+har myur/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa
dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khyad pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shage/ dza ya kAr/ dza yaM ku ru/ tur ta ra tar/ ma hAtar
'tshaNi/ ku rje ku Te/ kuTaM/ badzra kuT sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi snga dbon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo legs so legs so// lag na
rdo rje sems can chen po khyod soms can rnams la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ snying brtsa ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i ng legs so// lag na rdo rjerage sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i
lag tu song bas lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris ma/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal las/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal
bon po rnam thos kyi bur ba/sa kyi g.yog dang bcas par thong ngam/ grong khyeraram/ grong rdal las/ yul de srung bar 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis kyang gnod par

mi 'gyur ro// sa phyogs der ma ngas ma 'byung ngo// dgra mi 'byung ngo// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang lhan cig der srung ngo// yongs su skyob
bo longs su 'dzin to// zhab dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do// chad pa spong ngo// mtshon cha spong ngo// dug gsod do// ma mdza' ba 'gog go/ mtshams pa/cod do// sa gachodado// tad+yathA/

tapan ta pa na/ pra tapan d+hu ru ma/ d+maru ma/ bud d+ha a d+hiT+ThitaM/ mu khi u kha/ su mu khe/ su mu khe/ pra la pra la/ sa mA d+hi// sa mA d+ha gargyus mA d+ha gat+taM mAn si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/ dung d+ha ma na
si ka sAhA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i rgyal po gang la la zhag gas rage sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'ad glegs bam la legs par byas te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags
te 'chang zhing de la spos dang/ 'breng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ ma tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bas stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen
bo rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin byed bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tusrung bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang/ dgra dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// mthus yul der 'jug pa dang/ bgegs 'jugazha'ang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgags sna tshogs brgya dang bgegasasna tshogs stong byed pa 'gyur ro/
mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o// gang du g.yu la ngor
'jug gam/ da chen po dang 'thab pa der rag sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'ad mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de
pham par byed par 'gyur ro// de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'ad kyi mgul du btags ra du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje grongangs/ grong khyer ram/

lta grong rdal la ma/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang/ ma ngas mi bzad pa chen po byungan/ dar nag sngags kyi rgyal mo rgan mo rgyal po can 'di dang/ ma tog
sA tshogs dang/ cho ga dang/ gtor ma dang/ bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyalamo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na/ de'i cho rgyal po chen po

rnam thos kyi bu rmogs kyi g.yog dang bcasashang gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang/ mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che la 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba rom/ mthu che ba gang

yang ma mchis so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro//

tang// badzrab dzebadzra/ a ma ta badzra/ dzA la ta badze/ shu ta sha ni/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ stam b+ha ya/ sarma grahA NAn/ tshwahAhU~M/ thaDa thaDa paT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pa Ta pa Da pa// taT
taT ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru/ rnyam d+ha ma d+hu ma/ dzA la dzA la dzA la/ khu khu ma/ khu khu ma/ g+ho ra g+ho ra g+hor/ badzra ma nasi/ badzra huti/ putir/ phu ru shu ru/gyi sa gra sa/ sarba a ho tiShaN

na/ nA bu Ni/ mu chu le/ badzra pra dA da na/ ma la phu swAhA/ A u pa la na tsu tsu re swAhA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya sa ma b+ha pe sAhA/ dza yota tu ma sAhA/ dza ya ba ri de swAhA/ dza yan d+ha re swAhA/

dza ya ma na sa AhA/ dza ya badzra AtA a dza ta badzra ya swAhA/ badzrautwA sha nA ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha badzra d+ha ta swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sa phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba sul bar bgyi/ yongs
su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ chad pa spang bdang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug dgus pa dang/ mi mdza' ba dgug pa dang/ dus a lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/
'thab mo dang/ rtsod ngab dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ mtshams dgum par bgyi'o//
tad+yathA/ dza ya dza ya dza ye/ ma hAdza ya/ ma li ma na sa/ dze/ mu ru mu ru/ rta'utu/ mu mu le/ mAg ba ti/ d+ha du ma/ ba ga le g+ha d+ha ra Ni/ te dza ba ti/ bdag dang sems can thams
cad 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ dus ma yazhi par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shage swAhA/ bcom ldan 'dus gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bya

ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa// byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// ta shA/ bur skye bud d+he/ bud+ho bur+Na/ bud+d+ha ba taM/ bud+ma a ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harma pa tI/ sa ma hitaM/ sa mA d+higats+tso/ bud+d+ha

a la lha sa na/ bud+d+ha pa rihar/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni swAhU/ su la la zhage rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'dilas 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo bo sa ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba bdun du 'gas so/[”]
sa su zhig ga sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba mi 'da'achang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ ma u0f7a ger 'dra 'am/ glegs bam la bse te grong ngum/ grong khyemaram grong la lam/
ljongs sam/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/ der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shange/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu ge
sngags 'dzin pa nga'i sa dadu 'brangs bsrung bar bgyi'o// dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// sar rgol ba dang/ dgra dang// g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ mtshang
'bru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'byed ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// sar bzlog par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byazhe
rgyal bo chen po legs so legs so// sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang/ bde ba dang/ bstan pa srung ba'i phyir zhugs pa nang
legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'das gang yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang/ dug dang 2 byad dang//
gsod byed dang/ rims dang/ gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// lag na rdo rje/

khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal go chen mo rgyal ba can 'ad zung zhig// chongs shogo/ kun chub par gyis shage// lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tsho phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'ajami ba'

dus na sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnong sbyin dang/ srin po rnam sa dang/ chos ma ya ne pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe thung ba chos ma yin//
pas yul 'khor skyor ba 'byung ba de'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/ nyams mi bzad pa de dag dang// snang ba dang/ ras snang ba'i sa mas can
thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// 2ga sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bums cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byan byas brlabs paM/ phyag rgyas btab ra/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 3di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba
pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnamagrongs 'da'i mang rtsalag/ 'od ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa// lag
a rdo de'i phyir khyod kyas de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zungazhag/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar zung zhag/ bcom

'a/ ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang/ rgyal po chen bo rnam thos kyi bu dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yanadang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten la'angs
tabcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/
bzaAr+ya a b+hi'u nInA ma d+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus

gtsagan/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ma zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gras chod pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal kho

la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs [1 ]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di la ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang/
byang chub sa mas dpa' sngon gyi spyod pa dang/ bden pa'i smon lam dang/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag sgoms shig/ ston cig/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi
chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungasan yul la ma gnas/ phyogasan ma gnas na/ bcom ldan
'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
skad ces bka' sul pa/ nA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shAri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang/ theg pa chen po la
bas khyu// lhag par byed pa dang/ khyodagazungs yul mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa'i ng legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gzungasan chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang/
ma ngos pa dang/ da ltar byung ba ma yaM to/ shAri bu gzungasan 'das ba zhes ma 'chad/ ma 'ongs pa zhes 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes ma chad/ dngos por mi 'chad/ dngos po med par
'chad/ mtshan ma deng mtshan ma mad bar ma chad/ chos gang smyo ba'i phyire 'am 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi shAri'i bu 'on kyang byang chub bams dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos
ston te/ gang 'di gzungs ni 'das kyi/ rnam grangs kyi gzungs nagazugs med la bya'i/ lam du gyur pa/ rig pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/ sangs rgyas kyi
lhag par bya ba sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/ sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o// nga nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus//
bcom ldan 'a des la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus gang la gnas shange gzungs de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'i ma
ldog bar 'agyur ba dang/ dam bca' ba bzang bdang/ chos la mi gnas pa dang/ bdag the tshom ma mchis pa dang/ slob da pon ma mchis pa dang/ rang gi lam la gzhas pa bcom ldan ba das kyis
00 bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu gzhungs slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nases
rgyas nyid du brjod do// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhag byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thobs la khas stang byed dache/ bla mar byed dam/ ga gro byed dag/ mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti
stang byas par 'gyur// gang dag gis gzungs 'di thosaM pa dang/ gang dag mos pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing/ byang chub kyi sams der mi 'bral bar
'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di lta ste/ san d+ha ra Ni/ ut+tarA NaM/ sazhapra tit+taM/ utu ma su pra tiT+ThitA/ badzag ba lA/ sarba pra har dzAn ba ti/ u ta pa da ni/ ba ni yAn b+hi ru ni/

a lha b+he har/ 'u b+ha ba ti ma h+phata/ ba hu hUMb+ha/ a ba ba tsa/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni rebang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/ 'dasal rnams dang/ ma'ongos pa rnams dang//
da ltacu nams dang/ legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gse legs par bzung ste 'chang ba de chung du mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshong rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang/ bskal ba
stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ cha dang srog chags mi bsun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltamashA ri'i
bu gzungs 'di'i 'das ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum go/ shA rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i gros chod ba bcu mthar chags
su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang/ zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par bzung ba byas babs/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gse gzungs 'di'i sa sha na tshig gcig
tsam bzung ba de bas bsod nams chos mang du bskyed do// deci'i phyir zhan/ ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum bzhi pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
sul nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems da pa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zarab cas ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi zhim tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+ha
shes lngas bsgyurtsing zhus taM/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yahir d+ma ba tInA ma d+ha ra Ni/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sogs dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/ bcom

ldan 'das dga' ldan na zla ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta sta/ blan chad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa// skyo ba gcig
gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sams da pa' sams dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' sul la// legs par gnas kyang/
chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di'i dzan bar 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo//
ma thos so// mamyong ngo// gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ myong ba des gzungs thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'daltar legs par gnas byang chub sa mag/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gas bzod nams ma man pa dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba byas so zhes 'dzin to// de ci'i phyi nan/ 'di ltar logs
bar gnas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po na gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/
da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar cha ya'i/ 'gro ba chod par ma yin/ 'chi'athor a
yin/ skya bar ma yin/ stong bar ma yin/ mi song bar ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma mang par ma yin/ smon par ma man/ smon pa med par ma yin/ skya bar ma
yin 'gag par ma yin no// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni yi shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tsho yi shes 'a gnas par gyur pa de'i

tshimya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gang ba tshomyan las 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshodabyig dang ldan pa'i gzus len cing kun chub pa byed la 'dzin te/ don dang tshig 'bru'ang yongs su zad par ma 'gyur ro//
yongs su ma nga rtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang/ rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no// ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bdenapa'i chos dang/ rnam par
dag pa'i chos can no// gzhan gyi dwang la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so// sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/ rig pa'i chog la zhugs pa'o// legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma chags so// ma 'chang ngo// mi 'grol lo// legs par gnas gang gi cha byang chub sems dpas sa dpa' chen po ma chags/ mi'achang/ mi 'go'i ba de'i
tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i
gzungs 'thob bo// tad+ya thA/ ku Ni ku Ta ku tsa la/ a lA a me ri to/ ko shA la/ a rir/ a mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags
kyi ming gzhan 'o// ma byon pa dang/ nga ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon
dang/ da ltar byung ba'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i donalas gzhas pa'i phyir ro// legs
par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'ad 'dzi'i pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mdzod pa dang bsnyen bkurabyas pa yin
no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das glangs chod pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang khong du chud bar byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grongs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan ba yin no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des byang chub sems dpe 'a sa mas dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi phashes b.res par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas so// bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes bar bya'o//
su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs cad 'dzazhi pa de la lta bar gnas ra ra 'gyur taM/ shes rab 'a dod pa la shes rab dang/ gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang/
dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang/ thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas pa 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga 'di yan to/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu' chen dang na ra sngags te bza' 'o//
sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi gang gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o// 'on kyang gsangasngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ga mthus/ gang dag
gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yazhe zhum/ nam mkha' ldang ngam/ mi 'om ci'am/ lu 'a bu chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dgas sam/
grul bum mam/ sha za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag de la soms dga' bar 'gyur ro// bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub yongs su
gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang/ yangs pa chen bo dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ yongs su dgar ldan dang/ radabab pa la gnas pa dang/ ga ngas
ral gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa
'am ngagon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sman par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la pa dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' sul nas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gzhas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag ya rangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado//
phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzen ma tra dang (dAn shAl dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bshade ya shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad
gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar rdzogu lan ma bdu/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ngug sal ba zhes bya ba'i
rig sngags sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas

sbyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' sul pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na gangs kyi ra byang ngesazha/ spos ngad ldan
pa'i ri bo la// ri rgyal de yi sul gnas tshe// gzhon nu bsod nams brgya ya mchon// ar+ya ya ya nga gas byon la// sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can// gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas//
mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can// dug gi ma tog rnams za zhing// ma lu tu a lcag khu 'thung// nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug bu khyedatshur shog r la nyon// nga la dug sel
zhes bya ba// dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod// dug rnams gang yin de kun na/ nga'i ang gsi 'jig par 'gyur// 'ad lta ste/ oM a lamit+taM/ til mi/ a la te lam//
duny+tsa/ dum b+ha/ lA ya/ du ba du sa la ye/ tak+ka ta ka kaNaM/ ma rnamarmar he/ kag mo/ kashar mu ka te/ a lha zhu/ a lo/ a la ye/ a lA A le/ a ba e ya/ 'bu shA//
hAte/ tun+te a na u/ raka AhA/ dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni spyin pa thams cad dkar bo ste/ sus rag sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sprul gyis mi za'o//
de'i lus la dug gsam tshugs so/ sbrul gang zhag de la 'dzin pa de'i mgo shang aN+Da ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sprul gyi mdun du brjed par mi bya'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe nA/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ a la lA/ la lA/ tsakra/ bag+ho/ ko/ ke Di ti kun T/ ku ra Ni ti/ smra Ta/ bu ru Ti ti/ ma Ta/
no/ ni ku ru Ne/ ni ku ru Da te/ mu ru Ta/ u ru ti/ na u ru Ta/ ni mu ru Do ti/ bu ru To/ pu Ta Ta Ta haraM/ phuT Ta da na/ ta ha re/ nA ga ha'o/ nAg Da/
[76/ ]na/ ta ha re/ sa rba ta 2 sarba tan/ Ta ra/ kA/ A li/ rgyale/ rma la/ ba shi/ sha te/ shAta/ ba ra ta la/ mA ta la/ hal hale/ hal ha la ha la le
a la le/ ke ra tsal/ mi la la/ tanaN+Di tAnaT/ ta Ta// spu ta spu ta/ tsaT phaT/ har pa khri sAhA/ dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung bo 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags
gabarjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad na de bzhazhe no// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no// yang dag ba'o// bden pa'o// mnor ba'o/ phyin ci ma log pa'o// dug 'dim gdug par gyur
ga/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig/ 'dzan pa'i gan du song zhag/ ma'i nang du song zhig/ chu'i nang du song zhig/ thang la song zhage/ ka ba'i nang du song zhig/ rtsig nga 'i nang du song
nage nam mkha' la song zhig/ sa'i nang du song zhag/ zhi bar gyur cig swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sul nas/ dge slong de dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dug sel rgyas bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+hi pa tha ta b+ha ga bAn Ar+ya aM gu lin+tA
ma bi rAdzI/ bod skad du/ bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la/
zug 'tshal lo// daltadag slong rnams ra dri rgyal na gnas te/ de'i tsho'abags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ des bdag la sgras pa/ bu sngags kyi
tshig 'di nyon cig/ klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed/ g.yog rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ 'byung bo rnams dang/ sha za rnams dang/ sems can
stobs po che rnams dang/ grul bum rnams dang/ sems can grwa rnams dang/ 'phra man ba dang/ 'bu lon ma dang/ chu srin dang/ stag dang/ grul bum rwa can dang/ mche ba can gyis de ltar

sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po oM gu la yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa sta/ sngags can gang gse de shes na lha rnams kyi ba/dug ba lang dag par med par
byed do// u0f00na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya a bu la/ tad+ya thA/ o klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ sbrul lam/ sbrul mo 'am/ gnod byashe zhum/ gnod sbyin mo 'cha/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung mo 'am/ 'brachen
pha 'am/ 'phratsham 'am/ gdug bas zin pa 'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa'i ng rang/ pha ba pa/ ha ra ha ra ha re/ ro dza ra/ bsha ba/ nA ga ra/ sa re re/ har par/ ma ram ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/
bad+har pa d+he ra/ mar ma ra/ mAr ya A ra ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya moT ya/ A hU~MAhU~M/ la grul sku/ A na ya A na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ban/ gu rtsaguN//
za lhuNapa a sgyurma ba la/ dbag ched stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig/ klu thams cad rmongs shig/ sod cig/ thar par mdzod cig/ o hu lu yulu ha la
ha lahal ba gaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal mo oM gu las bka' stsal pa/ ta ka ka Na ka ke/ teka ke na Da ka le zhi/ shi ra shar/ tsaN ke sha ro han/ bgegs thams cad sel bar
mdzad pa can/ las stong tsan/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa oM gu la ta thA pa ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid+d+hi/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ ma'i mgo'i thod kyi 'phrang ba
can hUMk+Sha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyan khur gyi bar du dug sol ba/ a su su ra de ta dang/ ngan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can M/ bgegs 'joms bar byad pa can/ lha yum

da la phyag 'tshal bstod sAhA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'chi ba dang klad pa 'gas shing rgyal ba brgyar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul
gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do// oM ka la ka la/ choha ka la/ kA la nA ba ni/ bgegs thams cad zlog cig/ kha bam pha rol pham par mdzod cig swAhA/ bklags pas 'grub mi

oM guli'i snying po dang bcas pa'o// tad+ya thA/ o d+hu na d+hu ne/ d+hu na d+hu na/ sat+ya/ tad+ya/ Ta ha sa na ngu d+hu no/ ban d+ha banad+ha/ rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'jog po'i dug 'dor du
[rsp]// 'jug la/ dza ya dza ya/ tshudza tshudza/ tshu dza tshu dza/ thong zhig/ glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs chen po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal
nas 'byung/ mu ya mu tsa tshu tsa sAhA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so/
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yaserma d+harma A tIka' ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga'

bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya' gakhrungs/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga'ang da ltar 'chad pa zung zhi'i// r+ya b+hU
a btaM/ a brta/ ba ba/ ba bto/ b+ha ga ma shud+d+haM/ pra b+hA sA/ tar Ni/ ug kha la/ lug kha la/ sa rba d+hanA/ sha ba rgyanAhA/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ats+tsa/ a na le/ a lu le/ a lu la/
0 mAn+ta a nu ga te/ sarba d+harma a d+ha ba ti ya pAlta/ tshoswA ka ra/ a d+hA ga ta dzA ni/ bde'ut+tA pa te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo//
dang/ thams cad dang ldan ra 'khor de dag ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'des kyis gsungs pa la mngon par basod do// chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsu TAm NinA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'agazungs/ sangs rgyas dang/
byang chub sams dpa' dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i ra bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab par mchog tu dad byang zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzags dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ 'ongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad la/ 'jigs pa thams cad
las rnam par shar par mdzad pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad 'jig par mdzad ng/ mi mthun pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ 'gyod pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ra ma dzad pa/
ubya// sngage pa thams cad 'dzems par mdzod pa/ 'byung po dang/ ro langs dang/ gshase ngan du 'chib dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'go bar
mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ chu ge dang/ mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad zlog bar mdzad pa/ lha dang/ klu dang// gnod sbyin dang/ srazhi bo dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'
ldong dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa// dug dang/ 'brum phran dang/ spor bu dang/ gshed khyod dang/ byad dang/ ro langs dang/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad
'jog par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gsheng byed thams cad sel mdzad ba/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid// ra dang 'bra rnams 'a ra la mdzad pa// bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dang/ ga log
'kher rtag tu mang gyur ba// phyi'i zlog pa brjod par bya/ lha dang lha ma'i g.yul 'gyed tshe// brgya byin lha min rnams las pham// nga nas ranges pa kho nar ni// 'jig na dbang gi drung song/ de nas
snying na rab skrag na// 'ang skad kyi na tshig gsol te// lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// 'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni// lha yi gzigs pas
rtag tu gzigs// brgya byazhe gyi zhi ga gsan nas// dbang phyug gis na 'ang/ nga gsungs// lha yi dbang po nga la nyon// khyod la ngas na srung ba byin// lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
dusazha/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig dbang phyug 'od las/ ngas gtsug gi nor bu
zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo// mkhas pa gang gso rig sngags 'ad 'bras nas rgya bo 'dogs pa 'am// gangon tam 'on te klog na yang/ da ya 'jigs pa kun
mad de// rtagatu bsrung zhaThasba ba dang// g.yul 'gyed pa ni rgyal bar byed// sdig dang milam zha ba dang// bsod nams bkra shasi rab tu'ang la// lha yi dbang po de bas na// gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur
'dod pas// bros te spyi bor gags par bya// yade la rtag tu dran par gyis// g.yul 'gyed 'bulazhige ma yin te// 'di ni rtag tu sngagapa 'phrog/ bud med rnams la bu pho spyad// mngal na gnas
pa yongs su skyong// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed// sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jog/ 'di bde pu'i zlog byed ces bya// yan lag rnams la phyi'i 'bab byed// lha'i dbang po phyi'i zlog pa zhes bya ba

ga sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung zhig/ sangs rgyas la phyags tshal
la/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag 'dulul phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dun nyan 'os kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dang 'a ngag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag/
'tshal lo/ tad+ya thA// oM dza ya ka ra/ yud+d+hota ta ra Ni bi Ta nu kha/ sa rba maM ga la d+ha ra Ni/ dza nA ta sa ha sra b+hu dzaM/ sa sra ne tre/ sa ha sra sha3/ rkyen la ka ra/

ba b+hu mitaM/ ma ta kuN+Da lasan nA hasan na de ba tsi mo la da re/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti ri ka/ A ka sha ga na tsA ra Ni/ maM ge la ba ra dzI mo de/ ma gi tAkr-i ta maM ga le/ b+hu ra mi d+hi se ra NaM/ tsu ru tsu ru/
shwa ta pa ste/ u ru sur/ shi/ a ba na te/ hu hu ru pa bang tra mu kha/ ku ru ku ru/ tsaN+Da u la/ A di tu bsha ba'i/ dzam+bu ni/ rma ga la d+ha ra Ni/ hUM g+ha ni/ sarba bdu gyur
sA te/ mo hani 2 a mo g+ha pA sha da/ sarba b+ha ya ba so tsa na/ rAdzatso ra/ ag ba ti/ u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma zhi/ ka kho rnga ni pA loN/ oM ha ra ha ri/ dza na[']kas// da la ka ra/

d+ha na ka ra/ te dza sku ri bo bA da/ bra sha ma ni/ yung d+ha nA/ bA ra ni/ pa ra tsakra bsha a ni/ pa ra se n+ya ba b+hA a na/ ud+d+hot+ta ra ba/ pra b+ha da ba la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni na d+ha'i/ til

gsaA loka ka ra/ tri pu ra na ga ra ba rlu nas zha/ pa ra sa skya ba dra ba ni/ sarba kr-i t+yA karma na sA danaM/ sarba bya d+ha na ma pra sha ma ni// o tsa la ma le sAhA/ tsa le ma le sAtA/ ma la ma li sAhA/

rtsi la tsi li sAhA/ tsa kha li tsa kha la swAhA/ tsanAli mi Ti ni swAhA/ur d+ha ke sha pa ga le/ tsog la kA d+ha u khaswAhA/ oka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ras ra/ sa ri ser su'u su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa

mu'u/ pa 5// pra sha ma ya/ pra sha na ya/ yud d+hod ta ra Ni phaT/ tsit+te na a la ka ra yaT/ a su re nar g+ha ta naM/ phaT dza ya ka ra paDa/ pra ti ka ra yaDa/ sa ha sra sha re phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dzaphaT

sa na sa na tu baDa/ sarba bir+ya d+har d+ma ra na ma sku ti laT/ sarba sha nAn na phaT/ sarba byA ma ba lo ka Ni pa Ta/ pa ra ka na ba ra Ni kaT/ pa ra sa skya ba dra ba ni baT/ sarbakra 1/ karma pA dan phaT/

sarba bya d+ma phra shA ma Ni phaT/ sajagrwa ho swA da na paT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha man sarba bud+d+ha bod+hisatanAn/ sa ma tAa TishAn/ sA ba sa ya kA nAn/ sa pa ri pA ra nAn/ ta dzes ma ma shar na/ sarba b+ha go ba dra ba

sarba lu glu d+ha/ sarba byA d+hi sarba tu skra ta sarba kr-itu ka khoji b+hu/ sarba ba 'bya sarba kA la tsit+ti pA dIlA b+hashu/ rakA rak+Sha rakAAnaswAhA/gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
byang bar byed pa// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar byed pa// bsod nams thams cad sog par byed pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par
byed pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa// a gar gas pa dang/ ston pa dang/ bklags pa dang/ bzung bas bdag dang gzhan srung ba'o// de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang/ sbyin srog gas
yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzung sa rdzogs so//
zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba banang+ge ye shes sdes bsgyur sange zhus te gtan la phab pa/// rgya// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya' Ta kA ra ba//
bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dang ba'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug/

dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/ ya gi drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/
kun chub par gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ nganIl/ kanile/ daN a/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ka rAn+titi/ ko raN+Na pA ba ti/ ko shAdA/ tshaT dza/ dudu ma te/ ka tum ti/ tsu dun d+haM/ ku Ta da
ta ru hu'o/ an nag/ chu tra ba tun/ kun dga' bo 'ang ni ya gi drug pa'i rig sngags so// klad pa na ba dang/ mig na pa dang/ rna ba na ba dang/ so na ba dang/ sna zhu ba dang/ rtse na ba dang/ snying
na ba dang/ lo na ba dang/ rkyab na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ chu so na po dang/ byin pa na ba dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nying lag na ba dang/ zas ma zhu ba dang/ sbos pa/
dang mngal du thogs pa dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang// mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ rams drag po dang/ nyin gcig pa dang/
nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum po dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ rims yud tsam pa dang/ nyin mo'i rims dang/ mtshan mo'i roms kyis btapa nga la/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis
bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ dug
gzhil ba dang/ chus gtor ba dang/ srad bus btsangs pa byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byeng na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du mi 'gas pa ni/ kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas
pa dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skya dgu dang/ lha dang/ mi de ra/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte nan ma mthong ngo// tang//
Ats+tsha'i/ paN+Na ni/ ka ra Da/ ke yu ra/ b+ha ta gra he/ b+hu ta tra kIti/ b+ha ta ya skya ya na/ pra ya ba te/ te dza ba te/ ya sho ba ti/ ge ra Nin/ sha ra Nin/ bdag 'dzags pa thams cad dang
gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lha dang/ mi dang lha ma yin dang/ dri brar bcas
pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'a bags pa ma gi drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//
(#// 'phags pa shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyishu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal go/ tang ka/

oM pradz+nyA bAd+haM/ pAdzAa ba b+ha sa/ pradz+nyA ba lo kati/ sarbad+harma an d+ha kA ra bi d+ha ni/ sid+d+hi su si/ sid+d+hanu naM b+ha ga ba ti sarba dz+nyA na san d+har/ b+ha ga ba ti pad tshal/ bla sa ra has nA ma su kar/

sid+d+his/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ kaM pa kaM pa// pA la pA la/ d+har d+ha ra/ pa ra ba ra/ gardza gaN+Da/ A gats+tsaM A gtso/ b+ha ga ba ti/ mA ba la ma ba swAhA/ 'dra ba zung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba bzung bar 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrub pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs go
bye/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya khAdzApA ra mi ta sha ta sa ha sra d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi nga rol tutsan ba stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan
'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal go/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni d+herma/ saM gra ha d+ham/ a nu grwa had+ham/ bau d+ha/ sA ra a nu gra had+harma/ bashra ba Na pa ri brtan d+ha/
sa pa rib ma Nad+ha/ sa naM ta a zhu pa bzhad+mamasAhA/ oM badzashu tits+tsham ti dza ya swAhA/ wer ra swAhA/ obradzad ra mi tAb la gAhA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na lad gzhunges par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgra'i ba thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i
khagazungs rdzogs so// @#/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs// bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyazhi ba la

phyag 'tshal go/ tar+yamA/ oM b+hi shu ti smra ti'i dza ya swAhA/ brAdzAyA mitA kaM/ sacha gtishadol rAdzA ya swAhA/ 'di ba zung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa bzung bar 'gyur ro/ ltas ngan/
ba sbatshogs kyang bzlog go/ las kyi sgrib pa dang ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
ka@#// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying bo'i gzug/ 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin ba la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ chos la phyag 'tshal
lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal go/ na mo d+harma kA ya/ saM b+ho kA ya/ nir mA Na kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dA pA ra i/ shA la pa ra ma tA k+kinu pA li tA/ bAri bA ra mi tA/ blun pA ra mi tA/ pradz+nyA pA ra
mi tA/ sadzad+harman+ya tAsAhA/ 'di bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ro// stong ba nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams
cad kyimadodang rgyas ba shes par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa la byang bar 'gyur ro// ltas ngan thams cad kyang zlog go/ dab rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying bo la kheg zungs rdzogs so//
ka@#/ dkon macog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos bas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ o nam lha ga ba ti dA na d+hI pa ta ya sa//

tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lagacig thos pas tshul khrims thob bar gyur ro// na maH sarba ta thA ga ta naM/ ma hA kAn ma kAnaM/ na mo b+ha ga ba/shA la pa ra khuN sha rI yo gA la/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/

kan ta'i saM budo b+ha ga ban d+harma s+ya/ sa mA dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ bzod pa'i snying bo la de lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur// na masarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a tsa ga ta la/ naa kAnA ga ba hu b+hi/ tathA

ga tan b+hu ta ko blo ba ra ba n+tita ya raku ru tu ru tu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ shAkya mu na sawata thA ga tA naMa pa ri mi tAdzAn go tsho ro dzA pa ya tisAhA/ brtson 'grus kyi snying bo 'di lan cig thos pas brtson 'grus

thopa par 'gyur ro/ zhams rba ta thA ga tAm tsani skya ba shA ya hU~M/ na mo su ta b+ha ga ba ti pAr+ya lAr itA/ bAr+yan kuru dIts+tsatIts+tsaM/ me hAhAr+ya ta thA ga ta/ san+dan pa a tiAhA/ bsam gtan gyi snying bo 'dilan
tshig thos pas bsam thog tan thob par 'gyur bo/ na masam+pata shA ga tAnaM/ o ba la la/ na la/ rgya ni rgyu ni/ rgyalnga yatshulaT/ shig rab kyisAng po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob bar
'gyur ro/ na ma/ tathA ga tA ya/ a pa ri mi tA dzAn go tshanAya/ namo b+ha ga wa te/ dzAnapA ra ga ta ya dzam ku ru ku rub gnati thA ga ta// sa ma ya gnusmar/ hi hi hi hi/ dzAdzA dzA/ hU~MhU~M phaT
pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///tsa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i snying bo 'di la natsagi zlos las pha rol tu zhi pa bsu/
thob par 'gyur ro// skam sat+tAnaM/ tan gtanaM/ da sha par i tA ba rimU ra sAnaMg+haM/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzung rdzogs so//
lanatsag kharjod pas byams pa thob par 'gyur/ nam mnaM ta thA ga tA naM/ tsu ru tsu ra/ tshu ru u ru/ ru te/ ka ru tsa muta ba dA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti sarba h+pha yo mnAsha ya
sAhA 'di lan cig brjod pas snying rje thob par 'gyur lo namasawa tan ga tA naM/ namo b+ha ga ba ti sarba sa twa dwa ya shu zhu da ti sAhA/ 'di lan cig brjod pa ba dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro//
namasarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ ma ni'i d+ya ig nA/ oM tu lu tulu/ hu lu yulu/ chu lu u ru swAhA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas btang soms thob par 'gyur ro// namasarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya/ a zhu ga ta o
@#/ du tshugazhisAhA tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//ka@#// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal// tadun/ oM mun d+ha/ saM gra ha d+harma/ a nugra ha d+harma/ bi mut+tarnya/ sA dA A nu gra ha d+harma/ shwa kha Na pa ra ban+ti ta d+harma/ sarba kAr+yapa ri ba ma NarArma/ sa ma

pa ribartan d+harme hAhA/ o'aguha ti bi dza ya d+hin+d+he d+hAr la gtu/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyizhi pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ 1#// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal le/ oklun tsha sarba bud+d+hanaM/ o/ hU~M/
maM k+kA/ o b+haM/ 'di bzung ba 'phags pa phal bo che bzung bar 'gyur// 'dri ba dang klog pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o/ 'phags pa phal po tshabazung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
! @#// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalag nam sam bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM kA oM ka Niki ni ta thA ga ta/ ud bu ba zhu ba ra de/ ut+ta ma
ut+tas/ ta thA ga ta ud lha ba hU~M phaTas// 'ad ba zung bas 'phags ba sdong po bkod pa'i mdo thams cad rdzogs ba ra bklags sha kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig shes pa la 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro// 'a dgas pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs go/
dkon mchog gsum la 'tshal lo// na maH sa man bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ o d+hu na d+hun hU~MhU~M phaT pa AhA/ 'ad bzung na 'a pags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'/
mdo bzung bar 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo bzung bar 'gyur pa'i gzungs rdzogs go/ nga/#// dkon mchog gsun/

la phyag 'tshal go/ nam sa man bud+d+hA naM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ma Ni d+hA ri badzraNi ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUMwaDa paN sAhA/ 'di bzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo
bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo bzung bar 'gyur ba 'a gzungs rdzogs so//@#// 'phags pa lang ku ra gshegs
ba la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o tad+yathA/ oM bad pa dad ba/ hin hi hin/ tshulu tsu lu tsu lu/hu la shu la hul/ su la yul lul//
ba la pa le pal/ tshu dan de/ b+hin de g+ha dz+he/ man de ba ma rnye/ d+hane kar hAhA/ blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/gis ci'i cho ga ngal la grags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzazhi pa dang/ 'chang ba
dang klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed// lha 'am/ lha mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ lhom yan nam/ lham yon/
mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding 'am/ nam mkha' ltare tsho'atsha/ mi'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo'am/ la 'phya chen bo 'am/ la'achanakho'am/ driza 'am/ dri mo 'a ma/
'byung bo 'am/ 'byung po mo 'am/ grul bum chom/ grul bum cho 'am/ sha za 'a ma/ sha za mo 'am/ gzhon po 'am/ gnon po'o 'am/ brjod byed dam/ brjod byed cho 'am/
srinabo 'am/ srin mo'an/ ba phrachen bo 'an/ 'phra men mo 'am/ mdangs 'phrog tho 'am/ mdangs 'phrog mo 'am/ lus srul po lam/ lus srul mo 'am/ mi 'am/ ma ma yin
ba de dag thams cad kyis glags maradado// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyurag/ sags kyi tshig 'di dag ni
bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so// 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga to sha ba dza ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni kalpa sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba
ba/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go ga 'di skad ba dag ga sa thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu
med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs go khyang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngag bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyi 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu g zags pa'i da pal kyi tshatshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ba de gtsang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan la rgya cher

yang dag par ston pa na tshod nge ba sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur bas/ bcom ldan
'jag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bgazuoM pad bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu g zigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugazhas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'gazungs 'di bka' sum pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba tralokya pra ti bi shi ya khud+d+ha ya tan ma// tad+ya thA/ o b+ha d+hi hUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha

ga bshod la a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hAs su ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho u rab dza ya ba rishAn+te/ a b+hi'u nu maM/ sam+b+ho ta thA ga tA/ su ga ta pa ra pa tsa na a kr-i ta a b+hi la ra/ ma tA

bya chu dra mag pa de/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yu/ san d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho ng+ha ya ba sho d+ha la/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho/ u' ba dza ya pa d+hi'u/ sa ha sra rasmi sany+tso dataM/ sad+d+haM/

ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/ ShaTA ra mi ta par ra Ni/ saT+Ta ta thA ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tate/ sarba ta thA ga tAshrI da ya a dats+tshAn a d+hi/ chu dri chu dra/ ma Amu'u/ badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/ pa ri shud+d+hA/
ga sa/ karma A ba ra Na ba 'u/ pra ti ni be ta ya/ ma ma A yur bi shud+d+haM/ sa/ ta thA ga tas ma ya a na a d+haT+ThitaM/ sam+b+he karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+ho/ pra ti no borta ya/ ma ma A yur

o tshun chun/ ma hAmuni/ ba chu ni pa mu ni/ ma hA ba tshu ni/ ma ti ma// ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ tathA tA/ b+hU ta ko pa la dbab b+han+d+ha dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya ba dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ sgar pa ra/ snar la sgyur lahud+d+he/ bi spyi Ta/ bud+d+hi shud+d+he haha/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dzi la

bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Than a d+hiT+ThitaM/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ho/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ho/ badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ su badzra/ badzra gan+d+ha/ dza ya gats+tshA/ ba dza gany+nyo/ badzradzulAgan+d+he/ badzra ud b+ha be/ badzra saM b+ha bo/ badzra badzeNi'i

badzam+b+ha ba tu/ ma mgarI'i/ sad+d+ha satwa nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri rab tu/ sa rA ma sam+b+ha ga ti pa ri shud+d+hi// sam+ba ta thA ga tA maM sa ma shA sa yan bu d+ma buny+tsa/ si d+d+ha sa rgyu/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/

kha bo d+hi la ba bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya ba mo tshu ya/ sho ng+ha ya sho ng+ha ya/bshod+ma a ba sho d+hA ye/ sa cha zhun mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/sa man+tA rasmra ba ri ba// san+d+ha ta thA ga tAhA da la

a d+hA na a d+hin+titi/ chu dri chu dro/ ma hA mu dre ma hA mu druman+d+ra pa sAhA/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'dazhi'i tshob dag chen po'i dbyug pa

'dzin de lta/ dag byed sngag pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga 'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/ rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor bas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na

mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshon lo bdun thub bo// lebadun pa'i tshan lo bdun cu thub go/ de ltar mchog bde tsho 'thob cing dran ba dang ldan pa dang
nad med pa dang/ skyo ba dran par 'gyur ro// mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na nang chen bo las grol bar 'gyur ro// gos sam shang kun la ga'u wang gsi rang gi mang dang bcas

ba'i gzungs bros te/ tsan dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te/ rang ga khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba stong gi mchod pas mchodatsang zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i
mchod pa'i chog byas na nad las grol zhange tsho la brgya thub par gyur ro// med zhu ba dam pa'i rang bzhan la'ang bya'o// kha ngagos gtsangan la sna tshogs rdo rjel gzhas pa' mchod rten

bras la rdo rje'aphreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi mnge dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di ga'u wang gas brase la kham rab sbyar gyi nang du ba zhugs su gsol la/ rang khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen

'a po sa mchod pa byas na rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang tshog na sa la ma lhung ba'i lu bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la ma tog dkar po bkram sa mtshams pa zhare zhun mar gyi mar ma ba zhi pa zhig la/ e ka
ru dang du ru ka'i bdub pa byas la/ de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod ma tog dkar pos brgyan te/ gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod gnam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/ de la bag lon
ba'i lag pas reg ste/ g.yas pa'i lag pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pas/ nyi ma rer zhang nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la/ de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang/
tsharing ba dang/ dag yongs su nyams pa dang/ 'dzani blo rno ba dang/ ngag btsun par 'gyur ro// skye ba nas skyo ba skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de'i chus khong ba 'am/ byugs kyi ra ba 'am/ rta'i
rab 'am/ rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na rkun mo dang/ sbrul dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro// mgo la gtor na
dond de las grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar che dpag tu med pa'i lan yon chen po gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tugyur na de dang de duzhan bor 'gyur ro// so shang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
bzlas te 'chos na nad med pa dang/ blo rno ba dang/ rma rang bar 'gyur ro// mu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan lta shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcag yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na nad thams cad las yongs su
grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tutshad ba la bskor ba byas nas 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/ sku gzugs la sogs po sgrub pa dziltar bgyi 'dar smyan srog kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' sul pa/ drib legs par smras pa ni// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir// 'darin rtsi gcig yid kyis nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshod bag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'a be zungs 'ad gsungs pa ni'i da lta// o a mi
a ma tod b+ha be/ a mi ta ba kAn/ a mi ta gA tra/ a mi ta gA mi no/ a mr-i ta A yurda te/ ga ga na kAti/ ka re sasgra klasha k+Sha yaM ka rI ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'go zungs 'das mchod rtan/
byed pa'i ba jam ba blang ba dang/ byug ba la sogs pa dang/ gdugs gdags ba'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya// 'di'i tshig ni/ mchod rtan cho ga mchog gyur ba/
de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gsar dang a ni la dang/ dngul dang/ pad+ma rag la sogs pa'i rang bzhazhi mang po'i rin po chos sgrug pa sor bcu gnyis kyatshad pad+ma'i gang na bzhugs pa/
de'ags bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la gzhu rgyal zhetshan bsnams pa'o// me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dra 'gan ba zung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha 'a bu rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang/ g.yas dang gA yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang/ rdo rje 'chang gnyis rdza ga ba dkar po phyag na bsams pa bya/ de lta bu'i tshogs
mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bras la/ de' rong pasrol gyi gang po can

tshod byas la dri zhim po dang bsras ba'i chu gtor zhing dri zhim po'i tog gi mchod ba stong phrag gcamed gamachod pa chen po byas te/ dkar bo'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing/

sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/ zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gse tshale stong thub par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na

ba00 E] la 'gug thub pa 'gyur ro// rtag tu byas na tshalami zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang/ gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor a tshog chu 'gyur ro//
ngashas gzhan lang chogazhirob dudage ba'i gnas su sa blangasa'/ dri ma bos bsras la mchod rten bya'o// stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gi bar du'o// nyin rerazhing mchod nang
gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ jiskad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/ mar

zhing tshe dang slo ltar ba r byed pa'i gzungs kyi rmad du byas te/ sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o// zla ba

gzhan r ri la mchod pa nyase 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya// chog 'di lase na dus ma yin pa la 'chi ba brgya chad par 'gyur ro// blo rno ba dang/ named pa dang/

tshal brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang skyo ba dran bar 'gyur// gang gi tsho 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i sbrul shun pa brdzus pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te// mdzes pa'i lus
bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ yang de dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skyo gzhag dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar 'a 'gyur ro// rna ba'i bu garadmyal
bab @#// ba'i sgra'angathos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu sminupa lta ga la 'gyur/ 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro bamed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpal/tumed pas bgazhan yang sgrub pa'i
thabs bka'asuyapa/ gangags somasacan tshodapag tu med par 'gyur ba dang/ nyamang ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'iskad la tshad dang ldan ng 'imadzes pa'i las mkhas pas

bya'o/ de nas gtsug tor rnamapar rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon snam lus pas gzungs kyi yi ga las spul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya// tshodapag tume dpa 'od kher stong ga 'phrong btsan//
bsladadablaba'agadan la bzhugs l/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhol gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa// phyag brgyarapa/ g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gsar
gyi'od zeradapalcan pa'o// g.yon pa ni chebasamtshanumananapami bablad pa ut+pa la ston pa'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o// dbusamasgrib pa dang bcas shing dakar ba'o// g.yas pa'i phyag
gsasnyib khar sna tshogs rdo'o/ de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag med pa dang/ mda' dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o// gnasdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang/ de bzhin du
gzhudang/ mi'ajigasapa dang/ bum pa'o ya mgo bo mchod rtan l gnas pa'i o dang/ mgrin parog dang/ snying bar hrungo// dpral bar bo/ lte ba'i phyogs su bro'o// rkang pa
mtsha gnyis latsang ma/ yi ge 'di rnams l kod la rakAsAhAdangabacas pa/ 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang sdel kha'o// de'i logs gnyis su pad+madang rdorjechapags rdzayabo dkar bo phyag na bsamasapa
bya'o ste da dung dudachar gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis// logs bzhir khrong mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon bodang/ stobs/
po zhes byabaste/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyudang/ dbyug ba dang/ rdorjebasnams pa'o// g.yonapagadug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub che du byed pa'o// de ltor 'bad pas rdzogs
par byas l/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la smyung bar gnas pas mchod pachen po stong phrag gcig gis tshodapa sala'abum phrul du gcig brlas pa bya'o// de nas dkar po'i
phyogs kyitshes gcig nas bzung sta/ jisridabacolta'i bar Mdustongastong bzlas par bya'o/ de nas s bar nas la dusapa dang/ bcom ldan 'das zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de
nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa steraro// yang na ni thang kade dri'om po dang bsres pa'i chus byugasapa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/ mchod pa rgya che po byas te//
ma re re zhing brgyadabargya'i bzlas pa bya'o// yang zla ba re rel stong stong gi mchod pa byas shing stong stong gi bzlas byosanatshodapag tu med pa dang/ stobs dpag tu med pas gzhan gnon pa dang/
namam par la 'gro 'dang/ nad chen po med par byed do// sems can thams cad kyis nyi re zhing tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa ngag tu'agyur
ro//yanakhacig gis de lta burtsedapa mi nusan/ de yis rang gi khyim du dri'il po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i tshodapa byas pa nga 'ong ngo cog
glitshos brgyad la brgyadabargya'i bzlas pa bya zhing/ nyim re re la dus gsum dunyishu gnyis chu gcig brjod bya nob dang/ tshong ba dang/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang/ nadamed pa dang/
ba skyidapa dang/ brgya'abyob dang/ skye ba dran par 'gyura'o// yang na rang gis ma zhusanade'i tshod dpa' dra bag byas na tsherang ba dang blo rtobar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg chog
soms can thams cad l panapa'i phyir rtongar bshad par bya ste/ khru gang gi tshadakyi thab khung khrum po rdo rje'aphreng bos brgyan pa/ tsan danadakar po 'ams dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar bo
bkram ste/logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar ma rtsa ba bzhag la bdug spos la sogs pas gang dag bar do la/ phyogs ba zhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i dum ba rab tumadzes pa gos dkar po g.yogs la gal
y+Ya gas kha brgyan pa khazhi gzhag par bya'o// 'om can gyi am shi la mesngar lam lha bkugal/ dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas tegshegs su gsol lo// de nas tshodapag tu
0med pa gsal porathab khung gi dbus su bsams la// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal kha bzlas shing dug byugs gsum dbulalo// mngan/ oM a mr-i ta A yurda de swAhA/ zhes khyobs dang blo rno bdang

bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du spyin sreg bya'o// gtsug gtor rnam par rgya la b.lan bdun du bzlas pa byas Mtshe ring ba dang// blonor dang/ spyi dpa dang/ nadamod par 'gyur// yang na zla ba re re'i
dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad lamadang rgya chen po byas la/ dus gsum du tshol skyong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg dus na mchog gi tshe ring ba dang blo rnob sbyin par byed do// sems can rnams la
smad par mi bya'o// chog lang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing lo brgya lnga bcu 'tshol dang/ dgra lasam par rgyal ba dang/ bloba'agyu'o// dbyangs snyan 'gyur ro//
gal ter gas ma nusan de tshor nga dang 'dra bas byas na'i ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'adodonagatsug tor gyi rgyal po chen potshe dang blob dang bcas pas 'bum phrag gcig
sbyin srab byas te/ dngapoda mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la/ yapa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byason tsholo'akhum phrag gcig thug par 'gyur ro// bya ba byas na bye bathub bo// de ltar 'di'i
tshog 'i rim pas tsholo dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpa' ba dang/ dgra las rgyal khaba'agyur ro// dpal 'dod 'bum phrag gcig smin sreg byas n dpal chen po the'o
par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'dod n pad+ma 'bum phrag gis sbyin sreg byas nargyal po chen po zlobapar 'gyur// bye ba gcig byas la lo los sgyur ba thob pa gru'o//
ganganaral gri la sogs pasgrub yol dodan ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi tshongan thangasku bkram la stong gimachodapachon pos mtsho la bzlas pa 'bum byas la/ langan lcags lnga'i rang
bzhin phyir gri la bzlas po 'bum byas te/ lag pa g.yas par bacangasan yid kyis 'gro ba dang/ 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang/ stobs chezhingagazhanaganon pa dang/ sems can
thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas smanur chen po'i mchog tsho dang gtumed par 'gyur// de ltar rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ chu gsum la sogs pa'i ng bsgrub par bya'o// de/

wAltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyurab mchog gturedapar dka' ba 'di lta ji ltar sbyar ba de ltaroltar las grub par byed de// gangayang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bzungs 'di tila'i re la dus gsum du la ti sha rtsa gnyib khazlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la/ gzhan
la'ang rgya cher gsal bar byas na de spyod pa 'thob cing stobs dpaldan pa dang/ nad med pa dang/ lab sgrub pa dang/ de rno ba dang/ skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi 'chir 'i dus byed pa de tsho
[./ ]sbrul kun pa bas pa da pa 'dra bar ng gi lus khorati/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skyo bar 'gyuro// dmyal ba'isgra khug tu'ang thos par mi 'gyun/ 'bras bu smin par stabang la 'gyur/
gang dang gang du skyes pa dang der skye badran par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang thamasacad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/
drizabacasapa'i 'jig rten las te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mnaparab stod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsugator rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
rtogs dang bcas pa tshog saso//@#// rgyagar skad du/ AaT+Tadug tiparisho d+hani su yi oMnAmasgyuraNi/ bod skad du/'phags pa ngan
'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal bzhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag tshalalo// nusalcabu shin tu brtan
ba zhes bya bzhig sum cu rtsa gsum gyi pa rnams kyi nang chos bzang lha'i 'dunas na gnas te lha'i gzhal yas khang chen pon sgyu'i longs spyod chen po dang/ lha'i bu mo 'tshogs chen pon
bskor nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod/ dalha'i longs spyod myong ba las mtshan mo sgrazhig thos pa/ lha rigun tu brtan pa zhag bduphyin pa'i chiba'i dus khyed de/ de'atshib 'i dus
bya@#// byas nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te/ der yang 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba bdun pomyang nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyal
nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na'ang der dbul por 'gyur zhingadamus longadu 'gyur zhes des thosaso/ de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos nas 'jigs skrag sngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/

deris pa ris pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ panas lha'i dbang po brgyaban gyi rkang pa la phyag byas te/ brtabs par stsa zhi dekyi nyud kyi hud ces se sngagasa'adon bzhin
du lha'i dbang po brgyanal 'di skad ces sbas so// lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol/ lha'i dbang po bdag de lta'i mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ lha'i las spyod kyi dga' bal rtse zhing bde ba myong

ba lasasgra zhig thos pa// lha'i bu shin tubartan pa zhag bdunan 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang de 'gro ba bdun myon gnas sems can dmyal bar skyongar
'gyur ro// brgyal nam zhig mir skyes par gyuna'ang deradadabul po 'gyur zhing dmus long du'ang 'gyur ro zhes thosan/ lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas lha'i dbang

po rgya byin gyis lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i tshig de shes nas shin tu ngo mtshar du'adzinapar gyurati/lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdunapo gang dag myongabar 'gyur snyam du sems shing skad cig ngami smra bar 'dug
pa dang/ 'grob bdunani yagagi skyo gnas dang/ khyi dang/ 3dang/ spre'u dang/ sbrulagadug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ gya'/'gro ba'adun po de dag shin tu mi gtsang ba khrab myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo//

denas lha'i dbapo brgyabyin gyis 'gro khabadunapo de dga mthong nas 'di snyam du/ e ma lha bu'adi sdug bsngal mi badzad ng chen po bar 'gyuran/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgayaMr rdzogs pa'i
sasargyas ma btogs par 'i skyabs dang/ nadang/ dpung gnyenabu'agyur ba suyodasnyam du bsamasaso// de nas lha'i dbang po bi nub mo de'i srod la spos dang/ me tog dang/ bdug paswA
tshogs dang/ gos dang/ rgyan snatshogs la sogs pa ranas (bcomo ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo de phyag 'tshal te lan bdunabaskor ba byas nas
mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar 'dug nas lha'i bu shin brtan pa'i 'gro ba bdun po dgabcom ldan 'das la zhib tugasol to// lha'i dbang po brgyabyin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag
gsolam thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste/ sa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas snang ra byas te slar le gnas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa modzad nas/ lha'i dbang po brgyabyin la 'disadaces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang pogatsug tor rnam par rgyal ba
tha10/ @#// zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskurab/ ngana'agro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sgribapa dang sdug bsngal rang skyo ba thams cad 'jig par byed
ba sems can dmyal ba dang/ byolaseng gi skye ba nas dang/ gan rdzo'i 'jig rtenathams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ bde 'gro'i lam du'ajog pa yod/ lha'i dbang po de ltakhas na gtsug to

rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongasasu sbyong pa thos ma thag tu sgrib pa ra'agyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs brje ba shin tumang po dag 'jig par byed do//
skyo ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur// tshorabs thams cad du'ang tshorab sadren par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ngala'agyur ro// lta'i 'jig rten
nas lha'i 'jig rtenadu 'grobar 'gyur ti/ lhags sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dab po de brjod m thag tutshozad ng 'chi yang phyir nur bar 'gyur ba'i las
blob par 'gyur ro/ lus dang/ ngag dad/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa// yongs su bsags pa bder ra rig pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhinagshegs pa thams
cad kyang dal gzigs so// de dag kyang de la rtag targyun mi 'chad par ngosung ba dang bskyab pa dang/ sbyang mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par//
'gyur/ brjod pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba dang/ duda'agro'i gnas dang/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul thams cad sems pa'i gyur/ rnam pa 'jig par
'gyur/ ma par 'athor bar 'gyur/ rnam par solakham gyur/ stongs par 'gyur ro// deltar de la sangs rgyas kyizhing thams cad dang/ lha'i gnas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phya bar 'gyur// de ga'adod pa de'ajug par 'gyur ro// nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ lha'i dbangapo bsgyubyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das gzungs dongaka' stsal du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi srog lasmanagadags par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/lha'i dbang po kha byin gyis gsol
ba btab pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM namo b+ha ga ba tesaN+Datrilo kya pra ti bi shaN+Di a puSh+Thaya ten matad+ya thA/oMb+hAt+taM/shod shod+ham/ bisho d+ha ya ba sho d+ha/ mas mas
maa ba b+hA sa sba raNag ti/ ga ga nasA d+hA ba bi sha// ab+higany+tsanAmaM/ sats+tshAta thA ga tAsu ga ta bar btson/ mtshwa taa de kor mitsAmudra/ mnab deA ha ra ha ra/ ma ma A yu/ san

d+haraNi/ sho d+ha ya sho ng+ha ya/ risho d+ha ya bi kong ya/ ga la nas b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha uyib bi dzaya pa rishud+d+he/ sa hasA rasmisaMtsodi/ sam+bota thA ga a b.len/ ShaT rami tUr ri pU ra Ni/ sats+tsata
tha ga ta mA ted shad+hu mi pra tite/ sadz+dzatathA ga tAkr-id ma a d+hiSh+Than a d+hig/ mudramu dre/ ma su re/ padzrakA ya saM hatan/ parish+tsaN+NaM/ sam+ba karma A ba ra Nayi shu//
pAtin brtag/ ma ma A yurangashut+taM sam+batathA ga tAs ma yaad+hiN a d+hitaM/ oM mu ni mu ne/ mahAmuni/ bi mu ni bi muni/ ma hAmuni/ ma a ti/ ma hAm ti/ mam ti su ma ti/
tatA/ b+hU ta koNi/ pa rikun+te/ ba spu'/ bud+d+hi shud+d+he/ gi// sa dzaa/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ smarar/ sa ras ra/ sa ra ra ya/ sa bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Than a d+hiT+Thi te/ kud+d+he shud+d+he/
bu d+d+he bud+d+he/ ma hAbadzaM sulo/ badzragan+d+ho/ dza ya ban+d+he/bi dza a gan+d+he/ badzAdzAlA gan+d+he/ badzeud sgyu re/ badzra saM pU pa/ bidzra'adzin/ badzram nga tu ma ma sha riyaMsajas tAn

kAya parishud+d+hir g+ha ba tu/ sa dAmasaN+Dag rdzipa ri shud d+hi/ sam+ba tathA ga tA maM sa maswA sa yan du d+ma bu/ sid+ma si rgyu/ bod+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bang+ha ya bi bod+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa/ bamo
tsaya bi mo tsayo/ gorAya sho d+haya/ bshad yabakod ya/ sa man na/ mo tsa yamo ci ya/ saman rasmi pa ri shud+d+ho/ saN+Data thA ga tA hrad a d+hiT+ThA na a d+hitaM/ mu dre mu dre/ ma mu
dram dmu dAman pa tasAgA/ lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs na'agro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sdig pa dang/ las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
sa sbyob/ bdo'agro'i lam thams cad du'agrol dang/ ma'agrothamasacang rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'din/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan dasagang+ga'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye
masnyad dag gis gsus pa/ byin gyis babs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde
bgrora'agro bar bya ba dang/ ngan 'gror lhub rnams ba zlog pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba da/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsnga la gyi gnas thams/
cad dusdug bsngal zhing nyam bar gyur pa rnams dang/ sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhuba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin sems can thung zhig la
bachung basmed pa dang rnam pa sna tshog sakyi skyobalta ba rnams dang/ bsam panyams pa dang/ soms can lamalas nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling bzhag go/
lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di'u bal lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig/ bsgrugs nas kyang gdon pa dang/ kha ton du bya'adang/ bsam pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ dran pa bya ba
dang [0f10 ]mchodapa dang/ gzung ba dang/ kun chub par bya ba la dosbyor bar gyis shig dang/ de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad nor bodapa'i lha'i bu rnams dang/ 'dzam bu gling pa'isams
]can rnams kyi donadang/ phanapa dang/ bde ba'i phyiragazungs kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di dag khyed la gtadado// de'i phyi lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o//
lha'i bang po gzusa'adrithosam thag tu bskal pa ba stongad pasags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su khyang bar 'gyur ro// skye bar skyo ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro skyo gnas
dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenada'/ yi dgas kyi yul dang/ lhamain gyi ris dang/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'khyung po dang/ sha zad ng/ srul po dang/ lus srul po
dang brjod byed dang/ khyi dang/ rus sbal dang/ sprul dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang byadang/ sbrang bu dang/ sbyang m dang/ sdig sprul dang/ grog spur lasogs pa'i srog chags
[à/ ]kyi rigs su phyisami skya bar shes par bya'o// gzhan dun de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni ma gtogs so// derigasa chen po 'di lta ste/
bram ze'i rigs shing sAl chen po lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sAlachen polta bu 'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sAlachen polta
bur 'ozhes ngasmra'o/ lha'i dbang po de ltar nagazungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar duskyo ba yongs su dag pachen po'athob ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'din doltamathu
sa chaste rnalha'i dbang po gzungs 'dan deltar mathub/ mtshon chab/ mthu stobs ba/ dge zhing shes pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi dogyi phyi gtsug tor ma pa rargyal
pa sos bya ba'i gzungs 'grol masar dayongasas sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/ 'di ltaste/ dperan nor bu rin po che ma'i snying po shin tu rin med dam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer
gyisnang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/ lha'i dbang po bzhin du sems cashengagos pamedabashesapar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gseranishin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs
su dgal/ na tuta la/ zhin tu bsnyenApa/ shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang po de bzhin dusems can de rang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshor bas gzhan du'ang de bzhin du skyo bar/
tshurago/ lha'i dbang po gang nagazus 'dir gtuston pa dang/ bye brag tun gora'adrir 'jug pa dang/ lag pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ khaton du byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/
chub bar byed pa dang/ nyanab dang/ 'dzin pa gyurab der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad nachad par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs
'a yi ger bris te rgyalamtshan gyi rnamoragazhag par bya/ mthon po'am/ kha pa mthon po'am/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi stong du gzhag par bya'o// lha'i dbang po dge slongangan/ dge slong
ba @#/ mam/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsAnama'am/ de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhagapa mthong m/ de dang nyebar gnas
paragyuran/ nad gribams phog gam/ de'i rdulalus btab pas yol nab lha'i dbang posems can de la sdig pa thamasacad dngan 'gro'agro ba'i 'jings pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo//
sems can ma la bdang/ dupa'i gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtend nga/ yi dgas dang/ lhag min gyisathams cad dumi skyabar gyur ro// lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gsheng/
'tsha bathams cad kyis lung bstanaci/ banamed pas rtag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang ma gro byed cing me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ u0f00
dang/ ma ga'athabad// byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyu mtshan dang/ brtan dang/ rgyana rnams s kyang brgyan par byed pa dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdoramachodarten byas togazus 'di
bzhag pa la thalamo sbyor ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ skor ba byed ba lta ci smos te/ lha'i dbang po sems can de ni sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras
su rig par bya'o// chos kyi gnas surig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o// des chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjenub mo po'i nam langs nas/ bcom ldan
na 'das ga la ba derasong sta/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang/ gos dang/ rgyanal sogs pas mchod pa drang bsti stang byas nas/ sa bcom ldan 'dasalalan bdunabaskor ba byas
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nasa'adiskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di nomathutsho'i phanayonatshabalags te/ comaldanu'asabadag kyang rtag rgyun
mi 'chad par sems can de'i sladabazhin du'abrapazhinga kun tu basrung ba dang yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas pa bgyi'o// sems can dmyal ba thamasacad las de bzlog par bgyi'o// ma
ldan 'adas bdag ni byas pa gzobar bgyid cing/ byas pa gzo ba mi bgyid do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'dasala'an gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'dasala'adiskad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas gzungs 'di 'chog zhib mo dang/ bgyiba'i chog tshul sapa bshad du gsol/ de nas ram ldan 'dasakyis/ rgyalapochen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka'
