lcalato// nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'ichogazhi tshul bshad parabya'o// sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyi rigs kyi bu'am/ rigasakyi bu mos tshes bcola'i zla ba b.lakhrus byas te
lan stongartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ des sems can zad pa de'i tshe phyir nuranas nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob pa'i gyur ro// sems can/
tha grubya// dmyal ba la sogs pa ka'agro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur// than dud 'gro'i gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i lam du'ang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags
parab sto/ des na de'i na'agro'i kham yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig nadachen pos btab ste sman pa thams cad bye brag phye pa de yang de ltar na de las yongs su gyurapar 'gyur ro// de'i ngan

'gro'i skye ba thams cad kyang rgyunachad par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rtagyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas bla ma yin par rig par bya'o// degang dang gang

duny+tsa ba de dang der pa'i snying po kho na lasardzus taskye bar 'gyur ro// tshobasathamasacad du'ang tshorabs dran par 'gyur ro// sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dang shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzung

tsha/ 'di yungs kar da ga ga la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/ de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng dugator n de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenaMnam/
yi dag sasam/ dalasagazhanapa ngan 'gro rnams suskyes par gyur kyang rung ste/ dag gzungs 'di rimathus ngana'agro de dag las thar par 'gyur ro// de dag las thar nas kyang lharaskye bar 'gyur
ro/ su zhiga'anyin gcig bzhin dulan shurtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rtenamang ro'i mchod pa'i sasu gyulo// tshoring bar 'gyur// bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu skye ba ngang ldan

pa dang rgya galas 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// des kyang sangasany+tsasakyi zhing tha dad pa snatshogs su 'gro ba'agyur
ro/ dorayang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dabaphradapar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston
pa 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'apa'i jig rten la snang bar byed pa 'gyurapo/ lha'i dbang po thabs 'dis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyasems can dmyal la sogs pa'i 'gro ba
thams cad las yongs su tharapa'i gyur ro// de dag gi ngan 'gro thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshor bar yang 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po songal lca'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'dis
su ston la sgrogs shig/ lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdunan lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe'ang ba'agyur ro// stobs chab r 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang
bo brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/ po'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu g+hAn tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di khyon no// de nas lha'i bu des nyim bdun pa'i bar du nyin
drug mtshan drug tugazungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phunasum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/ na'agro las ni yongs su bar/ bde 'gro'i lam la yang dag gnas//
tha 0 bya// tshor ba yang gunas/ al lasangs rgyas/ a lalatshos al la gzus 'dalta bu 'jig rten du byung ste/ des bdag 'jigs pa chen po lasayongs su thar par
[>gyur tozhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// khaphags pa ngan 'grothams cad yongasas spyob gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////rgya ba/ gyi mkhanango
[']dzomi tradang/ su ren bo d+hi dang/ zhutshenagyi lo tsababanang+ge ye shasasdos bsgyur cing zhus gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thag pasu blo
bi dzaya nAm b+hAr Ni spyihita/ bodaskadadu/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnamapar rgyalapa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig n/ bcom ldan 'das tshopag tumed pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isongs rgyas bde ba
can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs ro/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsalapa/
rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis gzir ba tsho ngab yodadi/ da rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

gtsug tor namapar rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di btang ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ gzhan la rgya cheraya gaparaston pa ni ring bar sgrub par byed ra 'i ched du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po 'phagasapa spyanaras gzigs dbo phyug stan las langs thal mosbyabar gyurangs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par l ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad da ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs/
te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thums cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/

tshon mo b+hagawate/ sats+tshAtAlekyalnga ti bi shis bud+d+ha ya te na mar+ya b+hA ]o b+hud+d+hish+tsa/ sho phyus sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho pa// as mas man+ta a ba b+hUs slar chag ti/ ga gnasA la bit+taM/ ab+hi
nAmaM/ saT+Ta ta b+hAg te sug ta ba rab tsanaM/ aoM taa b+hiTikir/ mahAmo dromo pa ri/ A ha ra A par/ ma ma A yu/ san dz+hA ra Ni/ sho d+hayakod ya/ ngago d+haya bkod+maya ga ga nasUt+tA

ba pishiSh+Tha/ utAbi dzaya pari u/ sa nyarasmisaM tshodi// saN+Titah+'a ga taa wa lo ki ni/ 'a ra mi tApa ri pU raNi/ sats+tsha ga ta mA taM/ da nami patitsiti sam+bata thA ga ta hrid ya a d+hiyA na a d+hi
te/ mu dre mu dre/ mahAmu dre/ badzra kA ya saMhatan/ pa ri ung+ge/ sam+buka rma A wa ra Na huSh+Tha/ pra ti ni brtaya/ ma ma Ayur ba aNe/ sam+ba ta glu ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Than a/
d+hiT+ThitaM/ omA mu ni/ ma hAmuni/ bimunib muni/ ma hAbi mu ni/ ma tim ti/ ma sAm ti/ mam ti/ su ma ti/ tathAtA/ blutako Ti/ pa ri shu/ bas twA/ bu uSh+Tha/ haha/
dzaya dzaya/ ba dzaya bi dza// smarasna ra/ spyir sa ra/ sa rayas ral/ sats+tsha bud+d+ha a d+hiShAn ad+hi ti/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+ho/ ba badzra/ ma hAbadzra/ su badz+dzA/ badzrag/

rdzom gan+d+he/ bi dza ya gaSh+Tha badzradzalA gats+tso/ badzraud b+hu pe/ badzras b+hebe/ badzra badzra/ badzam+bub tumam sha ri risasatunany+tsakAya pa ri shud d+hirlungatu/ sa da me [”“ ] sam+b+ha ga tipa ri shur d+hi'u/

sawatatha ga tAku maMs ma shAsayachubu N+ya bud+d+haM/ si rdzu i ts+tsha bod+d+haya bod+ha ya/ bi bo ng+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho ng+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya ba ngegos/
saman+tatimo tsa ya mo tsaya/ sa mnal shud+d+haM/ sam+batathA ga tAyodapa a b+hiwun a d+hiSh+Tha/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hAmu drem hAsu rumanapa deswAhA/ 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni ngan 'gro thams cad yongasas sbyong ba/ sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib la
[z ]thams cad rnam par sbyong ng/ bde 'gro lam pu'agro ba ngan 'gro thams cad rnamapar 'jig par byed pa 'di ni/ sas sa gats+tsha'i krung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis
gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas photab pa// soms can thams cad bde 'gro 'gro
bar phyong dang/ ngan 'gror ltung ba/sa bzlog pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'asogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnas thamasacad/
dusdug bsngal zhinyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang/ sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin dusems can tshe thung
zhing skal ba chung ba smad pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skyo bar lhung ba rnams dang/ bsam pa nyams pa dang/ sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i glig
dusnyoms can rnams la gzungs 'di dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gas 'os su ga tad pa yin no// de'i phyiralha'i dbang po khyodakyis yang dag par gzung bar du'o// lta ba dbang po g.yu
'di lan cig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// skye bar skye ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/
@#// gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yid gs kyi yul dang/ lham yin gyi rigs dang/ 'diste/ gnodasbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ srul po dang/
lus srul po dang/ brjod byed dang/ khyi dang/ rus sbal dang/ spruladang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ byadang/ sdug bu dang/ sbrangam dang/ sdigasmral dang/ grogastsaral sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs
rnams su phyis mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// gzhan dudabazhinagshegs pa dang phrad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang/ rigs chen por skye ba ste/ dol rigasa chen pon 'di lta ste/
bram ze'i rigs shingesA la chen po lta bu 'am rgyal rigasashingesA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shingesal chen po lta bu la// tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye 'o nas

ngasma'o// lha'i dbang podi ltar na gzungs 'di'i ma bus byang chub kyi snying po'i mthur thug gi bar skyong yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob sto/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'din de ltar mthums/ phan yon che ba/
mthu stobs chob/ dge ba shes pa yin te/ lha'i dbang sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyiragatsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ng 'di bzhag go/ 'di lta
sto dparanor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snyingapo shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba na 'od zeragyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin dusums can
de'ang gos pa med par shes par bya'o// 'di lta ste dpar na 'dzamabu chub 'i gser shIn drim med pa/ na tu yongs su dgapa/ shin tu mnyin r// shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang pod bzhin
dusems can chen po de'angashin tuyongasasudag par rig pa ra byaso/ tsherabs gzhan du'ang de bzhin skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po ganganagazus 'di ba ston pa dang/ bye brag tu niyi ge
'dr-iri'ajugapa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ mchodapa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'dzin par 'gyurab de'agro ba thams cad yos/
su dag par 'gyur// sems can dmyalabathams nyang rgyunachadapar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris targyal mchan gyi rtse mor gzhas pa@#/ rimathon po'am/ khang pa mthon
po'am/ mtshodaN+Din gyi nang dugazhag par bya'o// lha'i dbang po dge slongangamo/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma kham/ de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/ dod shi ba gnas par gyuran/ than de'i grib mas phog gam/ po'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog 'balha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams
cad dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas dang/ lham yin gyi rigs/
bya// thams cad dum skye ba rig par 'o// lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstanacing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog par jig par byan/ lha'i dbang po shing bzo byed pa la'ang phan yonachen por 'gyuran/ mchod pa dang rim gro byed cing/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng ba dang/
byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sbosadang/ rgyana rnams kyis brgyanapar byed pa dang/ lam gyi bzhimador mchodarten byas la gzungs 'di bzhi g la/ thal mo sbyar ba 'am/

phyog 'a' ba 'am/ skor ba byed pa lta bu smos te/ lha'i dbang po semAcan 'di nas mA can chen po 'di ni nga ba rig pabya'o/ de bzhin gshegs nga'isras su rig par bya'o// chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mchong rten du rig par bya'o// de nas chos kyi rgyalapo gshin rjedi'i nub mo donamanangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha ba ma tog dang/ gos dang rgyun
la sogs pas mchodapa dngabasti stang dubyas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
gzungs 'di ni mthu chezhingaphan yon chab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu nam 'chadaparasems can de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing/ dus kun tu basrung ba dngayongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas
ba00par bgyi'o// sems can dmyal ba thams cad 'a sa de bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gadrobar bgyidakyi/ byas pami gabro bar mi bgyid do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis
bcom ldan 'das lalan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bde ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'ichogazhib mo dang/ bgyi ba'i tshog 'i tshul rgyas par bshadadu/
gsol/ dmas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal pochen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o// sems can thung ba'odon

gyi phyor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumos tshes bcolta'i zlanga'i nyal khrus byas tegos gtsang mgon nas sbyang ba byas te/ lan stong bzlas brjod dusanadasems can tshozad pa de'ang phyirar ro// nadadang
bral bar 'gyur ro// sgring pa thams cad rnam par dgapa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba lasogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
songaba'i srogachags bya'i rnam du'ang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya sU/ nas de'i ngana'agrab ng nyid tha ma yin par rigapar bya'o// gang zhig nadachen pos btang skye sman pa rnams kyis
bye brag phye ste bor ba'ang de ltar nd de 'o sayongs su tharapera'agyur ro// deningan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gi'aphos nas kyang bde bcan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
skyeba'agyur ro// denyid de'i ma lagyi gnas ma yin par shes par bya'o// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang derapad+ma'i snyingapo re kalas rdzus toskye bar 'gyur ro// chorabs
thams cad du'ang tshorabs dran par gyur ro// sems can sdig pa byed pa/bdag 'chiba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don dugazungs 'di yungs karal lanan+ti shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de dag gi rus
gong rnams kyi steng du gtor n ded gsems can dmyalapa'i m/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasasam/ gshin rje'i 'jigarteganam/ yi dgas sam/ de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur
kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar par 'gyur ro// dedag las thar nas kyang ltar skye bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin dulan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs
rgyu su brjod pa de 'jig rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'os su 'gyur ro/ tshering bar 'gyur ro// nadamed par 'gyur ro// bde ba myong bar gyur ro// rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dngamya
ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// 'phos nas kyapo'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// deng
pa yang dang zhin gshigs pa rnams dang phung par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugasaM'abyin par 'gyur ro// ngobazhir gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jig rten lasnang ba byed par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcingab ni sor mo kha cu'i thal mo 'asdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong la nyis dang sbyaral/de
nasogazungs 'dudrenapar bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi re byas teme tog sna tshogs bkramal/ snatshogs pa'i bdug pasa'adug cinge/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad ngang 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing/ de nas gzungs brgyud pa bklags par bya'o// ltar lan cig bklags pa tsam gyisabye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad curtsa brgyad kyi
gapa'i krung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i dir zhin gshegs pathams cad 'amachod cing bsnyen bkur dngarimoragyus pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sngon gyis mchod par
'gyur ro// de kun gyis kyang legs zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro// sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa h+phams chud kyi bdag de las skyes nga 'i sras su rig par bya// sgrib pa
mdang gi shes dang ldan zhing byang chub chen ngo risams kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa 'thob paba'agyur ro// de la gzungs sgrub pa 'chog thabs 'adis nilha dbang po 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems
can dmyal ba lasogs pa'i ngan 'gro las yongs su tharang 'gyur// dengag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ring bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po song lalta'i
bu blo gros shin tubartan pa la gzungs 'dirjesasu ston lasgrogasashig/ lha'i dbang po des zhag bdunan lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing
tshor ba 'gyur ro// stobs chab r 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstanapa 'dil+lengs te/ de gnas su phyin nas lha'abu shIn tu brtan pa
la gzungs 'di byin no// des lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i kharanganyidadrug mtshonadrub tu gzungs 'dil brtson par byas nas/ de bsam pa thams cad phunasum tshogs te/ 'di lta ste na
'gro lasan yongs su thar// bde pa'i lam la yang dag gnas// tshoring bar yang gyuranas/ a' la sangs rgyas/ ma'al chos/ u la la gzungs 'di ltabu'ajig rtend byung ste/ des
bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar yozhes ched dubarjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha'i bu shin tu brtan nga 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog dang/
dridang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng bdang/ gdugasadang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdanadang/ gos kyi rgyun bzang po/ba pa re dang/ lha tshogs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin tapyad
sa du phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa lonapo lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa nyibar mkho ba'i mchod pa brgyastong phul te bskor ba byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste de
bzhin duched du brjod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyimadun du 'dug ste chos nyanato// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gsar gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ lha'i bu shin tuparten bdabugs/
phyung nas chos ston par byed cing sangs rgyas kyibal du lung ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni de ri ba chen po'i dbyug pa
'dzin raste/ dag byed stag pa 'dzoms par byed pa 'degro ga'am gzhan zhig labris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/ rab mya cheb 'amachod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod du bskor ba stong phrag
bsgyu byas na mchog gi tshodang blo rno basbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshon yo bdunazub bo// lo bdun pa'i tshan lo bdunatsu bgo/ de ltar m chog gi cho
b+hong cing dran pa dbaldan pa dang nadamad pa dang/ skyo badran Mpar 'gyurar// mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo'i ngacangasanand chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro// gos sam shing
'akun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas par gzungs bris taM/ tsan dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol// rang gi khyim du ban ga la rgya che ba'i stong gis mchod
pas mchod de/ zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyi bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nad las grol zhing lo der thub par 'gyur ro/ medan 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la 'od bya'o//
g.yang ges gtsang mal sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchodarten bris la rdo rje'aphreng ba'i bskor bas brgyanapa de'inang durang gi mingedang gzungs kyi tshoge 'di gi'u wang
gis bris la/ kham po ba sbyarag nang du zhugs su gsol te/ rangagi khyim du bzhi g la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchodapa byas na rtag tusung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang chog ris la ma lhung
nga lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ mtshams bzhir zhunam gyi ma a pa'i bzhag la/ a ka ru dang du ru ka'i bdugang byos la/ de bzhin du dris gang ba'i snod me
te gdakar pos brgyan te/ gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten ma sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsolal/ de la g.yon pa'i reg pas rig ste/ g.yas pa'i las ra 'phreng ba 'dzin pas/
nyim re re zhing ran ti shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas M ya pa'ichukhyor ba gsum 'khrungs nand med pa dang/ tshoring ba dang/ dgra yongs su nyams pa dang/ 'dzin blo rmob dang/
ga btsun par 'gyur ro// skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de'i chus khang pa'i m/ phyugs kyi ra ba 'am/ lta'i ra ba 'am/ rgya' ngo 'i khab tugator na/ rkun ma dang/
la sbrul dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhingand kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro// mgo la gtor nang nang de las grol bar 'gyur ro// deltar
ma tshodang pag tu med pa'i phan yon cheba'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab taskya naredang dbazhi ba rman por 'gyur ro// so shing la lananyinuphu gcige yongs su bzlas to'achos n nAd med pa/
dang/ blo rnob dang/ tshoringabar 'gyur// chukhyor ba gsum la dus gsum dulamanyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas lnga'athungs na nang thams cad las yongasasu grol zhing yun
ring 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das tshedapag tu med pa la bskor pa
byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bya/ sku gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/ 'dir sbyin sreg
kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni// dpa' blo chen po legs so legs// sems can kun la yon brtse'i phyir// 'dir nicu gcig
yid kyis nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshodapag tu med pa
zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ oM a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi tasaM b+ha wa/ am ta pa kA a ma ta kAdre/ ami ta/min/ a mi ta a yurdade/ ga ga na kIrti ke re/
sam+b+han kAyaM ka ya sAtA zhes rang gi khrus 'disamachod na khyadang su 'jim pa khrang pa dang/ byug pa la sogs pa dang/ gdug su gdags pa 'ba'ajisAdardzogs par bya'o
'di'i thog rnamachodarten ga mchog gyur pa// donas yang dag bshad pas// gser dang/ in+d+hanAl dang/ dngul dang 2 pad+maru ga lasogs pa 'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches smras pa'i sor bcu
gnyis kyitshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa// debalags bal 'jig rten skyong ba bzhalag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dra'i gnabazung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i
lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byan la gan gdugs bsnams pa dang/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi rigs gnyis na sngasha ras gzigs dang/ rtsorje 'chang gnyis rdzayab dkar po phyag
na bsnams pa ga nyis khago/ de lta bu'i tshogs mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o// dang zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigatsug tor rnam rar rgyal ba zhes
byar ba gzungs brasal de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la/ 1 dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus gtor nang pa shom po'i ma tog gis mchod la/ stong phrag gcig gas mchod ma byas te/
dkar ro'i phyogasakyi chos brgyad nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang/ blo ster ba yon byan tastong phrag gcig bzla ra phyago/
/ zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gas tshal stong thub par 'gyur 'o// rtag tu lo gtsug tu dusan cho lo 'bum thub par 'gyur go/ rtag tu byas nAtsho le ma chud pa sgrub cing stobs dang ldan pa
dang / gang gas kyang ma thub cing lha dang lha mayAn dang mamanyam pa'i mkha' sdod kyi gtsug to'a mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang chog na'ib tudage ba'i gnas sus slongs la dri
zhim ros bsresalamachod rten bya'o// stong phrag gage nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gsar du'o/ nyim re zhang mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang
dag par bazhugs su gsol la/ ji skadagasungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen ro byas l stong phrug gAtsapo nasakhatsams lan radun gyi rar du bkag ra/sa phyago/ nyim re re zhing tshe dang
blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungasakyi ched du byas te/ sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba byin par bya'o/ sems can rnams la ra mngar dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang
par bya'o// zub gzhan ra rol mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas lab rgyud brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba na rangangamu rang dang 'dra bas bya'o// chog 'das nadusamayun rar 'tshor brgyud mad par
'gyur ro// blo rno ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ tshal brgya thub ci 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gatsho bar de'i dus khyadar deb mi sbrul nyun pa brjes/
byabya pa dang 'dra bar rangag lus borata/ mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang de nyid dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skyoba gnas dang/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi na goraskye ba mi 'gyur ro// rnapa'i khug garadmyal ba'i sgra'ang thos par m gyuran/ 'bras bu smin pa ltaga' 'gyur/ 'danems kyi gnas su 'gro ba med
do// des bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tumadangs gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa// gang gis sems can tshodapal/med par 'gyur ba dang/ nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed
zla pa gzhonanums bkalanga'iskudapatshadad ldan pa mdzes pa'i rasaM mkhas pas bya'o// de nas gtsug tor rnam pa ragyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzugs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul
pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o// tsho dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi 'phrang bcan/ pad+madang zlaba'i gdan la bzhugs r// ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/ rgyanathams cad kyis rgyan
pa zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// g.yon paskyobs ma mtshamanan pa mi bzad pa ut+pal sngon
po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o// dbus ma nisgrig pa dang bcas shing dkar bo'o// ga yas pa'i phyag gis snying khar sna tshogs rdordzo'o// dengazhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu/
med pa dang/ mda' dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o// g.yon du sngagasamadzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang/ de bzhin du gzhu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ bum pa ko/ yang mgo bor mchod/
rten la gnas pa'i lo dwang/ mgrin par Adang/ snying khar hungo// dpral bar tIng// lta ba'i phyogs su hu'o// rkang pa gnyis la oM a/ yi ge 'di rnams khakod la kAsAsAdang bcas
pa 'di nang durangagi tshodang stsol ba'o// de'i logs gnyis su pad+madang/ rdol cha gnyis rdzayab dag po phyag na bsnams pa'o/ stadu bdud mi'i charagyi rgyanA'abebs bzhin pa'i gnas
gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so// logs bzhi pa khro bo mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug pa sngon po can dang/ stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/ ral gri dang/ lcags dang/
dbyug pa dang/ rdo rje bsnamasapa'o// g.yonur na dug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub ched dubyed pa'o// lta ba bdapas rdzogs pa byas laring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
rtenadol smyudabarags pas mchodapa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchodapa byas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o// danas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig gcig sangozung ste ji srid
btsolnga'ikhor du skyongastong bzlas pa bya'o// de nas snga raraanasapa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasam zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro//ang nani theng
ka de drizhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par zhugs su gsol la/ mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing khyim re re zhing brgyad brgya bzlos
pa'o// yang zla ba re re la stong stong mchod pa byashing stong stongagi brlas pa byas na tshodapag tu med pa dang/ stobs dang gtumed pa gnon pa dang/ nam mkha' 'gro ba dang/ nad chen po
med par 'gyur ro// sems can brams cad kyis nyi ma re re tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma rag pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro// yang na kha cig gis delta bu byed par mi nus na des rang ga
khyam dudri zhim po dngabasus pa'i sa Tichar bzhugs su gsolal/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchodapa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad/rgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing/ nyi ma re re dus gsum
du ga rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod n blo rmob dal/ tshor ba dang/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang/ nad med pa dang/ skyid pa dang/ labargya 'tshong dang/ skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// yang
rangagis ma nusan de'i tshor dang 'dra bas khyas chori ngab dang blo rnobar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho gsems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya
ste wu gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i 'phrang bas brgyan pa/ tsan dan dkar po'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkarapo bkram ste/ logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar
0ma bzhi bzhag la/ bdug pos lasogs pas yang dag par mchodal/ phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i khyim pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkarapos g.yogs pa yal gas bar na
pa dgod par bya'o// 'o ma can gyi yam shing lam sbaral dar ma lha bkug ste dag blugs gsum byas na bsang gtor byas tekashegasasu gsol lo// de nas tshodapag tumed pa gsal
por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal babazlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ yang na/ oM a mr-i taAyurdadeswAhA/ zhes bya bas chod blo rno ba dngabacas
pas ngargyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal b.lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na choradeb dang/ blo rnob dang skyid pa dang/ nAdamed par 'gyur ro// yang na

zlangarare'i dkarapo'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgyu chen po byas la/ dus gsum dutsho lo so thub pa la'adod pas sbyin sreg byas na mchog gi tshong ba dang blo rno ba sbyin pa byed do// sems
can rnams la smad parami bya'o// tshog ' rtas mngag lus nad kyis gos par m 'gyur ro// lo brgya lnga bcuga'atshob dang/ dgra las rgyal ba dang/ blo rnobar 'gyur ro// dbyangs
snyan par 'gyur ro// gal terang gis ma nus na de'i tshor dang 'dra bas byas n zhi ba chen po 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod n gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshodang blo
rmob dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyinesreg byas te/ dang po dnga mtharastong stong gi mchod pa byas l/ yapa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byosan tsho'a'abum
phrag gcig thubapa'i gyura'o// bye ba sanabyobasgrub bo// doltar 'adi'i chog rim pas lo dpag tumed par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ dpa' khadang/ dgra las rgyal
bar 'gyur ro// dpala'adodan las 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas n dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma'abum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas rgyal po chen po
glob par 'gyur ro// bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyurab dro bapar gyur ro// yanaral gri la sogs pod grub par 'don mi bsrol dang bcas pa'i mtshod rten gyi drung du thangasku bkram la stong gi
mchod pa chen pos chod lakhazlas pa 'bum byas te/ yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te lagapa g.yas par bacas nayid kyis 'gro ba dang// 'dod pa gzugs
'dzin pa dang/ stobs che zhing gzhan gnonor dang/ sems can thams cad kyi gtsug tu'adrenang ro ragyur nas snyand nganapo'i mchog tshodapag tu med par gyur ro// de ltar rdo rje dang/
'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum la sogs pa la'ang bsgrubapar bya'o// de ltar phan yon dpagatamed pa'i gzungasachen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed
ma par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyarab de lta de ltar 'as 'grub par byed do// gangayang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor m pur rgyal ba zhes kyang gzungs 'dinyo che re re la dus gsum
dulanyi shurtsa gcig bzlas pa bya 'demachod na chen po byas te yang dag par bcangasal/ gzhan la'ang cheragasal bar byas na/ deskyid pa'i thob cingestobs dang ldan pa dang/ nad med pa dang/

lo brgya thub pa dang/ blo rnob dang/ skye ba dran par 'agyur// gang gi tsho'adziba'i dus byas pa de'i tsho sbul shunar bsreg pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor tu/ bdeb can gyi 'jige rten gyi khams su skye bar

'gyur ro// dmyalaba'i sgra rna bug tu'ang thos par mi 'gyuran/ 'bras bu smin pa malta 'ang ga la 'gyur/ gang drang bo/ngadu skyes pa de dang de ru skye brnganapar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa 'a pod dag dang/ lhadang/ dpal mo yin dang/ dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam pa rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//patsitachos kyi sde pa
dang/ khams pal tsab dge slong ba ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/@#// rgyagar skad du/ sah+phatathA ga to'i ka ba dza
]AnAmad+hAratshig la/ bodagad du/ de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyalama'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtogar// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal mal
phyag 'tshalalo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa dus gtsug nA/ bcom ldan 'das bdeb can n bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomo pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas tshodapag med chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po khang bzang gi chol khadeb 'aha par bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpasems dang 'chen po'aphags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can sdug bsngal dang nadasna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ring tsho thung ba dag yodad/ da rnams kyi don du tshor
banye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyalam zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gzung bar bya/ gzhan rnams la rgya cher angadag par bstan par bya'o//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gaTigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tore rnamar ra rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gachus bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
ma kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khoralagazigs te/ kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gtsugator rnam par rgyalam zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to// on tshod ga wa tasah+pha lokya pra ti bo ya/ bud+d+ha ya tanam tad+ya thA o b+hud+d+hAt+taM/ shod+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bsho d+haya
bshod yamasamasaman+taa ma blus par N ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho/ a b+hi nuNaM/ sarba tathA ga tA/ su ga ta pa ra ba tsanamr-itA b+ha lo kirma hAmu dromiMnIpadiA ha ra A har/ ma ma A

yusanar Ni sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bgo rgyu yab sho rgyu// bag ba gnas A b+hU ba bogany+nyo/ u la ba dzas pa ri shud+d+haM/ sa ha sra ra saMtso di te/ sarba tatha ga ta a ba lo ki ni/ ShA ram tA pa ri pu ra

kyisawaMtaphul tam te/ dasha rlu ma pra ti/ sarba ta blag tuphrodaAd+hiSh+Tha nA te omu dre mu dre/ mahA mu drobadzra kA ya saM ha ta na pa ri shud+d+he/ sarbakarma A wa ra Na ba ban+d+ha/ mapra tin khon+tayA/
uN+Di shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tas maya ts+tshiSh+Thanad+hi/ o mun mun/ ma hAmuni/ ban/ bamun/ ma hA ba mun/ ma ti ma ti/ ma sAm ti/ mam ti/ ma hAm ma ti/ sum ti/ su ma ti/

ma hAsumati/ tathA ta takoni parishud+d+he/ bi khud+d+haMud+d+he 2 mohehe dza ya dza ya/ bi dzaya ba 5/ sma ra sma ra/ sa=ra sa ra/ sa raya sU ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha d+hiSh+ThamAd+hiti/o'ud+d+he shud+d+he/

bung pud+d+he/ badz+dzibadzramahAbadzrasu badzra badzegan+tadzaya gany+nyo/ bi dza ya gats+tso/ badzradzra lA gan+d+hengadzod+d+hade/ badzrasaM b+ha ba badzra badzra Nibadzam+b+ha ba tu ma sha ra raM sarba satwA nAny+tsa/ kAya/

pa ri shar+Naglu ba du ma sa dA/ sarba ga tiparishud+d+hish+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tAny+tsa mI sa mA shAs yAn/ oM bud+d+haM bud+d+he its+tse sid+d+haM bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo ng+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bimo tshaya ngamotsa ya/

sho d+ha yagod+haa/ bi sho ng+ha ya bishornyaa/ saman+tanotsaya motsayas man ras+saparishud+d+ho/ sarbatathAg tu drod ya d+hiShAn d+hiT+Thite/ oM mu dre mu dre ma hAmu dre ma hA mu dra man+tapa des/ rigs
kyi bu gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyalam zhes bya pa'i gzungs 'chiba'i dbyug pa tshon po 'dzin pa/ sdig pa zhi bar byed pa'i dgag byed do// gsudag tshe ring
bar 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bklag par bya'o// sa phyogs yangs pa bcag zhus dang ba byung gis nye bar byugasal/ drangazang gi chab kyis chag chag gdab par bya'o//
steng du bla bresakyis bres ngag 'phyang du bcug nas/ de'idabus su rdul tshon dkar pos 'khor tshu bsabargyad pa shin tu brgyan par gadab par bya'o// gang de'i dbus su rang bzhin gyi snying po
'byung pa'i gtsug tor ro// deltar rim pa ji lta bar shar l sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nam ma kha'altar 'adus pa'i babab ston 'byung pa'i gtsug tor dang/ sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor

nas/ dang/ nor bu'i snying po 'byung pa 'gatsug to dang/ ro bcud kyi snying po 'byung pa'i gtsug tor dang/ snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug to dang/ gAkhri brjide su po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang/
pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung ba'i botsug tor dang/ so'abu 'byung ba'i gtsub// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// de yang phyi rol nyid du pad+ma'adab ma bcu drug pa legs
parabro bar bya'o/[”]'dab ma sos ri der yisapa dz+dzalta borathag le bcudrug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol la// nangastong pa de 'byung ba'i gtsug tor
dang/ phyi stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug dang/ phyi nang skor nyid 'byung pa'i gtsug tor dang/ stongapa nyid stongal de 'byung ba'i tsug tor dung/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i
gtsug tor dang/ 'dusaMbyas stong po nyidi 'byung btsu gtor dang/ [«]dus ma byas stongapa nyidi 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang/ thog ma dang bram med pa stong pa nyid 'byungapa'i gtsug tor dang/
dor ba med pa stongapa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang/ rangabazhin stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dapaM/ chos thamaMs cud stongapad 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dapaM dngos po med pa stong panyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dngo/ rang gi de nyid stongang di 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang///
dngos po med pa'i ringag ngo bo stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang/ de bzhin gshel sa pa bzhugs pa'i gdan gyi dekyil 'khor byas nas dus ji lta ba'i mi rtog gi rnam pa dbul bar

bya'o de'i phyed kyi steng du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'ametshod skyon gzhug par bya'o/ shog bu'am lam lasngags kyi yo ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang gzhug par bya'o// bum pa
chus kang de'ang gzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i phyi rol phyob sa bzhi bum pa pag ngagazhag par mya'o// dar gyi lo lnga deng/ gdugs dang/ bdan gyis bar mdzes par byas nas/ yang shar du bgegs
rab tu'ajoms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang/ lhora'achib rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang/ nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug ram par rgyal
ba'i lha mo dang/ byang du phung po nadarab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lha modang/ mar rdordzo' phung pa tshesbyin m dang/ bden bral du sgyu ma chen mo dang/ rlung du gser 'od ma dang
dbang ldan du gser kyi phreng bcatsho sbyin ma'o// snod ba'i chu dri bzang dang bcas pas bkang ste/ me tog gi phrengab 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o// 'di'i mthar kha gsum rdul tshon gyis bri bar
bya'o// 'phreng ba dang po la sku la sogs pa med pa'i 'jimapa rlon pa la khyas pa'i sats+tsha stong phrag gci'i bsgrig par bu'o// ma grub na brgya nges par gzhug par bya'o// phyogs bzhir bkur stadeng
khas stongachen po'i mchod pa byas nas/ tshig gzhan ma smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chog smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'dab klag par bya'o// lan rer zhingamachodat+taM na gyi dbul mchod cader ba tu/
gnus par bya'o// stongaphrag gcig tu klog pas dbusakyi mchodanagyi dbur lag pa 'gyod cing mchod par bya'o/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ maram dang/ dIchab dang/ lha shos

la sogs pa mchodapa thams cad stong phrag so sor mchod rten gyi 'phrang ba rnam par byas nas mngodapar bya'o// ji srid yongs su ma rdzogs pa de srid du ma ma 'phrang nga rlung gis mnyems pa sbyar khor
bya'o/ mnyam par gzhag cingegatsang sbrasarab tu 'jug par bya'o// de ltar byas na zhag bdun pa'i ye bdun du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// le bdunaratshan de ltar tshe mchog 'aglegatsangand las rnam par
gror nas brgyar 'tsho baka'agyur ro// dusamayin pa'i ra ba dang thams cad du rnyed par m 'gyur ro// doltakhu'anyoral spyodang 'arim palas gzhan du byas na de yis 'grub pa ma yin no// rab
tu byed pa dang po'o/// rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ni ru mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du 1
mang du thos pa lo tsa ba gnas brtan dpalanyim rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpalaTharal gling ga gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o//
ma[p]@#// gar skad du/ sarba tathA ga ta uSh+Tha' ba dzayanAmad+d+hAr lasahata/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal bzhes bya pa'i gzungs
rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

ts+tshA dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang bzang mchog na nyid re zhung sa so// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ 'phags pa
spyan rasag ges dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa// kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang/ ris gas kyi bu mo sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i soms can tshe thung ba

rnams yod de/ da rnams kyi phyi'i sems can thams cad la kun tu ba gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal dang zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang/
klog pa dang/ gzhan la rgyacher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyire yun ring por gnas par sgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gzigs te/ kun
tugazigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dpa/zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungasal bka' stsalapa/

mawa monamod+ha ga wa sarbadri lokya pra tib shiyabud+d+hAya tanamatad+ya thA/ oM d+ha[%]/ gosnyayagod+d+ha5/bi shod+hiya Tisho d+hiya/ asam sam a ba b+hA sa sa ra Nagati/ ga gnaswa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/
muny+tsal bi dza ya pa rishAN+NaM/ ab+hiny+tsanAmI/ so ta thA ga tasu ga ta ba rab[W ]/amIta ab+hi wi kor/ mahAmudraman+tapa deA har nAhar/ ma ma A yu/san d+haraNi/ sho d+ha ya shod+haya/ ba no

d+ha yol god+ha ya ga ga nasAb+hA ba bi shun+ti/u rayaM dzaya pa ri shud+d+he/ sahasra rasmi saM tso de// sarbatathA ga ta a ba lo ki ni/ ShaT pA ra mi tApa ri pu ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA ted ga lta mi
pra ti/ sarba ta thA ga 'phrad ya a na a d+hi'o/ mu dre mu dre/ mahAmudro/ badzrakAyasaM hAtan/ parishud+d+hA/ sarba karma A wa ra Na rab n+d+he/ phran brtaya/ ma ma A yur bi shud+d+ho/
sa cha ga tas ma ya ad+hiShAn a d+hitaM/ oMmunimuni/ ma hamu ni/ bi mu ni bi mun/ ma sUb ma ni/ ma ti ma ti/ mahAm ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta tha ta/ b+hu tako tsA/ par
shuSh+Tha/ bi sa twA/ bud+d+hishud+d+ho/ hahaM/ dzaya dzaya/ ba dzayab dzaya/ smarasmar/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Than a d+hiT+ThitaM/ shud+d+heshu/ bud+d+ha bud+d+he/

'phrobadzra/ ma hA badzra/ su badzra/ bsngogat+taM/ dzaya gat+taM/ bi dza ya gany+nyo/ badzradzal gany+nyo/ badzraud bla ba/ badrisaM b+ha be/ badzra badziNi/ badzram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma sha rI rosaMrdzasatwA
many+tsa ka ya pa rishudad+hi b+ha ra tu/ sadAms chag tapa rishud d+hin+d+he/ sarbato ba/ta samaya ad+hin ad+hiSh+Thate/ sarba ta b+hA wa tA shu maM sa mA shA sa yanA/ buny+tsa du/ sid+h+ya sid+hu/

bo d+ha ya khorAya/ bi ya bi bo d+haya/ mo tsa ya mo tsaya/ bi mo tsas ba motsa/ sho d+ha ya sho d+hiya/ bshod+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ samanan mo tsaya mo tsaya/ saman+taras+saM pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA/

shrI da ya a d+hiSh+Than a d+hi/ mu dre mu dro/ ma hA mu dre ma hAmu dzA ma padisAhA/ gtsug tor namapar rgyal ba zhes bya ba sdig pa dngaHsab pa thoms cad rnam par sbyong ba/ ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod

pa 'di yi garabris taM/ mchodarten gyi srog shing gi stong du bzhugs l/ zlab pa tsho khrus byas talan stong rtsa brgyad brjod matshozad pa las tshe phyiranurab pa'i gyur ro// n gnas olas myur du thar te/

sgrib pa rnams dag nas khran med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro rnams kyis thos na'ang de rnams ngan song gi pha mayin te/ byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram
ze'i rigs sam/ tshong dpon gyi rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs shisA la chen po lta bu'i nang du skyob ra'agyur ro// mchod rten de gri bams phog gam/ rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan songabu'agro bar
mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dor chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rang ste mngon par bstod do//
ma 'phags pa gtsug tor m par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog ra dang bcas pa rdzogasaso// rgya gar skad du/ Arasarba tathAgato bsitAtapa
nam a pa ra dzi tupra t+yaM gi ram hA yatserA dzI/ bodaskadadu/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyi'i
bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyalatsho chen ngo'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thoms cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa dus
gtsape/na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i yul sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas chos bzang lha'i 'dunas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'dge 'dun chen po dang/ lha rnams
kyi dngang po brgyatsane dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ donas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshamasapa nyid la bzhugs nas/ gtsug tor la rnam par gazigs pa zhes bya btangenge 'dzin lasnyoms
parazhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tul tsug gyi gseb nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag khyungango namo b+ha ga ba ta uSh+Thal a shud d+he bir dzeng male swAhA/
bcom ldan ras gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshalal// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe 'dun la phyag 'tshal// yang dag par rdzogs
ma// pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal// byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ 'jig rtenan dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams l phyag 'tshal// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags
'chang grub pa'i drang srong rnams laphyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong mod pa'i mtshon cha can dmed pas phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa la
phyag 'a'a'// dngangapo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog ma'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal// muny+tsa laphyag 'tshal la//
bcom ldan 'das legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pal phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' khyed dbang phyug nag po chen ngo grong khyer sum bcu gas 'jig
par byed ra kha che'i dur khrod chen po na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig ra laphyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo//
bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo mi'i gdung la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdungal phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ro'i gdung
la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gdung la phyag 'tsholal// bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdungalaphyag 'tshal lo//
bcom ldan 'dasaglang po'i gdung la 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gtumug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das chags pa'i gdung laphyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogasala'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rardzogasang 'asangs
rgyus 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das deng zhir
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdordzo'adzan pa rgya mtsho 'dzoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUmu'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag nga ra rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas nA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal
lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mi mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs laphyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can
la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgrang com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lag par dud sel la phyag 'tshala'// bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyus
gser grub la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub palaphyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag khar rdzong gsara'isangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bazang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas la dang ut+pa
la'i dri'o tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes
khyab gzhan gyis ma thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyalam 'dirab tu brjod par bya'o// 'thab pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par
byed pa/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa// pha rol gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dusam yin pa 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa// sems can btsadzes
pa thams cad thor pa byed pa/ sdong ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad rnam par rlag ra redal/ gdon stong khrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi/
po rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrubabar byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad rnam par rlag par byed pa/
stang pa dang/ drag po dang/ rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms ra 'byed pa// dug dang/ mtshon dngo/ modang/ tshulas skyob par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrolang/ dusam yin
para'achib brgyad kyibar duyongs su skyob par byed pa ste/ gzhan gyis ma thub drag shul che// stobs chen gzi brjid chen mo ste// gtumapa chen mo dkar mo che// gsal ba chen mo stobs chen mo//

'barab chen mo 'phreng ba che// gos dkar mo ni chinamo ste// 'phags ma sgrolam khro gnyer can// rdo rje'aphreng ba rnam bsgyings ma// pad+ma'i snangab rdoN+Di'i mtshan// gzhan gyis mi khruba'aphrang ba can//
rdo kharab snams 'joms pa mo// zhiba'ilha rnams kyisamachodapa// gzugasazhin dkara mtshonamo ste// 'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo// 'phags masgrol ma stobs chen mo// 'chi med rdo rje'u kha
rgyud/ rdordzo gzhon nurigs 'dzin m// lag rdo rje'i rdoN+Dadang/ rig sngags gser gyi 'phreng ba can// le brgan rtsi dang rin chen m// rnam par snang mdzad rigs kyi 'o// de bzhin gshegs
ri rigs gtsug tor ma// rnam par ba sa ma'aTi'aphrangab dang/ rdordzogasal 'od lta bu'i sman// rdo rje skyes dngadakar mo dang// pad+ma'i spyan dang la sangs rgyas can/ de bzhin rdo rje zlaba'i

sam/ 'od/ de bzhin ron+da'adzin ma dang// rdordzob phrang ba sgyu 'phrul tshegi/ lha mo dang nagaser 'od can// spyanamadzesamad dkaramo dang// pad+maya'i skyen can dang// rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni//
zla'od bdag gi yon tan shos// phyag rgya'i tshog sadod gdang/ mamo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas ra dang/ sems can thams cad la bsrungs ba mdzad du gso la//

so nga 'i ga Na pA pany+tsasasarba ta thA ga tos tAta pa tAhU~MhU~M b+hi dzamAn hU~Mdu hits+tsaM/ somyun hU~M du mit+taM/ motan ka rit+taM d+hu h+phaTit+taM/ pa ra bar saM d+haNaka ri shud+d+haMb+hi ko/ satsunasnyam+b+hanaka rIhU~MhU~M hU~M/

sarapa ra bicu ts+tshidan ka ri rgyud+hu b+hiyaM/ sarba duShAnaMsam+b+hanaka ri hudI taM/ sarba kAr kAsag hANipi tsho+usanaka rIhudo hit+taM/ tsatur ki tI ni gri husahas tshodaM d+hIsan ka ra hU~M puM kaM/ a bi ti/
nAm kAtuNaMpra sA danaka rI hud+hu tso/ anAmahA hAkhits+tshAsan ka rA+odaM yaM/ rakAr kA maM sa sany+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs

dkar po can rdordzogatsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo/phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' bachen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stongam 'ar chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ ro rje lte ba
yangs pa chen mo can/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad m la phyag 'tsha' la// oM sAts+tshan+tanAmam sa pa ri bA ra susachasatwaM usatwA rgyal po yis 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun gyis
ka 'jigs pa dang/ ma yis 'tshigs pa dang/ chu yis 'jigs pa dang/ dug gis 'jigs pa dang/ mtshonagyis 'jigs pa dang/ dgra yis 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol
gyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jigs pa dang/ mule yis 'jigs pa dang/ dgra bo yis 'jigs pa dang/ thog gis 'jigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'ar de yis 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo las
'jigs pa dang/ garamadachung bas 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan gtum pos 'jigs pa dang/ klu yis 'jigs pa dang/ glob ga des 'jigs pa dang/
byem tshamos 'jigs pa dang/nam mkha' lding gis 'jags pa dang/ ams kyi nad dang/ gnodapa dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'jigasapa dang/ gdon gyis 'jigs pa
dang/ lha'i gdon dang/ ku'i gdon dang/ gnongaspyir gyi gdond// srin po'i gdon dang/ driwa'agadon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang/ rlung lcab gdon
dang/ mi'am ci'i gdon dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang// mi rigadon dang/ mim yin pa'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ yi dgas kyi gdonadang/ sha za'i gdon dang/ grul
bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'il/don dang/ skam khyed kyi gdon dang/ smyo byed kyi gdonadang/ grib gnon gyi gdon dang/ brjed byed kyi gdon dang/ gson po'i
gdon dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang/ lus chags ma'i gdon dang/ nam gru'i gdon dang/ tsher ma bdonapag don dang/ relce 'don pa'i gdon dang/ bya'i gdon dang/ ma mo
dga' ng ra byed pa'i gdon dang/ kun tu 'brengarar phyid pa'i gdonadang/ 'phyang ba'i gdon dang/ mkha' 'groma'i gdon dang/ lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang/ ka Ta ka Ta'i tshogs can
gyi gdon dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ mal kha ba dang/ khruba'athungab dad/ zhag khab dang/ shazab dang/ tsholaza ba dang/ rkangaTab dang/ btsus pa zer
dang/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ gtor l za ba dang/ 'phreng ba bra ba dang/ dri bra ba dang ma ya/zab dang/ bdug pa za ba dang/ 'bras bu za ba dang/ la tob zab dang/ bsreg bya za bo dang/
rnag 'thung ba dang/ bshang bza ba dang/ gcon btub dang/ mchilam za ba dang/ snabs za ba dang/ ngar snabs za ba dang/ skyugs pa za ba dang ]nom bu ze ba dang mgatsang ba za ba
dang stor khung nas 'bab pa'i thung pa dang/ nor 'phrog pa dang/ sams 'phrog ra rnams dang/ dedag thams cad dang/ gdon thams tsad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcod
do// ro rdziphur bus gdab bo// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcan no// rdo rjeyulus gdab bo// mkha' 'gro dang mkha' gro ma'i byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcod do///
0 bya@#// rdo rdzophurabus gdab bo/ tshangasapas byas pa'i ri'i sngags ral gris gcad do// rdodzaphur bus gdab bo// brgyatsan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdorje phur
bus gdab bo// sredamad kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phurabus gdab bo// phyugs bdag chen po dang drag pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdordzaphur bus gdab
bo// nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// mamo'i tshog sakyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rjephur bus gdab bo// mi'i thod
pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// joN+Daphur bus gdab po// ri khrodar sa byas pa'i rig stags ral gris gcad do// rdordzaphur bus gdab bo/ g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags
ral gris gcad de// rdo rje phurabus gdab bo// skar mda' gdongagis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdordzayur bus gdab bo// jorje gzhonanums byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris
gcad do// rngon+daphur bus gdab bo// ga shin rjegashed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gral gyis gcad do// rdordzaphur bus gdab go/ gshin rje'i pho nyas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad/
]do// rdo phur bus gdab bo// klum rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdordzobur bus gdab bo// me las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcod do// rod+dedur bus/
tha0gdab bo// log 'dren gyis byas pa zhig lhags lam gsegacad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// gzhon nus byas pa'i rig sngagasaral gris gcad do// rdordzasur zhus ba dang bo// rgyal po[&]na
po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags la gris gcadodo// rdo phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis khyas pa'i rig sngags ramakhris gcad do// rdordzasur bus gdababo// nam mkha' ldinge yang dag pas
byas pa'i rig sngagasaral gris gcad do// rdo phu lus gadab bo// rgyalabar byed pa dang/ sgrung pa'i byed pa dang/ sgrub par byed l dang/ don kun sgrub pas khyab pa'i rig sngags ral gris
gcad do// rdordzonguradus lagadab bo// khyung ri Ti dang/ dga' khyedadabang phyug dang/ smin tshug gi bu rang/ zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ tshogs kyi dag po dang lhan cige pas byas pa'i rig sngags
ral gris gcad do// rdordzaphur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong gatser bus khyas pa'i rig sngags la gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus la/dab bo// dgra bcom pasakhyas pa'i rig sngags ral
gris gcad do// ro phur bus gdab bo// naras gabrigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo phur bus gdab go/ 'dod chags dang bral bas rtsas
pa'i rig sngags ral grisagacad do// rdo phur bus gdab bo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lags byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdordzuphur dusagadab bo// gang dang
gang du byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris ba/cad do// rdordzophur bus gdab bo// gang gis byed du bcugapa des byas pa' ro'i sngags gral gyis gcad do// rdo rjephur bus/gang du byas pa'i sngar
gdab bo// dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdorje phur bus gdab bo// bon dang/ pho modang sran phod/ bran mos khas pa'i rage sngags ral gyis gcad do//
ro yurakhus gdab bo// drang srong ga mchog khams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdordzophur bus gdab bo// lha'atshog sa thamasacad kyis byas pa'i rab sngags ral gyis
ga cad de// rdo rje phudabus ba/dab bo// mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad kyis byas pa'i sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// oM bcom ldan bsam bdag 'khor dang
bcas pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ snang ba dang/ rab tu sdang ngathams cad dang/ phyir
rgol ba 'am/ mamadza' ba 'am/ mi phanapar 'dod pa thams cad las srung du gsolasungadu ba sol/ dang zhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can s ngas//
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pam dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal zhinge dkarab rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag 'tshal// o dzul dzAl/ d+ha d+ha ka/ khA da khA da/
daradar/ ba da ra ba de ra/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ ban+titan+te/ hutsuphaT yaNasAhA/ sar dungan hU~Mtshu/ sarbadurma ta b+hup+payaT/ sarba durlogi tiny+tsayan/ samadumyu e yatsa/ sarbadil+loT/ sarba

dang lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang/ mi'i gdon rnams dang/ ma ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang/ yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang/ sha za'i gdon rnams
rgyudang 'khyung po'i gdon rnams dwang grulakhum gyi gdon rnams dang/ srul po'i gdon rnams dang/ lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang/ skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ smyo byed kyi
gdon rnams dung/ grib gnon gyagadon rnams dang/ brjod byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ gnon po'i gdon rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang ]nam gru'i gdon rnams rang/
kun tu bro ba'i gdon rnams dang/ chol ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dad bya'i gdon rnams dad/ ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang/ bum pa lta bu'i gdon rnams dad/ 'phyang
tha00 ]]ba'i gdon rnams dang/ lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang/ ka cang ka'-i tshogs can gyi ge don rnams dang/ gdon thams cad bsal du gsol/ rimasanyin gcig pa rnams dang/
nyin gnyis pa rnams dang/ nyin gsum pa rnams dang/ nyin bzhi pa rnams dang/ nyin bdun pa rnam dang/ zlab phyed pa rnams dang/ zla ba gcig pa rnams dang/ nyin mo pa rnams

dang/ sha za'i roms rnams dang/ mi'i rims rnams dang/ mim yin pa'i rims rnams dang/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rims rnams dang/ rlung las gyurapa rnams dang/ mkhris pa las
gyurapa rnams dang/ bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang/ 'dus pa las tshurapa rnams dang/ rims thams cad dang/ klad pa na ba bdal du rang sems can thams cad la bsal du gsol/ bdag
dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs phyed na ba drang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ mig nad dang snand dang/ khand dang/ mgul nad dang 2 snying nad dang/ lkog ma lhagoran ba dang/

mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis mi tshugs/ chad pas mi tshugs/ mdang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur nga'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis
mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ phyad kyis mi tshogs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad rang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams
00 @#/// cad kyi yid du 'opazhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar tshe rabos dran par 'gyur ro// rdordzab rigs bye ba khrag/

khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngagasakyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par srung ba dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sbedapar byed do// rdo rje phanyamo mngag gzhug
brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su skyong bar byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// nam du'ang gnod sbyin nyid dang/ srin po nyid dang/ 'byung po nyide dang/ yi dgas
nyid dang/ sha zanyid dang/ srul po nyid dang/ lus srul po nyide dang/ mi dbulalor mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod/
nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis ma thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags
kyi skyel mo chen mo 'di 'changan/ chongs par mi spyod pa'i ng tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// thub pa ram byas pa'i ng thub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang nga 'ang gtsang bar byas par
ska 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa'i ng bsnyen gnas byas pa can du'agyur ro// gang dga mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de'ang sdig pa ma lus pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro// ston
gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i ng ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung pa'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub/
ma phyir bzlogal chen mo'i rigasngags kyi rgyalami chen mo 'di'achang na bu 'dod pa des kyang bu rnyed de// tshe dang/ bsod nams dang/ stobs kyang rab ldan no// 'di nas nI'aphosanas kyang/

par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'go ba'i nad dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//

snyoms par zhugs mthag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di deg byung ngo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge
'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dund nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal//
byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rtenan dgra bcom pa rnams la phyaga'atshal lo// rgyun duzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalalo// lan
cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshalal/ 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyago'atshol lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drangasrolana'adogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags
la'achang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pal phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka'agrub bzlog pa'i bdag pod bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
tha[4 ]lo legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyerasum brtsegasa'ajig par byed pa dupakhrod na gnas par mos pa

ldan 'das rdo rje 'i gdung la phyag 'tshalal// bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das grangapo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhon
nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan badas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomal yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med laphyag 'tshalal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai ma'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po ma/
tog kun tu rgyas b.laphyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tsha'al//
bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs l dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bazang yol phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnam par snanga mdzad la
phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das der zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pala'i sdig tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalal// de rnams la phyag 'tshal

chu'as bzlog pa/ ngana'agro'i 'jigs pa lcams cad las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ gsum pa chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo gzi'arjidan+te/ dkarachen
'bara'aphrengagos dkaralo// 'phags masgrol ma gnyir can m/ rgyal ba'i rdodzo 'phrangazhes grags// pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub 'phro ba can// joNa'i
mchun rnamasgab gamo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchodam// zhi po gser gyi 'phrang ba na/ ]dkarachen 'bar ba gos dkaramo// 'phags ma sgrolam stobs namo// jorjolu gu rgyud gzhan
dang rdordzo gzhon nuragasa'adzinam// lagan rdo rjer gsor 'brang// le brgan rtsi dang rina chen m// rnam snang mdzad rabs btsug tor grags// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi chogs
de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ chos rba tathA ga ta/ras ta pa trayUd+d+hogits+tso/ dzam b+hanakari hU~MhU~M git+taM/ stam b+hanaka rIhU~MhU~M
hanaka rehUr+ya b+hi no/ saMg+hanakarIshud+d+haMhit+taM/ khamarlan ka risud+hi hIt+taM/ pa ra ba rab+hakANakarihUM/sarba durba duhAnaMsnyam snyan ka rIhU~MhU~M hU~M/ satho yak+Sha rakas gra hUM
tshob rnosan ka rIhAr+ya d+hu ts+tso/ sarbapa ra bar ts+tsha dan karIhU~MhU~M hits+tso/ tu rA shI tinaM gra ha sa has klob rgyusanaka rI hU~MhU~M gyi/any+dza bsesha tInAMnAkA puN+NaM prasAd
nakarishud+d+haM It+taM/ aT+ThA nAmashAgra sAts+tsha'i sonakarihU~M hU~M hrit+taM/ rakA rak+khamaMsardzas 'u/ bcom ldan 'dasam de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo
can rdordzogatsug tor phyir bzlogal chen mo/ phyag stongama'i ba chen mo/ dbu stongamanga' ba chen mo/ sbyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo=
yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig/ rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdorjod ng// gas 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// jo rje
sgros dang dkar mo dang// pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang// sangs rgyas dpal dngad bzhin spya// rda rdzanyi ma'i 'odudangan// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin// rig pa dang/ phyag rgya dang/
gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun nas srung bar mdzad du gsol/ o ra'i gan dra shalta sarma ta b+hag tor si tUta pa te pIts+tsaM/ dzam rgyu

na karIhU~MhU~M/ stam snyan kar hU~MhU~M/ ma hAng+ga saM b+hakU NA kArAhu/ pa ra sid+d+he saM g+hakA Nakarishud+d+haM/ sadzadukhAnaMsnyam g+han karIhU~MhU~M/ sarmayakA rakAs gra thA tsA bi d+h+waM sa ra ka re hU~M hU~M/

tsa tu rA shI tInAM gra hAs sngagrwa NA bi b+haMs na ka rI hU~MhU~M/ abil tInInu'u h+phaNI prasA dan karIhU~M hU~M/ a nI ma hA gra swANAbihUM san karI hU~MhU~MrakArakAmaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje'i gtsug tor phyir bzlogam chen mo/ phyag stongamanga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong ma' ba chen m/ spyan bye ba brgyastong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi
phyedu'abar ba'i mtshan rtags can[” ]rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkya'i 'khor du da pa dang sems can thams cad rgyal po 'a'ijigs pa dang/ rkun po'i jags pa dang/ mo' 'jags
pa dang/ chuli'i jigs pa dang/ dug gis 'jigs pa dang/ mchon gyis 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyise 'jigs pa dang/ mu ges 'jigs pa dang/ dgra yis 'jigs pa
rang/ lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chibs 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang/ skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dwang/ rgyal po'i ched pas 'jigs pa
dang/ klu yis 'jigs pa dung/ glog gis 'jigs pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gis 'dzugs pa dang/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang/ lha gdonadang/ klu'i gdon dang/ lha
ma yin gyi gdon dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'i gdon dang/ yid gs kyi gdon dang/ shatha'i gdon dang/ 'byung ro'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i
gdon dang/ lus srul po'i gdon dang/ skem byed kyi gdon dang/ brjod byed kyi gdon dang/ smyo byed kyi gdonadang/ grib gnon gyi ba don dang/ gnon po'i gdon dang//
mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang gnam gru'i gdon dang/ gshin rje'i gdon dang/ bya gdon dang/ ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang/ kun 'phrab 'i gdon dang/ chor ma 'don pa'i gdon
las bdag khadalegasasugyur cig/ zas su mdangs za bdang/ zas su mngal zab dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba dang/ zasasu zhag za bdang/ bras susha za bdang/ zas su tshol za ba dang/ zasasu
rkang rnga ba dang/zas su btsas pa za ba nga/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ zasasu skyugs pa za ba dang/ zasasu phyis za pa dang/ thas su gcig 'thung bdang ]zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang/ zas
sulhag ma za ba dang/ zas su snabasaza ba dang/ zasasungar snangesazab dang rngas sum gtsang ba sra ba dang/ brasasugator maza ba dang/ zas su 'phreng ba za ba dang/ zas sudri wang dang/ sasubadu/
pazla ba dang/ zas su me tog zab dang/ zasasu 'khrasabu zab dang/ thasasul tog za ba dang/ zas su sbyin sreg za bsta/ gdonadadag thams cad kyi rigasngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo//
kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ phurabus gdab bo// mkha' 'groms byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus
garab bo// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sridamed kyi bus byas pa'i rigasngab/sa gcad do// phuradus gdab bo// nam mkha' ldang yang dang ga pa dang lhan/
cig pasakhyos pa'i 'og sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mamo'i tshogs rnams kyis byas pa'i rig sngags
gcad do// yur bus gdab bo// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gtad do// phur bus gdab bo// rgyal par byed pa dang/ sbrang rtsir byed pa dang/ don kun grub pas byas pa'i
rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rab sngags gcad do// lus bus gdab bo// b+hug ri tadeng/ dga' khyer dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po drang
lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong gnyir bus byas pa roseg sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dag sbyong mago reg gis byas pa'i rig
sngags gcad do// phur bus gdabab// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// 'dod chags dang bral pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus
gdab po// 'jig rtenadabang phyug 'khor dang bcas ra sa byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do// phur bus gdab bo// lag na rdordzo 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad de//
phur bus gdab bo// phonyadang/ phonyamo dang/ bran pho dang/ bran mos byasupa'i rig sngags gcad do/ phur bus gdab bo// drang srong gi tshogs thams cad
kyis byas parig sngags gcad do// phurab sagadab// tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phurabusagadab bo// mi 'phrod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis
cas ra'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// bcom ldan 'dasam de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung pa'i gdugs dkaramo can sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems
dpa' thamasacad kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la srung du gsol srung du gsol/ o a ta a na lAnupra b+hA spu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa ti/ o dzA la dzAl/ khA da khA du/ han han/
dar dar/ ba der ba da ra/ sAts+tshin/ b+hin+dab+hin+da/ ban ng+habanad+ha/ hUM hUM phaT swahA/ snying po'o// hamed par/ hopo yaT/ mamo g+hayaphaT/ apra tid tAya phaT/ ba rAdA ya
phaT/ bar pra dAya ya// asu rab rwa ba NakarAyaN ]par brje ba Na ka rA ya phaT/ sachado 'i sbyayun/ sarbanA ge skyaphaT/ sardzas kany+tsa phaT/ sarba rakae dzaT/ sarba b+hu te NaT/ sarba

tshul pra ti N+ya phaT/ sarbar DeshAtso phaT/ sarba kun+nA N+Dit+taphaT/ sarba mu tanany+tsayaT/ sarba ka Ta du tan phaT/ sajaman b+huny+tsa/ phaT/ sam+pa unam dats+tsal/ sawats+tshaye smyaphaNo/ sarma a pa smA re
[g]phaT/ sajostar ke zluphaT/ saraTak+kin d+hupa/ sarba re bte yaT/ sats+tsayAm ke phaT/ sarnga/ku'ad+me phaT/ sajamA tin ka phaT/ satsakaM rU kiman phaT/ sarma a laMbaker+yaphaT/
sa gta ra ne h+phuphaT/ sarba karje pho sar gan d+har phaT/ sarba azhu ra phaT/ sarba nan rab+huphaT/ sarbag ru Da phaT/ satham rig sgyu yaT/sarba dur laM ga te b+h+yAyaN/ sa cha duphre

kI te b+hupha// sarbadzAre yaT/ sarba b+hu yi sbya phaT/ sa tho pa dra sgyuphaT/ sazo pa sane b+hu lan/ saja bla ma ts+tsha phaT/ sawa tItsIke phaT/ sa pA take h+phuphaT/ sarbabin+d+he d+hareb+b+haT/ dza ya ka

ra/ ma chu kar/ sid d+hi ka ra/ sarba am+basA d+ha ke la/ tsatur bya b+ha gi ni sgyuThapaN/ badzrakumArI ye badzra ku lan d+hur byA laT/ sarngam pra t+yaM gi ri phaT/ badzrakaM ka lA pra t+yaM gi ra rAdzAyapal/ ma hA kA
lA yamA tig Na nam oM taye pa/ blom+ma NI yaT/ bats+tsedAyi Ta/ ma hashar yipar/ rudzI yar/ ma hA kA lA se phaT/ tsamats+tshae paT/ kumArA yi laT/ bArA hAyo baT/ in yi phaT/ ag ye
paT/ yAmA ephar/ nIr phaT/ ba ruNayi phatsa/ mAru tAyi phaT/ so mA ye laT/ angesha nAyephaT/ kA la daN+Diya phaT/ kAlAr h+pha la phaT/ a ma ratra phaT/ yamadaN+Diya phaT/ yam ru
ya phaT/ ka pA lI yoNathAN/ a ti ka tits+tsha shA na pasaMnAyi phaT/ oDo ban d+hi ban d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAhA/ sems can gang su dag bdag lagadugapa dang gdug pa'i sems dang ldan//
rnams dang/ drag shul dang drag shul byasems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sdig pa dang sdig pa'isims dang ldan pa rnams dang/ 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
dwang/ snang ba dang sdang pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang sems can thams cad srung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar gyur
cig rta gnod spyin dang gdon gangasu dag khasasumar sa zaba rnams dang/ zas su gtong m za ba rnams dang/ zas su 'phreng ba za ba rnams dang/ zas su dri bar rnams dang/ zas su bdug
pa zab rnams dang/ zasasu me tog zab rnams dang/ zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang/ zas sule tog khab rnams dang/ zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang/ zas su rnag za ba rnams dang/
zas su phyi sa zab rnams dang/ zas su gcin 'byung rnams dang/ zas sumachalam 'thung po rnams dang/ zas su skyugs pa khra ba rnams dang/ zas su snabs khra ba rnams dang/ chos
su ngarasnabasaza ba rnams dang/ rdzas su mi gtsang ba za ba nams dang/ zas su sbyor khung nas 'bab pa 'byung ba rnams dang/ sdig pa'isoms dang ldan pa rnams dang/ gdug pa'i sa mas dang
ldan pa rnams dang/ drag shul gyi sems dpaldan pa rnams dang/ 'khrug pasems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ lha'i gdon rnams dang/ klu'i khe don
ma rnams dang/ lham yin gyi gdon rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi ba donanams dang/ srin po'i gdona rnams dang// 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang/ yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang/ sha za'i gdon
rnams dang/ kum b+haNa'i gdon rnams dang/ sulapo'i gdon rnams dang/ lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ smyo byed kyi gdonanams dang/ grib gdenagyi gdon
rnams dang/ brjod byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ gnon po'i gdon rnams dang/ mkha 'groma'i gdonanams dwang/ nam gru'i gdon rnams dang/ gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang/ bya ba don rnams
dang/ ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dung/ kun tu ba breng ba'i gdon rnams dang/ cho ram 'don pa'i gdon rnams las bdag srung bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur came//
ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ rims na gcig pa rnams rung/ nyin gnyis pa rnams dang/ nyin gsum r rnams dwang/ nyin bzhi pa rnams dang/ nyin bdun pa rnams dang/ rtag pa'i rims
rnams dang/ rims mi bzad pa rnams dang/ 'byung po'i rims rnams dang/ rlung las gyur rnams dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ bad kanalas gyur pa rnam sadang/ 'dus
pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ rims nad thams cad dngo/ klad pa nab bsal du gsol ( gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ ba ga 'chus pa dang/ mig nad dang/ snand dang/ kha nad dang/ mgul
nad dang/ snyingand dang/ logam lhagor na kho dang/ rnab na ba dang/ son ba dang/ snyingan pa dang/ gnadan ba dang/ rtsib logasan pa dang/ rgyab na ra dang/ lta
nad dung/ rgod pa na ba dang/ chuso na ba dang/ brlan ba dang/ rdzong na bdwang/ lag pa na ba dang nangasan pa dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nyi lag na ba bsal nug gol/ gdugs dkar mo
lca can rdo rdzogatsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'dise dpag tshadabcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung ro dang/ ro langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gnod spyin dang/ srin po dang/ rims nad
dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yan pa dang/ 'brum bu phramo dang/ mchinapar rdol kha dang/ mdzodang/ phol mige dang/ bas bldags dang me dbal dang/ g.yan pa dang/ lhog pa dang/ lud pa
lu ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ mi dran pa dang/ dbyi leg dug dang dug sbyar mdang pyad dung/ bdud dang/ 'ching ba dang/ dgra dung/ dgon pa dang/ dus ma yaner ra'achi ba dang/
sbudabu khyi bu ka dang/ sbal tAkadwang/ sdebeg pa dang/ sbrul dang/ srimong dang stag dang/ dom dang/ drod dang/ g.yag rgod dang/ musrin lasogs pa'i srog chags rnams bsal du
gsol/ dedag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan thams cad kyirig sngags bcing bar bya'o// tad+yathA/ oM a na le a na le/ khasam/

khasam/ bar bor/ so ma so me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+tenAn+te/ yi 'a de pa 'a de/ sIrir/ de ba badzra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni de dzra pA Ni phaT/ otshu nAhit+taMphaT swAhA/ o badzrapA Ni ban+d+haban+d+ha badzra pA sha namam

sa rub+hang g+hInAm kaM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ khrab 'i snying po'o// sus de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags
kyi rgyal mo 'di gro ga'am/ rasasam/ sha shun labris ta lus sam/ mgul du thogs sam/ klog par byed na de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mi dang chusamatshugs/ dbug
dug bsami tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mtshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dusamayin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ ]gdon thamasacad dngo/ bgegs dang/ logo drin thams

cad kyang dga'i bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'iribs bye ba khrag khrig bad+mastong phrag brgyad du rtsa bzhi rnams dang/ grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu mthun par srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ spyod

parabyed do// de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar yapa'i gyur ro// bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyadatsacu bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs phonya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi'ang rtag par phyi bzhin
yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// nam du'ang yi dgas dang/ shaza dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po nyid du ma 'gyur ro// mdebul por ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
'a/ @#// grangs med dang bag tu med pa ga klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

bar 'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ grwadapar mdzad tsange/ de dag gakhrugs su byon pa dang dgyes par yapagyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i
ts+tsa gdugs dkar mohan zhes pya ba phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyalamada'achang tshangs par m spyodara'ang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur// zub par m byas pa'i ng khrub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi
gtsang de'ang gtsang bar 'gyur ro// smyung bamakhyas pa'i ng sbyang ba byas par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pal byas pa'i ng khyadabar 'gyurar// ston gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma'usapa byed par 'gyur ro//
rigasakyi bu bam rigs bu mo bu 'dod pa'i ng la las de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can phyir bzlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ngam klog na bu
'dod pa des du rnyed de tshe dang/ bsod nams dang/ stobs kyang n nga tured do// 'di nas ga'i phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mnad dang/ phyugs nadadang/
