mas kyi nad dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba
'a gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog par ba sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtsom la btags tarim gror byas tamachod pa chen po khyas la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo kham/ grong dam/ grong
khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongasasam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// 'phags pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa phyirebablog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di btsugasan/ btsugs ma
thag tu g.yul zhu bar byas par 'gyurar// yamasakyi nadadang/ 'tsho ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ nur 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ pha rolagyi dmag tshogs thamasacad zhi bar 'gyur ro//
r+ya b+ha/ o oban d+ha ban d+hu/ ma ma rak+Sha rakAsAhA/ mosarba tathA ga tor an le a wa lokit+tatsuN te dzor kaM/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ka d+ha ka/ da ra dar/ ba darab der/ ts+tshin dats+tshen du//
b+hinar b+hind/ hUM hUMphaT phaT swAhA/ osarba tathA ga tot+taM' shul sAhA/ tad+ya thA/ o an lea na le/ khas ma bsam/ der bar/ so ma somi/ sarba bud+d+hu a d+hin achud+d+he sarba
tab+ha ga toSha si tA tapa ta hUM phaT huM ma ma shun hUM swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang/ klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang/ klu'i rgyal ro nag po chen po rnams dus dus su ra'abebs so// dus dus
susbyin bsdu ba dang/ dus dus su 'khrug gi sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro// nyobar 'tsho ba thams cad lasangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas lan gsum bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dang/ lta dang/ mi dang/ lcam yin dang/ driza' bcas pa'i 'jigarten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par ra stod do//
cis 'phags pa de bshan gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugasAdakar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ra chen mo phyir bzlog pa mchog tugyung pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
paN+Di pa ra hi ta b+ha dra dang/ lo tsab gzu dga'ardor gyiso kha che'i bdud rtsi 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag khang gi dpa ribel gtugs nas gtan la phab pa'o//
rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga takhA si tuta pa a pa ra dzi ta nAm sgyuraNi/ bodaskad du/ 'phags pa de nga 'in gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung pa'i gdugs dkar mo cun pa zhan
bsam grub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal la// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos
la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thosakyi dge 'dunadang bcas pa rnam 'phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams
la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rtsanayang dag par song ba rnams
0 la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grubar rnams la phyag
'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub ba zlog pa'i bdag por lcan tsamig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag

chen po lngas phyag byas pal phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na ' gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag rtsas ra'aphyag 'tshal lo// bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshalalo// nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// glang po'i khe dung la phyag 'tshal
la// gzhonanu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde
mtshonacha'i rgyalapo laphyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od dapag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das derazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman
gyi bla baiDUrtsa'i da kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sala'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu
[2/ ]rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol ba yang dag nga ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyazub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinaMgshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshala'// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po
la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de ba gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ba zhin ga shegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyanargyas pa ut+pa la bsung gi tog gal polaphyag 'tshalal// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyisamathub ma zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog mdas 'khyung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par
'anab las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/ snang ba dang/ rmi la mngon pa dang/ ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ ga ngon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par khyad pa/ rgya skar
tshikurtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa// gza'a chen ngo brgyad 'jigapar khyadang/ dgathams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang/ stabab dang/ rmi lam nganapa thams cad 'jig par byarapa/ dug dang/
mtshon dang/ mdang/ mulas sgrol ba ste// gzhan gyisam thub drag shul mo// gtum pa chadamo stobs chen no// 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar
ba 'phrengab gosatrakAram// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// tshol ba'i rdo rje 'phrang zhes grags// pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis ma thub 'phreng ba can// jordzomakhar rnams
'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma// gzugs ni gzi brjid+de chen mo can// 'phags ma sgro'am stobs chen mo// rordzalu gu rgyud gzhan dang// rdo rdzo gzhon nur go/sa'adzinam//
lag na rdo rje rig gser 'phreng// le brgan rtsi dang rinanam// snang mdzad rdo rjegatsug tor grags// rnam rar bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang// gsor bod lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rnatshoskyos dang dkar ma
dang// pad+ma'i spyanadang zla 'od dang// phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du gsol// srung ba mdzad du gsol// o ra 'bag Na pra shA ya/ sarba ta thA ga to si tA ta pa tre hU~M

d+haM dzam+b+hanakarI hU~M// stam+b+hanaka shud+d+haM/ mahAdIn+d+he saMb+hakA Nakarishud+d+haM/ pa rab d+d+he saMb+hak+Sha NakorIhU~MhU~M/ sa dut+tAnA sti b+hanaka rA sUhU~M/ sarba pak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra sU NIya d+hIs na kari hU~M hU~M/ tsa tur ni
naM gra has has NaM tshosan karihU~MhU~M/ ah+pha pisha tInIn kA t+taM NaM pra sA dan ka ra hU~M/ at+tAnaM ma hAkra hANib ng+hi sa na ka ra hU~M rdu rak+tarakAnaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gtsug tar nas byung ba'i gdugasaM dkar mo bar rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlogam chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbustong mnga' ba chemo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stongamanga' ba che ra ra
mi phyed 'bar ba'i mchonArtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mosas gsum gyi dkyil 'khor lamanga' mdzad pas kun nas bdag la srung du gsol// srung du gsol/ o rgyal pos 'jigs pa dang/ chos
rkun gyi 'jig pa dang/ me yi 'jig pa dang/ chuyis 'jigs pa dang/ dug gis 'jigs pa dang/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang/ mu ges 'jigs pa
dang/ dgra yis 'jigasapa dang/ rtsi 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang/ dusum yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang/ skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang/ rgyu'i
po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang/ lha yis 'jigs parung/ ku yis 'jigs pa dang/ glog gis 'jigs pa rang/ nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang/ gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs
tshulta pa dang/ lha'i gdon dang/ klu gdon dang/ lha ma yin gyi gdon dang/ rlung lha'i gdon dang/ namamakha lding ba bo don dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi'am ci'i gdon dang/ ltabartsi chen po'i
saza' gdonadang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ srin po'i gdonadang/ yi dgas kyi gdon rang/ sha za'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ srul po'i gdon dang/ lus srul po'i
gdon dang/ snyam byed kyi gdon dang/ brjod byed kyi donadang/ smyo byed kyi gdon dang/ gnon po'i gdon dang/ nam gru'i gdon dang/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ zas su mngal khra ba dang/ bras su khrag 'thung
ba dang/ zas su zhag za pa dang/ zas su sha za ba dang/ zasasu tshi'i zla ba dang/ zasau rkang za ba dang/ zas su btsas pa zopa dang/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ zas su skyugs pa za ba dang/ rdzas su mi
gtsang ba zab dang/ zas su gcin 'thung ba dang/ zasau parung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang/ ngas su lhagamaza ba dang/ zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang/ zas su snabs za ba dang/ zas su ngar
snaglu za pa dang/ zas rnag zab dang/ zas su gtor ma zab dang/ bras su'aphrangapo za ba dang/ zas su dri za ba dang/ zas su bdug pa zla ba dang/ sems 'aphrog pa dang/ zasasu me tog za ba dang/
bras su 'bras bu za ba dang/ zasasulo tog za ba dang/ sa su sbyin srog zab las bdag ngadalegs su gyur cig/ de dag thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i rig sngags gcad
do// phur bus gdang ngo// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo//
bya// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// namamakha ldang yang dag pa dang lhacig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur dus gdab bo// nag ngo
gi chen podang mamo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// rgyal bar byed pa dang/ sbrang rtsi'i
byed pa dang/ don kun grub las byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gad pa'o// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i ring/ sdugs gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// hUM gi ri ti dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/
tshogs kyi bdag po dpalhan cig mas khyosara'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dgesbyong gcar bus byas pa'i rab stags gcad do// yuradus gdab bo// dgra bcom ras byas pa'i rigs/
gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// 'dod chags dang bralakhas khyag pa'i rig stabs gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// gsangang pa'i bdag po lag na rdos byas pa'i yig sngags gcad de// phur dus
gdab go/ bcom ldan 'dasam de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can khyod la phyag 'tshalalo// bdag la srung du gsol/ o am si tAnA lAkadra bya spu Ta bi kasi tuta
pa te/ dzAl dzul/ khA da khA da/ da radar/ bi da rab dar/ ts+tshand Nin da/ nyin da d+hind/ hU~MyaTaDan hahadan/ cho Ta/ a mo g+ha phaT/ a pra ti ha tAphaT/ bar dra rA dzaT/ paNaM
gir ti yan/ a su rab pa ka Ta/ sarba de ba skyaphaT/ sarba nAge skyaphan/ sarba ma su red+d+ha phaT/ sarma maru 'a phaT/ sarma garu Dom+buphaN/ sarba gnad+harma yaT/ sarma kinan re paT/ sarba

mahor ga paT/ sarba ye kA ny+tsaphaT/ sarba rakAs skyaphaT/ sarbapra ta phaT/ saThapa shAtsits+tsa pha/ sarba b+hu ta b+huphaT/ sarba tuMg+haN+NaphaT/ sarba pu tan sbya/ phaT/ sarba ka ba pu tan b+baya 2

sa skan d+hi m+muphaT/ sarba kun mA de smyaphaT/ sa ts+tsha ye s+yAyaN/ sarba a pas re smyaphaT/ saN osar ka b+hu pa'o/ sarba dur lang gti / phaT/ sa cha duny+tsa kA tam+bu phan/ sawa dzAr skya yong/ satsAkaM

takarma Na ka khor do kir khab tu Datsatse pe ta ka du sha/rdatedur sgugata phaT/ saNatIwik+ku phaN/ sarma shAm Na phaT/ sazla biha d+hAr b+huphaT/ rje a ka ra/ ma rgyu kar/ sarba aN+NasAdAka blo brtse

tsAre smyaphaT/ tsa tur rgyu b+ha gin phaT/ badzra ko mA nI ye btse ra nI yesgyuphaT/ mahA pra t+yaM ga'i sgyu phan/ badzra shrIng kha lA ya pra t+yaM gar ra dzAya phaT/ ma hAkA lA yum tigi Na namaN+Di tiya phaT/ bany+tse gI
ye phaT/ brah+mayi phaT/ ag+ha yi yaT/ mahAkAlA yaM phaT/ kAl daNaDal phaT/ an+nayo phatra/ ro grwayi phaT/ komArA yi pa' bArAhIyaM phaT/ tsAmun+tiye paT/ rA tAyi phaT/ kA la rAtiyi phaT/
ya ma daN+Diya par/ kAlA' yi yaT/ a ti mukatits+tshasAn bA si nI yi yaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ drag shul gyi sems rang ldan pa rnams dang/
mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zasasumangal khri ba rnams dang/ brasasu khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su zhag zla ba rnams dang/ zasosu sha za ba rnams dang ]zasasu tshal
ba rnams rung/ zas surkangaza ba rnams dang/ zasasu da6sa pa zapo rnams dang/ srog 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zasasu skyugs pa za ba rnams dang/ zasasu migatsang ba za ba rnams dang/ zas
su gcin 'azung ba rnams dang/ zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang/ bras su lhagam za rnams dang/ zasasu mtshol ma 'thung ba rnams dang/ zasau skabs zab rnams dang/ zas su
ra snangs khra lo rnams dang/ zasasu rnag za rnams dang/zos su ba/tor ma za ba rnams dang/ zosau 'phreng ba ba ba rnams dang/ zasasu dri za ba rnams dang/ zasasu bdug pa za ba rnams dang/ sams
sgyu phrog pa rnams dang/ zasasum tog zab rnams dang/ zasasu'abras bu zla ba rnams dang/ brasan letog khra ba rnams dang/ zas su sbyin sreg za rnams dang/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/
sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ drag shul gyi soms dbaldan pa rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang/ srin po'i gdon rnams dang/ yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang sha za'i gdon
rnams dang/ khyung po'i gdon rnams dang/ grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang/ srul po'i gdon rnams dang/ lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang/ skam byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ smyo byed kyi gdon
0 ] rnams nang/ grib gnon gyi gdon rnams rang/ brjod khyed kyi gdonanams dang/ gnon log don rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i bag/don rnams dang/ nam gru'i gdon rnams dang/ ga shin rje'i don rnamag/
dang/ bya'i gdon rnams dang/ mamo dga' khar byed ra'i gdon rnams dang/ kun lubazang da gdon rnams dang/ cho ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang/ las nyin gcig pa rnams dang/ nyin gnyis pa/
rnams dang/ lasum pa rnams dang/ nyin bzhi pa rnams dang/ nyin bdun pa rnams dang/ rtag pa mas rnams dang/ rims mi bzad pa rnams dang/ rims ldang dub pa rnams rang/ 'byung
po'o masa rnams dang/ rlung las gyur pa rnams dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ bad kan lasagyural rnams dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang/ rims nad thams bod dang/
klad pa na pa bsal du gsol gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ migand dang/ snyand dang/ kha nad dang/ mgul nad dang/ snying nad dang lkog ma'i lhagoran ba dang/ rna
pan kha dang/ so ra dang/ snying nab dang/ klad pa 'kha dang/ ska na bdwang/ rtsibs logs na ba dang/ rgyaban ba dang/ ston pa dang/ rked pa na ba dang/ chuson ba dang/ bar na ba dang/ rdzongar
nang dang/ lag pa na kha dang/ rkang pa na ba dang/ yan lag na ba dang/ nyibal gan babasaladu gsol/ gdugs dkar mo can rdordzogatsug tor phyir zlogam chen m 'das dpag tshod bcu gnyis
00 ga/ kyin tshun chad du 'byung po dang/ langs dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rims dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yan ba dang/ 'thum bu phra mo dang/ mdzodang/ phol mi'i
dang/ bas bldags dang/ mdaba' dang/ g.yan pa dang/ lhog pa dang/ skam pa dang/ sgrag ra dang/ dpag dug dang/ dug sgyuram dang/ rgyud stoms dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ mings
dang/ dbra dang/ gnod pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'ab dang/ sbrangabu kyi bukadang tilA tAka rang/ sdig pa dang/ sgrul dang/ sra mo dang/ song ba dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ byed dang/
chusrinadang/ bung ba lta bu s gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dgathams cad kyi rig sngar gsar ri bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/
oM a na le anale/ bi Ta dang kha de/ bair bar/ badza?d+hur bat+ta paMrgyun/ badzrapA Ni dza hU~MhU~Mr ba phaT swAhA/ hUM ru ban d+haraTatshamarakarakAsAhA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor/
samyung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlag ma 'di gru ga'am/ ras sa ma/ shing shun la bris lugasam mgul la thegasan/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/
bska mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ mayis mi tshugs/ chu yis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyarams mi tshugasaM/ byadatsas mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus khyed rar ma gyur
00/ ro// gdon thams cad dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs lu ba khral khrib ka 'bum phralo brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la srung ba
dang/ skyab pa dang/ sbad par byed// de rnams kyi yid du 'o nga ba dang dga' bar gyur ro// bskal pachen po brgyad khri bzhi stod de tshorabs dran par 'gyur ro// ma du+od gnod sbyin rung/ yi dgas
dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// ma dbul po ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs mang dupa tumadapa ga pu'i krung ga khyim snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung
po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi chung ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di 'changan tshangs pa ma spyod pa'i ng tshangs
par skyod par gyur ro// thub par mkhyas pa'i ng chub par byas par 'gyur ro// ma gtsang ba'i nga gtsang bar 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnasam byas pa'i ng bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro//
sbyang ba ma byas pa'i ng sbyangs byas par 'gyurar// mtshams med pa ltacas pa bsdig pa khyad par gyurano// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa 'dam lus pa byang bar 'gyurar// bud med du 'dod pa gang la
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nasakhyung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thubam chen mo 'di 'chang na du 'dod pa des bu rnyed/ tshe dang/ bsod nams dang/ stobs rnams
kho rab turudasara'agyur ro// 'danas shibs nas kyang 'jig rgyun gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// min da dung/ phyugs nad dang/ gnag nud dang/ yams
kyind dang/ 'tsho batung/ nadabago kha dang/ gnodapa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong bzams cad l/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ogatsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar
mo can gzhan gyis mthubam phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di la tshanagyi rtsomol btar/sa ram gro tshar casatamachod pa chen po khyos la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am grongs/ grong khyer ram/
grong rdal lam/ ljongasasam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gajugs so// gzhan gyis mi thubam phyir zlog mchodamo 'di rim gro chor byas ted tshugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad
dang/ 'tshub dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ gnodapa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ongakha rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur ro// tad+yathA/ mo tsa ban d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rakA sAhA//
o tshu g+ho khanad+ma ban d+ha badzram ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzrapA NihUM phaTasAhA/ os chata thag to 'a anaa ba'agatamun+tanati dzor shi/ mo shu la tshul/ h+phaka d+ha ka/ dar da ra/ bod kyi du
ra/ smin daN+Din da/ nyin dab+hin da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sAkA/ mo sa rba ta thA ga toT+ThitwA hUM phaT swahA/ tad+yathA/mo an le a na le khas mkhasamo/ bo 'khor/ som somo/

sarba bud+d+ha a d+haT+Thinaa d+himitaM/ sarma tagag toT+Thi' si tA ta pa tu hU~M phaT/ shum ma hU~MnasAgA/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o// klu'i rgyalapo rnams kyis kyang dus rusasu char 'bangs so//
'phapa/sal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nasaMkhyung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyisazhi rtsub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga to ut+ti'as tA ta pa tre nam a pa ra dzi ta s myuraNi/ bdaskad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug to gnas akhyung pa'i kharugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi
thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'disadabadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha'i gnas nachos 'khongs
lhu'i byedunas ni/ dag slong ba dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' dun dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs ci+ig tu bzhugs s// de'i rmobcom ldan 'das
gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma khag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas
gsang sngags kyi chog 'a di dal khyung ngo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge/
byag/ 'dun la phyag 'tshalal// yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyanathos kyi dge 'dun dang bcasar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigartenan dgra
bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalalo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnamasulaphyar ga 'tshal lo// phyirama'o dba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten
lcan yang dag pa rasong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal la// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal la// lha'i dregrong dmod pa 'dor ba dpaphan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ge
sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshalal// rmongasapal phyag 'tshol la// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka'akhrugalas bzlog pa'i bdag po dang snyan cig
pa la phyag 'tshala'i// legs ldan sred mad kyi bu phyag rgya chen po ltas phyag rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legasaldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod nags
par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyagabyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ra'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'i gdung 'phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo//
nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal// glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshalal/ klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang 'khastan pa'i sdu mtshon cha'i rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od dapag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das dang zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sargyas mag khrugs da' phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
dkazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyan gyi bla de ma'i bod kyirgyal po 'phyag 'tshalal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal pom tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag
'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin che tog gi rgyal rol phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
padagrabcom pa yang dgapar gsalarardzogasar 'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshalal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyanargyas pa zhu 'a 'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag
[s// ]@#// 'tshalalo// de rnams 'a phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom 3na 'das de bzhin gshegs la'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkam can gzhan gyisamathub ma phyir zlogs chen mo
ba 'dis 'khyung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gacod pa/ gzhan gyirig sngags gcodapa/ dus ma yin par 'am de las zlog pa/ semahanabacings pa thamasacad 'abrelab sna ngab dang/ rmi
laman pa dang/ ltas pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa// gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa// dgra
thams cad zlog ma/ ma rungasapa dang/ sdang ba dang/ rmilam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa// dus dang/ mtshon dang/ me dang/ mulas sgrol bste/ gzhan gyis mkhrubadrag shul
che// gtum pa chen m stongs chen mo// 'bar gachanam gzi brjidem// dkaram chen mo stangs chen mo// 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma smrol ma khro gnyer can//
rgyal ra'i rdo 'phreng zhes grags// pad+ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rje'i mtshan// gzhan gyis ma rdzong 'phreng ba can// rdo rje mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo// zhi de lha rnams kyis mchod
tsha pa// gzugs ni gzabadz+dzad chen mo can// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang// dordzo gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin m// gan rdo rje rige gser
'phreng// le brgan rtsi dang rin chen m/ snang mdzad rdorje'i gtsug tor grags// rnamapar bskyang sama'i rdedung// gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga'am// rdo rje'i sgros dang dkar mo dang//
pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang// phyagargya'atshogs dedag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du gsor srung du gsol// o pa'i gan pra shas ya/ sarba tathA ga taT+Thi'i satA tar tehU~MhU~M/ dzam b+hanakarI

hU~MhU~M/ snum blun k+kArIhU~MhU~M/ ma hArAN+Di sam b+hakA Taka rI hU~MhU~M/ pa ra bcu sam b+hak+kaNakar hU~M/ sa ru wAnaM stam thun ki ra b+hud+d+haM/ sa rba yakAr kAs gra sAts+tshangodod+his nakari shud+d+haM//

tsatur tInAn gra has hasAts+tshabi d+hun san karIts+tsaMhU~M/ at+tA ritInAn/ na kAtahAts+tshamadra sAtan karishudaM/ ab+hA nIm hAgratA NaMbarnyanas niaM ka rIshud+d+haMrakAn+taM/ srung du gso la/ bcomo ldan
'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog ma chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba nam/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ smyan bye ba brgya
phragang ma' ngachen mo/ mi phyeda'angar ba'i mtshon rtags can/ rdorjeyasapachen mo sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa chen mo kun nas bdag 'asrungadu gsol srung du gsol/
o rgyal pos 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang/ ma yis 'jigs pa dang/ chu yis 'jigs pa dang/ dugags 'jigs pa dang/ mchon gyis 'jigs pa dang
yarol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang/ mu ges 'jigs pa dang/ dgra yis 'jigs pa dang/ nad kyag 'jigasapa dang/ lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang/
dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang/ skuramada' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang/ lhayis 'jigs pa dang/
klu yis 'jigs pa dang/ glog gis 'jigs pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gis 'jigasal dang/ gcan gachan khro bos 'jigs pa dang/ lha'i gdon dang/ klu gdon dwang/ lha
ma yin gyi gdon dang/ rlung lhab gdon dung/ nam mkha'alding gi gadrinadang/ pIwa'i gdonAdang/ mi 'am cig la don dung/ lto 'phye chen po'o ga don dang/ gnadasmyon gyi gdon dang/
sanapo gdonadang/ yadegs kyi gdonudang/ mkha' 'gro ma shigadan dung/ shaza'i gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon dang/ grul bum gdon dang/ srul po'i gdon dang
lus srul po'i gden dang/ skemakhyed kyi gdon dang/ brjod byed kyi gdon dang// smyo byed kyi gdon dang/ grib gnon gyi ba don dang/ gnyen po'i gdon dang/ de dag las kyang
tsha bdag bdale gsasu gyur cig/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba dang/ sauzhag rwa ra dang/ zas su sha za ba dang/ zasasutshil
[sl]za ba dang/ zasasu rkangaza ba dang/ zas su btsan po khro dang/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ zanasu skyugs khra bo dang/ zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang/ zasasu gcin 'thung ba dang/
zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang/ zas sulhag ma za ba dang/ zasasumachil mazab dang/ brasasu snabs khra ba dang/ zas su dar snabs bra ba dang/ zas su rnag za ba
dang/ zas sug ram zla ba dang/ zas 'phrangabu bra ba dang/ zas su dri za ba dang// brag subadug pa za ba dang/ sems 'phrog pa dang/ zasasum tog za ba dang/ zas su 'bras bu
za btung/ zas su lo tog za ba dang/ zasasu spyi srub za ba las bdag bde legs su gyuracig dodag thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i 'ge sngags gcad do// phur bus
garab te// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mkha' 'gro dwangamakha'agromasakhyas pa'i rig sngags gcud do// phur bus gdab bo// phyugs
bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// yur busagadab lo// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad d// yur bus gdab bo// nam mkha' ldang yang dag pa dang/
lhan cig ngas byas pa'i rig stags gcad d// phur bus gdab bo// nag po chen po dngam mo'i tshogs kyisabyas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// mi'i byed pa
pa nyis brgya/can gyisabyas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// rgyal bar byed pa dad/ sbyang ra byed pa dang/ don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad
do// phuradus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad de// phur bus gdab bo// hU~Mgar dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan
cig pasabyas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phurabus gdab bo// dag sbyong ba/ceradus khyas pa rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dgra bcom pasakhyas pa'i rig sngags
gcad do// phur bus gdab lo// 'dod chags dang bral bsamyas pa rog sdug sa gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// gsang ba pa'i bdag rol pa zha rdo rjes byas pa'i ge snga ba/sa gcad
du/ phur bus gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ba dga'asrung du gsol sung du gso'i/ ma
sa na pAn prab+has/ bkasi tapa te/ gaul dzol/ khA da khA da/ dar dar/ bdar bdar/ ts+tshind ts+tshind/ band banan/ pU hUMphaT phaT swAhU~M/ hadapaT/
ho ho phaT/ a mo g+ho phaT/ apra ti ha taphaT/ bar pra dAkha/ ti gir tilan/ tshag su rab drakho ka phan/ sarbade phaT/ sarbanag skyaphaT/ sang+ga ma su ri b+huphaT/ sam/
rud de 23/ sarba gdum+b+hadzar/ sarbaganad+mar khe pha/ sam+mana'i smuphan/ sarba mahor ge pa saya ts+tshayaT/ sarba kA sa phan/ sarba pra ta phaT/ saN+Da
pa shA tsit+yAya/ sarbad+hu phan/ sa suMg+haNaDelcaphaT/ sarbapu tanad+d+ha6pa sarba ka Da ru tan smyapha9/ sarbasan tam+b+hawapaT/ sarba unanA desbyaphaT/ sarbats+tshayi phaT/ sarba
amasnare d+d+haphaT/ sajo osar ke paT/ sarbaduralaMginy+tsapha'o/ saja dum+b+hakitaphaT sarbadzar zlu/ sawakr-itu karma kAkhor de b+huphaT/ kiraNare tu rgyatsongaT/ ts+tse ru
shakanu sha/ d+hup+paya9/ dur b+huka ta rgyuwa/ sapa tha'i h+phatsaphaT/ sarbagrom Ne d+hup+papaT/ sarba ra d+hare pa'o/ dzaakar/ ma rlu gar sgyuT+Thag/ sarba am sA d+ha ka ts+tso
bcu tsa Thapas de tsatur b+hagi sgyuphan/ sarba komArAyasbyab+haphaT/ btseradz+nyAyiny+tsaphaT/ mahApra t+yaM ga'i phaT/ badzragrong lA yu/ pra tsig ra ru dzAyaphaN/ ma hAkalAyam
drig Nanamasgra tAya phaT/ pany+tsayapar/ brah+maya phaT/ man+d+ri yapaT/ ma hA kAliya phaT/ kA'adaN yi phaT/ in d+hiyi paT/ radi ni ya/ ko ri ya phaT/
dA ra hIya phaT/ tsa muN+Di yi ra/ rAtiya phaT/ kAl rA tiya pa'o/ a ma daN+Dis phaT/ kAlA 'am pha9/ a ti ka tits+tsha yagan bAsi nA yi phan/ sems can gangs
dag bdag la sdang ba'isoms dang ldan pa rnams dang/ drag shul gyi rims dang ldan pa rnam sadang/ gzitsan 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zasasumadangs za ba rnams
ba dang zasasum la za ba rnams dang/ zasasu khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zasasuzhag zab rnams dang/ zasasugakhra ba rnams dang/ zasasutshe'i zab rnams tang zas
su rkang thang rnams dang/ zasasu bcos parngab rnams dang/ sroga'aphrog pa rnams dang/ zasasu skyugs pa za ba rnams dang/ zas sum gtsang ba tsang rnams dang/ zas su
gzhi'athung ba rnams dang/ zas su stor lun gnas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang/ byas na lhag ma wapa rnams dang/ zasasumachilama'athung ba rnams dang/ zas su
lcangs khri ba rnams dang/ zas su ngarastsangs za ba rnams dang/ bsasu rnag zab rnams dang/ zasu gtor ma sbe nganams dang/ sasu 'phreng ba rnga ma rnams dang/ rjes
sud za ba rnams dang/ zas su bdug pa dza po rnams dang/ sems 'phrog pa rnams dang/ zas su me tog za ba rnams dang/ zas su 'bras khu khra ba rnams dang/ zas su
lo tog za pa rnams dang/ sa su sbyin sreg khra kha rnams dang/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ snang ra'isims dang ldan r mas dang/ trag shul gyi so mas dang de
[2 ]ldan pa rnams dang lha'i gdon rnams dang/ klu'i gdon rnamA dang/ lham yan gyi gdan rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding la khadan rnams dang/ dri za'i gdon rnams dang/
mi'am ci'ile don rnams dang/ lto'adzachon po'agadon rnams dang/ banod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang/ srin po gdon rnams dang/ yid bas kyi ba don rnams dang sha za'i gdon/
rnams dang/ 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang/ grul bum gyi gdona rnams dang/ srul po'i gdona rnams dang/ lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang/ skem byed kyagadon rnams dang/
smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang/ grib gnon gyi pa/don rnams dang/ brjedabyed kyi gdon rnams dang/ gnon po'i gdon rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang/ nam gru'i
gdon rnams dang/ gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang/ bya'i le don rnams dang/ mamo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang/ kun tu 'khreng ba'i gdon rnams dang/ tsher ma
'don pa 'i gdon rnams dang rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang/ nyin gnyis pa rnams dang/ nyin gsum pa rnams rang/ nyin bzhi pa rnams dang/ nyin bdun pa rnams
dang/ rtag pa'i rimasa rnams dang/ rimasami bzad r rnams dang/ rims ldang dub pa rnams dang/ 'byung po'i gdon rnams rang/ rlung las gyur pa rnams dang/ mkhris pa
@# lag rgyu ba rnams dang/ bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang/ 'dus pa lasagyur rnams dang/ rims nad thams cad dang/ bdar na ba bsa'i dug la/ gzhog
phyedanab dang/ 'chus pa dang/ miganadadang/ sna nad dang/ khand dang/ mguland dang/ snyinganadadang/ lkog ma'ilhagor ba dang/ rnaban dang/ so ba dang/ snying
nang dang/ klad pa na ba dang/ rtsig 'a bas na dang/ rgyabanab dang/ ston ba dang/ shadar ba dang/ chu son ba dang/ bamanab dang/ rjong na ba dang/ lag ngan pa dang/ rkang
panab dang/ yan lag na bdang/ nying lag nang dag bsal du gsol/ srung du gsol/ gdugs dkar mo can rdordzong gtsug tor nas byung ba phyir zlog ma chen mo 'dis dang bag chod bcu gnyis
@#na tshun chad du 'byung po dang/ rolangasadang/ ma la'i 'gro ma dang/ rims dang/ shub dang/ g.ya' ba dang/ 'brum bu phramo dang/ mdze dang/ lamig dang/ bas lags dang/
ma dpal dang/ g.yanaparang/ lcog pa dang/ sin pa dang/ skragang dang/ dbyig dug dang/ dug sbyar ma dang/ byad dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ mingasadang/ dgra dang/
cha/ gnod pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang/ sbrung du dum bu ka dang/ tul tadang/ sdig pa dang/ sbrul dang/ sre mong dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dom dang drod dang//
ngag dung/ chu srin dung/ bung ba lta bu s gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kya'i phyugs btsadu bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid btsa'i bar bko/ gzhan gyi rab sngags khatsang
par bgyi// gdon thams cad nga cing bar khya'o// tad+yathA/ rtsom na le a na le bzed ba 'de ]ba ra ba ra/ badzraNAraM/ ban rgyu ngan d+hani badzrapANi/u0f74laT/
hUM hUMphaT phaT swAhA/ hu tshu lan/ ban d+hu dza' phaT swAhA/ sus de bzhin ba/ shegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis ma thub na phyir zlog mchanamo'
grog 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te lus sam mgul dub tagasan/ dngosrid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mtshugs/ mtshon gyis ma tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus
mtshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mtshugs/ khyadakyisamatshugasago/ dus ma yin pa chung dusakhyedapal 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad
nang/ bgegs dang/ rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi yadedu'ong ba dang dga' khar 'gyur// rdordzarogasabye ba khrag khrag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de'asrung ba dang/
skyab pa dang/ sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dmag 'khar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri che zhastod du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// nam dus nga gnod sbyin dang
srin po dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// mi dbul por ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
mdu dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis ma thub ma
phyir zlogam chen mo 'di 'chad na tshangs pa 'am spyod pa'i ng tshapar spyod par 'gyur/thub par ma gyis pa'i ng chub par byas par bgyur/ mi gtsang ba nga gtsang bar 'gyur/ bsnyen gnas ma gyun rang
bsnyan ng nas byas par 'gyur/ smyung ngam byas pa 'ang sbyang ba byas par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lta byas pa'i sdig pa tshang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon kyi 'aA kyi ba ra'ang
ma lus pa zad par 'gyur ro// pyod med bu 'dod pa gongal la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma pa'i zlog mchen mo 'an 'chang
na/ bu 'dod pa des khu rnyed de/ tshe dang/ bsod nams dang// stobs kyang rab turd do/ 'di nas shi sha sa nang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//
mnad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ gnagand dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag
tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ra'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thubam phyir zlogamachanamo tshad rgyal mtshan gyi chu ma la btags
tarim gro cher byas te mchodwang chen po byas l/ grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs 'a grong khyer ram/ grong ngan/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa 'a gnas su
gzugs so// gzhan gyis mi thubam phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rim gro cher dus btsugs ma thag tu u'ang khams zhi bar 'gyur ro// yams kun du dung/ 'tsho ba dang/ gnod
parang/ 'khrug pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu 'bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ otsalan d+ha banod+ha/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ rak+Sha
rakA maM/ opUt+taM ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ rakarakAnaM/ badzrapA Ni hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga to smib a ba lo ki tamur d+ha tidzorA sha/
so dz+wa la dz+wa la/ rmaka d+ha ka/ dar dar/ ba der bdar/ nad ts+tshen da/ b+hinadad+hand/ hUM hUMphaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tatsArahUMphaT phaT snasA/ tad+yathA
oM a na le ana'/ kha sa me kha sa ma/ ba rabe ra/ som somo/ sa rba bud+d+ha a d+hin a d+hiSh+Tha te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta'i si tA ta pa tre hUM yats+tshAn hA/ hrum ma hUM swAhA//
bya@#// sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byar du bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang dus dus su char 'dod s so// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chung sams dad 'a rnams dang/ lha dang/
mi dang/ lham yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'o jaganyen yirongasate/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa rab stod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas cung
ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thungam zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// ga tsug tor l+layul ma chung ba ba'i ru N+Di ta ma hAdzAnas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ sa mnamu ba pra deshar k+Sha bi ma la'adra b+ha sas tha ta thA ga ta hrid yas maya pa'i ka tanam d+hAraN/ bod/da du/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa 'a 'od

k+Sha rjer gtsug tor drin mad par snang ba de nga zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo//
ranas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang/ zhumarang la lha'i tshogs chen po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen
g+ha ngo la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs// 'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das mthol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar sbyin//
'khras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bas gsaras 'khor los sgyur ba'i darang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang/ rin po chesna 'dun gyi char 'bab pa dang/ lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen

ngo bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'il rol tu phyin pa dang/ ji ltar de bzhin gshog sata'i bstan pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga rung/ tshul khrims dang ldan r dang/ tshangs pa dang lhar skyes pa'i 'bras
bu rnam rar smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrim sakyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ ltar lha'i thugs 'dod pa dang/ bltas pas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe khyad bzang res legs par rgyan pa 'bras bu
rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ rga shi dang/ skye ba las grol ba dang/ rdzus te skyes nga 'isangs rgyas

kyizhing du 'gro ba 'dras bu rnam par smin pa ra 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ji ltar dar 'bara'agror ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i nying nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrag rum phrag du ma
'thob pa 'a 'bras khu rnamapar smin par 'gyur ba'i rasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ji ltar shes rab drang ye shes kyi tshog sachen po dang/ thosar rgya mtsho bsags pa dang/ mang du
thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi nga ro' tu ngun nga 'a// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis chos kyi sgo ba danyide nyin mtshan dusems shing rjes su

spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgomapar yang byed do/'/sbyadadadaka5'chal 'bya'aji/de nas lha'i 'khor danyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu sAng po drore med pa zhes bya ba g.yog

lha'i bu byu baphrag stong dang ldan// lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stongagasabaskor pa/ lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che snabadun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzang skyed mos
tshol sna tshogs dang/ lhab mi tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rje ngegs legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ lhab ru nor bu snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo mchog gam tog rgyas pa dang

ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la na chags// rinamo chosna'adun las rus pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang bzang gnang na 'dod pa'i yon tan la 'byor zhing
rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal gyis dregs tasnyoms shing nyalule// danas nam phyed tsam na'i budaganyid kyis legacade lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyangs te nyal bar gyur to// de
nas gnas mchog dan lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/ lha bunor bu'i snying po dri mar dang de la bskul ba/ kyi nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs
longs/ khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/ dga' ba' goms par byed cing chags par gnas sa zhig bye/ lha'o 'o ngos spyod dar ba/tumed pa la spyod pas ci
zhi khyu/ daste zhag khadunana' re'i nus khyed ra ru gyur lhalongs spyod dang bral zhi sdug bsngal tshor barman poskyong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnas gzhal mad khang dam pa
rin po chasna bdun las u0fb1sa pa ci dgos/ khyod kyi srogan yodam dkyus thabs myur du rnamasoms zhes/ daskad ces smras Mnas lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtsobo skur mda' gtong mi
snang bar gyurato// dAnas lha'i bu nor bu g+hong bo dri ma med pasag mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te mal nas kha sbub tus la lhung ngo// des lha'i bu mo tshogs de dag ni sgra bshige/
na rnams ni lhur/ gas ni bsnyal/ kha nas khrag dang gsher bgAnichadanas mchudang/ dkanadang/ mdel dang/ lcen bskamasal/ ts+tsa sngags stong phrag duman sme ste pu zhing
chongs 'dabasal/ kyaud kyi hud ces 'dzar cing/ lha'i rin po che'i snod nas smosachudang tsanadanatsa chuthang chos 'khor zhing/ kha cigamagul nas 'ju/ lag na'og pa nas 'du/
khacaganada' sgra la 'o byed/ kha cig ni ngang nas 'ju/ khacig mgo 'a'aju/ kha cig na ba rgyal te 'gying/ kha tsa gnas a'i snyi'achumed pa'i nyagazhin du 'gro ldog/ kha
cig lus la misatshig pa bzhin pu'agreldeg/ kha tshabon smisngags du ma 'don cing kyakhyed kyi budatse zer cing sho// danasalhashing nor du bsnying ro dri ma med pa de ra rgyal po sa sa
tadrar thob nas/ kha nas khrag skyagacade sdug bsngal chen po drag ro nyams su myong nas shugasarang du phyung ste lus 'dar zhing smyung gags kyis btab pa bzhin dugayo bar gyur
la sgra bskyungs pa'i snying gis rings pa rangs khar lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga 'ab der song ste phyin na/ lha'i dbang po brgyab kyi rkang pa la gtugs te/ rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces
smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po chab 'i bdag nyid can skyab tu gsol/ lha'i gnodasgyun gyi gtso bo saratshad 'a gdong gis sgrub thosazhas/ po dam/
dgungabadunan 'bum pa'i dus brgyad de zhes mami zhing sems cad myal bar bsams shig ces mchin/ lha dbang de thabs gang gis 'chir dag bdebang dumachirar mi 'gyur ngarung/ ngan
rgyu'agror mi bar mi 'gyurab ba'ajigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka'astsal du gsol/ lha'i dbang po 7zhes kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar pa'i tshigs bdag la skyab tugasol/ donas niy+tsa ba dbang
po brgyabyin gyis che ba de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas/ lha'i bu nodadub snying po dri ma med ra' 'dusnyedaces smras so/ ba ru ma 'jigs shig/ gang gis 'chi dag tham par 'gyur
tshang/ sems can ramyalaba'i sdug bsngal las tharapar 'gyur nga sangs rgyas khacom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ skye ba dang/ dpa dang na ba dang/ 'diradang/
mya ngan las brgal ba sla med pa'i sman pa yod// de'i khyod kyi skyabs dang/ chu lag 'japo dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ pha malta buratshul la yin// de nangan 'gro thams cad 'jig
par mdzad pa yin gyis/ 'drenar de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du ba dang// de nas de phyir sa lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po semedal dang/ lha'i
budang/ lhag du ma stong phrag dumadang lhan cig dga' ldan g la der dong nas/ bcom ldan das ga' ba der phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tel gsum
bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'bod do// danas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dmanapatshig khacom ldan 'das la 'di skadazhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skya'i
dunor bu'i snying po drin med ra 'dastsal gnod spyin gyi gtsobo ra ma da' gdong gis bskul to// dadagung bdun gyi gdugs 'anor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo dbang du gyur ro zhes
mamin/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ donas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha dar nga lo brgya byin gyi tshig gas gzhu 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'dzum
ba bstan ba des zha'anas kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung// 'od zer byung ba des stong gsum khastangachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'akhyas te/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des lha rang//
tshudang/ gnod sbyin ng bi nang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha'alding dang/ ri 'am deng lta 'phye chen po dang/ de bo dang/ 'byung po thams
cad gnasa rnams ngabar byas nas bskul ti/ bshukhanas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcos ldan 'dus kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so//
zhugs ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin pa 'di bdagagi sga'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de
nyon cig/ 'di gal te 'chiba'i dus byas par gyur na sdug bsngal shin tu bzad pa chen po drag po'i tshor ba sobs can dmyal nga'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur ro// thog ma na grong khyer chen po/

wArAts+tshasing si galamakhar gyi phyis khuga'adam rdzab kyi nang du sha h+pha ro bgamago can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sa khung den bshang gawa'o// sa khung de gnyid kyi nang nasrog chagaseb brgya stonga gnas te/de
dag dus gsum du phagabo de'i sha za zhing geng rus 'ba'azhig lus r pa byed d// de nas yang l kyidabangagadabang kun rdzogs bar 'gyur te bdun tshang bar 'gyur ro/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
gyur te/denas gonapar rus sbal gyi skye gnas su skyel/dematshut+tamipa' ngami grag cing shing thibakyang med deharIdagyis lus gdungs shidzajigal byetshon zhing bya regadag gis lus de gnas lus dum bur
'gyur ro// de nas da palas kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig pa 'gyur te/ le lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ wArANas de nyid du chu 'bab chu chen po'i nye

chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// de nus yang lasakyi dbang gis gang na chu med par re'aphas ngas lus tshan po de la sprul gdug pa dang/ byu reg dang sramo dang/ khyi dang/ gzig dang/ dred dang/ ce spyang lasogs
bsaza'o// srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang za'o// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te legasum de ltar 'gyurare// de nas yapa'i chi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun

dusu zhing 'dzam bu'agleng g sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ mdze can gyi khyim dang/ dbulapo'i khyim dang/ gzhung po'i khyim dang/ shan pa'i khyim dang/ rigs ngan gyi khyim dang/ gdol pa'i khyime dang/ dmus long ga/

khyim du skyes la drug cu'i boredu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal de dag myong nas/de nas shi 'phos pasems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar

'gyurayo// lha'i dbang po de ltabu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste brgyal ma'ilus thobana'ong dbul bdang/ yan lag mtshang ba dang/ shis rab chung ba dang/ yi ge mishes pa dang/ sangs
rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang bral ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa dang/ rtag tu skom pa dang bkres pa sems pa dang/ tshe thung zhing nad mngabar 'gyur ro//
denasalha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri me med pa'i gtam nathos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyasngar gan du 'jigs skrag ste/
yid mi dga' nas bdu skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ba dga' ra mams par gyuto// bdag la skyabasabgyid pa ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
dbang po 'chi bdag gi dpachen po'i gnyen po yod sa/ debasar ba med par m byed cing// des ma tsho mnyis na sems can de dag 'chare'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'apa'i dus byed par
@# 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cadwalasakha par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyisany+dzing pa thams cad byang char bgyur ro// tshor por gyurar// shin tu
ts+tsA yongasasu dgapa'i lus thob gyur// de nas lha'i dbang lokhan byanadang/ rgyalapo chon ro bzhi dang/ chos pa dad/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'bad
legs su lamosmrar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pas re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lhathams cad skya ba gsol/
bcom ldan 'dasaskye dgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das 'char 'i 'jigs pa 'bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba'i myu garas la
[j]mi bzad pa khasal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje gug tugagal/ bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten khams kyisems can rnams dbugs 'byung nugasol/
bcom ldan 'adas sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasana phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i shesakyi
phyag chen po gdang zhugasol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyon gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis ma gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnyen po ston pa chen mo bshad
du gsol/ bde bar gshegs l bshad du gsol/ de nas bcomuldan 'das de bzhin gshegs rashAkya thub pas de skad ces gsol pa thugs su chudanas/ rnam pa kun tu rnam par
bod zags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin da' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor gyi dbus nas byung nas/ des
phyogs kun tu snang bar byas tarin po che'i gdugs ltakhur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs na// lha'i dbang po brgya byin lo bdaskad ces
bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang/ dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes
bya ba gzungs sngags zung zhig/ phyag rgya 'di nig brgyung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi byamasnyad kyid bzhin pa shegs nyams kyis gsungs shade rjes su
par ba'o// gzus sngagasa mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang/ sgribab dang/ sems can dma' ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ ngan pa gro'o'i jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol
ba'agyur ro// sngonatshalas[”]sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te/ dparanan pas rtswa bsregs pa// rlung
gis thal ba myur du ded// de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma'// bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg/ dper na char pa 'bab 'gyur te// la 'bang chub bas pa yis// sa yi steng gi
sgyuphyagadar dang// nya'anyi'iThamasacad 'ded par bgyur// de bzhin gzungasa' mthong ba dang// thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa bdag/ dpar nam yosagaser sbyangs pa// sos
bcad rung bar g bar 'gyur// dngazhin bsabarjod byas tsam gyis// lus sbyong 'gyur te the tshom med// dper nam shar gyuran// 'od zer kun tu rab tu 'byung// de bzhin
tsa/ su zhigagazungs 'chang ba// de yi'us kyang rnam par mdzes// dper na skam po 'gro ldog/ chudang bral bas 'chisgor 'gro// la' sa slar yang chur bor bas// den gnas
shing yang me'o// de bzhin dran pa tsamagyis kyang// mi rnams chen zlog par byed// lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig/ namasam+ba tathA pa tAnaM/ om sAtsin+ta ma Ni dzI la/
hU~Mn/ sA ga ra gam+b+hi ra/ a kar ya karaa/ A yuN+Dapa yun+tar/ san+tamasar/ kANakA Na ki NaNi/ klu ku/ sam+batathA ga ta masAsamaye/ tiSh+Tha tiSha/ maha ba na/
sA ga re/ saMoMnAya aMsam+b+hasany+tsa/ b+hul ga ba sem+barapo bamale/ dza6dza5/ dza ya lan+d+he/ sprul sku Ta/ spom po sa/ bi ga ta A ba ra Ni/ b+ha ya taraNi/ hUMswAhU~M/ mr-i
skyud d+hare/ a b+hayaprade/ uSh+Tha' bya ba lo ki te/ samanamute/ saman bya ba le kite/ mahAm ya/ mawAlA sha d+ha re/ a mo g+hab ma le/ AkAr ya A kar ya/ A kAb+hA a A ka
ya/ sgyur sgyur/ saM b+ha ra saMsgyur/ in ya/ bishornyan/ b+hu li ta b+huraM/ mahAmu drubalokitaM/ dzaya dzaya/ sits+tshasid+d+hi/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ brnyan bo d+hani/ saM bod+ha na saM bod+han/
shornyan sho d+ha ni/ saM sho chu nasaM shornyan/ bshorlan bo sho d+ha na/ nyar hur/ mamasats+tshalApaM/ sarba thA ga ta ku' blungo/ sa ma ya tiShi/ prasAraM tum ma puN+NaM/ ban shun
paraM sam+b+ha kal ba khag re/ ma Ni ba shAn+d+he/ go rnyaya la male/ bkos tapad+me/ ka kha tsi ta dze/ kha ra ma tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sam+ba tatsagator ba de ko ti sAhA/ sa ta ba gto
gu d+hiSh+ThanA d+hiSh+ThatisAhA/ AyurdaN+NasAgA/ puN+Dadates hU/ puts+tsha swAhA/ pu rgyua ba 'aki'i sAhA/ tshwacudasAhA/ ya mdaN+NasAhA/ ya ma rU tenAhA/
saM ha ra NasAhA/ saM b+ha ra Nisu hA/ sarar NisAhA/ pra sa ra NisAhA/ ordzob ti// taidzing tisAhA/ dzaya ba tisAhA/ sarba ta thA ga tamurAd+hiShAn d+hiSh+ThatosAhA/ lce'i dbang
pogazungs sngags 'di lha'i bunarabusnying po dri ma med pa la rjesasu ston cig/ des n khyod kyis lha'i bu der yun ringapor phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// kun nasasgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer
gtsug ra dri ma med nga rasnang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang/ dam tshig la rnam par lta pa'i gzungs sngags 'di dros la mchod rtenAnang du gzhug go/ mchod rten gsar
pa 'amanyi pa'i ng rung ste de'i nang du gzhug/ sngos dang byug pa'i ng tshul la gzungasakyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig lanyin lan gsum mtshan lanagasum
dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te/ smos kyi dekya'akhab khar byas lanyam legs sum tog gas gtore// a ka ru drung du ru ka'i bdug pas bdugs te[）]
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya'o/ mchod rten brgyatshu brgyad btang pa la ngag snyags kyi snying po 'di bos mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas
dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na/ ga krud bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i khyim snyad kyi 'bazhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang 'ange bsrel mchod rten ra rab nang du bcug

par 'gyura'o// ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/ o namasdu ya d+hI kA naM/ sa tathA ga taphrodAya gats+tsha dzA la dzA la/ d+harma d+ha du bats+tshasaM b+har ma ma A

yusaMsho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha yam ma sadz+dzapA paM/ sarba tag ta sa man+to 'a ba ma le bi shud+d+hi hU~M[%]hU~M/ oM saMsaM dzamAhA/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'od zer gtsug tor dri mchod pa zhes bya ba dus gsum
gyid bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di lagusapar byas to/ mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las spyir nur tachorang por sbyong bar byed de// gal te gi'i ngos na'ang sprul gyi pags
pa brjes pa bzhin du'u sa bor nas skal bamanyam par 'jig rten gyi de lams bdad can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad nam yang ' che ba'i nying ba mthong
bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chadas satanadmyal ra dang/ dud 'gro dang/ gshami tshe'i 'jig rten dang/ ngan 'groro'agro zhingesgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chadasems can dmyal ba'am
du'ang grags par 'gyur na/ 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgyu rang lta smos te/ den gnas med do// de nas lha mang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di be com ldan 'das la ngadzung nas
lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po drim med pa dang lhan cig tunam langs pa dwangarang gnas su longs/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du chog go rim bzhin du mchod
rten las byas nas/ bzlas brjod kyi chol khad byas pa dang/ byas ma thub/ tulha'i nor dusnyid po dram med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nyebapazhinas sdig pa thams cad dang bral// lus rnam
sgyu par dag nas pagasapa mdog ni gsar gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ skadang me ba'amathon mthing lta bur gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad na mngon du mthong/ nam mkha'i dbyings nas de
bzhin gshegs pas legs so legasas zhes bya pa'i gsungan phyung ngo// de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral nga'i lus su myur pa mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzungs rab tu dga' nas/ a lal
sangs rgyas/ a la la raleg stag/ mal 'chos/ 'bras bu 'phrul du ston pa bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mtshog tuchab yid bzhin gyi nor bu de la phyag/
khatshal la phyag 'tshala' zhes ched dukharjod pa chedadu brjod do// des lha'i bu dor nas su song nas lha ma togadang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng po dang/ byug pa tshog
blas te/ lha'i gosadang/ spyod pa dang/ rgyanakyang slas nas g.yog 'khor thamasacad dang/ lha'abumo dang/ lha tshogs dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya ba sogs pa dang dag ldan

gyi gnas su rong ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyanapa phyi de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan/
sngar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po naro bzhi dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jugadang/ dbang phyug po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen rolaganu rdos/ bcom ldan 'das ga 'bang de legs/
su thalamo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to/ bcom ldano 'das sug las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po drin med pa la mi bslad cing kAn tu tshang 'a 'bras/
bucha maparasmin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legasaso// skyes bu dam pa dag legs par saso// de'i phyir nyon tshang/
dang bshad par bya'o// lag na rdo rjesngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyudan yangs pa re ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ don bram ze drim med pa zhes bya ba mal sar// byang da
gsalar/ yid gzhungs pa/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa// blta na sdugopa/ mngag bzang po rgyus// mchog dang ldan pa// dadapa dpaldan ng/ dag pa'i bsam pa can//
rigapa smra ba zhig gnas te/ darig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su se mas shing sgom la mngadubyed de/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do// de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim 'dang/
rangasnang zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor ni ba/ las spyod chab/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhared gnas/ khyim bdag dadadad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs la dad
do/ bram ze dan rum bad ga del yang dangosangarig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dasopa dang bcas pa sgrog kyang/ khyim bdag de narol dad pa'i nyi mas mi skyid par/ debadisnyam dusams te/
sa bram rje'adatumadu dum bur gtungs la zhu dwangs sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor ta'ar na sku gsakyis dgang ngo snyam m// de nas 'dasum du bsamam thag tu khyim bdag de la sha bkra
dngamadze'i nad kyis btang ngo// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mikorasdug bsngal gyi tshorab chen po myong sta/ shanas sems can dmyal ba chen pomanar med par skyes// derabs la/
pa'i tshad dusdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo// de nas shi 'phos nas nyadang/ phag dang/ rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo// n gnas 'chung dus byas nas sems
can dmyal ba thiganag tu skyes te/ der yang bskal pa'itshadadu sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo// de nas shi'aphos nas grong khyerang nyid du dmus long khyim duskyes to/ dmusalong
dugyuranas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang/ del rag slongasnying rjel gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par dus
[. ]ta zan no// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'beng bstags so// dmus long ngos gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshorabs dran par gyur nas bram ze deb ngad+danate/ rjes su se nas shing kyi
'am bodrad pa'i lasakhyagaso snyam nas ngomaM dAng khrol yod par gyur 'dir 'dus byas pa dang/ gzungs sdugs 'di'i methus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i nang duskyes te/ gzhal
mda' chen po nangan lha'ingu mo' tshogs kyis bskor cingalca'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus long du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/
khyod dogs shing the tshom zad bam yid ganyir sugyuranade ltar mibaltaste/ lha'i nor bu'i dpodri med pa 'danyide do// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bstan dar ru//
'gan rdo rdzolas des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'daste du myong// lha'i bu 'dis kyang chung kyisU nga ror mthar thug gi bar sakyi 'bras bu rdza ma 'di myong ngo// lag
nardo rjod de'i dusanatram ze drin med nga ra gyur de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsamamam yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi lta sku/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do// danus
langa' gzungs sngags 'di sgrogapa dag slong de 'jam dpal gzhonanuragyur pa 'dinyidad/ de tshodi'i dus na dag slong du gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor mang po dus sngon byung ba 'di
thosazhasarmad du byung bar gyur// dga' ba thob par gyur/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung nas/ a lal de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di ma
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// danas 'khor de las lha'i du khri nyis stongani spyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'khum ni
lca bud med kyi dbang lo dang bral nas skyes pa'i rab ng ro byung staphyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyisdodapona chen ngoka'agan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyichog ragosngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba phan yon che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'adas jiltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus nasems can rnams
laphanam dngabade rab 'agyur zhing/ gang gsasems can dmyal ba dung dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su grolangara mdzad pa'i choga bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsalapa/ lag rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i nganayon dang sgrub pa'i chog 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tsho ru ma'i dus narigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/
dgeslong ma sa/ dge bsnyaganam/ dge bsnyenams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran pa ranga'o// ring bsrelagyi snying po'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rangabasral gyi snying po

[s/]can gyi mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin po chab dganyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// des ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig phral ga 'khum gyi bye ma snyed kyi dadazhin gsheng/
pa rnams la dge kha 'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyurano// bsod nams chen ro dang ldan par gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs sukhyang bar 'gyur ro// soms
can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jigartakhying song rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// tshorang po'agyur ro// sbrul gyi pags pa brdzus pa bzhin
dulus khor nas skal khamanyam pa'i phyir 'jigartan gyi khams bad brtan du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyin chadamangal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang derardzus
taskye zhing pa las skyob 'gyur ro// tshorabs thams cad du rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad lalta 'dod par 'agyur ro// bsams pa thams
cad yid bzhinadu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal tachogakhyabar 'dod nas khrus byas lugs gsarapa bgos te/ spos kyidakyil 'khor gru bzhi pago/ snying po'i rig sngags
go ga' khri dang bya'o// mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i mya'o// rig sngags 'di'i mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya// mchod rtenakhazhin grwa bzhir gzhag go/ gcig ni
kyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// shing bu btsugs tabadanadamar po skyang ba'akhyago/ ma tog gsagato/ khum pa pang balngagazhag go/ grwa
bzhi po yor bzhinas du ru ka dang/ chu karudang/ tsananan dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o// yid bzhin nor bu nalo tsha'adi gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
khyab/ snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la paskor ba brgya rtsa brgyadabya'o// nadakyis btab pa dang/ gnodapa dang/ nadamaM bsache ba dang/ chozad r drung/ dus ma yin
para' ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal lo dang/ pha rolatshademagatshogs kyis rgyab pa dang/ bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khoralamangolar phyogs par gzhagago/ rma bya'i sgro lngas khyayaM par
bya mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ chog 'a dilanatsag khyasan bskal par bsags pa lasakyi sgrub pa dang bral nas sgrub pa med par 'gyur ro// nadathams cad
dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad tang/ sems nadmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gnardzo'i 'jig rtenagyi nasong thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las
yongs suTharapar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ sgrib pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ gdung pa thams cad tshorabs gcig nas
gcing/ da brgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// tshe 'dapa' nga phyir nur zhing tshorang bar 'gyur/ yun ring du nad kyis ngarongs
tashazad pa' lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lus shen yongs su rdzogs par dag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i ng yid bzhin du yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
phyin chad 'chi bdag gi sgor sdug bsngal m mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi pags ba brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal bamanyam pa'6pa'i dzag rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar
'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las skyekhapagyur ro// thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur ro// skyobathams cad du tshorabs dran par 'gyur ro//
'di'i bzlas brjod kyi tshig bzhin dbyin gsu'i bzhin du dus ba sumadulanaDi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i sdig pa'i sgrub pa dang nyamongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur
ra/ bzlus kharjod chog bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas zhu 'jibs lamed po'i lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// drim med pa rnam par dag pa lar ba'i gzi brjid ces khyab lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// mo rnam par dag pa thob par
(bgyur ro// gang+gA'i kludabye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi khyim snyad kyi de bzhin gshags pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par gyur ro// chorabs
gcig tu brgyudapa rnams su'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa de dang der 'gro ba'agyuro// sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor
nas skal bam nyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar gyur ro// 'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing ril ma lta bur kun tu shes so// tshos brgyud dam/ bcu bzhi'am/
btsolngal yid bzhin kyi nor bu rinapo che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na/ bzlas brjod
ts+tshA byas pa tsam gyis 'phrul du mnodan las sgra 'byung ste legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'phral du sdug pa'i sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ 'dod chags dang/
zhesna ngadang/ gti mug gi dri ma dang/ ser sti dang/ phrag dog dang bral bar gyur ro// lus dri med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud mad dam/
kya ma/ bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang snyib pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro// dud 'the'o skye gnas susong ba la smras na' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams
[4e cad las yongs su tharapar 'gyur ro// byab tshogs thams cad l smras nab dbyatshogs yongasasu grol bar 'gyur ro// than khyi dang/ rusasgra ladang/ sbrul dang/ nga la
dang/ sumo dang/ srog chags sna tshog salasmras na'ang thams cad yongasasu grol bar 'gyur// bye ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du garan/ gang gi
rus pal yog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba bdadung gang du skyes pa de dung yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar gyur ro// gang dag mtho ris su skyes pa dag gi lus la me tog gi char
ba bab par 'gyur// gcan gzan dang bya sna tshogs gang dag du khrodadar 'gro bde dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ril gtor nar dgas dang bya rgyu ba de dag
rlams cad bdeb gror 'khar 'gyur ro// kun nus sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 4na brgya stong bzlas brjod byas
nu/ gal te mtshams med pa ltakhyedal dag mnar medu dar lhung nas gdung bas bsregs palas 'phral du yongasau thar par 'gyur ro// lan 'bum bzlasabarjod byas na/ gal
semagul nas thag pa btags takhrid pa'i ng gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro// de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can
dmyal bathams cad kyang rnamasngar 'jig par 'gyur te tshomamadra do//myalagala'adapa'/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'ang dran bzhin dusams shing 'dug ge// lus bsam
gtan gyi lam bzhin nam sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa ra nIn dulus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba dag gi sdug bsngal
mi mthong bar 'gyura'o// 'bum brisatamachod rten gyi nang du bcugan/ 'dum tshon gnas mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nges
par 'phral duphyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye masnyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa bskyedatsangalung ngastan pa thob par 'gyurar// dengs mchodartan n po gcig gi nang dubcug ste shing bu bsgreng bcas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshags pa'i ring
bsrel gyi snying po 'bumakhyamachodarten zhes bya'o// gang dag de'akhya ba rnams byed paredag thams cad kyang phyi mildog par 'gyur// thun med pa mngadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
monapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skyo gnasasu gtogs pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang srog chags kyi pis sna tshogs gang dag dara'adong ba dedag kyang phyir
mi ldog par 'gyur// kha na grib mas yol/pana'angayos su grol bar gyuran/ bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'da' yon tan dang phan yonan brjod pa mi nus so//
denas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag rdorjod ng/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ dag ldan gyi gnas na gnasapa'i
lha'i bu de dag dang/ brgya byin lasogs pa sum cu tshog sum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po drom med pa dang/ dudag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
staphyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to//
ngom ldan 'das gzungs sgrugs mthu chen po 'dInayid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang thos par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig rtogs nas
sladama'i rtsomadama'i dusanayidwabazhinatsanor bu rin po che7da gzung bar bgyi 'og rgyas par bgyi// sems rgyun thams cad la bsgrug par bgyi'o// 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can
chen po de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing rtag turgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba bar bgyi'o// bu bzhin du yongs su bskyong bar bgyi'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bya// bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig// rig sngags kyi rgyal po yid bzhin gyin du rinapo che'adis khyed
lag tadad// 'phags kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dngazhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi snying po dang/ dmatshig la rnamar ralta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
blo rdzogasas//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi 'dang/ shI len+d+rab d+hidang/ zhu chen gyi la tsa ba ban d+hiyashes sdes bsgyur cing zhus togatanal lab pa//
@#// rgyug skud du/ satsaman an+nAm ta sid+d+hisU le nAm d+hAr Ni/ bodand du/ nasari khams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchodarten zhes/
bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'adzin laphyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad oMtshul dang/ 'dul ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha' la// phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la//
phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dgel// me'akhrugs pa dang 'od dpag med// spyan ras gzigs lab dpa phyag 'tshal// rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo// 'di/
skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo 'dzin ba chen po ri ba chen po sna lnga las grub pa// gzhi dmachod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i stongan/ rin po che/
chogs pa'i khang pa dang/ tshad med pa'i mchod rtenakhazhi dang/ rang bzhin gyi mchod rtena chen mo gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo dbyangs kyang mchodartenadugyur pa'i gnas na/ lag na
rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyanaras gzigs dang/ byams pa la sogs pas bcukhyadachub sems dpa' nyams dang/ rmongs pa dang/ bsubyin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi
lasogs pa la gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// nga nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor dang thugs ka'i dang 'a re'u la sogs pa rnams las 'od zer kha dog
rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye// stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing lang ba thams cad 'od zer
gyi snang ba chen pos tilatshigang bu bzhin dugapazhing khyab par mdzad pas/ mthaTayas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang Da 'onapa rnams kyis
sgradzes pa dang/ ding gapa rnams smras shes pa dang/ 'thongapo rnams dang/ zha bo rnams 'gro zhing yan lag rangs pa dang/ nadapa rnams nadadang bral ba dang/ dmyal ba rnams tsho phra
pa @#// nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar pa dang/ gzhan anga' gro bsems can rnams rim gyis dranupa redwapar byas nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyis
mchodartenachos7skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/ 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to// de nas lag na rdorjel
sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur sa/ bcom ldan 'das lam re dang/ rgyul mtshan dang/ 'phan dang/ gdugaso dang/ rnga yab dang/ dri'i bu dang/ dar dpyangs ba/
spos dang/ ma tapag dang/ 'phra ba dang/ byug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ bshos dang/ rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rjechen po dang ldan ms mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i chog rig pa chen mo bas laume ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ mchodarten byin gyis ngarlab pa la chog rig pa chen ma ba ma la u phyi'i gzungs 'di na rigs kyi bu 'am/ risogs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
'dzin ma/ changam/ bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyan par byed na/ d mtshams med pa lnga dang/ ma dge ba bcu dang/ sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad malus
parabyakhara'agyur ro// bim la ub+hi ka'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rtenakhyin gyisakharlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o// u0f00 khyad+d+hasarba tathA ga taphrod ma gan+d+he/ dzAlanyam zhugan+d+he/ saM haraN/
mA yusaMkod+mas/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga tas man+tau kha ba ma le TishAr sAhA/ rig pachanam 'a du gsungs mthag tu'ajig rtan gyi khams thams cad mchod narangang zhin du'agyur
ro rig pachen mo 'dagrog 'am/ rasasaMm/ shing shun la bris te rgyal mchan gyi rtsa mal btagasan/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang/
bkur ste byar 'os su 'gyur ba dang/ rigal chamo' dilus samamagul du thog na/ dalha dang/mi dang/lham yin lasogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar 'gyur ro//
bdag nyid ri ba bag kham/ la lam/ dgon pa'i m/ sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'achorig pa chen mobadape rjod na dengs phyogs thams cadumachod rten dang 'dra bar 'agyur ro///
mo khyad+d+ha sarba tadag ta phudwayakhacha dzAl b+ha d+hA tug/ saM ha ra Na/ A yusaMshortaya/ pA paMsarba ta ga tasaman+ta uta'i ma le shudazhu/ mawAb redzo ra saM par si/
d+harma d+hA tu gan+d+he/ b.lo sa ra a na laM sAhA/ zhes brjod na gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten kyi rang bzhin du gyur ro// bdag nyid chu Tam/ chu bo 'am/ mtsho'am/
ca/ rgya mtsholasogs pa gang la brgalakhana' ngarig pachanamo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyura'o// choste yargyu sarba tadag tu
khrod yagan+d+haM/ dzAl chuman+tA gany+nyo/ saMsaraNazhayusaM sho d+haya/ pAlaM sarba ta thA ga tasaman+ta bamal ur dashudab+be/ ma hA bir rdzor baiglings cha mad+hAtub bsar/ a mam ki
sAhA/ zhes brjod naru thamasacad kyang machod rten gyi rab zhin du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'ad btaban/ nam

mkha' thams cad kyang mchod nas rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// o si ya ts+tshA sarba ta thAkha gro da ya/ gan+d+he dzA la d+harma d+hA tu gang+gesaM ra Na AyubasaM shod+ma ya/ pA paM sarba ta thA ga tasaman+to/
bi ma la u'abashud d+he mahA bar chur gi pasid+harAn tu ba ba sa ra ga a laM yasAhA/ zhes brjod nam mkha'i khams thams cad machodartenagyi rang bzhin dkyur te/ phyag bya ba drang/
bskor ba bya ba dang/ mchodapa bya ba'igosasu 'gyur// bas 'a zhum+me'a'i gzungs 'dibazlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la'angamachodarten btab nanyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa
! thams cad dag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yangs dang/ pa dang/ rdodang/ 'jim pa dang/ 'di 'apa gang yang rung ba larig pa'i sngags bdas btab ste mchod rten btab na
rin po chasnatshogs kyimachod rten gyi rgyuba'agyur te/ o rat+tatipi tseb bsar sAhA/ zhes brjod nas pa'i lci ba la sogs pas byugasan thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur/
'gyur ro// rig pa chen ma'i sngags bad ma btab na/ gang zhig la ser dang/ dngul dang/ ba glal sogs pa rin po che sna bdun los mchod rten bzhengs sugaso' yang rdo dang/ gde/
dang/ khamar dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ dmi'adi nyidardzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dngagasang sngags byin gyis brlab na bzhugs pa'i phyir ro// rag ra chen
'das khyin gyis brlabs tabataban/ 'byung ba chen po gang la mchodarten btabakyang baskul pa dpag tu mad pa thams cad kyi skyob pa 'i dri ma dag nas/ khyim bdag kha rags shing/
la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir maldog pa'i sa thogolara'agyur ro// rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te rdodangashing leb lasogs pa' mchod rtenubatang na/ dgungonam bla bar bram
ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bculis sa'agud de/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob par 'gyur ro// rag pachen mo 'a nas khyenagyis brlabs tagaser dang/
dal dang/ brtu la sogs pa lamachod rten bstar na de gdonami za bar rgyal ragis gangasA la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'i sa thobangar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rig pa chen/
grwa/ mo'i sngags 'dis btaban mchod rten gcig bu rngub ba nga bye ba btab par 'gyur ro// rig pa chen mo bsam btang na bye bab tab kyang g cig dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
de tsam bzhen/ go mkhazhinano// rag pa chen o de'i sngags 'a da yin te/ tad+yathA/ sum+b+hosum+b+ha shAn+ta shAn+ti/ nir kule/ ashotedzo/sa bud+d+hA/ ang+giT+ThAn/ ad+hiT+ThitaM/
sgyu azhuidisAwA/'di'i chog ni 'di'on te/'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mchod rten gcig btub na bye ba ba tab par gyur// brgyabatab pa'i grangs dang pan yon
na'aphags pa nyan thos rigra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nusaso// stong btub pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par ma nus so/ khri
btab pa'i grangs dang yanayonanadabazhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mizhus so// 'dum btab pa'i tshangs dbabanayo nan phyogs bcu dus gsum kyi dang zhan ga shig
ba rnams kyis kyang brjod par nus so// de bsan mchod pa'irten lngaman chad gdab pa'i mchod pa 'tshog r byang na thogamar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi
'jim pa'i gnasasam mchod rtenagyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas der sa bdag byin sa ngarlab cings lal/nas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa/ mched
0 rten dang dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ oM badzrasu tra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid
rdorje'i skyed par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon dzatsam ran pa dang/ 'dzum pa'i sa khyon jitsom run pa thag gis sAgacad/ de bzhin du su bcad nas gzhi de nyid mchodirten
rgyu rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa ru 'dra bar 'gyur ro// danas sa de nyid la seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di dang par bu s+sa/ oM badzra
ki'i kI la ya sarba duny+tsa hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba 'dra'i na bdunabazlas te/ rdo rje phur bu dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhir gdab bo// de bzhin du btab nam dang mi ma yin pa las srungabar
'gyur ro// sngonakhyolasakyi rnam par smin pa na ma gtogs so// seng ldeng gi phur bu'amachod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgas la ma blangs kyi bar du ma dbyung bar gzhag go/ de
nas skyil dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dirjod par bya'o// oM a mr-i ta na ha na hU~M phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas tasa'i phyogs su gtor bso/ sa phyogs de nyid
kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par gyur ro/ deltar s ga zha dang zhan gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnasasukhyen gyis brlabs te ]bgegs kyi ra sam skyer
ngan pa las mtshams bcad de/ spos dang/ mi tog dang/ gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa lha dang/ gyurung/ lha ma yin
lasogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsos te// ba ma laub+hel gzungs 'di bklags nas phyogs pa'i ngashin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod nagyi 'jim pa'i
sa bskopa tsharig pa chema'i sngags 'di zlas to bgo bar bya'o// oM badzrakhan kha na hUMphaT/ ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga gyur par dmigs te bskos na de bzhin gsheg
pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// denusas gtsang ma khrangs pa de dag gnas ba ]tsang mgacig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho gan thu pa la bdud rtsis khra'i lab phyagargya rdo rje gsum 4 sa
nan to/ rigar chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab ste brdung// badzomud gar a ko ra ya hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs n nyon mongs pa dang bag
chags thams cad malus par khyabazhing bcom par gyur ro// des 'jim pa brje bzhi spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas gtugs te/ spos chu da'i nang du'ang chos nyid kyi 5
ga a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par legs te/ zlara'i dkyil 'khor kyi 'od zer chen ngo des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/ spos chunyid bdud rtsi Tarang gshAte
