du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM am tahU~MphaT/ ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te bun gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i
rgyund 'dra baba'agyur ro// denus 'jim pa brjod bsngags chen mo 'dabarjod par bya'o// oMbadzrapramartan ya hU~MphaT/ ces lan bdun brjod de/ 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de nas 'ajim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyisam khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni 'jim pa de nyadel bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rig pa chen
mo'i gzungs bdabarjod par bya'o// namorat+tatra yAya/ tad+ya thA/swAkesuke/ shAn+to/ shAn+ti dAn+taM/ nAn+te/ nir kule/ yashe yasho pa ti tadzo kur d+ha ra shud d+he/
sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hit+taM/ a nu mo hi tasAhA/ zhes bdaganyid kyis rig ra chon mo 'di lan bdun gsum nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlangs
nu'ajim pa nyid las ya shosakyid zer rnam pa lta phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur
ro/ 'od zer dadag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po chesnalnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan ng ra 'gyur ro//
de ltar yid kyis kyang dmag saso// dunas 'a ba 'a ba khyed pa'i chojig pa chen mo 'ad bdalar bya ste/ oMbadzra Amu 'gAhA/ zhes lan bdun ba zlas te run gyis/
brlabasan/ 'di ba nyidi'as yoshes kyi 'od zer gyi sman gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste/ 'gro bam po'i don byed r ra'agyur ro// 'od
zer gyi spun phung de dag slar 'ab baba'inang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid yishes rinapone'i rang bzhin shel gong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin duyid kyis kyang dmigasaso// donas
'ab 'bab nang du rim la uts+tshala'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas r 'am/ gro ga 'am/ rasasam/ shog bu 'am/ shing shun lasngags bris pa dwang/ de'i nang du rigs lngaso/
so'i snying pa/ oM hUM traM shrInA/ de rnams phrugs su sbyar tamu dra'i phyag rgyurabyas pa 'am/ yir bris pa 'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du stsalanade bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye
shas dpaldan par 'gyur ro// nang du rtsol ba rag sngags 'dakharjod par bya'o// cho 'phrogats+tshAsAhA/ zhes bya ba bsgrusan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes
bdenang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro// yid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas tshe rgya'i yor bu'i nang du yungasakar ram/ mar gyis bsu ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di rjod
par bya'o// oM a ra dze ba ra dzesAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis kharabs na de nyid thangs dung shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de
bzhin dus de kyis kyang dmigasaso// danasamachod rten 'dengs pa'i tshorig pa chen mo 'di rjod par bya'o// oM badzramudabang A ko Ta ya A ko ta ya hUM phaT ce dngas shing mchod
skyon btangan dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du gyur ro// den bzhi' u kha'i snying po gangs byung pas kyang machod rten pa ltar na dbyangs dang
ye shes gnyis su med pa ra 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten khyam kas par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rtan por bu'i nang nas dbyang ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la
dbyung ngo// oM d+harma d+hA tu a sAhA/ d+harmat+tA tu bogasnosAhA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te/ mchod rten phyung nathabs dang shes rab gnyis su mad pa 'grel ba lasamachod rten chos kyi
sku'abyamakyas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyibar du phun sumatshogs par dzad nga ra'agyur// de bzhin du ya du kyis kyang dmigs so/
denas mchod rtenasnodAnaMs phyung ba las 'khor la ga zugasad 'i rig pa chen mo'i snga ba sa 'ad brjod par bya'o// oM pram NayeswAhA/ zhes bany+dzasanas 'a boral pa shugs narin po che'i
gdugs dang/ rin po che'i gdung/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po tsho'i shar bu dang/ dar gyi lta ba lhu ba la sogs pa rnams kyis chan/ mya ngan/
las sa pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin duyid kyis kyang dmigs so// de nas machod nan bza' gsol ba'i
tsheg pa chen mo 'ad bzlas lagasol to// o rnyarmad+hAtu swa b+ha ba rishud d+harma swAhA/ zhes lan mang du bzlas tebatabanachos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur
ro// de nas mchod rten btab pa 'i dkyi 'khor mchod naltar ban dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brab r sho// de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/
stong ngam/ gang btab la de'i grangs dang mchod sbyin gyi shong tshad kyidakya'i 'khon gyi zi'u mig stobasgrigs bu brtsig pa nas bya// rnaleb bam/ shing la sogs pa las dkyil 'khor
gru bzhir bgyis// 'og gi grong seng ge 'i khri shom/ rin pa che'i khri'am/ pad+ma' khri gas lu byas l/ de'i steng du 'gom yang dwang spos chus chag chag batrab ste// dbus
dang phyogs bzhi'i mchodarten bzhugs pa'i sa kun tu gur kum dang tsan dan gyi chu zlum por bskusal/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khoma'ang
da mchod rten mar ba tar na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang ltar bri bar bya// de bzhin du mchedan+ten gyi grangs brgya 'am stong gang btab pa ba grangs kyi mchod na shong tshad kyi dkyil
'khor la'u mige ro Tedu ba 'i thog gis sa bcad par bya'o/ mchod na ga 'gar sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ru ra bri bar bya'o// de nas mchod/ nagyid kyis 'khor du bzhug
pa 'chorig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol/ oM su pra til sku re swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas mchodarten pa zhagan bdag dang gzhan gyi don phunasumatshogs
par spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa na/ drang po dbus su dgod de nus shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgo/ de nas nub tudaged/ de nas khyung
gakhar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// dgod ra 'tshorig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oMbadzrapunas ma yeswAhA/ zhes lan gsum du bzlasa'ado rjod ng pad+ma'i
gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas las gzhidang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'jing thum sa cad mchodartan gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigasaso// gzhan
yang machod rten ro re btabanas thal byud dkyil 'khor stong du bzhugs l/ spos dang ma tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/ mchod rten gyi kha dog
la sogs pa bskur nazhiba'i dkar do/ rgyas pa'i sarapo dang dbang dmar po/ srung ba ljang khur dmigs nabazashayang de bzhin dug sol la yadekyis kyang de bzhin
du dmigasaso// danas mchod rtan tsadakyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng duger dmar po gnas pa las rigs chen mo'i sngags 'dubarjod par bya ste/
phyogasarasAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlasangasade nyid[W]sa mo dpung chen po rab tu 'kha nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnamamar sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po chesngolas
grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so// danas dkyil 'khor le'u mo snga 'chu/ brgyabam/ stong ma/ gang bris pa'i dus rnams
su yag a dkar po gnas pa las rig pachema'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM a tsan+damaN+Dal hU~M phaT/ cog gras ji tsamaran par bats+tshas nam rtsod rten gyi gdan blar dkyil 'khor
rarar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigasaso// de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad du 'i tshul shar nub gang bder bltasal/ bdag nyid do'i 'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen
snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi'od dadu ba'aphro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gsab thamaMs cad ms
kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang/ sangs rgyas kyidakyil 'khor dung bcas pa'i srin bu bzhin d mthar 'khyamakyis raraka phran shing/ sems can gyi khams thams cad du phyin gyis brlabs
shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par gyur tu/ de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigasaso// de nas machod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la
dordzorubyang sama'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchodartan gyi skyidadu reg par byas la/ rig pa chen ma'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ obadzArA tu a d+hI tiT+ThAhU~M/ zhes bzlas byin gyis
brlabs pas rin po che sna bdunagyi gzhal med khang ginang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par
'gyuro// dobazhin du nyid kyis kyang dmigs so// de ltar du mchod rtenare re btab ste bzhag nas de la mchod pa 'i rnam pas mchodasani/ seng ge rgyal mchon dang/
'bras chanadang/ spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang/ 'dra zhing dgod pa dang/ blar dang/ 'phan dang/ gdugs dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar
ma dang/ gros dang/ mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams rnam par dag pa rig pa chen mo 'ad brjod par bya'o// o saza ru dzapuSh+Tha AnA/ zhes bzlas te byin kyis brlags
0 rgyug pa sa kun tu bzang po'imachod ra sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du'adebs par 'gyur/ dung zhi duld kyis
kyang dmigasaso// mchod rtenamachod pa rnam palnga pomAranIs mchodatsang yon du da ru chung dang/ 'phanal sogs pa'i blo dang/ gdugasakhu chung yang rung steraradabul lo//
doltar chog bzhin du btab lags n ]dgongs rgyud kyi ting nge'adzin gsal khar bya ba'i mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbusadang ltar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang/ rgyan dang/
malugs dang/ khor phunaum tshogs pa tshul bzhar du dgongs te dmigs par bya// yi shes ltalas grub pa'i mchod rten de'ang rangang zhan gyis rnam par dag cing gsal
ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su kha ma la u kha'i kha zungs kyi snying po dang/ rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bu rab kha dog gsar btsom bzhin du dang zhi'atshor ba gcig tu mgas la/
dwa dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer snyatshogs 'byam klas par rigs lta phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshags pa'i sku'i snyan tshaganamam ba'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyared/
kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyuranas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'ad mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus nas
de nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug dang thugs kar phog/ 'phrin las kyis sgrib pa 'asogs pa rnam par dag// sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dang por phyi nang
du sbyos chab dang drisna tshogs skyur pa'i gnas gsa'ato// ang+ga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i stod du dung phor bzhag la/ spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyid po'i dgyur
pa'i 'od zer gyi sa chu nyid lo shas kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du rgyun par dgongs shing dmigs mchod ra da dul ba'i bag pa chen po 'di'i rjod par bya'o/[” ]ga sarba te a rgyum pa
snyat+tA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du gdugs shing sgrung taphul pas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro// tshag tu'ang 'bags la thams cad mnyes pa ra
gyur capo ches kyang brjod do// de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i spyin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste/ ma shes kyi sku nang du 'dus shing phunasum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad rusur khar
dam gsaso// de nas pa ma la u la gzungs 'daklog cing lan tsamang du brjod par dus/ bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par btab par bya go/ chog 'di bzhin du rdzogos par
byar mi bde'ang rangag lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa mnyams par bya ste// mchod rten dang mchod pa 'i so khyad lasogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi
dkyings rnam par dag par dgongs te/ mchod rten btab na'ang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste 'gal ba 'du do/ de bzhin du ma gyur na ba bam la u
'gazungs 'di klog pa dang 'dzin pa dang/ yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab chog rgyas par mdzad pa mi 'a te/ mchod rten dngodrazhin gshegs pa'i
skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed pa ru 'gyur// ba ma la u ta'i gzungs 'di ma brjodon mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhingamanga' gsol yang
ma 'phu'o 'ar mA 'gyur ro// gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo// rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sngags kyi ngab zhinam gsal zhing// dgongs
pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas// mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams// btab kyang sgrog par yongami 'gyur/ zhes 'byung ngo// gang zhig gsang sngags dang/
dgongs par ldan das/ mchodan dang sku gzugs btab pa'i yon na ji skad du/ mchod rtenachogatam ra'adod bsonyaman pa byashi pa'i khyad pan// gzungs
'di pa zlas pa'i mchod rten kyis// gcig btab bye ba pa tab dang 'dra// yunaridzes dus nas 'khor ba yi// mtshams med lnga dang sdeb dpung rnams// ji snyed yod pa
[z/ ]malus 'byang/ tsho'ang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// mo rangs gzhan du skyes nas kyang// rigs mchog dam par skyes pa na// longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing//
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skyas// tshorabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur// dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du// dkon mchol gsum dang mi 'bral zhing// ngagegs
kyi gnad pas dri ma bskyod// bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur// mthogana mngon par 'tshang rgya khyo// ba ma lau ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/
mchod rtenagacig yan chad/ bye ba man chad gdab pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i rgyud ni kun kyang 'dra'o// dal mchodartan gcig btapon de la nga tapa par gyur ba'i sngags dang tshog ni//
'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams ca da la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brgyag par bya'o// nam sgyuya h+phu ka nAn/ dzinanAn/ ro nan+tarat+na trAsan kun/ a klosgyu ma mi tAnganatsa
band/ a haM a litaM/ namasgyu dz+hanu ga nAn/ sarba tathA ga tAnAn/ sukAsuN+NaM/ nA ka du/ shAn+taM/ dAn+te/ shAkhan ra ku le/ ashe ya sho bgati/ te dze
'dzob ti/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha ta sAhU~M/ mu dra 'dababs pa'i 'ji ba 'am sngags bri ba'i tshor na bdun gdan pa'i sngags la/ namasaman+takhuN+NanAn/ ma pra ti ha ta/ shAs
nAnAn/ oM badzra A mu khe swAhA/ 'ab baba'i sngags la/ mo brjod d+ha pA ya sAhA/ tsa ti'i phor bu'i nang dang/ sa tsha'i nang du phyu ma btab pa 'an/
snum gyis byugs pa'i sngagasal/ oMbadzra aridza radzesAhA/ phyag rgya 'am sngags gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM d+harma d+hA tu gasmyosAhA/ tse ti'i yor bur bal pa gzhug pa'i sdugs/
la/ oM badza?d+hA tu gan+d+he swA hA/ tho ba zug cing gdab pa'i stegs la/ oM badzramud ga ra na ko Ta ya hU~M/ tsati'i phar bu nas tshur rubyung ba'i tshugs la/ o rgyumAr te AhA/ 'khoral/
dang dpu zhu gsol ba'i sngagasal/ a sgram tan ye swAhA/ tso'idakyil 'khor la gzhag pa'i sngagasal/ o supra tiSh+Tha badzesAhA/ chogad ltar byas na tso tigacig btab pas khyo ba
snyed btab par 'gyur ro// thamasacad d skye ba dran par 'gyur// dal 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jib can gyis gar bar busasan/ nad mtsho'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa
thams cad m lus par zhi bar 'gyur/ ka @#// rgyugar skad du/ Ar+yaras bi ma la bshurje pad+ma Nanam d+hAr/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa 'od zer dram med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/
00 na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po seraskya'i gnas kyi pho khra 'khor gyi khyams chen pon dwage slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la bdalta sku/ byang bsams dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyur pa thams cad rnam par sal nga dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
kyi debang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ shes rang 'od dang/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dad chen po grangs med pa rnams dang/ lhodang/ klu dang
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyargyun pa da 1 mi dang/ sum yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom
ldan 'das la zhusar byas/ ri mor byas/ bkur ster byes/ yongs su bskor ba la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ de'i rosar skya'i grong khyer na gnas nga dram ze chen po
ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'a yid ma ches shing/ log par lta ba zhig ba gnas pa darus gzhan zhig gi tshog zhan zhig gas rmi ltas su rmis te bstan pa/
bram ze chen po khyod da stazhag bdunan chab 'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas/ bram ze deshIn tu'ang ma dga' ste 'jigs skrag nas yid la bsams ra/ dbadag gis srog
gi skyabasasu la btsal bar bya/ yang dag sbyong go sa thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes gragan/ bdag de'i gan du song ste/ dathams
cad mkhyen pa yin yang dgand 'jigs pas nyamathub par 'gyur ba'i skyabasa mdzad pa'i phyir chos ston gor ma chag go snyam bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi gan dusongang dang/ rgyang rang
po nas 'acom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma slongs tasas shing 'dug pa la/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'isangs rgyas dus pagsum mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bas bram ze'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgos dbaka' stsal pa// bram
zerAn du khyod da ste zhag bdunan 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gromanar mdang 'asams na dmyal bar skyabar 'gyur ro// donas yang rimagyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu
kha brgyud de bar 'gyur ro// de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan shan pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// donas shaphos nas kyang phug lus su skye bar 'gyur to// N+Dag tu ngan skyugs
mi gtsang ba za zhing 'dam rdzab kyi nang du'ang yun ring du gnas te/ rgyun du sdug bsngal myong par 'gyur ro// de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na'ang shin tu dbul ba dang/ mi gtsang nga dngo/
bring ba dang/ mdog mi sdug cing gnag pa dang/ lus 'di cangenyam chung ba dang/ mdze nad can du 'gyur te/ skye bo yongs lami sdu ga rung rtag tu bkris pas nyam thag pa// skye bo yongs
kyis smad pa/ rtag par rtog btog khya'ang shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de thos nas/ bram ze deshin tu 'jigs skrag skye yid gdungs pas dus nas/ bcom
ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nasems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na/
bdagan sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags ta/ deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na/ bdug nasong ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las
skyangs mdzad par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisAbaka' stsal ra// bram ze chen po byed so 'a grong khyer sar skya'i lam gyisumamadamaMchad rten ring
bsracan rnying pa ral pa zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi rtso myur srog shing btsugs la/ gsang sngags yi ger bras pa de'i nad du bcug ste mchod pa byas nas gsang
sngags lan bdun bton na khyod kyi cho'ang phyir nurata'apal par 'gyugal/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyig la ngas spyod che ba rnams su skye ste// bskal pa stong phrag brgya'
bar du bad pa las spyod kyang phyir phal zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ da nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pam 'a khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar/
gyur to/ ngaskal pa brgya stong du mar bde bachen po myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'i ngos nasargyala chen ris bawa rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang bskal pa
lha chen po stong phrag brgya yi bar du bad pa longs spyod mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro// tsherangs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun 'ang yid gzhungs shing che bar chad med pa dang/ las kyi
sgrib pa thams cud zunganusanam du'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tuya ngadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad
da/ bram zachen po ga zhan yang dgeslong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyem/ dge bsnyenam 'amA rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo gang la la mo thung ba nam/
rgyudumang ba zhig yod na des mchod rtenarnying pa bcos sam/ gsar du brtsegs kyang rung sku/ gsang sdugs 'di bris 'a nang du gzhug nas dkyil 'khor bya ra cus te mchodan/ de dag
gi yon tanan tshozad pa 'angatshoslar nur zhing ring ba dang/ nad kyis btad cing sdug bsngal la'ang nad do cog las thar pa dang non du'ang gnasong na'agro sems can dma' ba dang/
ca byog song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi rna lam du'ang grag par mi 'gyur nu/ de da pab tu skye ba lta ci smos/ de nas khram ze de de skad thos nas/
shin tu rangs ti/ mchod rten zhig pa bcos par bsams nas de 'khor danas langs te nga ngo// de'i tsho 'khor danyidan byang chub sems dpa' sems dad brtan po sgode pa thams cad
rnam par sel bzhes bya ba zhig stanalagalaunas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di de lta bur bgyis
nAyon tan dang/ legs pa dang/ dgab tshub skyed par 'gyur/ da skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bal pa// gsang sngags chen po rnams
kyishing mchog bdag nyid chab drimamadatsanganam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba da dkyil 'khor chen po'i chog bzhin byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde tsarlabs kyis sems can
thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na mchoms med pa lta byas pa'i sdig pa'i ng ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dung/
brnab sems dang/ phrag dog las gas pa ma dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ chozad pa las kyang tshorang du nur ba dang/ bkra shas dang/ legs
pa phun sumatsho las pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de skadwacas bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pah+phang pa thams cad rnam par
sal bas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thamasacad bsal ba'i

slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngagasakyachog 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gsung/
nasa'od zeratsho sna ba chen po byun gnas / stong gsum gyi ston po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyad par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mkhyen par mdzod
nas 'od zer de dang gsur 'dus ti/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsugag bdunub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'dus dgyes shing bya kal bange ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bka' stsal/
pa/ namasats+tshanAn/ samyakaMbud d+hako[=]nAn/ pa ri shud d+hem nas/ many+tsan+ti ta duT+Thi tAn+tan/ namo b+ha ga ba te ami tAAyus+ya/ tathA ga ta@#/ asarba tathAg shud rgyu/
A yur brnyani/ saM ha ra saM ha2/ sarbatathAg takhar ba len pra tesang han/ A yusAr Ar/ sarba tathA ga tas mal/ bo d+hib n+tu/ bud+d+ha bo rgyu/ brdzu ya bo d+ha ya/
[p/ ]ma ma sarba pA paM A par Ni'i shud d+he/ ba ga ta ma lam/ tshar su bud d+ha budaD+ha/ gu ru hu sAhA/ 'di'i rtsa ba'i sngags te/ gangala'a' kirtog byed par ba de na chos brgyad dang/ bcu/
gsum dang/ bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga rnams gung yang rung la mchod ringabasrol rgyun la 'an bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/ gsang sngags 'dalan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/
khrug byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yig bdun cu rtsa bdunu pras te/ de'i tshe gsungasngags 'don pa dang yi ger 'drab 'ang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon/ lus shes
kyis khyugs nas kha zas gtsang ma zos// ma togadang bdug pas mchod de/ dal ran po che sna bdunuyang yon du phul lam/ yang na bdag gi nyams kyisatsa'abyor pa phul yarung ste
masamagular bya// chos btsun par bya ba'i phyi'i bsti stang dngarim pa bya'o// gsang sngags kyi yig la'ang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhagaste/ mchod rten chung nus
pa bdun curtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing/ tAreran du gsang sngags ricugaste/ sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na/ tshozadu ralas ro nur tetsho'ang ba'agyur// sngon/
lasakyi sgrub pa tshorabs grangasamed pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas niam du'ang sems nyanadmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yadags kyi skya gnas thams can du skye bar 'gyur ro//
gdadu skyeg pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su drand ra 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ de bzhin
gshags pa 'bum phrag bdun durtsabadunasnyad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhigand tshabs po chos btab ste
sgra 'chida' dus byed pa la zuganadakyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la/ du du'i stang du mon sku las ri mor bris te/ dbus kyi chur ni ba khor lo dang rdorjod ng/ dung rung/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/
g.yung drung se dang/ pad+mo rnams bri// grwa bzhir yang du durar bros te/ dab stong du smos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re ra gru bzhi'i gzhag le// bdug spos kyis snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs
'thul zhingagazhag go/ khadeg sna lnga'i snad du kha zas sna tshogs dang/ zas dkar gsum dang/ 'bras chan du sbyar ba gzhug mngaTi chudang/ me tog dung/ 'bras sam

'bru'i snyid pa krung ba phar bu re re blugs pa dang yang khuwas sna tshogs spyar ba'i gtor ma sbos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar tod kyil 'khor gyi stang du gzhag go/ gtor m de dang 'bras kyi drung dunye
bar tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bostong du mar ma ga zhag go/ de nas da kyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa re zhag lo/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa 'and pa'i
mdun du'ang mchod pa ni bshos bzhag ste 'bul du gzhug go/ de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra skyel byas te/ nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab sta/ cho ga ba da ltar byas

nad pa tsho chud de 'chiba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdunonusu dran pa nyams shing 'khrul par 'gyur ba'i nga tsho sur nur zhing tshogs ring por 'gyurar/ rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro//
ga nga la la zhig gsagacong sgra cher byas te/ nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lanara'i ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bton// da'achi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang bde ba mi zad pa'i
gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyu zhing morabs rjesasu dran par yang 'gyur ro// dusum
an da rigs 'chi ba dang sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ g.yung gang la la zhig gis mi sha ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang sngagasalan bdunacu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod
phyugan/ shi ba dn gnas ong gi gnas su lhung na'ang de'i mod la lasakyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mthoras kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gsagasang sngags
ya gar bras pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos ta mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugal/ nan tan du mchod pa rus ni sha ba gang yin pa de nasong gi gnas nas thar tamatho ris su skye bar gyur do m dga'
ldan gyi lha ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ sas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
mchod rten de la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ mchod pa phul yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis dran med pa'i byunganur kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par
yang gyur// sngon gyi las kyi sgrub pa rnams kyang malus par byang bar 'gyur ro// tha na myu drung ri dwags la sogs gang dag lamachod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam yang dud/
'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang la la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa'i ng mtshud rten del reg gam/ de'i gribams phog kyang rung
ste/ de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhingazad par 'gyur ro// mchod rten de'i gnas ni 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ ya dag dang/ sha za lasogs pa
lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang/ gcan gzan khro bo dang/ thog 'bab pa dang/ sdig sprul kha gdug pa dang/ sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang ma tshugan yang med par
'gyur ro// gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ mtshon dang/ mi dang/ chudang/ sar ba dang/ mu gi dang/ dus mi na par 'chi ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/
tsags bkra mi shis pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na'ang mchod rten dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od zer chen po khyung
bas ltas ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par gyurar// gangagazhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/ dgra rgol ba zhig byungan da
gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen pa 'byung// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyisame lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba nangs dmag gi dpung dang/ mtshon cha'achar mngon par bstan
pasapha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhizhing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa bya ste// phyogs bzhir dpal/tshad brgyatshun chadadu mtshams bcad de bsrungs
pas de'inang du 'khrug pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ phyugs nad thams cad ma 'khyung ngo// 'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung/ chesaa yun par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro// dal gsang sngags
gzhan gyis gcad pa dang mnan par ma nus te/ gsangasngogs thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir// yang mtshad rgyun du srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad r/ ( chos rba tathA ga tA b.lu
la aT+Ta/ maNikanarA dza ta/ bdu sha ta ab+hin+d+ha ra d+hur/ sa man+ta ba lo kati/ sa rasar ma ma sarba pA paM bi shorta/ saM bo d+ha Ni/ pra ba ra ya/ pa rim Ni dum ra tsa mal
ngu'@#// nga shud rdzu hU~M hU~MAhA/ rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang gsang sngags de nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bras te/ mchod rtan gyi srog shang gi ngos bzhir gzhug go

de'ang cho ga'i gzhung 'danyid kyang bris te srog shing gnang du gzhug// cho ga de ltar byas na mchod rten dbu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'phra'o// de'i gong du'amachod rten rung srol
can dgu khri dgu stong ba'as pa dang 'dra'o// dre'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang ba mchod na dgu khri dgu stong
btsugs pa dang 'dra'o// yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim pa 'gamachod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/ shin ng du gsang sngags 'di dag bcugana'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong
brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o// yang rang la la zhig gis mchod rten la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ thal mo sbyar ram/ me tag yul ram/ byug pa dang bdug spos yul lam/ dril
du dang/ ba dan dad/ gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yanano// dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su
pa'i u/ rdzogs pa'i dpal dang mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro// than bu dang sgrungam la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phagana'ang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjes su dgongs par
[78]mdzaded/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob rung phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro/ yang gang la la zhig gisamachod rten 'di lta burmi lam du rmis sam/
gyongan mthong ngam/ phril bu'i sgra thos sum/ mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te sdug pa dang sgrib pa thams tsar byung ste/ rtag tud bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyis srung ba dang rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/ blunamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su dag pa'i thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di mchod rten
gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o// yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa' mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags dedug ba snying po 'du yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma la bsho d+ha
ni 'ud d+ha ba le pra ti sang ska ra/ ta ga tu d+hA tuny+tsare/ myurachur/ san d+ha ra san d+hur/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi ta// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/
dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang 'al zhig gas mchod rten bdag nyid kyis dus snyam/ gzhan byed du bcug gam/ mchod rten ring pa bcas legs byas kyang rung/ sa 'jim las mchod rten
chungadu byas sam/ so phag gam/ rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/ dngapar gsang sngagasakyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad tshad du bzlas brjod byas te/ de'i 'og tu mchod rtan san mo gang tsam/
gyis las sam/ khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/ dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi ched du byas na'ang rung sta/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang/ sems rtse gcig tubyas pa'i
stobs na mchod rten de la'ang sgos kyi ngad ldang//tsan dan dang/ gapur dang/ bla tshe dang/ gur kum la sogs pa'i dra bri ma/ lha'i sbas pazhim pongad ldang bar 'gyur ro/
bdag dang ba gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang ( bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bsags par 'gyur te/
yon tan dpalegs pa phun sumatshogs pa rang 'thub par 'gyur/ tsho thung ba'i las shag yod na'ang monur zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'amiba'i dus khyedana'angasangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig
'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te// skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du
lungastan par 'gyur/ der yang tshole bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang/ lca' mig dang/ lhu'irnab rnam par dag pa thob cing pha rol
gyi sems shes pa dang/ 'chi'apho ba dang/ skye ba shes pa 'thob bo// lus las tsan dan gyi dra' ngad 'byung zhing/ kha nas ut+pa la'i dri bsung ldang bar 'gyur to/ bla na med/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'is 'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// yang khri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/ gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rtan/
bskusanu'ang de dag gi yon tan dang li gas pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyurar// yang dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyenam gang la la zhig gis
bdage nyid gtsang bar byas te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang rin pa cher 'du shes pas bzungan/ du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dod par bya ste/ gsang sngagasa rnams

la gus pa bskyed nas yig bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya chog bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste mchodarten byas nA/ da dgakhagi/
rtsa brgyu chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang legs pa thams cad 'thob pa la 'gyur ro// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsangasngags kyi phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag bshad pa'i mi phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nang zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjesasu thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/ yang dang ga par rdzongs pa 'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems
can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing thams cad chos kyi dbyangs la dked nas gsang sngags chen pa'i phyag rgya'i choga'abyin gyi rlabs 'thob par bstan pa legs so legs so//
shin tu'ang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub 'theb ci'i phyir mi ldog rar sang 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor de nyid na lhadang/ gludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin pa dang/ dri ba dang/ lhamayin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dang lag na
rdo rje dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i chos longs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ gshin rjod ng/ mulhu dang/ ku be radang/
de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul chab 'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rangarang gi spyod yul la skyo zhing yid khyung ba gyur te/ mthar gyis yon tan chen po theb par
'dod pa'i phyir gtago la gcig bas tasmasal/ kyem yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba nashAn tu'ang red par dka'o// de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa'i ng shin turnyed
par dka'/ gsang sngags dang phyagargya'atshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyis bstan pa thos pa'i ng shin tu rnyedapa radaka'// 'dinashin tu ngo mtshar te zhes smras so//

tshatshan/ de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya pa bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang cho ga'i yon tanachen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrub pa'i rdul dang reg ba rnams dngas
bar gyur/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang/ sdol pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad tsadzad g pa ra gyur/ cho'ang da nur 'bur gyur nas dga' magu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob
bar gyur to/// de nas 'byung po 'chogs thams cad kyasems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba'akhyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'asoms dar chen po sgra'i pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de
bzhin ga gas pa la mchod pa 'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor dang rinapo che'i khang pa brtsigs panor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ chos l dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan
'das la phul te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'adus kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom lhan 'dus kyis bsang sngags dang/
phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' bsems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad
de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing mo ring bdung/ sdug bsngal gyi phung pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa lags na/ dAdir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag ra'i yis rkub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyichig bshad par 'tshal te// na mo
b+ha ga ba te/ na ba na banI/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ko Ti yu tasha ta sa pas N+NaM/ namasarbaNib ra Nang skom pa na ba d+hisatus/ tu ru tu ru ma ma saru A ba ra Na bshe na Ni/ sarba
tathA ga taA yur bi mA nIbu la male/ sarbasid+hin mamasgra/ bar bar/ sarbas tA ab lo kani/ chos thagi bA ra Na ba ska ma ban/ ma ma sarba pAs lisha rnya na ku ru swAhA/ bcom ldan
'das bdag ga gsang sngags 'anas nigs rgyas te ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/ gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtsa gcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig bton
na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur ro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di chog bzhin dudagu bcu rtsa dgu ya gir byas te mchod rten nang du bcugar/ mchod rtan dal la
la zhag gras phyag byas sam/ chig snyan ngas bstod dam/ spos dang/ ma tog dang/ byug pa dang/ mar ma'abulan rigs kyi bu dedi'atsho 'danyid la sdig pa thams cad byang zhing
las kyi sgrub pa thams cad bsal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/ songs rgyus bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa'i bsla'i klung gi byemasnyed la mchod cing
bsnyan bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyurar// de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgyastong bye ba khrag khrig gnang klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de'i dpe/
ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsogs par 'gyuro// yang dag sbyong gang zhig gsatshes brgyad dang/ bdubazhi dang/ bcolta gang yang rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos ba gtsang ma gyon la
zhag gcig skya ba 'am/ yang nubras dkar gsum zos te/ mchod rgyun la bskor zhingagasang sngagasa' da lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlasabarjod byas na bskal pa brgyastong du bsags pa'i las kyi
sgrub pa thamasatsed dang/ mtshamasamed pa lnga byas pa' nga yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrung pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur sa/ byang chub sems dpa'
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tusbyin par mdzad cing/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi la yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad btonan sgrib pa thams cad byang
ste phyir ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyura'o// yagangags bzhi brgya rta brgyad btonan rgyal chen ris bzha' rgyal po chen pa dag kyang nye bar 'ongasanas lus mngon parab stan te srungapa dang
skyabs byed tsad/ shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nams thams cad nyarar bsgrub po// gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad btonan dge ba'i rtsa ba ded kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa
'thob bo// yang g gis drugabargya rtsa brgyad bton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang gang gis
bdun brgya rtsa brgyad bton na legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yang gangags brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad btonan gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa' rang dbang 'thob ste// sems rnam par
dag par 'gyur ro// yang gangabs dgu brgya rtsa brgyud du bton na phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton nargyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob go
gang gis nyis stong tshang bar btonanalan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thobab// gang gis sum stong tshang bar btan phyirama'ing pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo// gangags pa zhastong tshang bar
btonan dgra bcom pa 'bras bu 'thob bo// gang gis lta stong[&]nga bar bton na rangasas rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis drug stong tshangarar btonan byang chub sems dpa'i
rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas 'thob par gyur ro// yang gang gis bdun stong tshang bar bton byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'athob par 'gyur ro// yang gang gis brgyad stong tshang bar bton
na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnonapar 'gyur ro// yang gang gis dgu stongatshang bar bton na rig sngags dang gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'a thob par 'gyur ro//

0 mngagang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mig yo ba gnon par 'gyur// lung ga nga gsenyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sku la thob par 'gyur te/
seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur go/ yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyilas bya bar 'dod na/ mchon rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la ngaces
legs byas te/ g.yas phyogs su skor bskyed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ga bar du bskor ba byas n bsam pa thams cad yare bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par sel bal legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rab grogs byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gsang sngags kyi chog tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin// donus gnod sbyin thams cad kyirgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags chog 'di dgade bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'drab/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi skulas byungabalags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po
dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnasapa'isamasacan rnams kyi las kyi sgrub pa dang sdig pa thams cad bsal nas/ de phyin chad khacom ldan 'das kyi bstan pal 'jug par 'gyur ro//
de skad ces gsol ba dud/ bcom ldan 'das kyisA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la pa ka stsal ra// gsal ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cha lag 'dwadab nam 'os
pa'i dus na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rtan zhu la zhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no// ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po grub cing phan yon/
char gnas par gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa ltartsa sgos te/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad ngasags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de dag gi yon tananAdang zhin gnags la brgyu
stod bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do/ gsab pa'i 'dag pos gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'dasu las tshogs chung du ji ltadu zhig bgyis na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyi legs
par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dpe khasnyan mgang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob par 'dod cung yon
tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/ dgu bcu tshud du ya gir dras la sangs rgyas mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas
la ba lci ras byugasate/ grwa bzhir dri' dar bu bkang re re gzhag/ bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba'i kha bzhag nas/ snod chen po'achung dum tog dang/ dri'i chudang/ 'bras
skam po rnams blugs te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang/ yang tal nug ngo dang/ sran ma mdzad ng/ 'bras rnams bsras te bcos pa'i 'bras thugakra sa ra zhes byang dang/ rdzas
dkar gsum dang/ 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang/ yang shing thog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/ kha Tas mingags smos pa bda rnams dang/ spos dang/ me
tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng dung kram la/ gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gnang du bcu gnas / mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad mngon du dmigs taphyang ga byas la de nas rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba pu la ba pu la ba ma dra ba re dzin nga res
ras ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta rdza tu gco/ a d+hiswAhA/ a ma ta to ba na nA/ sarba de ngan/ ngahaya ba shud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thanas ma ye swA hA/ dadug sngosa'athul brgyun ma chad
par bya zhing/ gas nga sngags lan nyi shu rtsapargyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po brgyad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang/ gsang ba
pa'i bdag po dang/ rgyal po chen po bal dang/ rmongs pa dang/ dbang phyugachen pa dang/ sred med kyi bu rnams de'i med la mchod rten de lamachod pa dang rim
gro byed/ srog gangang rtan par byed do// de bas gong du'ang sangs rgyase ba 'khumaphrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/ gang+gA klung gi bem snyed kyang gnasader gshegs te mchod rten de la mchod
pa dang/ chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob chungarang bsrel dang ldan par mdzodado/ da ltar sems thag pa nas tshe ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang/ gzhan yang mchod rten de yid
bzhin gyi nor bu rin po tsho las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma lasamachod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dag pa'i rtsa ba rgya
chen pa dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la ring zhing nad mad pa dang/ bgegs thams cad kyisam tshugs par 'gyur ro// gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'da mthong ngam/ mchod
rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na'ang las kyi sgrub pa dang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ mchomasumad pa lnga byas pa'i ng yongs su byang nas 'iba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
du skye'o// gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa'i ng 'ching 'dus byas nas banamed pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa ra 'gyur/ thon bya dang ri dgas lasogs pa sems can
[a/ ]gang gis mthong ba de 'ang tsho'i bos nas dud 'gro'i gnas spangs te// bsod nams dang ltar lus tha mar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod
paru'adod pa des sngar bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te[） ]sadang lci bas byugs 'a/ de'i stang du spos kyi skyang nul gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir hra'o zhus bkang ba'i snod
rar bzhag la// sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bros te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung dudagu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags/
rnams gcig kyang r ra de'i nang du gzhug ba// des yang gsang sngags la da dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi le gar bros te mchodarten bya yang l rnams kyin ng du bcug ste/ mchod rten rnamasudakyil
'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang byug pasamachod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di'i nga gdon par bya'o// naman banA tInA/ ta thA ga ta saM gaN+NanA zi hA lu
hUM/ ko Ni yuk+ta sha sahas u0fc4/ u pa po ri/ tsa ri tsari/ mo re go ro tsal ba ru swAhA chog 'di ltar byas na parol tu phyin nga drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de

des rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+ga'i klung gib lasnyad byas par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongaphrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la/
mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par gyur ro// de'i gong du'ang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa/ nasnatshogs bsdus te/ mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas de
bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mched par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyad kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do//
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do// yang g la la zhig gas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'ad snying po mdor
bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa'i las byas la lus la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis srung ba dang skyab pa mdzad de/ phasal rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang/ shar ganyer ba
rnams dang zla gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi dwags la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod par ma 'gyur te/ 'jags shing skra gnas so sor khyer bar gyur ro// gang la
la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtamabyas pa'i machims med pa lta'i lasakyi sgrub pa'i ng yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/ grib mas
phog gam/ lus laragakya rung ste/ de'i tshor bas gzhan gyi sakyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thamasacad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mitshugs/
mes mi tshugs/ chus 'khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags ma red/ thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis bsrung ba dang ngaskyab pa mdzad cing spyan
ras kyis 'tshos mdzad de/ lha thams cad dang/ dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la stongs grags byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang/ byad drang/ sbyor nga thams
cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyura'o// de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di 'tshog don du gnyer la bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi ngan
mdo 'am/ sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/ de'i nang du nga cung don 'gro ba thams cad dang/ bya dang/ sbrangom dang/ thon grog spur yan chad
kyis mthong ra dang/ thos pa dang/ rig pa dang/ del phog pa'i sa dang/ rdul dang/ rlung dang/ grib mas phogana'ang byo' song dang/ yi dgas dang/ panasong lagapar
ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrung
pa yongs su byang bas tshorabs rjes su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ phying ma ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems rapa sems
dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhidang/ rmongs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang/
tshangs sa kyi lha rnams dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal// skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal ro'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongs su
gtad kyi/ rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su bzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tol gnang du chugal gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du'ang rgyun ma bcad par soms can l
ston cig/ mthong zhing thos par byas nas mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa'i ng 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
ba dang/ gsangang pa'i bdag ngolag na rdo dzodang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang/ rmongs pa dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ srad med kyi bu dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lha ma yin rung/ lto 'phye chen rol sogs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshalanus tshig 'thun par smras te
gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs tagasang sngags 'di'i tshog dang/ mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa
[z/ ] rnams sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis srung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungs su gzung zhiyi bskyod par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang/ ngaglag pa
dang/ mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma'ongs pa'i dus sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro soms can dmyal ba la sogs pa
dang/ sdig pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' drin spyi bos blang ba'i slad du ba gsang sngags
kyi rig 'di dugarimagror bgyi/ btsun par bgyi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes ga zhwa ga par bgyi/ rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar
ba lta ba ra bgyi ste/ nam du' nganub par mi 'gyur zhing minas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ra/ skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi chog 'a de dag bsrung ba dang/ rim gror bya ba dang/ yongs su gzung bar khas blangs pa ni legs so legs
so// shing tu'ang legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pala mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam ra ra dag pa 'dacas bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po
bcu kar saM ha dang/ zhu chen gyi 'tsho ba ban rnye dpalagyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la nyab pa// dzabaa ti shadang/ dge bshes 'brom ston pasasngags rnams dag par
rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Naa granA man+d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad
mkhyen pa la phyag 'al// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa// sems can sdug bsnga'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshing du nub pa rnams yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir blo grosashar pa la phyag 'tshal lo/
de bzhin gshegs ma'i gsang sngags kyi mchog snying rje chen pa'i rtse mo 'char ba/ thogs pa med pa'i don yon pa'i las kyi dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba/ soms
can gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i lasakyi sgrib pa dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal rnamapa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa// phan pa ma yin pa du/ bkramashis pa dang/ rmi lam nganar dpa/ ltas
ngan pa thams cad dang/ ra rnam pa du ma dang/ dus ma yin papa'i rib rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ thog
0 mar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs dum bye baphrag 'bum gyi brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsam par bya'o// namo b+ha ga ba te/ ba ro tshon ya/ tathA ga ta ya/ ad+ha
te samyaka saMbun ya/ saN adon rgyu spyir sha man me tre tad+ya thA/ sa chu na so snyan sid d+ha bad rgyur/ b+ha ga ba ti pAr pA ra shargyu ba ti/ a rnyon ka mA ya/ sarba pA paM bishud rgyu
d+harmanAramal tshun go par/ asaM ga ra phrashamam mun+ti su khaM pra tisazaklashachab ti/ sarbadA paM ba sho d+han/ brnyam Nabin kan nAgan bonAshaya ban na ya// b+ha ga ba tisu
rasamal bud+d+haM/ sar ra/ bas ra bas ra/ su rusu ra/ su ru sur/ srasarapras ra/ bas rabs ra/ a dzaM na ma ke sa ha sra saM tshe tan karma A ba ra NikA pa ya/
kem ba ti bud d+ha bab ya/ bsha ba nipA ra mi tA nAMn go tsa'i/ bag zab ti/ a she kha li ni ka ru Nagatsar/ ba ma sAdzA na a h+phe Teka ba ti/ sungani ta rnyam/ ha
he b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA ka ru Ni ku ru ku ru/ bi sho d+hi yumaM/sarmas ny+tsa/ ma sAka ru totasaenas ni sin tsa ya/ sum bo d+ha ya/ sa mad+hu lA ya/ pa'o hAm/

ma hA ka ru Nang ngon pa ri shud d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha me ku ru de ba tanarakArakAnaM/ d+ha ga ba ti mam hA bo d+hi tsi saM mU rtsed masan tu shud ba ti la ka ru Ni/ bud+d+ha bo d+haM pra te/ na ka pra tatir+yag ti/
dulenanu lan/ de ba ma phyag ti so pa ha na la ba por klashe/ sarba bud+d+ha d+harmA pa ri pu ra Ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyisang rjen pa'i mchogaces bya ba'i gzungs/
bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byungar 'dan gzungasagrasamadar phrug stongaga 'khor dang ldan pa'o// sdig pa dang/ lasadang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// bkra mi
sgyu/ gus pa dang/ rnalam ngan pa dang/ ltas nganam dung dus ma yin par 'chib thams cad zhi bar byed ng 'o// tshodang/ bsod nams dang/ gzugs dang/ stobs dang/
bde ba dang/ spobs pa dang/ nad med pa byed pa'o// 'byung lo dang/ brjod med dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ nam mkha' lding dwang/ lham yin dang/ mi 'am
pa'i gdon thams cad nges par 'ajoms pa'o// gzungs 'di'i ming bzung ba dang/ thos pa dang/ brjod pa tsam gyis kyang tshorabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrub
pa' 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thamasazhuru bsrabs par 'gyur ro// de'i ngan song gib grob thams cad kyang rgyunachad par 'gyur ro// sangasargyus dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// yongs su ma nyems pa'i chos can du 'ang 'gyur ro//
snying rjelasakyanyamasar rami 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mngon par dga' kha 'gyur// nyin dus gsum mtshonadus gsum dulan bdun bdun brjod zhu ba ra
thams cad lasa rnam bar thar bar gyural/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan stong phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dgakyang thob par 'gyur ro// mnangs pa'i dus su skyel mo krung bcas
tabade khang du lag la lag pa gru gsum chu phyagargyu byas nas/ sangasargyus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdag dachen po mngon sum
du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshol lo zhes sa te/ yid kyis phyag 'tshalanas lan shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ dal yid la ji ltar 'adod pa'i bsam pa thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// sa brgyad dang/ bshubazhi dang/ btsolngalar mgo ldan 'das la mchod pa byas l/
bskyed nas blangs nas gos dkar po bgos te/ sbyin pa rgyus la byang chub kyisams chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba des rang gi lag gis dkyil 'khor byas la/
ma tog kha dog sna gsum gyis mchod nas tsan danadakar pos bdugasal/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag mtha' yas pa dag na mchod pa dang bkur ste chen mo rnam pa sna tshogs seng nga/
dadabazhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsams te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
po stong chen po 'bar ba 'byung ba 'di ma dga' ba chen po skyes kyi bar du brjod na/ bdag nyid deng zhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug pa shes shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyi zang zing med pa'i chos kyi longs spyod chen po'i dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa gsasu phyir mi ldog khar skyes pa yin no// chorabs gzhan
dusongana' byang chub sems dpa'i sa chen po 'ong par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'ang thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyang theb par 'gyur
ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'i ng thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la'angasems can thams cad dga' bar
'gyur ro// lha thamasarbad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// klu dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sran ngo thams
cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur te/ ga la smras pa de de'i bya ba sgrub da ra 'gyur ro// des ci bsams pa dang byed du bcug pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro//
de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sus kyang ngag mi gcog khar yaba'agyuro// lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang/ gzugs dang/ bsod
nams dang/ lang tsho dang/ nadamad pa dang/ rgyas pa 'phel bar byed do// bgags thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// mdor na de bzhani gshegs pa'i grang
khyer du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong bar 'dod pa rnams dang/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thums cad thob par 'dod
pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gar thabs byed pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dapa' chen po chos
nyid kyi dam tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ bar charamed par rgyud chen po'id kho na rtogs par 'dod pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i yon tan rgyan gyis bdag ni brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i tshor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod cing/ byung chub sems
dang 'asems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yang dag pa'i bstod pa 'di thog mar bsgram pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsams pa'i tshog ji skadakhastan pa bzhin du blang dor
bya'o/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///@#// rgya gar skad du/ kyerlu ba dze yakal drug cu
tan+ta/ bdaskad du/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo 'di
mngag shin rje gshed// mtshon cha me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs// drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa// de mthong nas ni bro po gzhan// thams cad kyi ni lag rmasher// de ngazhin
du na ba jig rten pa'i// lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed// gzhan yang thal mo sbyar byas te// sla gnas bstod pamang po byed// lha rnams mang po ji snyed kun// 'jam dpal khro
ba'i gzwangarjid kyis// gzir bzhin du na rang smras pa// bcom ldan bdag cag sangs rgyas dang// chos dang dge 'dun skyabs mchis kyi ri nga du mi badrud 'jigs pa'i gzug//
gzingade 'bar bas phyogs khyab pa// khams gsum 'khrugs par mdzad pa mthong// gang tshe lha dang lha man rnams// skra gnas skyabs su dong ban// de tshe 'dzam pa'i dbyangs
kyin/ khro nge slar yang sha rib 'gyur// gshin rjegashed ces bya ba yi// khro bo chen po zhi ba la// de nas skyabs su dengang yi// lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa/ 'khyod kyi
brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal bas// ji lta buranamanyes par bgyi// ji ltar yang nadwang bar 'gyur// bdag cag the tsom chen po mchis// khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas//
gshin rjegashed kyis bka' stsal pa// lha rnams thams cad khyad nyon cig/ ngan dus gsum sngon du 'byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon du byung/ nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang
'byung// nga nidus gsum da ltar 'khyung// ngan lnga brgyamatha' ma'i// nga yi bstan pa 'byung dur byedo// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// nga 'a bstan ra 'byung bar byed//
lasongan mtshams med byed pa'i/ nga tshong yi bstan pa 'byung// zas ngan lci ba za ba ngo// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// gosanganadug hrul gyon pa'i tsho gtso tshangs bstan
pa 'byung// nga nadus gsum 'khyud pa'i sku// bstan pa thams cad nub patsha// de tshong yi bstan pa 'byung// ji lta bur ni zhir 'gyur yang// nga na thams cad zhi ba'i sku// ji
lta bur khros 'gyur yang// thams cad khros M pa nga yi sku// gacha brjid chen po khyedan+nams kun// gang tshog sum la skyabs song nga demyong yami bzad pa// khro bo'i yid laM gnas
par gyis// dkon mchog gsum gnas pa dang// de yi bka' yang bskyang ba dang// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi yid ni zhi gyur gyis// khyed rnams skyabs su
gdongab yi// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis// thamasacud don ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ yi ga 'khrun khacu bdun po// ngayi g+hare yid lasabyung// lha
rnams kun gyisu gzung bar gyis// gshin rjegashed po bdaganyid kyis// snying po rad tu gsungs pa na// danas sanagayos par gyur/ rgyamachoyang na rang tu'i khrugs//
gnod sbyin dang na son po dang// sha za la sogs phung bar 'gyur// lha rnams kun n phyag 'tshal zhing// yan lag kun nas spu langs nas// gshin rje gshed po khrobo ya//
khro bo'i snying po degazung ngo// de nas dam chos srung ba'i phyir// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtog pa bduni dadag la// gshin rjegashed kyis rgyas par gsungs// de nas khro
ba rnam rgyalagyi// rtog pa khro bo nyidakyisagasungs// snying rje byang chub samag ldan ragi/ lha rnams kyis thos dag gyur nas// dkon mchog gsum nasrung ba'i phyir// so so
yani rtog pa bshad// de dag gni rtsa ba'irgyud// khro bo nyidakyis rab gsungs pa// khrokhe rnam rgyal zhes bya 'di// 'jig rten 'dasu dang 'jig rtenapas// sngon nas phyag
byas khro bo yi// zhal nas ji bzhin thos nas kyang// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// rgyud nibyang chub sems rnams kyis// snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa dang// rnam pa mang
do ra byin gyis babs// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtag pa khro be rnam par rgyal ba las/ rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skabs te dang po'o//de nas khro bo rnam par
rgyal// 'jam dpal khro des bshad pa yi// bstagapa rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ mdor na rayaM tu bshad par bya// de la 'di yi dkyil 'khoran// dngos grub thams cad
sbyin mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad// yi dgasamang po zhes bya'o// thams cad dun dkyil 'khor 'di// gnas ni gang du 'grub par gyur
sngogs pas thog ma nyid du ni/ de yi gnas ni brtag par bya// gang g.yog pa 'am dur khrod dang// khyim stongadang nubazhi mdo dang// mchod rten dang ni mo gnyis dang// thabs
po stong du lam srang ming// spyod chos tshal dang ri yi rtse// muyi 'gram dang nags[&]la dang// yang n mtsho yi 'gram dang ni// lha chen phyi na gnas kyang rung// ba lang lhasasam
g.yul gyis/ khyad par dun yul gtsang ba// gang du yaden dga' bar yang// der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya// de nas rig 'dzananan tan gyis// sa na yang dag
sbyang bya ste// kha cha mad cing ma gas pa// mnyam zhing zug rngumed pa la// shar dang byang ni mtho ba dang// kha dog snum la lhag par bzang// ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang//
ldanul yin skye bas byug/ ci rigs par na khyugs nas kyang// slob dpon gyis na khrus byas nas// sbyang ba byas te mnyam bzha gnas // khro bo'i srung
bsakhyen gyis brlab// yi dgas phalatshano zhes bya ba'agi/ dkyil 'khor gsang mcho gzhung mo tra// zarama'i rasasam ras pa la las// thigaskud gsum sgril mdzes pa yis//
grwa bzhi dngun sgo bzhi par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thag btab ste// thog mar shar dang byangs ni// lhodang nub kyi bar du'o// thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas// de
nas kyang na drang bar bya/ shar dung lhos mtshams dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// thig gis rab tu tshadabyas te// gru bzhi dang ni thig gdab bo// ram pa/
gcig pa mdzes pa la// sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya// lho phyogs kyi na sgo phye la// lcagamu rnams nagacad par bya// dkyil 'khor dang na 'chom ra yi dbus su pad+mo
brakhar bya/ paNod phyogs bzhi sgo// the tshom med par mnyam par bya/ mdzes byed sgo ya byed du bya/ 'khrum pa 'dab ma'i ched dang mnyam// nyab yin m ngos byed kyang///
mngosakhyed dang na 'dra bar bya// chog bzhin du dkyil 'khor te// kun tu thig ni btabanasakyang// phyonas tshulakhazhin rig 'dza gyis// dur khrod thal khas dra ba na// rtag tu
byang shar lasogs pa'i// grwa nang nad dag tu// mkhas pas le con phyagargyagro/ phyogs kyi sgor nas dgas gzhag/ gzhan yangs degs lnga pan// pad+maT+Ta stong du bsam
par bya/ der mi phyisgo'anang dag dang// phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du// mi romagomodwayi dogasa rnams/ dur khrod thul bas dngar te// de phyir yi dgasaphal chen/
yan// khru gang la sogs rim pa nas// khru brgyud pa yabar du ste// de las lhag par yong mkhri/ rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pan// khru gangan bro bar bya// zhi badrang na
rgyas pa dang// margyal sgrub pa khru dor bstan// sems can kun n skud pa dang// der ni gzhig la khru gsum r// khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa yi/ las rnams kyi na mchog
tugasungs// khru ldand dngamed dang// dgra rnamasumed par brtsalaba'i mchog/ khru drug bgegs rnams thams cad dang// gdon rnams nges par klog par byed// khru bdun
pan lha yi rnams/ dbang dang dgug pa'i lasa rnams byed// khru brgyad pa na dngos grub kun// sbyinusrab/ mchog tu shes par bya// de ltar ci rigs byas nas ni tu nas
gtsang mas nyi rig bya// mu yi phyir namu i snod// chusarab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang// ma tog sdug gu dri zhim dang// me tog 'phreng bsasnod mchog
gzhun/ logs pa ra dag pa'i mdzes pa// dri yi don du bya bar// tsan dan dkar po dmar po rlung// aka ru dang sbyar ba yi// gu gul bdug pa de
ba nanano// maramamar gyi mar me dang/ gam bas pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag ro yisolas dag la// mi mo rilakyis byakharab shad// gtor mnya dang kalasogs
sbyar dug la sogs lhag par dbul// de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas// de nas rig sngagasu'achad pa yis// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas te// byang chung sems la
dmigasanas ni// rim yin lasa rnams dag/ gal te 'dri bar minusan// yid gs phalachen dbus dag tu// pad+mastar byas gang yin pa// dayi steng du yi dab/san//
mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya/ yi dgas kyin sngagasa mchog gis/ bsamapa dga' skyes nas kyang/ grwa pa'i nyon bzhi po yang// sngagasanyid kyis nAbasam par bya/
gal ta'adri bar nus na// sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya// sgo yi yi gas bzhi po yang// gal te khri bar ma nusan// de bzhin yid gsa'adzan sngagasakyis// byin
gyis rlob par gasungs pa yin// de yin du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob par bya ba'ar// rkang lag mgo khe dpung pa dang// de bzhen gzhan yang dpung pa dang//
'kha gzhan yang de bzhi lag rako'adzung/ bod pa ke am lags na// ros 'phung ba bsam par bya// de yin na rang sngags kyis// bya tshasarlobatul zhug par bya// de
ltar chog bzhin bsamasas/ mjug khro bo gti gshed// sngags brjod pasun spyan drangs nas// rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol// khro'i 'khrubasam
'jibasamadzodapa// sku ma lce 'baran 'dra/ gzi de 'phags pa bsamaran// sku mdog skyung la bcas/'pho 'dra// zha'akrug sgra yang khamam 'jug/ sman ma kham
pamig kyang sar/ gnokasumamigen zlum pa ste// phyagazhi bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs// de bzhin mi dgas steng bzhugs// zhabasajugagis ni mdzes par byas//
shularal gri datsug tagrasku/ spyan pa'i phyirenAphyag brkyangs// lcags kyu yi'o man dag/ g.yas pa'i phyagazhar bzhan bsnams// de bzhinegason pa'i drug bo yang/
thonapa mdung thung mda' lo/ mdzub mosabasnagasadang zhagasar bsnams// phyags dacug to bsam par bya// tshamago rlon dang skum po dang// yid gs 'phreng bas
rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa 'an bza' gsol/ ]sku yang tshel gsum khyamache// zhalakyin tsabasan du ma ste/ skrani rgya mtsho'akhrugs pa 'dra// zhalagacim/
bzhad 'di lagacig zhi// zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrod pa'i ga/ zhal gcig zhalan gdangasapa ste// lcags kyang bskyod la mdzad pa dang//
zhalags kyan chab gtsigs// de ltar snying pos legs ragi/ smanadrangs mchod yon dbul bar skye// de nas dri dang sbyar ba'i chus// mchod yon tshog pa'i yul
nas/ yidugasakyi spyi borayang// mo tog dmar po gzhag par bya// blotshon gyis ni khro bo ga/ degs tshan dan dmar po dbul// dra li'og tu me tog rnams//
tsanatan can gtor ma dbul/ ma tog me togagator ma dbul// ma tog tog 'phreng ba rnams// ma tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ ma tog sngags kyis rim bzhin//
matog chog bzhin phulanas// rang gi snying po sngags kyis kyang// khro gosan lo dang// khro bo gtso pa'i byung la nga// snying mo rnam par dgod par/ gsum
de mi 'tshogs ma dang// de yi gtsug tu spyi gtsug gzhag/ de lus lAgo dang// mtshon cha'atshogs la mtshon bzhag ste// 'ad skad bstan pa 'anadag// ma tog
rgyu ga gis dgod par bya// delta ba gas mchod nas kyang// bdug pa'i ngag sngags kyis dbul// de nas mar me rang 'bar ba// phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya// 'byung
pa 'gatom khro re lu 'phul nasayi dgas la chen gyi// phyi rol tu ma las pa yis// smyug tor rnams zhi sngon par bya// khro bo gtsol de phyogs te// de nas yang ni dug
pa dbul// de phyi rolachudacas snod// ma tog gsanabasu gzhag/ tshogs khrus bsnyung ba yi// slobam dag na bsams kyang// sngags kun gyisanagazikhaspyod/
la khro bo yin snying po yis/ lag gnyis me tog zhus// gos kyis gnon gsu par/ dkon mchog gsum narngon byus la// slob dpon gyisan
gzhug par bya// rang gi snying posAm toganyid// dkyil 'khor la nag tor du gzhug/ de nas re nyon zhes ra yis// phyag rgya sngags pas re la bstan// dkon mchog gsum
nagasang ba yi// dam tshigare la sbyin par bya// degs grub par bya ba'i phyir// sngags pas chudang ma tog gis// blo ri'i gtso po'i gsang sngags dag/ dbang bskur nas
nu'i 'gyun// de nas khro ba snying po yi// chog khazhin du dbang bskur nus// me tog bdug pa 'phyang ba las// snying po de la sbyin par bya// khro bo yanaslong mo mchog/
des kyang de ltar masanasagi/ de nas thamar phyag byas s// ci sa sbyin pas mchod par bya// sngags pas bla ma mchod byas nas// dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan du
man/slob masnying po tsani nas kyang/ 'phrengs tsan dan lasogs pas// mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni// phyi rol tun sngar bzhag pa'i chu la sogs pa gang
ba'isnod// dablangs mchod yon phul nas// 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa'i// mthu rtsal drag po gshegs su gsol// bzhud nas kyang nAyon chud// dkyil 'khor la yong
dbul bar bya// rgya chen s yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi// rig sngags 'chang bas de ltar na mchod pa rtag tu legs par gru da nas sakhrub
thob par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dem khro be rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ yid gs phal po che'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba so gnyis pa'o///
de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste 1 sonamasarba tathA ga ta b+hupra tamu kha bad kla sAhA/ dbus kyi yi dgas kyi'o// on masarba ta thA ga te d+maA kro rgyu ba
dzAya arjer dzul te dza hipra ta shA ra hU~Mpa'u/ 'du ni grwa yar con pa sogs sngags so// oM namasarba tathA ga ta b+huoM pra ta thod lakA ya hU~M phaT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dgasogo/
o pra ta bamAka shu par/ lhosgo'i yi dgosakya'o// oM pra tadzA la hU~M phaT/ nub kyi sgo'o yi dgas so// oM Iprapra to ta ka hUM phaT/ byang sgo'i dgas so// onam saja te
0 thug teN+Da pra tamA leb grwa// pra ma leb sgra// sre tamA le mi khri te/ kul cika te sarba rak+Shapa tshuhU~M/ yi dab/sa khe phrang pa'o// 'di ni yi dgas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags
kyichogasaso// dan khri legan rje gshed spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i sngags la sogasar 'byungango/ ]so nam bud+d+harnyamasaM g+ha b+hukro d+ha pa ri ba rasajam yen/ A gats+tsha Agats+tsha/
o Ab+hUhU~M/ i dpra ta/ AsanaN/ pra tod ga na rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ khro bo rgyal po gshin rjegashed spyan drang ba'i snga gnas o/ o tshu gitab gra hAhU~M paT/ goma'i'i
mon kro d+he ka ya man+ta ka hanAm b+hats+tshany+tsa hUM lan/ 'dan khro de'irgyal po gang gi rtog pa 'dra yin pa de bsngags ya le'u bcu bdun pa'o// omAhU~M/ de nyid kyi snying po'o// o kA
la hU~M phaT/ 'tshog samago ]o yaman ka ma kA rA ra hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug gigo/ o mi khas su tAn ta ka hU~M mnA ma'o// 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gan rdzaganyer
kyi yan lag lta pa'o// oM e ka dzA ra aman+ta ka bar ra sAhA/ mchod yon dbul ba' sdugs so// o ts+tshaAn ta ka dzo ba 'di na nusAg+ha/ lha bshos kyi sngagasaso// o pA ka/
kan ta'/ saM ga rlu ba gra hasAhA/ dri'i sngags so// yod pa srog mkhyad+ha ra NisAsh+tsa/ me tog gi sngags so// oMwi ti d+hu ra pra yA ya swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngagasaso
o da la do tawas sAhA/ mar me'i sngags so// oM sa chu a mashe ba ha ri gAhA sgeg tor thams cad kyi sngags so/ o da re zhan blo ngon/ su
ha dri dro khA hisAhA/ gtor ma thams cad dbul ba'i sngagasaso// tsholu du nu pra tota ka te/ pra tamA le lan/ ma ma kyi d+ha pra pra tishal dri dro drotra/ khu 'gro ha gAli hA/ yi
dgas mang pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtor ma'i sngagasaso// 'jam dang la gyi rtsa ba ga zhib mo khro rnam par rgyal ba las/ yi dgas phal po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngagasaram par
bya ba ste gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yapa'i jam dbyangs kyi// khro bo dpa' bo gtsaseg mu na// tshad med gzi brjid bdag nyid che// de yi phyag rgyu ba shud
bar bya// thogamar dkon mchog gsum ro yi// dmatshiga mngon par bstan byas nas// lag pa g.yas pa tsho gabazhin// legs par rang tung cinge bar bya// rig 'dzani
dgags rtag par na// lag pa'i mo thams cad kyis// mthe bo legs par sbas pa// rab tu bsdams pa bzang po btsa nga// chog shes rab bsonany+tsa// snying po
sngags sam logs shig tu// sngags pa phyag rgya sngags kyis btsangs// gzhan du nam yang ma btang ngo// on mo bud+d+ha d+ha m+masaMb+he/ a saT+Ta ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dzA ya/ ag+har
dzAl ti dza hA/ ag+har dzA la ta dzitA/ pra ta kaM hUMphaT/ ba chen gyi phyag rgya'i sngagasaso// phyag rgya gcig pur gyur pa bdagi/ khro bo'i snying po sngags 'bar byed// mtshon cha ma
lus pa yib gco/ bdud rnams thams cad zhi bar byed// ji ltar dkyil la khong du khrib// d mchog ra shad par bya// ge con dbyig pa lta bu'i tshul// 'di ni bcom zhes par grags//
khyad par du na de yi rtser// yi dgas mgo bo mkhas mas/ yi dgas malortag tu dra// de las gzhan du zhums kyang min// rig 'dzin gyis cho ga bzhin// rgya 'di dur khrod
ji la ras gyi/ yang na 'di nyid legs shig tu// lagang gi tshon sgrub 'dod pa// sgrub pa dngos grub 'dod pa yi// rang gi dkyil 'khor dug tu bri// de nas phyag rgyu sgrub pa gi/
dkyil 'khor 'an na bshad par gyu/ snga marazhin du gru bzhi pa// yi dgas pa'i tshin 'dir ya nga gi/ de yi dadusasu khe bon dazhag/ phyogs brgyad rnams su de nga zhizhano/ khyab/
rgyud dang ldan pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya// de bzhin du lho yasgo/ gaphye ste de nas mchod pa bya// phyag rgya sdugs ma lus pa// khro rgyal rang gisnyil ma bya//
de las 'di namachod rgyur la// rim gyis gsang ba'i mchod byas 'gyur// on mo bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha lca/ o Asam+ba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha ma dza sag/ agir dzA la hA pra ta shi'i hUM phaT//
]'di'i khro bo rnam par rgyal pa'i gong du bcug pa 'batson gyi phyag rgya'i sngagasaso 'dis las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// des dngos grub kun gyis chog
ka khro bo'i gsolo de len// gsang ba'i mchod dang ldan ng yi// be con sgrub pa bshad par bya// snying po tre ba mdzes pa yi// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyadabyas l// 'dab ma rtse mo'i phyogs
brgyad du/ be con khro bo'i b.ru bcug bra// dbus su dag pa bzhag nas// gzhan rnams shar phyogs nas brtsams te// bskor ba'i tshul du go rims bzhin/ me tog
dag gis gzhag par bya// de can kun gyi sa bon hUM// yi dgas spyi bor gzhag par bya// thogamar o dang ldan byas te// o rung namamachod par 'gyur// a' pa khro ba rnam
rgyal gyi// sa bon d mchog yin par bshad/ oM AhUM/ oM namo bud+d+ha d+harmasaMg+ha/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// ba chen rnams ni thams cad kyang//
rang gi dam tshig bskul bar ldan// thams cad rang gi ngom tshig lon// de bzhin gshegs pa'irogs las byung// bskul ra'i gan rab ldan 'ang// khro ba'i lta bas brtags
a pa dang// rangarang rtags kyis bskuT na ni// de ma thag tu las byed 'grub// a 'ar khri bo rnam rgyal gyis// khro bo'il bas ngaltas pa'o// rang gi dam tshig dang ldan pa// hU~M
dang ldan pa bskul ba bzhin// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang dgug/ dbye ba dngul bskrad pa rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag pas mdor ni ba shad par bya// de yi thog
! mar yag mo// delas gzhan pasngags 'phel byed// der zhin khashegs pa'i dam tshig nyid// gsum pa yin par yongs su bsgrags// bzhi pa dngos grub ster ca'i yi//
'dir sngags la bskul ba'i tshig/ o ut+tAhU~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta hU~M swAhA/ zhes brjod pa sngags kyi bdag nyid do// mjug la h+phan khro bo yi// sngagasani'i phal bar byed
rar bshad// de las gzhan khyad par du// rang bas bskul r tshig gis khyed// dbang du bya bar 'dod pas na// rang gi ngo po smyos par bya// lhadabang dbang du byos sha'i
ces brjod nas tham sAtsA sbyar// zhi ba'i phyir bskul ba nyid// mjug tu bo ShaDa brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs rigs las byung ba'i// dpal ni mtshungs
med tshud pa yi// bskul ba'atshagakha mjug tu yang// nam A rtag tu sbyar// rgyas pa'i phyir ni sngon bzhin du// bsalanus po'aTasbyar bar bya// rgyas phyir bskul/
ba'i thog ma dang// thama'i khro bo'i skyo yang sbyar// gsad pa 'an phaT son pa/ 'bar ba 'di la lhag pa yin// rigs rnams b+hAmag par bya ba lo// hUMdabus khro dang ldan pa'i phaT/
