yid du 'ong bas mchod// aka panag po bzang po yi// bdug pa dgakyang sngagasakyis dbul// nyin re de ltar byas nas su// chog bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ dpalan bdag la stsol cig/
ces// mtha'am dug tu sbyar nas su// de nas n masU hAr ldan// tshog sngon bzhin sri bzlas te// de nas rgya mtshon rab 'gro ba'i// krung ga 'gram du song nas ni// lte banub par chur
'dug nas// ma rtagasur ka ni// tsan dan dkar pos bskus nas ni// brdzus shing bzlasashing chur 'bul la// blo dang ldan pas 'bul byas na// de yumajug tu dpal chen
tshun 'thob// yang na padamar pon// tsan dan dmar pos bskusanas ni// gal te de ru phulanan// ra nas de yi mtha' ma ru/ las 'di dag gis nges par na// mi zad pa yi gter
'thob 'gyur// a ti mug ta'am tog rnams// bzlas shang rgyus gange snga ma bag na// gal te chig 'bum phul na// tshogs gsungs pa bzhin gnas pa'i// sngags ras nges
par de mthar na/ 'di nor 'buman thing ral 'gyur// 'di la rnam par dpyad mi bya// de lta de yi snga ma bzhin// sum 'bum dngul bar byas na// gdon mi za bar gnod spyin ma// de yi
dbang du 'di 'gyur ro// chog 'diyas sgrub pa po// rin chen dgakyang thob par 'gyur// de ste sngags pas snga ma bzhin// me tog sna tshogs mang pan// tsan dan dag gis bsus pa/
rnams// de nas sngags pas tshig 'dum du// chu yi nang du phul na ni// sa yi steng na 'dod pa 'thob// yang na pad+ma dkar po ni/ mngar gsum dag gis bskus pa rnams// ma 'bar
nang du legs bsngags na// de yis dpa' bo mngon sum mthong// de yisade la'adod mchog dang// nor dag kyang narin par 'gyur// blo dang ldan pa zas kyi mchog/ mar dang sgrung rtsare sbyar
ba dang/ zhag bdun du na gza' bu yas// 'bar ba'i me la bsregs nas u/ yul gru bdun rnams rab tu 'thob// 'di'i rnam rar dpyad ma dgos// yang na 'bru rnams thams cad
kyi sbyin sreg don rnams thams cad sgrub// sbyin sAg gcig 'bum byas pa yi// re dganyidin mo zad 'gyur// bal bamar gyis bskus pa 'bum// mnarang tu 'bar la/
[rl]@#/ dbasregs nasas yi bdag po la// nor bcas dgaglob par 'gyur// dur ba' 'jag ma ma grugs la// nam smA hA mthar ldan pas// bo ma las pa smugs pasrogs
nan mi yachen ring bar 'gyur// de bzhin mar dang sbrang rtsi dag/ 'bar ba'i mi la rtag tu srog/ gdon mi za bar myur ba ru// yid gzhungs pa yang thob par 'gyur// rgya skyags shing gim
dag la// deng zhani nyin rem gyi nyam// casan tshod ngayid gzhungs grags// rgyas dang stobs dang gzi brjid dang// dran dang dga' dang mdangs bzang dang// dpal dang somasar 'i dngos grub
dab/ 'thab par 'gyur bgadon mi za// de bzhin zasa rnams na bsregs pas// gzi dang rgyas dang stobs dang grags// 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs// 'thob par 'gyur pa gdonami
za ji ltab chog pa ma las// phal cher 'jam dbyangs khro ba yi// pad+ma' lanas nges 'byung pa// de dgamador bsdus bshad pa yin// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo gshin
rdzog 'da rnam par rgyal ba'achog zhib mo kun gyi phyi ma las/ 'phags pa 'jamarangal gyi tre bo chogazhi ba mo ma'am pa 'phya pa ste dgung rdzogasaso///des chogathamasacad kyi/
i'i phyir zhes bya ba// sbyor bar bcas shing rgyas pa yi// chog dan bshad par bya// yi ge bcu bdun sngags kyin// dpa' bo brtu'azhugs bzang po dang// derazhani sngon du bstan
[8/]lasogs// tshog jugana' dare bshad zin/ da ni yi ge 'bru gcig pa// sngags mchog dag ni gang gsungs// de yalas kyi rig ra shad// dusab bo brtul zhugs med ra/ ra yang//
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo gang// ming nag shin rjegashedaces mya// de yasnying ro mchog de ni// hU~M zhes bya ba'i yi ge gcig/ thog mar o ra zhagachog bzhin// rimo'i spyan sngar 'dug
nas su// 'dan 'bum phrag bcur bzlasan// de yi 'og tu sgrub la 'jug de nas de yi ra mo mchog/ don rnams thams cad sgrub pa gzhan// gang gis dngos grub rab thob pa// tshul
bzhin dun ra btu bshad// sanA gsarapa khru gang tsam// legs par bkrus shing dris bskus la// na rtsi bzang po sngon mad pas// khro bo gshin rje gshed dra bya zhalan bgrad cing/
'jigs pa'i gzugs// sminam/ ra zhing yang sar// char sprin nag po 'i kha dog 'dra// thed pa dag bas rgyan du byas// spyan gsum dbu yang gyen du brdzas// zhal gcig pa la mdangs
kyang gsal// phyag gnyis pa la be con bsnams// phyag g.yon pas na bsdags par mdzad// zhabs kyang rab tu bzang po gnyis// ma ha lan bcas par bya// stag lpagis na bza'
mnabs par dgyes// 'khrugatsang 'jigs pa'i gsungayang 'byin// yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs ra/// 'od zer 'bar ba bcas ra'i sku// de nas de la mkhas pa yis//
mchod pa yin lag mchog gis mchod// sngags pa brtul zhugs brtan pa ni// de yi 'og tu brag phug zhugs// ri mo'i sman sngar 'dug nas su// kha zas za ba
dag spangs nas// ra dbangadenudzatsam du// g.yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas/ yang na khro bo gshin rje gshed// bzhad dam g.yos kyi bar du bzlas// yang n rab tu 'bar gyi bar// bzlas
na de tsho nangos grub 'thob// deltar lha 'di bzlas pa yi// dngosakhrubayamtshan de yan no// de nas rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan// grub par 'dod rnams kun bsgrubs pa// ci bsams pa
na de dag kun// ring por ma thogs 'byor pa/ ra 'gyur// khros nas yapa 'gas par 'gyur// chu dug kyang ni skamasarar 'gyur// ri rnams thamasacad snya'i bar nus// rgya mtsho dgakyang
skams par byed// de lasags pa'i las rnams ni// ya mtshan chen po thams cad dang// sems can rnams ni thams cad la// phan pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed// chog sngam gsung
pa kun// chog snga ma bzhin du bsgrub// bsgrubasanas sems can thams cad la// 'bras bu mchog rnams sbyin ra ra bya/ 'grub pa 'amathun gang yod ra// bder gshegs bsams/
na de dag kun// 'jungs pa med pa'i bsam pa yis// skyob 'phongs pa rnams la sbyin// snying rje can gyis bdag ga lus// 'phongs pa dag la rtag tu sbyin// de ltar sbyin pa'i
rol phyin// dri ma med par bsgrubs nas// dge ba 'di yis sems can kun// bde bar gshegs ldan dge par 'gyur// bde ba thams cad yongs rdzogs shing// dag pa kun gyi
snod gyuraces// yid kyis yongasasu bsngo bar bya// gang zhig de ltar sngags bsgrubs kyang// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// bder rtag tu spyod pa de// dngos grub rtog las
gang ba/sungs pa// de bzhin bshegs pa'i zhal nas kyang// thams cad de la nye bar gnas// sgrub pa po de rdzu 'phrulakyi// yon tan kun dwang ldan par 'gyur// de ltar 'jam dpal
khro bo zhal nas gsungs pa'i cho gan// khro bo rnam rgyal rgya cher bstan/ chog thams cad bsdus ra 'o// 'jam dar lagyi cho ga zhib mo khro bo thams cad rnam pa la rgyal ra ri ga
zhang mo bltasar las/ 'phags pa 'jug dar la gshin rjegashedakyi cho ga zhibam phyi ma yang phyi ma'am par phye ba ste bcu pa rdzogasaso//'jam pa'i dbyangs
kyi khro bo yi// yi ge gcig pa bshad zin te// de nas gzhan yang de yin// chog zhib tuny+tsa cher ngashad// gan rdzarab tu 'joms pa yi// zhalan hU~M zhes bya bar ro shad/ de nas
'jam dar la khro bo// hU~M zhes bya ba mchog rig bya// de yi dkyil 'khor gzhan yin te// 'dod pa kun sbyin shes par bya// dur khrod ba/nas su bya ba ste// dur khrod gnas pa gang yin
wa[k gg; ]/pa'i khru brgyad lasan sgo bzhang/ yang na khrung zhi pa yang rung// dur khrod gnas pa bzang po ste// dur khrod thal pas bri bar bya// de ya dbus su dgas ni// 'phrang
bdag gis brgyan pa drag/ sgor na 'debs ro smad gzhag/ mtha'achadag tun gopo gzhag/ gru bzhir shul nga zhi rnams dang// thod pa dag kyang bri bar r+ya/ gal pa bri bar nus na//
shA mkhas pas de dag thal bas bri// de ste de dag ri mon// brib dag tu minusan/ 'di tshes gzhi bzang po la// tsan dan dmar pos bskus nas su// dur khrod gnas su dang der ni// sngags
ras yug dgod par bya// de nas gashin rje rab 'joms pa// de ru spyan drangasamachod pa'i bya// 'jigs dazhalan 'bar ba drug/ de bzhin zhar sa kyang drug dang ldan// spyan gsum
char sprin sngon po'i mdog/ phyagakyang bco brgyad dag gis brgyan/ khro bo gshin rje rab 'joms ra// gzig lngagasan bza' gsol bar dgyes// mtshon cha bzang po du ma bsnams//
yi dgas steng du mchod ma// 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rjegashed// chog pa zhan du mdunasakyang// mar dang sbrang rtsisbyar ba yi// 'o ma'agran thug gtor mar dngulu a ka ru ya
bdug pa da dul// mar me dag nimar las bya// de nas gshin rje rab 'joms pa'i/sa bon yi ge gcig pa 'ad// khro bo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su// steng rtsa brgyad du bzlas par tshu
de yi 'og tu mkhas pa yis/ dur khrod gnas su slob mgazung// khro bo gshin rjegashed byed pa// hU~M ga ka lan zlosangashangagazud// btsudanas de yi snying kharan// hU~M zhes du ba ga zhig/
dar bya// de nas shula'i phyag rgyan// rasakyisagayogs te bcing bar bya// slobam dag la legs bstan nas// de yang mchod pa byed du gzhug/ de nas gzhi rje rab 'joms pa'i//
khro boman par dbang bskur nas// 'jam dwapal khro bo gshin rjegashed/ deya yi ga 'bru gcig sbyin// de nas mchod payang byas nas// khro bo de ni gshegs su gsol// gu la phyag
rgya bcingasanas su// de rakhani rtag par gshags su gsol// khro ba spyanan drang ba dag/ shu la'i phyag rgya ldan par bya// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas// shul rab tu bstan
par bya// mkhas pas lag pa gnyis dag gis// sor mo phan tshunubasnol nusasu/ nga mo'i/ ra mo mchog gnyis ni/ dbus nas gyen du bsgrunganus gzhag/ srin lag gnyis nang du
bcug mdzub mo gnyis kyi nang du gzhag/ de ltar de gnyis bsgreng nas// lhag ma rnams na legs par bya// gshin rjegashed kyi phyag rgya 'ad/ shula'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'o//
'dayo las rnams thams cad na// rnam par dpyad pa med par du// dmas gzhan yang rim par zhin// gshin rjerab tu 'joms pa 'ad// sngags rnams thams cad ma lus ra// dkyil
kha bar 'dir ni skyabar// o hutra/ dbus kyis dbus// oMtshul^alA yi dgasa' phreng ba'o// oM hUMdziraH ye dgas smad de slobazhi la du'o// oM hU~MhA/
'og ste tha ma'o// sa tshug/ kha phyogs la bzhi cu gyi'o// oM hU~M hri ha/ thod pa rnams kyi// lho phyogs kyi sgo khyenas// lhagam gzhan n gcad par bya/ 'dur khrod gnas su rtag par//
gshin rje su'ajoms par ni// sngags rnams kyisanu rab brgyan// dur khrod kyin gnas su 'gyur// tsan dan dmar pos bskus payi/ sa gzhi khru gang tsam 'a/ ji lta bur yang gangayang
rung dkyil 'khor dgan bris nas su// dkyilanAs chog shes pa yis// sngags kyisamachod pa rim bzhin gyu/ o shusI A gats+tshAAyAphra than sAhA/ spyan drangs pa'o// oM hU~M hikA la thAn ha/
mchod yon gyi sngags so/ oM hU~M tsit+tiTu kha/ pa'i sngagasas// o tsAhAhU~MhU~MhU~MhU~M/ ka ra la ra na ha ha ]ma tog gi sngagasas// a hUM// tshub shing hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// o
dzi drihA/ mar ma'i sngags so// oM hU~MAhU~MAhU~MAhU~M/ khad ka kha/ gtor ma'i sngagasaso// mahU~MAhA/ khro bo'i snying po'o// oM hUMhit+tegats+tsha hU~M du na ra ga mnAya swAhA/ slar gshegs
ga su gsol nga' grags so// 'jam dpal gyi cho gartsa dazhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ ga na rdzarab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bkad
0 pa' rim par ste bcu gcig pa/kadenas de yarimi mchog/ sgrub pa po yas bri par bya// ji skad gsungs pa las rnams bya'o// bzlas pa'i las ni ri ba tu bya/
ga phran khru gang tsam don/ khazang po gsar pa bkrus la/ tshon tshu dkar ngo sngan mad pas/ gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa bri// zhal drug dbu yang gyen du brdzas// de yang spyan gsum
'jigasa'ajoges ltar// khres ra'i phyag kyang btobargyad pa// khabs rnams rab tu gsal ba rdug/ gzig gi pags pa na bzlar gsol// tshul bzhin ya dgas stong na bzhugs//
la ral gri 'khor lo dang// dgra sta mgakyang sbyin ra 'i phyag/ lcagasamadab be con rdo rje dang// mda' ro tshe yang bsnams pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag ste g.yon ngan// dbyug to zhags pa ga shel
dang gzhu/ thod pa lcags kyi mdung thung dang// rtsa gsum gdangs dang de bzhin bsdigs// de ltar ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs/ bung ba dang ni sngon 'dra pa/ 32bris nas de yang legs par
sa ( yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dwapag tu// bzha gnas abazlas pa dag kyang bya// brgyus pa'i bag 'dir bshad na// rig pa 'dzin pas rtag pa ru// 'bar ba'i sngags kyis khrusabya'o//
bdud rtsi 'byung ba sngags kyis// thog mar tshul bzhin kha bkrusanas// bdag lus l sngags shes pas// danas pasung ba 'kha sar/na bya// dwaya'og tu tshog zhan/ mkhas
pas khro pa'i khang par 'jug/ zhugs nas ku phyag las byas pa'i// stan bzang de la 'dug nas su/ danas tshog sngon gsungs pas// khro ba lan mched
par bya// lag pa gnyis n dris ra skus pas// sngagasakyinor bu byas nas su// nyes pa'i skyon dpa sbyang ba'i phyir// khro bo bdud rtsi lan bdun bzlas// da nas sngags pas khra bo la//
mngon par phyogs 'dug bzlas par bya// rab tu na zhing rtse gcig yidA/ yid nu'i skyo bar du/ danas mkhas ras bzlas pa'i mthar// khro bo gshin rjer pa 'joms pa/ shu la'i
phyag rgya bcas gshegs gsol// de ltar legs pa'i nyin ra bzhin/ yi ga gcig pa'i sngags 'di'i/ rnam pa kun tu cho ga bzhin// gang zhig bye bgacig zlas pa// de yi dngos
grubadam pa 'thob// de nas gzhan yang ci bstan pa// khro be nyid kyis gsungs pa/ya// chog dag gi sngagasa rnams na/ sgrub pa rnams la phan phyir bshad// oM hUMrAmA te dzam+b+ha// khrus

kyisngags so/ e hUM a mr-i ta pra ba raM la/ kha bkru ba'i sngags so// oM hU~Msasarba go rak+Sha man+ta ta thA ga to dz+hAn pa ya tisA/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga te skyahUMmany+dza glu 'a

dzAnayasapo du TaM ban d+ha ban d+hu sAhA/ gdug pa rnams bcingama'o// namasarba ta tha ga te Sh+yatshud+maka pra kA ri phaT/ re ba'i sngagasaso// in masarba ta thA ga ta smyahU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~MhU~M/ yo ma

[j]pam b+han ra kA rakA/ namasajulhu ta b+haye d+hUta tha ga ta dzAn pa ya ti swAhA/ 'di ni yan lag thams cad srung ba'o// a hU~M kA la ma than paT/ khro bo'i khang par 'jug pa 'a sngagasaso/ oM hU~MrakA
rak+Sha maMswAhA/ gdan gyi sngags so// oM hU~Ms kyi ra hUM dzra/ sngags kyi nor bu blang ba'i sngags so/ oM hU~M kro d+ha a ti dzugad snga ba sAhA/ sngagasakyanir bu lagadab pa'i sngagasaso//
'jam dar la gyi rtsa ba'irigashib mo tre bo rnam par rgyalaba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ gshin rje rab tu 'joms ra'i yi ge gcig par ma dang/ mchod pa dang/ bzlas pa'i chag rim par
phyi bste bcu gnyis pa'o////dayisngon du bsnyan pa// skye ba gcig tu nges par bshad// khro bo bskul zhugs phyis spyad n// dngos grub mchog na thob par 'gyur//
gshang las byas r 'i thod ran// nyi shu rtsa drug sorachodakyus// mkhas pas rtse gsum non ron// lag ra g.yas dang g.yon du bzung// gzig lpags kyis gos bgos nas//
lus n thal ba drug gis bsku rus pa dag gi 'phrang ba yis// rgyan du byas nas brtul zhugs spyan// 'jig rten 'jigs par byed pa yi// gad ma sgra chen dag kyang 'byin// dur khrod
dman shing gcig gam// ba bam yang namaMl yang rung// mkhas pas zla ba drug tu ni// lci babaza' zhing bu rtul zhugs spyad// blo ldan grong du yong ma'ajug/ mnyam par bzhag cing
tshigami smra// gtsang zhing tshangs par sbyar pa dul// rtag tung de gshegs sems dang ldan// byang chub sems dang kun ldan zhing// khrob brtul zhugs gang
spyod cing// rtag tu bzlasalabartson byed pa// den dungosachub mchog thob 'gyur// gshin rjerab tu 'joms pa 'di// dngos grub gzhan du yong mi 'gyur// gang tsho 'di yi brtul
zhugs na// bsnyan par bya bar minusan// de tsho lta ba zazhingan// tshul bzhin bye ba gsum du bzlas// bzlas pa byas pa'i tha mar yang// mkhas pas mchod pa rgya cher bya//
denas sna ma'i ma tagastong// ra mo lug la phog par dbul// rig pa 'dzin pas legs pa ru// deyas phag par phul nas ni// gang tshe'ar tu ltar gyur pa// de tshor mo rdo
yisan// nam mkhar 'phar bar gdonam dra// denus rig 'dzin thams cad kyi// mchog tu 'gyur tethog mar 'gro/ 'on te phog par phul na ni// rab tu g.yo ba'agyuranan//
chog zhib las bshad pa bzhin// del dngos grub 'brang du 'gyur// de ste rab tu ma g.yo bar// rim rang bzhin du 'dug l// dngos grub tha ma thob da ra 'gyur// ji ltar 'bras
lta burnam gsum bshad// lus nyon mongs spyad pa las// dngos grub rnam gsum 'thob par 'gyur// brtul zhugs sbyang la rab tu 'bad// yang na chu klung dag bza'/ ci'i
[@]/ ma chags phyugs gcani btung// byung chub sems dang kun ldan na// de tshe dngos grub dmar 'thob// rig pa'i mchog kun bsgrubs pa la// dngosachunga mchog dang 'bring rnams dang// tha
mdag ni sgrung ri'aphyir// 'di dag spyir na sgrub bstanayin// gang tshe dngos grung mchog rnams dang// 'bringeyang gal te ma 'dod la// longs spyod rtag tu 'dod na// de rtag par bzlas par
'do yi cho ga gzhan dag kyang// de nas mdor na bshad par bya// sa ga'i rab tu mdangs dga' la/ lcababazang pos bsus ral// ran tsan dan dmar po yi// dkyil 'khor dgan
mkhas pas bya// deyang bzang po khru gang tsam// rab tu mnyam zhing yid du 'ong// gangagAn rje rab tu 'joms pa'i gang// dkyil 'khor dur khrod gnas gsungs pa// de nas der na sngags
dag gis// dkyil 'khor mchog de byas nas ni// de yi 'og tu sngagasarag pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i las dag gis// ci ber pa dang nyinusakyis// khro ba lan mchod par bya/ 3
nyi marar chog bzhin// bzlas de dgakyang stong du bya// de ltar rtag tu byas pa yis// 'dod ra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rten tham can dga' bar yang// gdon mi za bar 'grub par/
'gyur// de yi dgra yang med par gyur// nad mad pa/ra na gdon mi bya// de yalongs spyod 'thal bar 'gyur// rgyal ro'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur// gang zhig rtag par chog 'das//
gshin rjegashedan zlos byed na// de las de yi dbang po dang// g.yo dang mi g.yo 'jig rten rnams// byang chub sems ldan de yin// dbangan 'gyur ba gdon miza'
'jamanar 2 gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khri ba rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ gshin rje rab tu 'jomasar 'i yi yig 'bru gcig pa'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba ste btsu gsum pa'o//
de nas gzhan yang brtul zhugs kyis// sgrub pa'i las zlums bshad par bya// dngos grub mchog rnams thams cad na// ga ni rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/ brtul
zhugs dga' danyid kyis// rnam pa kun tu bskyab par bya gal chen dngos grub mchog rnams// brtul zhugs med ra/sa mi 'grub ste// de rasagashin rje la joms pa yi// brtul
zhugs spyan pa byas nas su// dngos grub mchogo rnams 'gas par bsgrub// mkhas pas gzhan lam yin no// ji skad bstan pa'i mtshon cha rnams// rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i tshig bzhin//
sngags rig sbyor ba snga ma ragazhi// de dgartag tu legs par bsgrub/ de la 'dir ni rtog pa ru// dur khrod gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub thams cad rab spyin pa// bye brag
tun logs shig gsungs// ral gris 'og rolangs dang// mig 'phrul any+dzaga'u wang dang// yung kazab zla btsag rnams dang// gzhan yang las dag cha'i nor dang// mi snang ba dang
rkang mgyogs dang// gsara'agyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len// gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrub pa dang// klu yi bu mo la sogs bsgrub// dgug pa'i tshog dam pa yis// bud med dam pa sbyar
bsgrubs// rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i chogayis/ tshulang zhin gnas nasabasgrub par bya// dolas 'do chu bo bad yi ge 'bru gcig khyan ra ra bshan// de nas dza skad gsungs bstan kun//
ma smos pa yang bsgrub par bya// 'jam dar la khro bo'asnying po 'di// hU~M zhes bya ba rgyas raste// da ni rtsa ba'i chog yin// bsdub yongs su ra sgrubs pa 'o// 'jam dar la gyi rtsa ba'i cho
gzhib mo dre ngo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ khro bo gshin rjegashed kyi rtsa ba'i chog zhar mo bsdus pa rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//rtog pa mdo ru
bsdus pa dang// rgyas pa dag tu bshad pa dang// brtul zhugs dang nangs pa yis// de nas khro bo gze wan gyi// zhal drug thu zhes bya ra'i sngags/ bzlas pa tsam gyis grub
mnaM/ gsang ba mdor bshad par bya// drartul zhugs spyad dang brtul zhugs dag/ de dag 'di la yod med de/ lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang/ [】]las rnams thams cad
khyad par gyur/ on masarba ta thA ga ta shu pUhU~MhU~MhU~MhU~M/ yam pra ma thArak+ShamAsarba b+hu ta b+ha ya h+phu/ ta thA ga to rlon ma ya ti sAhA/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gsum 'di/ khro bo bsgrags pa
tsam gyis 'grub// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// de rtagar ra bzlas// dngosagrub thams cad ster bar bshad//
dur khrod gnas su rtag par ni// rtag tu blos ma chog pa res// lha dang lha min du zad ng// gnod sbyin srin po klu yi rigs// dpag tshad bdunan khor yug tu// de yi gzisana' ra ba
sgyu 'gyur// khro bo gshin rdzagashod mdzad// zhal drug hUM ga sngags 'don// gang zhig blos ba byed pa// 'god ma'agro'ajig rtan// de la dka' ba cung zad med// zhal drug
zhes bya ba'i sngags// shu la phyag rgya ldan pa ni// khra bo rnam rgyal rgyud bdal// de ni grub par rab tubasgrags// dur khrod gnas su chog bzhin// de yi sngon du bsnyan pan// thog ma nyidi
sgyu du chig 'bum// de nas rtag pa'i cho gar spyad// rtag par skyon ra 'tshog yis// de nas chig 'bum bzlasazhus kyang// de 'og ji skad gsungs pa// las rnams kyis na grub 'jug
tshur rtog pa'i ga yis// de nas thams cad las grub par// zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba yi// chog 'dir namador bshad pa// 'jam dpal la khyung khro len// hU~M zhes bya ngo'i zhalanyid
yin gshin rjegashed ces mya rar grags/ 'dal dka' ba'ang ci'ang min// khro bo zhalanas mnon// chog bzang po tsagasungs ra gi/ chog de bzhin bdag gis shar
[z/ ]zhal rdul shules bya ba 'dis// hU~M zhes bya ba drug tukhasgrags/ da bzhan la/khan yang rtog pa ru// hU~Mgam bzhi re skul bar skye// hUM daM kA la'i phyag rgyar ldan// ri rnams kun kyang gas
par byed// yuM tA reb tu sbyar nan// myur du ras kyang gas par 'gyur/ tshig rig sngags thams cad dang// mtshon cha rnams ni gcod pa'i rashad// shul 'phyag rgya dang ldan par//
hUM kha rtag mar rab sbyar nas// snang ba rnams n za ba dang// dgra yi dpung dag rab tu 'jig/ hU~M ga rab tu ranan// glang da gan pa rab tu bsgrags// hUM tha mtshon na kun 'phal
tsho lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed// hU~M hadapung rnams 'jigs pa dang// rmongs par byed pa yongs su bsgrags// hU~M dgra rab tu sbyar zhun// phan tshun mtshon cha 'khrug par byed//
hU~Ma rab tu sduranan// sur yang thal mkhyen payin// hUM ga glang po seng ge dang// rta dang mi dang bya rnams dang// gu dngashing rta' bzhon ra dang/ 'bab chu dag kyang myur ba 'ad// shu
la phyag rgya ldan byas na// gnod pa bcad ra'i mchog yin no// tshu ba rab tu sbyarinan// mnan pa rtag tu thar par byed// shud+haM tu sbyar na// lha dang lhaman gzhan yang rung/ dngos
grub phram thams cad la// bskul n de 'dras bur 'gyur// hU~MpaM kun tu dbang byed pa// tshamar ra bzhag dbye bar byed// rta dang sbyar na sdang bar byed/ ]ma dang sbyar ba gsod
par byed/ yadang sbyar na de bzhin gsod// la dang sdur na mig 'phrul byed// zhi dang rgyas la 'ba' zhig go/ de la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang// rtsab chogs
sbyar bar bya// de nas skad gsungs khag las rnams kyisan sgrub par byed// de ltar gs rje gshed banayi// dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo rnam rgyalagi/
ga ra'i yi ge gcig pa gang/ 'jam dpal khro bo gtso bo yi// gsang ba gzhan dag bshad pa yin// 'jamadapal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi mi lus/
pa khro bo'i rgyal po ka na rjegashed la drug/hU~M zhes bya ba las byung ba'i cho ga zhib rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas chog zhib rgyas pa/ gzhi rje gshed po
sgyu gcig bu yi// chog kun gyi mchog dang rab// don grub ces pa bshad par bya// de la 'go 'dzin dpal ldan pas// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir// mnyam bzhag byang/
nubasams ldan pas/ thog mar dkyil 'khor bri ba mya/mtsho'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam// gcong rong dur khrod duyang rung// denang de nas bortagasanas// ma tog sil ma dang/
gis brgyan// dpa' bo gcig pu'i sngags 'khor bas// me lce 'bar bas 'khrug byas te// sa dang skyu ru ra lasogs// khasangasanas khrus la brtsam par bya// rig 'dzin khrus
byag gtsang chayi// de nas sngags des thamasaNan// bdag gi lus la dgod par bya// khro mig dmar por gyur payis// de nas s phyogasag tsang mgi/ phyag dar thong dra yongs
sngangs pa// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags zlosashing blta bar bya// dems khro bo gshA'i rjegashed// dpa' bo gcig pu'i sngags zlos shing/ dkyil 'khor
bzang po gru bzhi par/ dur khrod thal bas khri bar bya// nub phyogs sgo gdong sgo bzhi par// de yi dbus su pad+ma shri/ be con phyagargyu rtse'abar ba/ 'gru bzhi dag tu bri bar bya// bdazhi po
tsanamang po yin// shulan nyan gyi shul mang// mdung thung rnams kyis yongs bskor// de bzhin mdung thung mngazheacu// de bzhin thon lamang ro yin// ma'i rang ldan mar mang//
mar mi sdug ma med pa// yid gas 'baranangasan po na// phyogs bcu kun nas 'jigs pa can// denadurakhrod mang zhes bya// gas rjegashed po dar ba yi// dkyil 'khor
rnamar rlag tu bshad// de'abaconamang pon// longs spyod thams cad 'phal bar bshad// sbrul mang po sran rnams na/ 'joms pa'i ng tu bsgrugs pa yin// de bzhin mdung thung
mang ngo// khagags rnams thams cad tshar gacor mgo/ thod pa mang zhes bya ba rnams/ 'khrul 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jigs// ma'imang po zhes bya ba// langs thamasacang
sgrub pa'o/ dur khrod ma mo' ba grags pa// dngos grub thams cad ra ra spyan pa go/ de la rad+mo'i dbus sug/ 'jam pa'i dpal gyi khro re'i mchog/ gan rje
gshed ces bya ba de// cho ga bzhin du bzhugs par bsam// in+d+ra nA la'i bcag 'phro mdog/ zhal drug spyan yang 'jigs par gzigs/ khros shing zhal yang brgyan pa ste/ 'jigs
b+hU 'jigs skul 'jigs par gano// spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes// choms kyis sgros mnan 'jags 'jigs sku// bcobargyad phyagazhi dran par bya// khabs kyang rab tu 'bar
drug mi'o mgo med 'phrang ba yis// so ral kha yis rgyan du byas// mdung thung thung zhags pa yi// ral lcags kyu mchod thogs/ la rdo rjod byug torung// bcon mtshon cha
rnams dang// deltar g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams// g.yon pas bsdigs shang sri'i bu dang/ thod pa bzang po kha rgyu ga/ mamag rlon dang keng rus dang// 'jigs pa'i maro dbyug to
'khor// de dag phyag na rtag tu thogs/ 'khro bo gshin rje gshed ro na// shi ba'iya stangan bzhugs// 'jigs pa mtshon gdengs 'jags 'jigs lta// dur khrod na rtag tu
pa zhugs// sbrul dang srin po thams cad 'joms// lha rnams kun gyis phyab byas sha// khro bo thams cad legs par 'dud// sku rab tu 'bar ba can// 'khrug cing bar tu za
pa rnams// stag lpags na bza' mnabs rar dgyes// 'jig rten lhan khro bo rnams// mtshon mdang mthu snangs nas// rjes su 'brang zhing phyag myus pa'i// log shani rdzog shad/
dran ga/ de ltar 'jigs med byas nas su// bdag gisngags kyis dran byas nas// stsanadrangs tshan dan gyis bskus nas// ma tog sosakyis mchod rab bya// rtag tu rig pa 'dzan pa
yas/ tsan dan dmar po dbul khar/ ranug dang na gtor mayis// rim pa bzhin du mchod nas ni// sor ma khro bo'i sngags drug dang// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dag gis//
btsud nas me tog 'dor du gzhug/ de nas 'ga' yi dar la dang ldan// bdudatsathab sbyor bzlas nas su// 'phrang pa tshun dan dkar la sogs// mchod rabyas nas slobam la// donas
sangs rgyas spyan yang bzlas// khro bo gshin rjegashed po ni/ 'jigs pa pha rol non pa sbyin// lha khyod bdagags mnosaso zhes// de skad slob mas lan gsum smras/ donas
sngags 'ag chog bzhin// blam dab la phyag byas nas// chog bzhin du dbang bskurangs// khro bo ba/ shin rje gshed pa bzlas/ 'jamadapalagyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo bro rnam par
rgyalang ma'i yang bya ma zhes bya ba las/ khro kho'i rgyal po gshin rje bshed rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o///degs gzhan yang gshin rje yi// gshen po'i sngags
'di mnos nas su// ma'i dug ga gos blangs nas// de la de yi gzugs kyang bri// de nas chon rtsi sbyin med pas// bzang po snga ma bzhin du bya// bzad re khru
khang tshad du bya// yang na khru bzhi' tshad du bya// gangatsho sngags pa bdaganyid kyis// bri bar mi nus de yi// bzo bo smyung ba byas pan// khrims mnos pa dag 'du 'u gzhug/ kaM
ba'ang yi snying du bzhugs// phyagani bco brgyad rnams kyis brgyan// zhalajug zhabs kyang drug tu bstan/ 'jigs paganon pa 'jigasa'ajigs lta/ kha cig bzhad cing kha
cigan lngags 'dral kha cigamache ba gcigs/ kha cig zhal gdangs bcig khros// kha cig 'jigs nga pharel ga'o// khro bo de 'dra 'gal 'dra ba/ snyan tshoms ra la spyan
yang sar// ji skad gsungs pa'i mchon cha rnams// phyag na panyams pa bri bar bya// dben zhing 'du 'dzamed ra ru// sngags pas de ltar 'di'i gzhug go/ deltar bris nas sngags
mkhan te/ 'gram la na nga ltas nas 'dug/ gangashes ngas 'bumar zlas che/ 3ram grog ras de nyate kyis// las bsgral 'jug par bya// gzhi rdzog shad po re yasngags//
tshal drag ro gangayan de bshad do// o de ya dang po yin// sa zhes bya ba gnyis pa yin/ kro zhes bya ba gsum pa ste// rta zhes bya ba bzhapa yin// ka zhes bya ba lnga payin/ yazhes bya
ba gsang ba drug/ mAn zhes bya ba bdun paste/ gtan brgyad par shes par bya// ka na dgu ste shu dngabcu// de bzhin phar byalhag pa ste// mamanyam sngagasan re chu gcig pa'o// 'jam dpal
chazhi khro bo mchog/ gshin rjegashed ces bya ba de// chog phyi ma'i phyi ma ste// sangs rgyas kun gyisa mngon bstod pa'i// sngags de daltar mnos nasasu// cho gas mnos nas bzlas
casan/ rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur// oM a kro d+ha ka ya mAnaka hU~M pha3/ ga shin rje gshed po lha'i lha'o/ 1oM a mr-i ta ku la/ sarba rAg+hAnA/ t+ta hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ bdud
chu thab sbyor gyi'o// o burlu latsane swAhA/ sangs rgyas sman gyi'o// de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi/ gnas dag ji ltar yin par bshad// dur khrod ya ngan rayang rung/ tshang tshing
bats+tsha'i mtsho 'gram du// khro zhing gan rjegashed po na// bzusan dngos grub thob rab gyur// ku sha' la ya stag lab nug/ gamo lan phyogs 'dug ste// lag pa gnyis ka dris
bskusanas// ru kA yi 'phreng the gsal// sngags pas rtag tu bzlas par bya// de bzhin 'dug pa mgur dbul// myur ba dang na bul dang/ de bzhin ya ge 'dres par na//
mayang smra ba yongam bya// rtag tu rab tu gsal bar smras// chog bzhin du yidebasamasanas// bu don lan sims bzhagaste// skyo bamed pa'i sems kyis/ mag go rams
bzhin dubazlas// dum gcig bzlas pa'i thaman// bsgrub bya ba bshad kyis nyon// mtsho 'gram du dkyil 'khor ni// dugakhrod mang po bral khya// de yi
nang du ri mo bkram/ sems dang bamtshan mo zhugs nas// grogs bzang sems kyang m rmosapa// gu gul bdug ra de bzhin sreg/ zlosangashangs ma'i mi rtog stong// snying khar phog par
bya zhing dbul// de nas khro bog shAn rjegashed// rim la bzhugs khro de'i sman// rimo de nangs pa 'u// g.yo 'am yang n 'gul bar 'gyur// de nas lha de grur gyur nas// gang 'dod
ba yibs rnams khyed// de sta grubaparamagyuran/ (gzhan yang tshig 'dum byas par bya// de nas de mtha' mar bsgrub// des kyang grub gsum re la// mtshamasamad lnga rnams byed
pa yang// gdon mi za bar 'grub par byed/ grub pa las rnams gang dag 'di// byed pa ra'agyur ba bshad par bya// sgrub par dka' pa las rnams kyang/ g.yade la gang dang gang
'dod na// de dga mthar phyin myur ba na// 'ag sngags 'chang bedar mgyur// ga rnams kyi na tsamo nang// gcong rong rnams snyol bar byed// sa yang rang tu'ags byed
tshu tshudag kyang ni skams pa nus// dpung rnams m g.yoganon par byed// khrag gacharan 'debasarar byed// stong ngamayang na 'bum yarug/ de ma thag du gsod par nus// gnad
0 pa dang ni rmongs pa dang// de mthug tu 'bab par byed// shing rta'am yang na gru ga dang// glang po skyes ba gnon par nus// pha rol dpung dag 'khrug par byed// yul phyogasu myur du rmongs
par nus// khros nas sa yang g.yo bar byed// grung dang nags tshal srog par nus// de nasegang da' mtsho yang skems// bskams pa dag kyang 'gangs rar nus// sngon yang legs par
gnon par nus// char ra dag kyang 'debs par byed// dus man rnamayang badregs pa gnus// ku ya bdag po dag kyang 'gugs// de na nag pos zin pa yang// mthong ba'am yang
na na tsam gyis// 'gags par byed dpechom med/ sor ba dang na sol ba'i chab// de ma thag tu 'bebs par nus// 'bras bu me tog mchog rnams dang// yal ga dag gis lo rgyan
pa'i shing/ khams pa'i m yan rdo 'bangs dus// glo bur du yang 'gyel bar byed/ des sbyar ba tsam gyis su// sa 'og kyang ba khrug par byed// de bzhin lha dngam rnams la//
gnod pa chen po 'byung bar byed// khro bo rgyal ro 'dapa'i// nges par dbang du ma 'gyur ngag dngos po 'das dang daltag dang// phyis byung ba dag gang yang med// lha de grub par ma gyur
kyang// mthong ba tsam mi mchog gis kyang// dug dang 'ams dang gdon rnams sogs/ zhe ra byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// dbang du byed dang dbye ba dang// gsad dang bskrad par bya ba dang /
@#// mig 'phrul a dza bsu ba rnams// dadug da nga dris khyugs sgyur ba yis// las rnams 'di dag thams cad na/bzlasal brgya byas thub par byed// sngags
pa ga ter chen yod par// song ste bsgrub par byas nas su// bgegs rnams kyis bgegs dar// zhedu zlas nga stong byas pas// bdag gi bzhed nas len pa yin// phramo rnams zhi
shAng yis 'thor// bzlas dang sbyin sreg ma dus kyang// gshin rjegashed kyi ming tsam gyis// lha rnams skrag bar gyur na// ring por ma thogs ga don ba// ma rungs rab zhib
nang// can dang stabs da ga khyab dang/ rmongs dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rnams// bltas rasa rnam pa dumaya/ chog la/zhasakyi chog yang// ring rogamazigs 'grub pa'i zhus/ yul dang
waM ul phyogs dpag tu yang// gnod ra dwang zhan kyang ba na// rmugs pa dang na gnod pa dang// rmongs dang mi mthong byed pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang nasgrig pa dang// skyo gang slar yang g.yo ba dang//
nor 'gugs pa dang gzhi pa dang// skye bo dag kyang 'gugs ra dang/ yul du 'amozhing 'jigs pa dang/ 'khrug pa 'thubamosarapa dang khrub nyin ni skyes radang// gang yagazhan dag
de 'dod pa// sngagasaro'akhazhirjegashed dran pas// de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas chog phyi ma ba ni// jiltar yin pa de bshad do// snyam in zhugaskorasong/ mkhas pas
ri mo bkramagasasu/ kha zas khra stan gcig 'dug khri yi grangs tshad bzlas byas nas// de nas tud yon gzugs mchog ldan/ bzapo rnams na sgo phyunas// sgrub pa de yi mdun
duni/ nang du gshegs shes dga' bar byed// danas grogs ro yid gcugs dang/ sgrub pa po lhan cig tu// nges par dam tshig dag gsan// de yi gnas su 'jug rar mya/ de
bzhin ji ltar 'o dod pa ru/ gnod sbyin ma ya mong rnams dang// shAkhra mo la ma dri ba mo// yong na gang 'dod paya lhag/ ming gras de yi mdun bzha gnas // 'a mo la nyin re zhing// de yi
tshig mthar rgyab nas// mi skyo bar na 'bum bzlas na// sgyur ra po des 'jigs la gyur nas// de dag thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur// sgrub po ji srid 'dod pa 'dar las rnams
phyed par gyur// lha rnams dgan thams cad kyang/ gnod sbyin la sogs bsgrub bshad zin/ 'di ya la phyamaya// phyim dag kyang/ shad ra ra bya// ri mchog dag gi tsamol//
yarigs mang pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// yid gs dkyil 'khor branas kyang// kun la sha ya gtor ma bya// grogs po sems dara' ba dang// yon tan ldan zhing bzo ba dang// maro'i gos
la bris pa yi// ri mo bzhag la de nas su/ bad ga ga yan lag thams cad las// rus pa dug gis khragaphyung ste// mayi thod pazhing du ga lhag/ lus larbag na ru phyin pa// ma'o'i
1@#/ sgra yi pa'i dag gis// de nas de yi lus dpag dang// mig kyang 'ab tu bsal bar bya// de la dgegs kyang mang du 'gyur// den ni ra' ros bshad par gsungs//
dang 'aredag gi las kyang// de yi 'og tu bgro gog/ dpa' bo dag gis yonayang dbul// de nyid yongs su rdzogs par// gyur kyi bar tu tshul bzhinakyis// thamar dpa' bo gcig
wA mu de/ ri mo mtshan mor rab 'bar ram/ yang na dgod dmagayo yang 'bya/ de nas dngos grub thob par bshad// ri mo den byas pa yis// namamakhar 'phar ba gdon mi za// dpal
ldan thogs pa med par go// mtshon mnyam bzhin du 'bar// dar ba bo dag gis sgyur ma 'di// rig 'dzin kun gyi thog mar 'gro// grub pa de la lcan masakyang/ gdon mi zabar phyag
'tshal gyur// rig 'dzanamasan thams cad kun// kun tu bkur ba'i rgyal por gyur// yang nachog shes pa'i rgyal// rim zhing sngon pa'i du// blangs te bsregs pa snying
du gzhag/ de nas bsregs pa de 'dugs// gcig pu lagri glangs nasau// mtshamo gsha'i rjegashed bzlas pa/ 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du'am// du dbamatsho 'du
bzlas/ 'ba' bor gyur pa dpal dang ldan// rig 'dzan dun de 'gyu'o// dubatsung bas mi mang ga namamakhag 'gro ba'i mchog tu 'khrug/ de bar gyur na// sal rgyal
por nges par 'gyur// ral gri mchog de bya ra yang gsor gsum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ng// yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bsgrub pa/ bya ba so ya rdo// deltar rtog phyi ma yang//
mdor nalegs par rashad payin// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor moyas/ mthe bong sgrasanasagyen du// bsgreng bar byas pa'i phyag rgya ya// be con zhes n bsgragasalayin// hanyani
kyisan sngagasaldan par// las rnams kun la bcing bar bya// spyan drang ba dang mchod pa dang// gshegs su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang/ las rnams khyaba'i tshodag dang// gzhan
yang dgos pa 'byung ba 'tshi// tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di bcings nas// gak+kin rje gshed [”]lha ba rdzasaso// sngags pa rgyal po'i drung song nas// mgo btud pus mo btsugasanas su//
bdag nyid dang nang bcas par// gdonami za bar myur du 'thung/ 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba 'cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyudachen po thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ ngacom ldan
'das 'jam dpal gshin rjegashed kyi gsal bsha khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i chog zhib mo phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba bcu bdun pa bsal shangag rgyudardzogs so//
kroN+hi kaya man+ta ka hU~MhU~M phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ 'di'i nga bcom ldan 'das kyi sngagasagazhanano// oMAhU~M 'di'ang ga zhan/ yi ga 'chu gcig rgyal po yi// de nyid bzlas pas grub
par 'gyur// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// tshu pa dang ni phyi ma dang// de bzhin phyima'i phyi ma 'ad// rtog ra ma lus rgyas pa dag// lha de rnams kyis legasags nas//
ba yig rten 'jig rten 'dus pa kun// thal mo rab tu sgyur nas kyang// khro ba rnam par rgyal ba ni// gshAn rje gshed la 'di skad smras// bcom ldan khyod kyi rtog pa 'di sgrub pa rnams
la phan pa'i phyir// rab tu ngomatshar bshad lags te// bzlas dang gom dang mchod la sogs// khro bo chen po'i brtul zhugs dang/ de bzhin dka' thub drag po dang/ ngaskad gsungs
pa'i snang ba yis// khro lo kAlo kil la// sogs pa'i ng dus la bab pa na// sngags zlos pa la dngos grub ster// bcom ldan 'das kyi rtog pa dang// khyad par gyur pa ci zhig mchis//
de bas bzlas dang sbyin sreg dang// sgrung dang brtul zhugs dka' thub dang// med par rang dbang nyidadun// dngos grub dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha mchog de dag thams cad kyis//
phyag 'tshal de skad smras pa dang// khro ba drag tu bzhad pa yis// rab tu drag pa'i tshig 'di gsungs// drag tu bzhad pa'i zhal 'dzum pa sa// lhayitshog sa rnams 'jigs rmongasal//
tsa/ ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes gsungs pa// phan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyung nas// khyed rnams kyis ni gang smras pa// sgrub pa dgan mod par yang// sbyor ba shes pas 'grub
0 gyurang rnams kun gyisamanyan par gyis// bde gshegs dangos grub gcig pus// gyes pa rnam pa tha dad 'gyur// de nas ting 'dzatshulalas// mtshan mdang dngos grub
da tho gam khyang chub rtsa la brten// shes rab de lta bu yang bsgom// sems kyang rnamamaram rtog pas// bde gshegs dngos grub de dwag zlob// dang gzugasaugyur ces// sa
bon mtshonam ma nga moraldag/ khro bodiyan la drug bsgyug/ dril bu gsal ba'i sgrayang 'byin// khro bo' na'abacas par ldan// demagazi dngamathu ldan byas// kun tu dga' ba'asnying
po ldan// gang gi yid la gangabasgoms pa// do la ngayathugs g.yos pas// dzilta ba bam ba ngayang rung// mdun nam yang na rgyab nas kyang/ las kun byed zhus grub par 'gyur//
la dran ga phyag lnga bcu// bcon gdengs pas snagasapa'i mdzad/ dri'ajal gra dgra sta kyu// thod pa shAkati thod dmar dag/ de dag lasan phyag gsum drug g.yas
par conamada' ra'agro// g.yog 'khor la rdo rje 'dzin// rdoN+Dirdzagacigamag drug nga// dpral ba'i gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang// khro gnyen bstar ba'alta bam/ 'jigs pa'i
sgrul gyis lo stod dkris// thod pa dag gis rgyun du byas// char sprin sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// zhal gcig sdun yang mnyamar/ 'brug gi sgra dbyangs sgra sgrogs pa// stag lpags
na bza' gsol ba'adagyes/ mtshonachamachon rnams 'abaganang bcug/ rdzun dang gtsug bud rtsa dma'aser// zhabs gnyis gdengs da tsham ma mdzad/ saya stong
naza khra lta// mchab d ga kyang gcig gus pa'i zhal// bcangs ra ma habacangs pa ste// sems ra'am ri mo la bris pa// sgrub po myur du mchod byed// de la myurang ru// dgyes nas
mngon du phyogs par gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rnams// gdon mi za ba grub ra ra byed// rnam par gnon pa'i gzugaMs 'dono// bdud lasargyal bayin par basgrags// thogamar
bdag gis dmatshigasbya/// bsung mchogatshul bzhin byas nasau// ras 'dasum cusoratshadal// sngags pa mthoge yon tan nyan// yin te rtan pa bya ba'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas su
ma mngon dang// tshon rtsi dge ba bzang po yis// ri mo thog mar bri bar bya// zanas kyang n dpe na par gzhag/ sulabang bstan pa yong ma mya ngayi gzugs su gyur par byas//
sa bon mtshon chab zang por ldan/ drungayi'a' na khri bar 'gyur// du'i bu gsal ba'i sgra dang ldan// khro be galan resam par bya// ngaya gzi brjid mthur ldan byas// kun dga' yin
snying poraldan// gal tedamatshig mi ldan magi/ skye bosaromo d mthong// myur du rnam par myos par 'gyur// dengasa rnam pa thams cad du// bsrung ba drag po lkog tu bya// gong ngam yang
na grong khyer du// rnam pa gzhan du pazhigagyur tam// gong du mchod pa ma byas na// myur du 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur// mi la ni gnas pa'i gzugs// de ltar rtag tu gams byas shing//
der sgyur de yi mad du 'gyur// ji sridabang dag goms gyur cing/ kun tu mdun na gnas pa ru// gang tshe mthong bar gyur pa na// de tshe ra mo med pa yang/ ji lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis//
rtag tu sbyor ba lus nasazhi// sbyor ba nyid kyis rtag par// khro bo kun tu sbyor ban// de las las rnams thams cad byed// 'a dan gsang ba bstan ra yin// yang n bdag nyid de 'dra
bar ji srid gcig tu gyur pa'i dar// yid la legs par bsgoms na ni// de nas de yi dngos gnas par// yid la cung zad gang bsams pa// dngos por goms par byas nan//
de nyid 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/ gang phyir khri po bsgoms pa yis// khro bo yong ye bsgomasan// bzlas pa la sogs med rarayang// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa
rnams la dam tshig gi/ gal te sbyin par can yang// dechos n rab sbyang san// thog mar smos chus gdab par bya// kun tu zlum ro zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor 'a di rigs shig tu//
kun tu zlum por bri bar bya// chonatsanag por legs dris te// nub phyogs sgo ba tad khru dotsam// de yi dbus su mchog bya ba// 'gying zhing ldem pa can gyi lus// char sprin dang na khung/
ba'i mdog/ bajam zhing mnyenar dpal dang ldan// gser gyi dril bu'i sgra dang lhan// g.yag rnga bsalayapa g.yob ra can/ adzan ya bo lta bu// ma hachen
bo dam pa// da kyil 'khor dam pa de khros te// bsrung bachog bzhin byas nas// sngags shes pas na mchod byas pa// chog bzhad du 'dir bshad do// spyan drangs gdan du bstab
pa dang// arga gtor mas mchod pa dang// mar ma bdug pa bstan pa dang// thamar slar yang gshegs bstan pa'o// gzugs dgod pa dag thog ma ru// lha dgod pa dag yig
'khrus bskyed/ sa bon gyis nitshul bzhin rab shad/ de las dang por thams cadun// sa bon khro bo'i gzugs yan te/ de nyid phal cherar tu grags/ gcig tu mtshon chadu
ma'imadog/ de nyid der sku brtan bya ba'i// rtag tu mtshon 'barda byed pa// de yagazugs bdun gcig pu la// sa bonakyisan bskul ba'i zhal// dril bu'i sa bon drug rnams
kyis sgra de rnams bzhin sgrogs par brtag/ 'dan khro de 'a zhalayin gsungs/ dbadun thog ma nyid kyi gzugs// de yi mthuyang tsha'adu la// tshul bzhin du yang 'dor bshad de//
gang gis dran pa tsam gyisan// bdud dpung gdug pa'i gadon la sogs// mthu rtsal gnod pas nyams nas su// 'jigs shing pa bkong byed par 'gyur// zur zhag pa ya
chig gnyis ldan/ zhalayang gdangs shang 'bar ba can// snying po dag pa rab tu gnas/ mtshon cha'adebs pa'i mthu rtsal can// de ltar khro bo rgyal ba'i gzugs// sa bon zhes
su bya ba ya// sngags kyi dngos po gsanas nii// sngags las dngos grub thob par gyur// mtshon ba phangs pa tsam gyisan// de yis kun tu bsrung bar bya// sa ben bkod pa'i
tshul bzhin du// bdag lus l myur bar bya/ gzugs ni gzugs la bzha gnas su// mchon cha de nyid lagan thegs// sa bon rnams kyang khar bzhag ste// rkang pa gnyis kyang
cham rngamar+ya// danas kun tu khros nas su// rang gis len dgod par bya// thog ma pa dpag la mayangs par// bsrung pa de ltar byas nasasu// dkyil 'khor dun tsan drangs te/ 'dems
mdun du mchod pa khyi// sngags kyi snying po tha ma la// tshul gshegs pa ya tshag gnyis dang// rtag tu ldan par byas nas su// spyan drang ba drag bya bar bshad// me tog dag gi gdan
'dal// n gzhugs su gsol zhes rtag tu bya// de lta bu na spyan drangs nas// ma rtog dgags snga ma bzhine/ 'bazhugs shig pa yi tshig gnyis kyis// cho ga bzhwa'i ru bzhugs
su gsal// khro bo'i rgyal po re la/ 'bazhugs par bya ra bstan pa yin// me tog sngagosakyis pa/ pa ra yis// de ltar bzhugs par byas nas su// arga 'dag po zhes yig/
[zl ]@#// ces tshig gi mjug tu brjod nas su// sbosazhum tog sbyar ba yi// arga de la nubul bar bya// me tog bdag gis phul ba 'di// bzhes su gsol zhes
brjod nas su/ spos chu zang po btang pa yi// me tog dag ni sngon bzhin dbul// sngags ras rtag sku zhig mjug la// gtor m bdag gis phul ba 'ad// bzhes su gsol
ts+tshA zhes brjod nasasu// gtor ma sna tshogs dbul bar bya// mam bdag gis phul ra 'ad/ bzhes su gsol zhes mjug tu brjod// mar gyis legs par gang ba yi// mar me/
dwang na dbul bar bya'og/ bdug pa bdag gis phul ba 'ad// bzhes su gsol zhes mjug tu rjod// gdug pa thang chu rnam pa lnga/ sngagasakyis btul sku dbul bar bya// der
nAmachod pa byas nas kyang/ dkyil 'khor dag gamaremo la// rang ga se na lag pakod pa dag/ dam tshig can la bstanAnas ni// mthong ba tsam nyid kyis su// rig 'dzin dam
tshig can du 'gyur// de nas rtog pa las gsungs pa'i// las rnams myur du byed pa la 'gyur// de ltar khro bo'i rgyalaro ya// mchod pa legs par byas nas su// sgrub pa pos/
sku/ rnam yangs par// sngags brjod sra2yang lo gshegs su gsol// spor yang gshegs par mdzad nas su// sur yang gshegs pa'i tshig gnyis brjod// me tog snyim pa
[zz]bkang nasasu// phyag 'tshal slayang gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor dag gam gas sngags bzlus// danas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni// rab tu 'bar ba gcig pu bshad//
gshin rjegashedaces bya ba'i lha// gang gis grub par gyur pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo yis// mthe bong sgrasate gyenadu na// bsgreng bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ba// bcen zhes n
grags pas// lha nyid kyi sngags ldan pas las rnams kun la bcang bar bya// smyan drangs pa dang mchod pa dang// gshegs su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang// las
rnams zhu ba'i tsho dag dang// gzhan yang rgal ba byung nga'i tshe// tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di bcingasanas// gshan rdzagashed kyang lha bzlas so// sngags pa'i rgyal po'i chu 'gran//
mgo btud dus ma gtsu gnas su// gdon ma za bar dbang 'gyur ba// bdag nyidi dung nan gyis so// khro ba rnam par rgyal brgyudachen po 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams
cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma las// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das bshAg rdzagashed kyi rgyal po rtog pa phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba'i le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs//
ma ma mA me mu mu mu// mumamAm maya ge zung// thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu// zung dang bsnol ba'i srag gis// sbyar bar bya ba 'dir bshad do// sa bon shes bya dkyil du
kha gzhag/ khro le dag so so ru// zung ma 'khru yin tshig da la/ thoma' lung na ma yin no// zungs lung mtshig dag/ nye reg hahi hahahahahahe he
zhes gnyis sbyar ba/ khri chen gal thogamar bcas// o/ o dang sA hAphyag 'chol bzhag/ rgyas par 'dod pas dga' bzhin du// mal tshothun gcig rtag tu bzlas// rim la/
tshog bzhin du sgrub pa yis// rtag par mchod pa'i cho ga 'di// man ru bsdus nas khashad pa yin// bzlas pa dang zhi hom dgadang// brtulakhug sa dka[P]phrul mkhyas kyang// sngags
kyi dngos bdagosanas// mchod pa 'ba' zhig dbul khar bya// 'dilo mchod pa bya banyid// khro bo'i rgyal rtag ra 'u// mnyes byas yod par gang shes pa// sngags pas
das grub thob par 'gyur// rtag tusngags pasasems pa dang// rtag tu sngags kyi bdag nyid gyur// rtag tuyade la zhen pa dang// rtag tu mchod la brtson pa dang// rtag
tukhro pora'adu shes// lasa rnams thams cad grub pa'i phyir// chog mdor bsdus 'di bshad pa'o/ khra ba rnam rar rgyal ba 'jam dpalatsa rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang
nga'itog par gtogs pa ste dang pog///mami mA mi mumu// nuyulenAm man/ yag zung dang yakhral bye brag gis// thog ma tha mazung gcig tu// 'khor lo
'dan mi rigs par// sgyur bar bya ba 'di bshad do// sa bon zhes bya da kyil 'khor gzhug/ khro bo d gnas so ru// dag nga dang khon dang bas da ra dang// de bzhin bskrad dang zhib
dung yang na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// zung dang bstsal bas myur du 'grub/ khro bo zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil du bzhag ste so soru// zung zhig mig gnyis tha mar ga zhag/
tshage mo zhig dbang du byos// mchon cha med pa'i sabon gzhage/ swA hA'i rigan bar bar gzhug/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas// de la rkang pas brdzi ba// sngag
pas 'grang ste 'dug na// kung skyob yabar du bya// rgyalare dbang du ma gyur ra// 'di yi dbang du myur du gyur// gcig pu de lasngos nas su// myur du go rims bzhin gzhag pa'o//
sa bon gnyis ma'i gnas lan// gnas nas gdongayang bsgyur nas su// zung zhig tshig gnyis mtha' mar gzhag/ meg mo ya mdza' bo de// stong par gyur ces mtha' mar bya//
skrag par bya ba cung bradamad 'basgrub par bya ba gnyis ka yi// gzugasan 'jigs pa'i las byed de// gcig tu dpa' ba 'a mnyam ldan pa/ gnyis kalayang skang pas mnan//
sngagasa mkhan de la gnas ra yis// mel tshe thun na phyidatsam gyis// de nas sgrub pa 'dod pa bzhin// de gnyis phan tshun dgrar gyur pas// khro be rim bzhin bsgoms pas//
ka @#// lan cig byas pa tsam gyis 'khyug/ sa bon gnyis pa de las kyang// drag po rtsal gyis sbos nas de// khro bo chen pomig rtsa dmar// gsan gsum pa la gnas
te g.yon pa'i gnon pa/samanan pas// drag po shugs can malus mnan// kha dang bar dang rgyab kyang bsgyur// tralabudakrol nga'asgra sgyur 'gyur/ phyis kyang rim gyis bal
shu gnas/ logasashig khre re'akhele'abakas// rkang pa'i chom rngam derazhin byas/ gdong yang dal bus bsgyur nas su// dang po'i sa bon gangaAn rag/ dbang du byed rgyas par
khagyur// de yi mtha' yang lhan cig tu// me dang 'dra ba 'bar ba ste// kun gyis lasan grub 'dod na/ shug tu 'gos par sdur ba ba byed// deyalung mas bskulurayang/ so so'am
gtsag tu'ang rung bar bshad// khro bo yin 'khor lo mthu// brgyad ra dag lasa myur bar gnas// ma ra ldam tshulakyin// khon rabs can dag khos bskul// sa bon
zung mas bskul bayang// brgyad pa 'byed par sgrub pa la// mdza'abcur du bzlog pa'i phyir// chog bzhin du rim par gyur// rim pa snga ma'i tshul bzhin du// myur du gsad par
'dod pa yis/ khro bo'i 'khor legs// dngug ra A tsaraya// chogabadamidagra bo dag/ myos par byas nas 'jigamar gyur// wa rnams kyis sbas pa yang// gshen
pa'i drung du khrid par 'gyur// rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyisasu/ khro bo yin 'khor lo'i gnas// bcu pa dag la'adem gyis gnas// drag shul can gyis drab/tu mas// dems bon gyis
kyang bya// sngon gyi sa bon 'du 'bar ba// sngam bzhin du 'am gyisabazlas// sngar bshad pa yalas sgrub bo// bakhor la rim pa bcu gcig po// g.yon nga nadi babunas// de nas
zhing ra byed pa yi// sa bon de yis bskul bar bya// snga ma bzhin du bskul ba dang// sngam lasan spyod rab 'gyur// zhi ba dag la gang gsungs pa// rgyas pa dag la sbyar bar bya//
khoral zhi gnas kyi mchog/ bcu gnyis pa la gnas nas su// de yis bon bskul bar byas// bdag gamathu rtsal gnod brtags pas// sa bon zung ma sbyor bayas/ sakhen
mjun 'bar ba na// 'khor lo bkod pa'i las rnams// sngon gsungs pa dgagrub par bya// de ltar khra ba 'khor la// tshogs bcas pa rgyas pa dag/ gsang ba bskul mar
bcas la yi sbyol ba ma lus bshad pa yin// sa bon zung mas bskul pa gang// gnyis pa rab tu grags pa yin/ bde ba dang sa bon gnyis pa yin// myur du grub par 'gyur bar
bshad// tha ma'i sa bon thams cad la// phul ba'i tshig gnyis rtag tu sgyur// zung ma'i zungam tshig bdal// ya tha dag dang tha ma 'o// 'khor lo bkod pa bstan pa 'ad// ji
ltar rimar shesazhani// sbyin sreg bzlas brjod ma byas kyang/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub thob// khro bo kher lo gsang ba na/ khad ma shes par
gang sbyor la// de 'di de ngos grub mi 'thob kyi myur du skye ba thob pa 'gyur// mam mamAmu mu chug rnams kyis// dbang dang khon drangagasad pa dang/ bskradadan ring rgyas pa'i mthar//
b+hU mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub khar bya// de dpa nyid la bzlog pa yis// de bzhin du ni bskul bar bya// jiskar gsungs pa 'di rnams// mgruban ste gzhan dumed// de la mu mum ma man//
mnargyus mthor de bzhin du// 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas rnams na// de dang de da ga gnyis su sgyur// de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang// khro bo sku mchog sa bon mgrwa/ bzhag
nasazhig gi mtha' mar yang// khro ba'i dril bu dkrol ba nagon// 'khor lo'i murananang dag tu/u0f7c/ khrubazhig payatshig gnyis brjod mkhas ra sa 'khor lo'i mag gnang/ 1sa
bon bkod pa rnams la gnA// khro bo'i cho lo bsgrags nagi/ gsan dzaskad bshags// dngosagrub rnamasun thob ra ru 'khyug/ dngos grub tshul pakani thob gyur pa//
de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya// thog mar phyag rgya bcings nasasu// skun saskun skur bsgyur te// las rnams tshul zhin mthong ba yis// sbyor ba dag ligs rar cu// gdong dang
kha mig rkang pa mnyam// bar tu dwapa'i ng ra'i sems// snying yang de bzhin rab tu dga'// dbang du bya ba'i sngags/sus pa// shin tumanyam par bzhag ras sgrug/ rkang pa gcig
thung du gzhag/ gdong rung numajing bcus te mnan// khadangamiganam gcig 'dzums/[&]ma rngam gnon pa chen po byas// bcon lan mig gis blta// bsgrub par byab bsgyur
la 'bad// gang dag dbye bar 'dod pa yis// de dag dbye ba brtsam par bya// rkang pa gnyis pa btagar yis// chom rngamakhyab maral khazhag/ bzhin bsnyor phyag rgya bcingasanas

tsag bdag gis gsung// yid la bsams pa tsamagyis kyang// gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed// bzhi rams la sogs de yang// thos ra/sa myur du med par byed ]3

khaya mchog tu 'byung// 'gro tsheyid la bzlasazhan// lam rkun po'i 'jigs pa med// seng ge stag dang dgra rnams dang/ nad kyis 'jigs pa med la 'gyig rgyal ra shi drung
du'agron yang// sngags kyis spyi gtsug bcings na// rgyal po khros pa myur bar tu// brkyang dus thal mo sbyor bar byed// gshags 'gyed pa dang rgyan ro dang// mchon dwang me yis
'di sa la la// yid 'dren ga nga bzlas byas na// mi bde kun las thar ror 'gyug 'tsho ba thams cad zhi bya'i phyir// mi bde nyam thag gyur pa la// sngags 'da myur dran
brjod byas nas// sprinadagamanan par bya ba dang// 'don pa zhig myur du slar yang bzlog/ gnam lcags ser ba 'bab pa yang// dkyug ra'i phyag rgyas zha re la byed// phyagargyas
bcings pa de nyid kyis// yid kyis sngan rnams nabab ra rakya// doltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas// sminamanaMms dgakyang bsgyur bo skya/ rnam pa de dganyidakyisan// gnam
lcagasaser ba gcad par bya// sbyor ba mkhas pas 'dod ra// chalngar dmag kyang ga cad par bya// gosan sngon po bgos nan/ 'khor khor yug ra sung byas
nas mda' nub rar chur zhugs te// nyin gsum lags rA ba zlos byas nas// brgya run gyisan sngon bsdus nas// 'dod r bzhin du char ra 'bebs// de nas sprin chen

'gyugaM/ rgyal po dbang du byu ya ngaru/ yungs kar dkar po bzang po las// gzugs nan legs par byas nas su/ deya gzugs kyi steng 'dug la// gang gi ming smos
nyin bdun du// bzlas brjod legs par byas zhagi/ d myur du cho ga 'das// dran ra zhan dus dbang du 'gyur// zhag gcig smyung btus pa yis/ 1dmangs rigs dgan dbang
tu 'gyur// na mo gnyis sbyang ba de ra zhin tu/ (khazlasan rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin// zhag gsum byas pas rgyal rigs te// zhig bshad pa 'gas khram ze dag/ bzlas pa'i rtog
bzhin byas na// 'dod ra bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/ 'khru dang phub ma thamasacad las// chu dang bu mo gangayang rung// de bzhin gzugs brnyan byas nan// dmangs rigs lan mtshan
gcig gis// rab tu sdang ba bya bar 'gyur// rjeshu'ags la nanag gnyis kyis// de stong tsog pura'adug nas ni// de bzhin mdza'adwang bral bar byed// nyin zhag gsum dang
bzhi dag gis// rgya pa rig par na bram zego/ jaltar jin na gsungs pa yi// las kyis khyayagazhan gyis min// gangayang rung ba'i gzugs bar nan/ dur khrod sol khas
legs pa ru// snga ma bzhin du legs par bri// den sa seng ldeng phur bu la// sngags kyis stod du bzlas byas nas/ de ya'og tu lus lagadar// dgra bo de yi ming smos nas//
de la khros ra byas nas su// de nas de yi snying khar 'dus// phur du btab ste bzlas bya ba// de nyid lag pas bzung nasau// dus gsum nyim gsum byas na// dgra bo gang du
brkyang pa der// gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su 'gal mi yor par s ltung// zhag bdun lon nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ ma mo'i gnas su song nas su/ lag pas
de tsam phyug rgya ba cing// lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis// bsdigs shing himanubs su// khros shing dgra yi ming smos bab+hUs/ de nas dgra bo mo gdonakyis// zin nas spyod/
pa sna tshogs pas// 'chib pa 'gyur pa dag ni byed// de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi// tshogs de la kha bar bya// ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas// zhi ba'i chog mkhas pa yis//
dbang de bsdams shing yid bde bas// nyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas// de nas de la las de yi// zhi bar 'gyur pa gdon maza// nyim lan mngon phyogs
nas lag pas dgra bo'atshag khyug cing// dgra yi ming smos mnananas su// nyi ma nur tur zlos byas na// des klad ran 'gyur// tshangasache'agal thug par 'gyur// danus
thal mo sbyar nas su// nyin dang zlos shing zhi bar bya// sa stengasazhungasapa/tsal/ gis 'dug/ nyin dar lag pa khyenatu brkyang// cad ga'u khros shing bzlas byas pa/ gdugayiming
smos ci 'dod par// nyi ma nub kar de nas dgra// mi dga' ba dang myos 'gyur te// gan dang mdza' bo rnams gar// denus gzhan gyi gnas su'agro/ de la 'dir gzhi ra 'am/
'on ta rgyas par bya bdod// ga tsang byas te gos dkar bgos// bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos pa/ mchod pa bzang mo byas nas su// de bzhin bshegs la phyag 'tshal
nas 'om btung zhing bzlas byas la// zhibar 'gyur gyi du'o/ ltar na tshog sang// sbyor bcas rgyas rar rashad pa yin// rtog pa'i chog bzhin// ma gsungs
payang legs par sgrub// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpalakyi rtsa ba'i rtog ralas gsadapa'i rtog par gtogs pa gsum pa'o//des gzhan yang
ra zang po 'di// yula'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa// de bas bzang bo kha gzhan med du/ ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya// dang do ra zhes gang gsungs pa// ra skul ba 'a sa bon thams
cad pa'o// de na len dpa' dzin pa ste/ las la myur du bskul ba'o// de bas thog mar bskul ba dang// don bzhin du ni bzung ba la// khro bo yin rgyal po gi/ pala'i dkyil
'khor rim bzhin bstan// ha ha ha ha hi hihi hi hahahaha gnyis sbyar// khro chen tshag ga thogo mar sgyur// zung zhag pa yo chog gnyis khagro/ zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha' mar

ltar bkod pa dang// ji ltar smos shing gang gnas pa// so so'i las la sbyar par bya// de nas 'di dag bkod pa de// sngags rnams bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad// de 'and muran
gsum po dang// dbus kyi mun bzang por ldan// mtha' yi mu ran drug po dang// tshubs kyi bu drug ra ba bzang dang/ rob dgen 'du 'dzomad pa'i sar/ tshog bzhin du legs
brasan sa// de yi gnas su sbyar ba dang// de yi go rims pa bzhi ru sbyar// deyatshom rngam gsal ba yi// sngags rnams 'don pa sdu bar bya// dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa yi/

bcug nyis sun gsungs pa yin// khro kho rab tu snang byed pa// bcu gnyis bgrangs pa 'di da gan// khrera'i rgyal pos kun tu mtshan// thamasacad rim pa bzhin du ro/sungs// 'bo ra la'i
phyi rol ba sar 'khod/ 'babashing drag ro mthudang ldag/ thams cad rastan nas 'khod ran// khro de chen ro snang byed pa// mthu rtsal chen po stobs su ldag/ kun kyang d dud rtsi
la pa'o// sa bon snga mamatha' yas rnams// gug skyed drug dang ldan par bya// steng du spyad kyi 'khoragyis mtshan// sangon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'o// dang po dkyil 'khor na gnas
gcig gdungabacas pa'i don kun sgrub// rab tu 'bar ba'i sngags kyi mthar// 'bar ba'i 'phrang pacan gyis bsgrags// sa bon gnyis pa gang yin pa// tsheg dung racas
par der zhen gnas// rdo rjem rgyal zhes Mspyag/ khro bo don kun grub byed ra go// dang po bas bon gsungs pa yang// snga mar nutshog nang bcas// rab tu shugs drag cher grags/
pa khro lo'i rgyal po khro bor stong// snang byed khro bo'i rim pa las// tshog drag de bzhin khro bon// den stobs po che zhes gsungs// gnyis pa'i 'khor lo tshig mtha' can// gang
gsungs khro bo rgya chen M// degs skyong bor grags pa yang// mthu ba gtse'atshog dang ra cas// de yi sum rotshog bcas ra/// de yang de bzhin bsgrugs pa yin
'jigs pa zhes khurar tu che// khrob du khro bo snang byed pa// rgya chen rim bzhin du// bzhi pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ 'chog bcas ra da tu drag ponyid// su ru khro bo de bzhin bzhag/
de yis bon lnga pa yin// 'gal ra'i 'brong chen zhes bya gang// chog dang bcas pa dang zhin du// khro ri ba pongs pa grol zhes bya'o// lnga po rgya chen nyid yin te// tshog dang bcas par/
bsgrags pa go/ rab tu 'joms pa zhes bsgrags pa// khro bo khro bo snang byed pa'o// sa don sngamamatha' med las// snga mtsheg bcas de bzhin gzhag kA la kA la bya ba yi// dngos
glu grung thams cad rab tu stag/ de bzhin de sa bon 'ad// ga bcas de bas 'di'i bshad do// kA la chen po de// khro ba'i srogo snang byed ra'o// khro po'i rgyal po de dga' gas
blogon bde dag rnams kyis bsgrugs// khro rob rgyalatshosbyorab yas// radatusna dkar byed ces bsgrags// khro nga ba rgyal po 'khor las gnas// gzhi rdzol/ shad ro yan par
h+pha gsungs// dang por de na 'khor la bstan// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang// khro bo'i rgyal po de las gzhan/ khro bo'i bdag po snang byed pa'o// de ltar khro bo gsum po de//
bgang dang gang du rab gyur pa// de dang de ljags rnams na// sku'ang khyed ras de bzhin bskul// chog shes mas nan tan du// gang dang gang 'dod bsgrub ra ra bya// khro bo bsgomun ng
lcan ma yis// de la ni 'khor los bsgoms nas// dkazhong sgrug tu'ang mi rung ba// dortal zhugs ram da nga racasal sogs// de yis dgod la ma byas kyang// sngags kod
shesan sgrub rago ga dela'i 'khor la tshul shes// de yis dka' bo macasakyag/ gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub// brtul zhugs hom dang bsam kho tan dang// ji ltar gsungs
pa'i dgayo thung rung// mngon par brtson zhing dadam 'ir dag lan grangs bcu gnyis gang bsnyen pa// rtog las gsungs pa'i las rnams phyed// radatu ya mtshan ston pa rdo/ de
la'i 'khor latshul gas ras// ring bor ma thogs bde ba na// khro der bsgom pa dang ldan zhing// dela'i 'khor lo kha nas 'dug na// khams gsum dag kyang zhu cig gis//
thogs med myur dugayos par byed// dengs rab tu bsgrims nasazhu/ grolor sgom pa goms byas te/ 'gal 'kholalasa'abyung sngags/ sbyor ba dag gis goms pa skya/
khro bo rnam par rgyalag/ rtog pa dang nor khang bsgrags pa// des rtog pa gsang bshad na// tshog gtanas nig ba'i mchog khro ba'i ral bsgrag/sar na// chog de las
shin tu gsang// khro bo'i 'a khor lo bsang bshad pa// rab tu snang byed de bas kyang// yul 'khor la nga sgrags pa 'ad// rab tu gsang ba'i mchog yin te//
rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyi// rab tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// rtog pa rab tu gsang ba na// 'di dag rnam pa kun layang// phala'i yakhor lo'adra g.yagi/kha khor los byung phyes me 'byung//
gang zhig 'di yo don thos nas// khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na// de yis 'bad pa ma byas kyang// 'jigarten na sgrub dka' med// sel ba khor lo'i gnas lan// ji ltar 'don
para gnas nasasu// khro bo bsgom dang rab ldan pas/ 'khro po'i gabrugasasu gnas nas su// rtse gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog/ sgrub pa mchog rigs sbyin par byed/ thogasar
mad par 'jam dpal mthong/ ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o// khro bo rnam ra/ rgyalar shi rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtag par gtogs paste bka ra'o// khru pochen
do'i tshong dag mthar// skul cig ces bya'i tshig gnyis gzhug/ skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'o// khro bo chen po 'phrang ma dang// bdud rtsi
pa la 'khyil pa ba di yi mthar// kun tu dngapo g.yo ba dang// sngags shis tsham rngam mdzes pa yi// phala'i 'khor lo la gnas te// dang po gnas su 'dug nas su// bcon phyag rgya
lan cig bcing// de nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa// sngags pa'i grang ste 'dug la// rkang pa gnyis zhi resgyur ba dang// khro bo bsgom ra da la// sems zhwa ra pa tu shesacas
nas sa'adab tu g.yos pa 'am// ri dag g.yo ba'i bar du'o// de nas khong la sgrub pa yis// gnyis pa'i gzhas la song nas su// khro bonan reb tshiga mthar gnas/
sgams shigatses par dbang bskur ro// de chig thog mar bkod nas// deya tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// de bzhin bdud rtsi'i bka' ba'i mthar/ rdo rjemaya rgyal po'i sngags/ rab
tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang// cham rngam gsal ba dag la gnas// decon phyag rgya bcings nas// khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas so// rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'don// mtsho dang
rdzong chenu klung chen rnams// khros pasa myur du snyoms par byed/ 'bab chu dpag kyang gyen du 'debs// khro be mthu chen gagan ldan/ sngags kyi yag dgod par bya rtsims
rnams 'amaras kun mananar// gnyis re re lasab posanasasu// de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug/ mthu rtsal ldan pa sa'am par mnan// khru ren po'atshig ga mthargya/
slad mar khyosazhas tshig gnyis bskul// don snga ma bzhin bkodanas// dayatha mar bdud rtsi 'khyal// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar// rab tu drag pa'i shugs gzhag go
rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yis// khro bo tshom rngam bsnyen par gnas/ glang da myos pa'i shugasacu dang/ mngon du 'ong dar khyabashu yang// de ma thag tu skrag
par byed// myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu dor// slad du lag pa phan tshun du// bskor zhing mjug 'a ra shan du'agro// glang ro/'i rgyal po de tshos nga shang// bde ba ma theg bsal la 'gyur
klu sgrub pa khro ri sgom pa yate chog tshulan de bzhago// de la 'khor zhes bya pa'i// dazhir ' gnas al 'dug nas kyang// khro ron kho tshig pa mthar// nan cigaces pa'i tshig/
gnyis bskul// de nas chog sngar bshad pas// bdud rtsi bcu'i ra pa gzhag par bya// bdud rtsa 'khya'i pa da yi mthar// khro re chen po stobasa chen gazha// kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa ya ]
cham rngam gyisan ma g.yos mnan// darung ngam yang na gleng re 'am// gru 'am yang na shing rta'am// rta dang dza mo lug sogs// khro bo ra sgoms pa tshul nga yis byas// sbyor ba de la gnas
nas na// rad tuman ra lus par 'gyur// de nas yul shes bya ba'i// 'khor la lnga ma' pa nas nas// khro bo chen mo dag gi mthar// dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig ga sa
la/ gzhas// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khya'i pa yang// mtha' ya tshig pa ba gnas su gzhag/ khro ba rgya chen zhes khyab// rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang//
rob tu 'khrug pa zhes bya dang de/ chom rngami mchog gis myur du ni// dgra ya de mu rnams phan tshun du// rang tu rnam par dgrub ka robcu// de nas nyal 'khog yagi/ rim pa du sog gnas
nas ni// khro bo chen po tshig gi mthar// rmongs par gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo rab dud rtsi 'khyi ra yang// tshig gi tha mar kun tu gzhag khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ra//
chogasdum khazhin du bskul// rmongs par byed ra'achom rngam gyis// chog bzhin du rab bskul nas// ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhi/ 'gro la myur durmongs par 'a// de nas
la'ang khong la'ad// rim bdun pa la gnas nas su// khro bochen mo'atshog gi mthar// sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis gzhag/ khrogo'adzan pAr byed pa yis// bdud rtsi
'alul pa skul bar byed// 'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrog ma/ khro bo naMm rngama myur bar// nus mad par yang sngon gyis khengs/ dezhas 'ded bzhin char pa 'arebs//
denas phu'a'i 'a khol ya// rtsibs kyi'amo ra brgyad ra la/ gnas nas 'daran snga ma bzhin// khro ba chen rab tshig gi mthar// hi gis don gnyis na gnas// de yi 'og
tubadud rtsi 'khyil// khra bo zur du de bzhin du// bdud tsa bal pa'i tha mar gzhag/ khro bo tshamarngam kha gdangs pa// mchog ces bya ba myur khan/ rkang pa ya gcig gdangs
[s n ]/pa' stabs// sad dang ser ba rlung la sogs// dusu sam yang na dus min dag/ sgrub khro bo ngasgoms pa yis// khro bsngags kyi tshul 'an du// sa/
ya stong du 'debs par byed// de la' 'khor la gnas brgyad de// sgrub pa la de sa ra ba nas// khro bo'is ren tshig gsal// dgur 'brang mo la gnas te/ khro bo chen po tshig gi
b+hU mthar// slongs shig pa ya tshig gnyis bskul// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// tha mag 'khongs pa sgrol ba gzhag/ khro bo bsgoms pas mdzes pa yi/ gtsam gsalab byas nas
khro bo gshin rje gshad pa bzlas// khra ba nyid kyi tshig gas gsal// hU~M zhes khyab bzang po yis// khra ra nangos por bsgoms nas// shang gci dngayal ga da dug de yang
shing chen rtsa nas 'byin/ ma tog bcar du klog pa'i m// yang na 'dadar zha'o g.yo bar byed// ljon shing chen ro rnams kyang/ jiltar 'dod par mgayor 'gyur// de la
zhasar+ya 'khor laya// rtsibs ricu pa la gnas nas// khro re chen ra ba tshig kha mtha'// choms shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis skul// khro ba chen po rab 'joms ra//
'a khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar// snga ma bzhin du gzhag ra ra bya// 'jigs par byed pa'i tsham rngam byed/ chan dag gi rtsa mo nang/ sgo dang lcagasasgrog rnams kyi// khro
po'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du// bsgomasar 'ab mchog gung khyed na// layin 'khor lo yi// rtsi'i san bcu gcig la gnas te/ khro chen rab tshig ga ma ra/ snyal cig/
ces pa'i tshig gis bskul// khro bo kA kAlaya// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bya ba// mig gi tha mar gnas pa ste// cho ga bzhin du bshad pa bzhin// kA kI la zhes bya pa//
tsham N+Dam mchog la de ra zhin gnas// ba con kyan phugargya bcings// gzin rje gshed de bsgoms razhi// rin chen rtsa ba brtan payung tsamanas kyang sgul bar byed// yanar kar
skye ba ya'i/ brtan pa'i shang rnams 'gyel bar byed/ de nas e'i 'khor lo yi// bcu gnyis pa yi tshubs gnas// lnga ba chen po'i ga gi mthar// zhugs shig ces
pa'i tshig gis bskul// bskul nas de yi tha mar ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya// khro chen kA la kAl yang// de yi tha mar gzhag par bya/ kA kAl chen po zhes//
kya ra 'tsham rdzam de bzhin bya// brten phyag rgya bcas nas su// khro bo chen po gshin rjegasher// yid la rab tu goms byas na/ rtsig ra shing skam rdor sogs// babs
na phyung ste nam mkhar gnas// nam mkha' la khyung nas kyang// 'dod pa ratsha du ltung bar byed// 'di na rang byung ngamachoral// 'di na dus gsum sngon du byung// skyon ra/
gzhan yang sngam bzhin// khro ba bsgoms pas byed par gsungs// hama'i 'khor lo dgon ran// rab tugasang ra yin par bshad// gsang dad
bcasashangasbyor bcas pa// shesan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang ci rigs par// chom rngam bcuganyis sbyor ba dag mdo dang rgyas pa tshul dag
gas/ dana'i nga tu bshad r/ra bya// kun tu g.yob dang po yin// de ngan rab tu g.yo bar bshad// sgrig pa byed pa gsum pa ste// bzhi pa kun tu sdom bar byed/ rab
tu 'khrug ces bya ba la// rmongs par byed pa de ba drug/ myur tsham dram de la bas// kha gdangasar dacan rar don// mdzes zhes phyu pa da gu ra ste// 'jigs
par spyod pabcu ra yin// kA kAl zhes bya dang/ kA kAlaMchen po yi// khro bo chen rnam bcu gnyis so// 'di nig rim bzhin bshad pa yin// thog mar bsdogs
'a rim pa yis// pe con phyag rgyaldan par rgyu// pa des rang gzugs ji bzhin du// sngags ra dag gis shes par bya// rangagagazugasakyang rang gnas ra/// bsngags
la shing tshom rngam khyed la sogs// skrag par khyen pa'i khab bral// khro bo'i lta ba gdong 'gyur la// rkang pa 'khyen ra razhag pa dag/ tsham rnam mtshan nyid bshad payani//
rkangasaya gcug myur du gzhag/ gdong dang numajang yon lo khyas// khro gnyer 'jigs ra ra byed ra ra bsnyen// g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig gis bsngags// chom rngam byed
cing be con gdengs// gdong dang brla dang rkang pa g.yon// kun tu g.yo zhes khyab ste/ khyorechom rngam bsnyomasadang bcas// kun tu g.yo ba rim gsungs lo/ rab tu g.yo
zhes bya na// chung khrod du na de bus dman pa'o// rab tu la/yo ba brtag par bya// de nga zhig dpung pa brkyang ba dang// rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs pa dang// lag gnyis drag tu
rdung ngan// de bzhin skrag par byed par bshad// nga ton lan lta bar gtan// rkangam g.yos pa gsal bar phyar// den kun tu sdom rar bshad// g.yon pa'i mdzub
mos bsdigs par bya// dpung pa gdengs pa pa/yon ran du// mig na mdzub mo gcig la gtan// rka nga ma g.yas pa phyar ba kun tu 'khrug rasar+ya'o// rkangapa
mon pa gdangs byas te/ g.yon phyogs sun phyar zhing bskor// dpung pa brgyad ra' brten gdengs// bsdab/ sa da kha/cig tu rmongs/ra byed 1 myur du tsham rngam zhes bya
ba de nyid dpung rardod sabasdigs pa 'o// de nyid lasan ba gdangs raka/ kha gdangasad pa zhes bsgrags ra yin// sran dang bcas par tshan bskor/ mthu rtsal cher tistabs
@#// sustsalag/ mamyuyi mtha'am yasamanan// lag pa phyar tasdigs par red// bsnyams dang racas/shang sgra yang 'byin// 'jigs par byed pa'i tshubasgrags
ka pa'i cham rngam legs par bshad da// mdzes pa'i khro bos gan pa'o// btsan thabs su nang skor bar bya// rkang pa ma yas ra btsugs te man+taka lag ra ba gnyis ka drag
rdor ra// byas nas 'jigs par bya ba// de bzhazhi bsnyams dang bcas bo shadar/// tsham rngam bdag nyid chen po 'ad// 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rtag tu khre re sgom pa 'o//
rkang pa mnyam par bzhag ste 'dug/ g.yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya dpal dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad 'gayon rwasor mo gcale shan bsags// dpung pa brtag ste re con 'phyar/
rkang pa dang na se dang bsgyur la// rtag tu khro bo skyem pa ni// kAl kAl zhes bya go kAl kAl chen pa na/ de nyin las rgyab tu blta// khro bo mgag ya gcag rAtsums// myur du
mchong stabs byed pa 'o/ 'dan chom rngam sbyor ba ste// ta la'a 'khor lo rtsibs mas// mdo na ji ltar dgod pa dag legs par bshad pa 'a yazhin// halaso'i lo
bsgra le'i mthu sngags dang// tsham rngamagayas kyi mthu naka' yis// las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba// ji skad gsungs pa las rnams bya 'o// bsgrubs pa de dag gsang rgyun dang//
ka/ hala'i 'a khor lo 'di shesan// khro bo dngos dang gcig gyur bas/ 'khrulo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur// rtog pa la zhi gsang ba racas// gsang ba'i snying re'i mchog tu rashad//
khro ba'i rgyal po'i rtog 'dalas// mchog tu gyur pa gzhan mad do// khro bo rnam par rgyal rabs// rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di// rab tu ba/sang ba zhes bya ba/ zlosanas gsang
ra'odon bsgoms pas// lha de thams cad yir nas/ khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te// rad tu dga' ba'i mchog tu gyug/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dar lacha zhi rjegashed po la
rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig ra'o/ khro bo khams gsum rnams r rgyal pa'i rtog ra'oskyal pa gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra b+hi ra ba rgya ra inam/ bod skad nu/ 'phags pa mo rje ba jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba (sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da pa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba sras dang bcas ra/ drimamad ra/ hrimasal ba/ mtha' yas ra// ma thug pa med pa// dam pa sbyanar// shin tu rgya nag/ thams
cad bdag la 'thun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa/'dam ra'i mchog stsol par gyur cig/ de la pa'i rdo rje'i tshe na bad nag go/ a bar/ a sam/ sa ma t+tAa nan+ta/ d+hame tre/
kha Na ra Na/ ma sAdIr/ tsa le sam ma/ A sa la/ mahA ba le/ ka Na ka Na/ ma hA ba la ag gi hi/ hahar dzrab dzrahAya/ d+hu rAn+tar/ hU~M hU~MmaN+Dal sa
mang ra ak+Sha yi ge/ kurukuru/ tu dutu ru/ sarbapA sarba ti/ dzral dz+wa la/ akr-i Na phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying de 'dra'i ra 'gshegs pa
snga sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rigasngagasarung gas sngagasathams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro// las gzhan thams cad kyang denayod tsang thogs pa
[“ ]mad par byed de/ dam chig ca/ sum ra'i chogagalas 'byung ba rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ snying re dang/ gzungs thams cad nang las thams cad byed pa'o//
klu dgas cho ga mi bzad m// rje rdzogatams pa 'dra khagi/ kunu lha srin bcas pa yaM/ sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa// de khros pas lhas mtshon pa'i// brgya pa'i nyid kyang 'dar bar
'gyur// 'byung po kun gyisamasmad pa// de na sung kharabyed pa'i mchog/ jaltar lhar bcas 'jig rtenan// sangs rgyas badra ba'aston pamed// bden pa'i tshats+tshanir yisan//
tsha skye bo kun lasur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzra pra ka ra/ badzra praka ra badzra daM/ b+hayA pahA/ rtsoru tsha'u/ pa ra tsum raka/ tshulu tel/ namoratA tAyAya/ namo badzra/

anaA/anayA/ ma hAg Na pa til gru la/ a nyi ahi/ a kra ma a kra ma/ sha raM/ gyi hri ta mA/ grwa sI tam/ daMny+tsam/ don+namAnA/ a ba tu sha'i/ kany+tsinAya
sa brnyan/ brnyan/ raT pa'i [”]kaM pa kaMl/ rag ri ga mo da mo ra/ d+harma d+harma/ badrilA badzradA/ spu ru spur/ gu NaguN a ban ma ran/ kIg+haM gA
N+NaM mahAmadzrab+he ra le ga Na pa tirA dzA pa ya ti swAhU 1 chog la dgra thams cad ' rangs par bya ba dang/byad stems thams cad gcadu ralan bang ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas
la sams khros pas mtshon la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas tes la btsugs na de ma thag tu byad ltams thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod
lasan dbyug pa lalan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangasan dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rjel lan bdun bzlas
brjod cas te bsnaman klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// sarapa bzlog par bdod lasan rdo rje hacangam drag mar bskor zhing/ sgra'ang nang gsang ma mtho bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi
b.regs par 'gyurar// chang bsrung bar 'dod pas na chang gi rdzas rnams yungs karal lan 'dun bsngags n thub par 'gyur ro// nad zhibar 'dod pal
nad dang mthun pa'i smananam tshulalan bdun bsngags te 'thus samakhyugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro// las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas n
bsamasam/ grub par 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyigazungasazhes mya pa ma rusalaphyir bzlog pa rdzogasaso//'phags pas gsum
ba rig khungs rnams rnam mang yang// rdo rje 'jigs byed gal nus gsungs pa'i gzungs// bsung mya'olas bdu ldan pa'i gzungasa mchog 'di/ kun gyis thun mong ma yan rnal
'dur nam ra'i gzungs// rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor chen po don yod rdo rje zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban d+he skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA daN+NanA ma d+hA ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pore cachen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangasargyusadang byang chub sems dpa' thums
tshacad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ra dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung ro 'di la/ dag srong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gnag
da dus chen re dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshon tshe dang ldan pa sgragacan zan rgyal rong la kya dur khrod chen mo bsil ba'i gnas// bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogasAn ba dug ga
der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang/ lha malan gyi gdon rnams dang/ klu'i gdon rnams dang/ gnod spyin gyi gan rnams dang/ srin mo' gtso rnams dang/ mi'amaNa'igan
rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen do' gdon rnams dang/ driza'i gdon rnams dang/ mib gdon rnams dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang/ padagasakyi g.yo rnams dang/ 'byung po gdan
mas dang/ sha wa ga rnams nAng rgyul bumagu gdon rnams nang/ gzig rnams dang/ parog rnams dang/ 'ug pa rnams rung/ grog spuranams dang/ sdig
sbrul rnams nang/ gzhan yang mi dang mi yin pa/bsems can rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin lashin tu gces so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i
rig la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgoros phyagatatshalate/ dacom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus rta mchimazlags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pasgraganazinal bka' stsal pa// sgra gam chen khyor tsatso phyir da
mdunan 'dug nas mchem blog/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa sgragacan zan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi du khrod chen po bsil ba gsan/ bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogasan mchisAmachisan/ der lha gdon rnams dang/ lham yin gyi gden
rnams dung/ klu'i gdon rnams dwang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang/ srin po'i gdon rnams rang/ mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang/ dri za'i gdon rnams dang/ lto' phye chen
po gdon rnams dang/ mi gdon snums dang/ rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang/ yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang/ 'khyung ro 'a gdon rnams dang/ sha za'i gdon rnams dang/
grul kun gyi gdon rnams dang/ gzig rnams dang/ bya 'og rnams dang/ lug ra rnams dang/ grog sbur rnams rang/ stag sprul rnams dang/ gzhan yang ma dang ma mayun ra'i
sems can rnams kyis dag la shan tu gtsos lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ che dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin labakaM' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zan khyod kyis khecon/
@# na ro'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang/ dge slong ma rnams dang/ dge bsnyen rnams dang [. ]dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/glu
sba ba dang/ yun ring po 'don dang/ pan ra/drang/ bde bar 'gyurar 'du zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ oM gA/ khaM gA/ tigA/ taraM gA 1 sar sa rA ta raM gAsU/ sa sdos/ dza d+ha rA/
akA re/ a ra nIru/ tarahA// tar tar pa ra/ kanar nA/ tshu ru ArA/ tshu ru tshuru mA rA/ in+d+ra ki/ sar gnas/ hanasakasar mi tsa 1 ma h+phamaN+NaM me si'ikA/
ka la kA maM ga dzayaM/ dzayal ga/ e lA/ tsan+ti/ la/ ti le/ sumeta/ bu su ma ti/ tshulun/ tshulu tshu lunaN+NaM/ tshulan Ti/ kun ti/ pa ki/ na rIT karta/ gor/
gan d+hAni/ d+har Ne/ rluraNe/ u pa rA la ka/ uk+ka/ pa pa de ke/ kar karmi ka/ kakal/ tsa lanaN+NaM/ kag ma la lam ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ rA la kule/ bta sa la/ un ma'i
ta ra pAr/ ta ra ta ra kA'i/ kuru daMr/ ku ru ku ru mAr/ tshu ru tsu ru tsu ru tsu ru klu'i/ ma hAtA'i 1a ram ti/ ba ra ma ti/ rakA ma ti/ sarma a sA d+ha naM/ pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha naM/ a
pra ti ha ti/ rgyal po dbang po dang/ rgyal po zla ba dang/ rgyal po gshin rje dang/ rgyal po rlung lhan ng/ rgyal po gzi can dang/ rgyalaponor rgyas kyi khu dang/ rgyal po de tshon nang/ rgyal ro/
btsan mo dang/ rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang/ sangs rgyas bcom lta'adas chos kyi rje dang/ chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba rgyan med pas da log la bsrung du gsol//
yongasasur skyob pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba dang/ 'kha dang/ bde legasasu 'gyur ba dang/ chad pa spangs nang/ mtshon cha snang ba
sa dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ dug gzha'akha dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ sa bcung d mdzad du gsolu/ tar+ya b+hA/ alam/ tasalA/ iram taM/ sa ma ti/ tsa la ma ti// phur
mAti phu ru dur/ pu ru du ru/ pa ra khu dunu/ khu ru ma ti/ b+hum maN+Da kal ka/ tsan+d+hal/ akas rAl iyA sA/ sa la ma to 2 hul/ sgule shale dzaya/ sgyu la/ tsal nA
tsan/ nA gA An d+ha ra Nig ro nyin/ go la tihi/ ar/ si kayu re/ ka tu ma taM/ b+hu taM ga me/ b+hu ta ra ti/ d+hare/ ma sU ra la a tsun+d+he/ a tshu run+te d+ha ra myur/ dziya lakA/
dza' go ro hi/ saMr/ hu ra su ru/ run rgyu run cu/ guru/ d+hum ti/ d+ha ran d+ha re/ d+hare/ bshA ma ti/ nAn/ ban rnyan (mo man ba ma tsa/ sAn+tano/ bsho d+han/ saM
giraNi/ man g+hor Ni/ an+nat+tan/ pA d+hu tar ma la/ tur taram No/ har hAr/ ban d+hu ma ti hi hir/ ge re la 1 mu ru mu'u/ saMg le snyan / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
rnams laphyag 'tshal lo// sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi mig sngags brgya rtsa bcu ra 'daskud pa la mdud de/ lag ra'akhatagasas ma mgul du btagasan/ kun
nas da nga la tshad lasu khor yug tu pe con rnams dang/ me tog rnams dang/ phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro// de lami dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis ma tshugs par 'gyur ro/
