mchon dang/ dug dang/ nad dang/ rims nad dang/ rims drag po dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rolangs dang/ khro gtug dang/ mo dang/ chus 'chi ba'i dus khyed
marami 'gyur ro// rig sngagasadang/ gsang sngags dang/ sbyor ba rnams lags par sbyoral thomasacad kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o// grub pa rnams kyang tshun mtha
bar khyed ra'o// pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'chang rag/ parolasalatsangesar las grol bar byed pu'o// nad rung/ mya ngan dang/ bgegs rnam par 'jig par khyen ra go da'athab ra'i
rog tshurar 'dar byed pa'o// gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// gdan gang gis mi gtong ba de ba mgro N+Da ka'i dag pa bzhin dumag tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// gnad
sbyin sde dpon chen rola gzhu rdo bang rdo rje bkar ba kun tu 'barab/ kun tu rab tu 'bar// me lce gcig tugyur dus/ debamago sadz+dzaka' dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun
du'agams so// rgya'amochen po bgadang lcags kyi 'khor la spu gri'i so lta bu'i mchon gyis phung bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyi bo srong
'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo// sgra gcan zin rgyal po dang/ mirgod dang/ ma dang/ chudang/ mchodachadang/ 'brog dang/ dgon pa dang/ ri dang/
mya ngamadu song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod n sdagar thams cad las rar tu thar par 'gyur ro// sgra gcan zin pe con chen po'i gzungs kyi
rig sngags 'dasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga 'i krung dgu bcu rtsa gca ga lemasnyed kyis gsungs pa// gsung ba/ gsung bar 'gyur ra/ grub pa mchog tu gyur pa// gzhan
gyisam thub pa// lha dang/ kludang/ dra zal sogs pas bstod ma// 'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las
sgyu bde bar gyur cig/ nad med ra dang 'jigs pa med ra ra gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ tshonang ldan pa sgragacan zin yarangs te/ bcon ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcon chen do zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasas////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza'i ma tra dang/ don hUM
k+kha la dang/ zhu chen gyilatsal ran d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phabara'o//
00bar skad du/ Ar+yaratamAlanam a pa rA dza/ bod skad du 1 'phags pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i zhen ngo ma'i 'phrang ra zhes bya ra/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal// sangs
rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcasar rnams
la phyag 'tshala'// byams mal sogs ma rung chub sems dpa' thams can la phug batshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
la phyag 'tshal lag nAgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshala'// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs r rnams la
phyag 'tshal lo/ u'i drang srong rnams laphyag 'tshal lo// brtul zhugs gyur pa rnams la phyag 'tshal la/ lha rnams la phyag 'tshal ba/ ku rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gnon sbyin
rnams laphyag 'tshalal/ dri za rnams la phyag 'tsholalo// lta' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshol lo/ 3ma 'amatsi rnams la phyag 'tshal// srin ro rnams la phyag 'tsha2 la//
sha za ma gyen du brdzes pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig ma'i bdag po rnams 'phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba nang nyim rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal/
de nas gzhan kyisamathub pa'i rin po chu'i phung ma'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ra 1 lha dang klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba/
lasakhamasacad byed pa gtsang mkharjod par bya ste/ dag cing de na bkra shasar// bsod nams khyed gtsang dar la yonan// srin po 'joms ra'i lanams dang// sems can kun
gyisam thub pago stag ra thamasacad rang 'jig pa// don kun grub pa dang/ yon can/ gdon kun rnamarar 'jig byed pa// rig sngags 'di brjod par bya// 'dani rtag tu
rgya'abyed pa/ brgya can gyis kyang mthud 'ad// dug dang gshed byed 'jig byed da// ma dag rgyal po'i 'gyes pa dang// gnod byed gdon dang rol ngas dang// lam dAn
dang lus srul dang// lhan ng lhamin dri zad ng// gshed sbyin srin po klu rnams las// kun nas dar gdan rgya tshunachud// rtag tung dag la srung bar mdzod// nyin gcig pas
rimasan da dang// nya gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa// nyin khan sa ya rims nad dang// ldang dub rams las 'dasrung mdzod/ dug dang dbyig dug zos rayar// kha zasal/
du zhu bar 'gyur// gangag ma lan mi chags dang/ gangs chu bar bayang// smin par yi'aphrang ba yis// de dag gtu'atsho bar 'gyur// nor 'dod panaranams thog/
dur la 'dod pa yang dpal thob 'gyur/ 'tshab mang byed dang g.yul ngor yang// myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin// sams tshan rnams la gnod garlags nas// 'jig rten mgon
gyis rab gsungs pa// yi chen 'phro zhes bya ba yi// rig sngags 'di brjod par to// tad+ya thA/ o da na ka ra/ ba du la ka ra 1 dzaya ka ri/ yab+hAka ra/ srad+hi kar/
Ayu dAde/ pany+tsa dAri AmAgam/ d+han d+han/ ba brtan/ gi kur 1 saN gru han kA tu rA shab/ ma dwangashan 1 pu tra dzanan (rar la rwa ba brtan/ Ayurnyan/ pra tika/
ngag+han/ ston+tan/ mo rata/ mi mo gru dka ti/ kan+taM na mUle/ gra so/ 2 makar NaM/ sarba kA la kA la ha'i gra ba ba bud+ha/ pra shaman/ pa ra tsakra/ nagar ba ra be ca/
stag+han ts+tshan+tar mAle ka ri Ni/ sarba pA maM pra sha man/ sarba kA'akhawan gnasAhA/ tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ tu ru tu ru swAhA/ mu ru mu ru swAhA/ sarbade baazhu dzAti sAhA/ sa nA
gsar ti sAhA/ on rir phaN 2 han han paT/ da thad pa phaT 2 pa tsa ra tsa phaT/ gang dag bdag la sdang bar sams pa dang/ gnod par sems ra dang/ sbyin sreg
byed pa dang/ khyade na pa dang/ byed du 'jug pa dang/ byed pa la rjes suya rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT sA//[7 ]ag+gatso snyaya ma tIshan/ a tun ud kan/ tshor na/
sadzadukan/ sa rnamu ba taNika/ bcam tu na/ saM b+hayAm/ dzi snyaya ma/ mo lha ya mi/ phaT phaT sAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ces ra// rin chen 'phreng
lags rab brgyan pa/ lus kun byen du de bzhin du// rtag tu srung bar byed pa 'ad/ bgro 'am yang na yang rung// de dag 'ga' la bris te 'chad// srin po 'joms pa
bsod namasa mchog/ sdig minog pa 'jig pa ra rtsed// g.yul khyon pa dang 'thab pa dang// kun tu rgyal bar byed ra da reg/ mngagatsang sbra byas nas su// rig sngag
'an bris bcang ba dang// rakragasarngananga shes rab can de la// 'jigs ra gam byung ngo// chog bgazhin du klog 'chang na/ 'gasang ba po kun rtag tusung// yongs su skyong
bar byed par 'gyur// rtag tu rgyal par byed pa ste// dpa' ban chen 'phreng g.yos/ mgo bo rgyun namadzes pa ltar// de razhin phun sum tshogs pasamadzes// gang
dgaragasngags 'di gnang na// deyigadon rnams rnam par 'ajig ]na dkyis btab ra ra ma bgyur ro// bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// de yi 'khor na bzang mor gyur//
sems can kun la phan phyir dang// bye brag tu na casar phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rig sngags 'dazhican gyisab+hArabs// lhayi rgyal po rnams dang
de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung// de la phyogs su rnams kyi ni// de bzhazhi gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad// dgu pa dang nor rnams 'phel// sdig pa rnams
kyang byang pa'i m// rmi lam ngan dang nyes byas las// grol 'gyur ba la the tshom med// tad+ya thA/ mun mun/ mu ni mun mun r/ ma ti ma tim ti/ mahAm ti/ bdag
'jigs pa thamasacan las srungs shig srungs shig gsangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalalo/ shayams kyi nad rung gnon pa thamasalas bdag bde legs su gyur cig swAhA/
'phagasal gzhan gyis mi thub parin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan pos rinagazhi dang// zhu chen gyitsab ban d+haye shes sbas/
bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab la//oM pad+ma ni ma Nidza hU~M/ snying re'o/ oM ba ra da paNaM hU~M/ nyera'i snying po'o// oMm Niradzra NihU~M/ gsang
nga'i snying rogo/ sngagasasnying ba'i 'gyur smon lam dang tshigasasu bcad pa rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ ArasarnaanarAya ba
kon mad+d+hAraNi/ bod skan du/ baphags pa khar du gcod pa thams can rnams sbyong gnas bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas laphyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo///
dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// ba de skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong/ gangs ma'i
gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogasazha/ lus 'phags ral dbang po' brag phug na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byami la'achib po'i chos su gyur to// tsho'i 'du byed kyi
thA lcag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chun nas skyag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
pos phyug 'chol te/ lan gsum skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang tshe don du gnyer ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal ra// kodug ka
de'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa ba gsang sngags kyig kha gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kan chu gcad par 'gyur
ba bar dus/cod pa thams cad snum rar sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi bda rnams nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ a b+haye/ b+hayab ga te b+hiya pa risho d+han/ a g+ha
la a sgo yan+da ne/ nar rakri'i/ an le/ a ku la pa ri sho d+han 2 a gra te/ a bkalde/ akawan/ a hU~M te/ shud b+ho shug+ha te dze tadza la ti/ sham u pa bag mam hor pa/
ma mi bris rgyud rdzu titin/ togs zhe sa te/ sa skya darI/ a ba ru rmi/ sa hi ta ha ta te/ sarba mchu sid d+he/ amr-i ta pa te/ a b+hi/ brdzus skye/ ak+Sha ye/ a kA ya pra b+he/ can bar/ shud+d+haM
kud+ho/ ban+taM/ a balha sa/ a pa b+has kha ti/ ur yoka/ a nu t+ta'i ( sam tshut+ti 1 kun+d+ha/ a d+hin/ la sho d+han/ ma saMhabye/ sun gro hitaMmar pa lanaM/ ba ra dzayo draN+Dag Na nAn/ namo
la kal/ ud ga tA nan/ d+harman rgon@#/ saM gra hAkan/ d+ham ka khag/ ko'u shi ka khyed kyis gar 'gasang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dagazhi/ khyod kyi rig pa gsang sngagasAkya gag gang dag
gas 'dudathamasacad dang/ phyir rgol 'thams cad dang/ bas[”]sgol baThams cad shin tutshar gcod par 'gyur ba dag go/ 'dar sgras kharjod byas n sngon gyalas kyi rnam par smin pa
ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
lha'i dbang po brgya byanas rangs te da 'tsho bar skad du/ khogolhalas mgyural// bad nyidanan dug bzhin du// khogos tshe yang zlob wan/ grogs na ni ltar shes par gyis//
la ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bda'o mthu thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren thams cad named pa gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa
thoms can 'grub par gyur cig/ namo a zhe tulen tsan+danA yisAhA/ rtsa a sgra sA d+ha ni swAhA/ d+harma sA d+ha kiyaMswAhA/ sarba An+tar ya bi sho d+ha nA ye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
ka kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// lha rnams kyad bang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor de rnams yi rangs te/ bcol
shuldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa/ ra bstod do// 'phags pa bar du bcad pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////rgya gar gyim ban po
na ma can ng/ dAn gAl dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ngan rje ye shes sde pa bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang gces nas gtan la phab pa//
sgyu kaM/ rgya ba/ra skad du/ Ar+ya sAja a b+ha ya pradu na nA ma d+hAShi/ bod skad du/ 'bags pa thams cad lam 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes kyi ra'i gzus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 'go/ 'ad skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcin 2 bcom ldan 'das yulamag rnyanasayul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du ba gshegs te byed zhas/ amra'atshol
tshig lus 'phags ri'i dbang po 'khrag phub/na bzhugs so// de nas lha rigs de rang lo brgya byin bcom ldan 'das gang ba der song ste phyin nas 1 bcom ldan 'das kyi gangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
[d/ ]te phyogs gcig 'dug go/ phyog sa gcal// tu bdug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan kha nas lhamayi rnams narib tu
gnod par bgyid ra ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha masan rnams ni bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ches bstan du gsol/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan Sha das kyis[7 ]lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigasaraspyi ma'i rige
sngags don thams cad byed pa// 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu bar byed pa/ nad thamasacad rab tu zhi bar byed ra/ dug thams cad 'jil pa/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa//
rkang med dang/ rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par byed// dgra thams cad phung bar byed ra// lha dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ sbyin byed ma'i du dang/ sha za dang/
brjod byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ bram ze'i srin po dang 'khyung po dang/ rolangs dang/ bya'i gdon dang/ srul po dang/ nam gru dang/ gnon ro'i gdon dang/ gnon po dang/
brjed byed kyi gdon dang/ lha'i gdon dang/ klu'i gan dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang/ dri za'i gdon dang/ mi 'am ca'i gdon dang/ log 'dren gyi gdon dang/ ma mo'i gdon
phung bar byed pa// mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ zas su 'phreng ba za ba dang/ zas su sngos za ba dang/ zas sum tog za ba dang/ zas su bdug pa za ba dang/
zas su khrag 'thung ba dang/ zas su rnaga'athung pa dang/ zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang/ zas su gtsan 'thung ba// rab tu phung ba byed ra// rims nad thams cad dang/ rlung las
chur pa dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ bad kan lasagyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa// rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod
pa dang/ 'gyed pa rung/ mtshang 'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed rab d zung zhig dang/ thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par s+yago/ tad+ya thA/ aDi
ma Di pa maNe/ go le ngo/ le bos se/ mo// baSh+Tha/ kha raN+NaM khar Na/ ga Ni pa Tha Da ga Na pra gu Na/ pra ta ma rje/ka' pra kAka' tsa/ ma hAhaMt+tA pa titsa/ rje ge a tirag/
son/ na/ mahA/ pra mo hA/ pra mo Ta/ nA gan/ pranAshAn/ rgyu ba ni/ parnyapa ni/ bal gan/ pra ba la gan sgrakhyen/ dra na tan/ kro d+hani/ pra ti kra d+ha na/ han han/ de
na ba han/ sazadud+hAdza?tuShanAshaya/ sarba a b+ha ya prade/ bad/ 'khor dang bcas ra 'jigs pa thams can dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig
[ro]/ srungs shig/ gnasa' yi bdag gi don thamasacun 'grub par gyur cug/ de lta bsan/ khri do lodo tsum re/ sarba sid+d+hi hanir te/ namasarba bud+d+hanAn sAhA/ lha'i dbang po thams
cad la mi 'jigs pa sbya'i ra'i rig sngags ga bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcingasAsam/ sa la mdud ra ror ma/ bzlas brjod byas sam/ yungs kar ram/ gi'u
wang la lan tsag bsngags te bskus sam/ gom la bsngags na mtshan gyis ma tshugs/ dug gsum yin/ rimasand kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig nas man 1 nyin gnyis las/
ma yun/ nyin gsum pasam yin/ nyin ba ras ma yin/ mes ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro'angs kyis ma yin/ dugags mayan/ nad kyis ma yan te/ chus
'char dusabyed par ma 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang gsang sngags sbyor bsgyur pa thums cad sbyorar rnams kyis ma grub de rnams grub par byed do// sbyar te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis
mtshugs par byed do// pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed do// gzhan gyirag sngags gcod par byed do// 'dag rig sngags 'phal bur byed do// gdon thams cad
pung bar byed do// gdon gang gsamig tong na'ang/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du lags so// de nas lha'i darang lo brgya tsan de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to//
@#ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkau0f8bstsalanas/ lhab de pang po brgya byin yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon rar bstod do/ 'phags
ka thamasacad la mi'ajigs pa sbyin pa zhes u0fb1 ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po yi mi cad ng/ dA na shAl dang/ zhu chen gyi sob ban d+he ye shes sdes
bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas pagatan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya drub Da batrer dza bod skad du/
'phags pa gro ldang ba'i rig sngang/ sa kyargyal ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na smig mtshu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na khazhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' rog la dka' stsal// kun dga' po khyed kyis glog thams cad bzlog ra//
sosol ba brang da sngon gyi yang dgapar rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ 'ang da ltar 'chad kyis khrubashig/ kun dga' re shar phyogasan rong pa zhes bya ra'i glog yod/
kun dga' bo lho phyogs naskad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dmag 'bonub phyogs na bod nyamasal zhes rtsa ba'i gug yod/ kun dag 'bo byang phyogs na rgyud gyi re da ga rozhisakya ba'i grab
[z]yod de/kun da la gad bobang la 'al gloga'adi rnams kyi mang shes ra dang/ phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes ba de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad du 'byung rang shes par bya'o glog gi
ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dub tu glog thams can mi b.lab ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ba'agro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya glu/ na mo ma zhuman d+ha re/ 'jig rten gsum snangad pa khyen pa// laban rtse gsum r sa phyogs 'di'i glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig
srungasashigasAhA/ yang de 'tsho byang chugasems dpaTasams daraTachen ro 'gas ra spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan
'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi mgrangs 'dal 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyig tar+ya// hate
baha te ni hate/ dra h+phake/ pra skya ma kuN+NaM/ muka/ ba ma te/ prab+hasA re/ maN+Dare/ paN+Dare/ shA te/ paN+Da/ ra pAsazhi/ ha ri kar da 1 pag lAk+Shad d+hi mukha/ dus mayan
par 'chib thams cad las bdag la srungs shigasrungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dusamayin par ma pa thams can mthong bar ma
gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag rolagar rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btud de/ bcom ldan 'dras khra'adaskad ces/
ka gsol to/ bcom ldan 'dasaradagags kyang chos kyi rnamagrangs bar l gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA 1 chunamun 2 mun mun/ rir/ ma ta ma ti/ su ma ti/
ma tamaNi/ hA hAhA khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces gan rdo rjes smras kyis 1 draDi sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gsung ra ra zhan gyisam khrub pa'i
su'astongala'ajipItam gorakhris na/ de 'badag gis rtag par rgyun nu 'jigs pa thams cad lasarasrung darab gyi'o// dusam 'gas par bgum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o//
zladoms mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyidon dang sman pa dang/ bde
cha bskyed pa'i sudadu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dal gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyig rnams brjod par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ halo mi la/ lasAhA/ brag+hAsAr sU ra sAhA 2 brah+ma gan+d+ha
push+tsasaM sta resAhA/ bcom ldan 'adas da'i bdag gzung ba tshangs mchan pa zhes bgyi bste/ dus ma lags r 'gum pa thams cad las yo ngas su skyob pa///ga paThamA
cad rab tuzhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya pan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la dgod ces gsol/
to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gsakyang chos kyi rnam graabad lagazung kyi lasang sngags kyi gnamasabarjod par bgyigo/ tar/ na ba ri Ni/ ban d+haban d+hu/ mA dan D+ha//
ma tun 'a go/ gan d+hu'i/ tsal/ ma trag ba ralan/ hin mAr Nim lan/ da la man+te 1 tsakra pa kra/ shar ri sha ra ra sAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
'di'i bdag garig sngags rdo rje 'dems pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thamasacad las rnam par thar par bgyidamU 1 dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyong pa
lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung drang/'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su
thalamo sgyur ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gas kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye ba mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten
la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dal gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyig/ tad+ya thA 2 pu'u puSh+Tha/ d+harma bar har/ Ar+yadra shaste/ shir mut+taM/
ka @#// tshig le/ sku lce/ sna tisAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi por dgacagag srung ba'ajug pamamachis pa zhes bu ste 'jigs
ba pathams cad lasama'ajigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyongang/ dus malags par 'gum pa thamasacad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal ro/rgyu mtsho dang/ klu'i
rgyal po glogakhod dang/ klu'i rgyal pomadres pa dang/ krung rgyal po glog lce dang/ rgyu ni rgyal mo 'od zer brgyaras (bcom ldan 'das gal ba de'agasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud ni/
bcom ldan 'dasal 'daskyid ces gsol to// bcomoldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrungab chen po yid bzhin rgyan du zhes bgyur glog kAms can bzlog pa dusamalags
parab gum pathamasacad sal ba/ duN+Da rnams gdug par bgyid pa// gabyed byed dngo/pyadad nga/ langs dung/ bkra mi shis pa 'jigs par bgyid pa mchasan/ bcom
ba ldan 'das bdag cag kubaskye gnasa'adazhes dbyung ba dang/ ser sna sdang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgos te de bzhes sugasol/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'dus/
tsha/ bdag cag ku rnams nasamasaser sna can te/ sems ser snasakun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o// tad+ya thA/ ar rje/ am re am te/ a ye pu ts+tsa ]
par bte/ sam+bapApa sra sha mnaya sAhA/ Arang rgyas pa kAyisAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag skyes ra'am/ bud med gangal la lcil 'don
tamaya ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mams par rag la/ra bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mareb ga dug gam/ dbyig dug gum/ gang dag gzhan yang
yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de'agum pa'i dusabgyid par ma 'gyurar// bdag 'jigs pa rnams cad dang/ gnadar thams cad las 'de legasasugyur ga/ de
nasakhacom ldan 'das kyis/ brgya byin dang/ chongs pa dang 2 'jig rten skyongab dang klu'i rgyal po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag skyar mang rol na
pa dang/ skyag mang pa la bdara'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs bar rjes sul zung ba'i phyir 'gro ldang ba'i gsang sngags tshig rnams bshad pa legasolegasaso// phyogs
rnams na gnyid log pa dang/skyes pa dung/ rab tu skyes l rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skad cesakhaka' nas/ dge song de dag da du/ ngargya byin
dang/ rmongs mdang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dedag dang/ grub dbang po de dog dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha malan dang/dri bar bcasar ba'i jag rtenayi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bsus ral mngon par ra stod do// 'phags ma 'greldang ba med sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/// rgya gar mkhan po dzan mi tra
dang/dAnashAl dang/ chu chen gyi tshab ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
chu/ rgyagar zhud du gA thudwayan+d+ha ra Ni/ bdaskadanaM/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jamanAr la gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang
natshos lab+hAras pa dang// le lo dang cung zad chog par 'dzad// 'dod chags dang nang rgyal spyod pa dang// 'gyod pa dang ma nges sbyong ra rnams// somasanas mas kyi sgrib par gyur
pa/ ]/ de yi gnyen por theg pa mchogarastan pa// deyas bar du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyos ra khamasacad 'ab tu song bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzrapra kA ra badzratsaka/ daM g+ha
An ke/ a male/ ba mele/ nar mal/ phyoluge tshulu tshulu sarba bud+d+hesAhA/chagasasu khacad pa gnyis pa2gzungs lan// chog gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba// soms
can dam pa blo dpaldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par gyur/ khams rnams mthob dang gartas par 'gyur ba dang// 'ched 'tshon mchog dga' dam pa thob/
kazhijilta'i dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang// thams cad du tshorabs dran par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par gyur ba dang/ de bzhin de dag las thog mchog thos// mos
ba'agyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang// sgo gnyis dngan khungachub myur du thob// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis da gzungasardzogs so//
gar skad du/ Ar+yan+d+ha dza a gragegayu ran man+d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'obags ra rgyalamtshan gyi rtsi mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya nga yi gzungs/ sangasargyus dang byang chub sems dara' thams cad
luphyag 'tshal// 'ad skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtso gsum la lha yi ngal kha dkar po lta bu'i rdo la' la zhugs te/ nas lha'i dbang
po brgyabyan lha ma yin rnams lasupham/ rab tuphamanas de rtab cing ras pa'i gazugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgongs phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di'i lham yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/ lhamtshan gyidarang mo thag bzangs
ras las pham/ rab tu pham ste/ sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu phaman/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gas de la jaltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha'i de bang ro khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces khul gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungasazung zhag/ sa kyang sngon
byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhazhi gshegs pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'damanasaso// mnos nas kyang gzhan la cherayang dag par bshad do// mngon par
dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ cung zing zhes byed pa bam/ than skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod ra 'byungamamyong ngo// bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi co
mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba la gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA oM dza ya dzaya 2 ba dzaya ba dziya/ ya pAn/
kaM ka ranaM ka ri/ pra b+hAka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ sarba shan+taM/ dzaMb+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya/ sti rnyayan+taM b+haya/ mo ha ya mo haya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya ba hin/ ma
tham tha/ pra ma thA pra ma thA/gras gras/ has pas/ hU~M hU~M/ la hU~M la hU~M/ laM bod ricoNataN/ oMtu sku 1 tsa tur daMSh+Tha/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra ti shu la tsakra Tik+ku
la/badzraka ba tsan+tAr Na/bdag gnod pa thams cad las sris shig[” ]/o b+ha ga ba ti/ han han/ da had/ pa tsa pa dza 2 ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ na tshun/ ba rgyun ba rgyun/

hu hU~M 1 phaT phaT/ b+hany+dzab+hany+dza pa ra su rgya ma ba rgyun sa ya 2 sa[–]tu na g.ya/d+ha dza a gra ke yu re/ tu ti ba ta ke/ b+hi Ta b+hi Ta/ u la kA mu khi/ u la kA d+ha ra/ tu'adekya ma than/ ba d+hAn
sa ya pa ra se n+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungasashag srungs shig/ tsa la tsa2 1 tsa'i tsale 1 tsu tsu lu 1 kaM pa kaM pa// ka la ka la/ ka la ka lo kulu ku lu/ muny+tsamu'u/
a saM/ ba rgyunas ya pa ra se n+yan/ rgyus ya ta ya/ blum ya b+hu maya/ bud+d+has skye na/ d+harma sa rgyas/ saMgrus can/ sa t+yA bAd+hi'on sa/ bud+d+hA tun ma ti kra ma/ d+harma sa te ma ti ka
masaMg+has skyam ti kra ma/ sa te bu dmAn sa skya ma ta kram/labod 1 laM lo da/ ku ku Ta/ku ku 2 ku klu pa ya ku pa ya/ ru ca ma nA ya bat+tamanAya/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya brah+mam nan kyi
a n+tar tanAg/ sarba de ba ad+hi pa ta mnAya/ sarba kAr kyus/ gan rnyam/ kaMg+hat+taM kAm hor ga a d+hi pa temanu5/ga d+hAn saya pa ra si/na 1rig gi ga/ ri ga da lA/ ro gar
dzAl dzul 1 pukumA lan/ run chu run sgyu rA tir ti 1 tsa tatsitaM/ d+ha ti d+hitaM/ b+ha ku Tau kha ra ra/ sin ku'o ta sA dan ka pa/ hal hal/ ha la hil 1 hu lu hu lu[”]he he ra Na'i Ni/ ri Ni
ma ta dzib+ha b+hAdze/ sarba bud+d+hA/ a ba la ti/ bdag 'jags pa thams cad las srungs shig/ sarba ta thA ga te/ ang la ka ti hu 1 gu ta ra dza dra g+hasat+ta pAhA/ skur an rim la
swAhA tsan+d+ra aka ba ma 'amAhA[7 ]su'u gra tan raD+ha mAka ra Ni swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad ga pa dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad las
srungs shig srungasashagasAhA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtsomo'i dpung rgyanaces lu ba gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa bam/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/
gyid pa'i m/ gang du 'gro'ong rung ste thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtsomo 'am/ mgul du btagasan/ mi'i rgyalapo dang skyes bu dang 'a bo thamasacad l srung po
byed do// bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur na samadun du 'dug ste 3mi'ajigs pasbyin zhing srung bar byed/dar la skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sna spa bkong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang/
gtsang dang/ grogasaparung 1 dpal dang/ phun su mchogs pa kun tu gnas par byed d// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya rgyun dang/
lha dang/ mdang/ lcam yan dang drwakhor bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te 2 bcom ldan 'dras kyis gsungasar la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse ma'i
tsha/ dpung rgyan cesar+ya ba'i gzungs rdzogs//rgya gar gyi mkhan po na ma ta dang/ dngashA'i dang/ chu chen gyi tshor ban d+ha yapashegasdes bsgyur cing zhus te//
skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yatsurje de la nAm t+tAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
palha mo skul byed m zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs padagra dacomal yang dag rar rdzogs ra ba sangs rgyas rnam
par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'dasalhamo skulakhyenAm mthu dang stobs dpal/tumed pa dang ldan ra/ rdza'aphrul dang pa rol gnon ra grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pathams
cad kyis ra sngags shing bstod la phyag 'tshal lag/bdag rnam pathaca thams cad du dpag par mdzod cig/ namasam+b+hanaM/ saMmuka saM bud+d+hA ko TinaM/ tad+ya thA/ o tsatsunestsahA/ brtson 'grus/
chen mo thogs pamed pa 'dulakha/ stobasam/pha rol gnon ra che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang/ dgra sta dang/ lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa bsnams// khromo chen mo/ khromochen mo'i
dbang phyug ma/ drag mo'i gzugs can ma/ zhalas mtha' yasam/ phyag stongamanga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ donayod ma/ gdul bar dka' na/ mig stong
ma dang zhi gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag rgyas shing mchod pa rab tu sgyur ma/ rdo rjesen mo can/ rdo rdzordo rjes 'drenam rdorje'atshon
chacan/ rdo rje'i sku nam/ rdo rje khu tshum/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can m 1 drag shul can m lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sbyar
bston pa mdzad m/ skurdo rjod ng byi[G]cha rgyanagyis brgyan pa/ og+ha ga ba titsun+te hU~MN+NaM/ kr-ihU~M/ tshuruM/ suM suM/ raMrI 1 a de shaya/ grostsagrosgyu/ grosgyu rayagrostar ya/ ha ra ha ra/
b+haSh+Thab+hat+taM/ sa ras ra/ ma ram ra/ ma ya ma ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da had ha/ griSh+Tha grid+d+haM/ sdang nga gdon dang/ rims zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnyis pa dang/ zhag gsum pa
dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/zhag bdun pa dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ yud tsam pa dang/ 'byung po dang/ rolangs dang yid gs dang/ shakhra dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
bsgyu grul bum gyi gdon dang/ mngal las skyes pa dang/ las las skyos pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gnas pa bad dag dang sdang ba gang bdog la'atshel dang/ gdug pa de dag thams cad/
sAd+hayasA cha ya/ mardzaya many+dza5/ sho Shayasho khaya/ tAr ya k+Sha pa ya/ uta sna daya uta daya 1 han hanu badzraSha 1 sa rwas ra daN+Din/ mAr ya mAlaya/ khagen/ hU~MhU~M[7]
rgyu / rgyu dz+han+naM/ o tsa la tsu'atsuny+dzasarba an+naAb+hayasAk+kA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang khyon gyi rab sakyis/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge char gyur cig
sat+taM 'phags ma lcam skul byed ma zhes bya ra'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// rgyaga' skad du/ Ar sumu khanAm t+tAr Ni/ bod skad du/
'apags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 1sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das

byang chub kyi shing drun byang chub snying po'i mchod rtenachen po na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dag slong ga dge 'dun chon rogs da lta ste[0f7c]dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ chodang ldan
pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs care tur zhugs te 1 byang chub sems dar 'dage 'dun chon po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dar bsams
dpa' chen po la gzhu rdorjod ng/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rdo rje'i rgyalamtshan dang/ r+yang chub sems dpa' sems dad chen po rdogro'i snying ro dang 1 byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po 'byang chu sems dud/bsems dar ba chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas byang chub snyams dpa' sems
dad chen po'agan rdorjes 2 bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ra ti sangs rgyas kyis/
sgo bzang po zhes 'gyur chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snanga' bgyis par 'gyur ba dang/ phyurargyal ba dang/ dgra thams
cad kyis gnod par bas la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab par 'gyur ba dang/'di lto// lha'i dbang po rnams dang kru'adarang ro rnams dang/ gnod spyin gyi dbangapo rnams rang/ sran ro'i
dbang po rnams drang/ 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par ma bgyur ba dang/ sdig pa dang/ mchon dang/ dug dang/ r+yadakyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang/ phar mchi
kham saramama'am/ nyalo'am/ gnyid kyis legagam/ lcosasam/ rab tu smos kyang rung/ thams cad du'ang skyob rar 'gyur ba dang/ dedag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang/
sngags kyi gshin ms ra shud du gsal/ ji ltar bdag rtag tud bzhin gshegs pa'i m gu 'tshol ba dang/ rtag tu srung ba dang/ yongs su skyong ba 'tshol ba dang/ de bzhin du
sems can thamasacad kyi don dang/ byang chu sems dur 'a theg pa pa'igs kyi bu 'am/ ralags kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ rtsod pa dang/ nad dang
dusamalags paki'agum pa las bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba bgyi ba'i sun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa'i tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'adas
kyis kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pas thugs su chud nas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rjekhyod sems can thams
cad kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so' gas so// da'i phyiralagan rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ sgo bzang
po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par cu'o/ ug mu gu lano/ban snyan 1bal tsa man/ ba hu du hub gu la brtaya AhA/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang
bskur ba'i gzungs sngagasakyi gzhi rnams bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ badza badzra bab/
d+ha ra ni/ badzramA Ni/ badzad+han/ tsakra badzra/ tsakra d+har/ pA tu d+hi d+ho rob+har/ mur/ cer/ a hu ra 1 b+hag/ b+ha b+hi'o/ gar te/ kIr/ ru ru tse ru ru tse 1 tsa ri bo'i
da ra tsali/ tsaru tsu ru/ paN+Dare/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rang tu zhi bar byed ra// dus mAyAn par bar bar byed pa'i 'gog pa nas/ mi
lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed ra/ tad+ya thA/ ban d+ha da 1 ga ga 'ani 1 murtan/ pra mUrtan/ na/ pranA shAn/ nad rab tu zha ra' byed ra nas/ rmi lam ngan pa'i
ba bAri bo ri/ be n+d+ha bod+he/ su 'i Ni/sha ra Ni/ ba ru ba rin bar yA/ bats+tshatsam Ni/ in+d+ra pa ta d+hi d+hi reyi Ni/ na momaha shwa ra ya/
bar du'agog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nAshan/ nAshAn ban rnyan/kun rnyan/ smin+danats+tshin+dan 1 tsari Ni'i mA hehadan/ bani b.re/ kha reber
nab+hu ta bdun/ sa skya ga'i so ma rAr/ so ma prab+helAhA/ tshoradi khar 'gyur ra/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra harahA kAhA/ tad+ya thA/ i tag ta/ bdad/ an/ a ra hUM/
dzayo ga kAn/ mu ca da du ta// marga a g+ha rohanu/ gus pa tre/ mu pa ba ti/ hil sil/ ya b+ha ba dzuya/ ya atsA/ yab+haba'i tsayathun la/ yathu badzraN/ ya byorAya sAts+tshA/
lag rdo rje 'di'i sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rjenas/ sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do// ji ltar sngon byad bzhi/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyisabarlabs pa dang/ bden pa'i thugs dam gyi rnam par bzhi g bzhin du nga'ang
lha 'chad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyisaskyes bu chen po'i mtshan snyan mtshamasakyi mdzod spunas 'od zer phyung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang byung ngo/
la ba/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi shang du gnas ams te/ 'jabag rten gyi khamasamamajed 'da'i khyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya
dpyan te/ shAkyazur ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes khyab chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags kyi gnamasasnang bar byed r 1 mchog tu dga' bar
byed pa/ dran par byed raM/ bshad par byed malegs so legasaso// bdag cag gas kyang dran gyis brlab bo// legs so zhes bya ba bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gang lal gzungs sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag 'dzin tsang/ nAngar ra langs nas klog pa rigs kyi ru 'am/ bags kyi dmod ba yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par byaste/ cha shu
gang zhen/ bdalta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang 1 sangs rgyas thams ca A dgongs par 'gyur ba dang/ ngan song du 'gyur ba/
lasAkyasgrub pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang/ chorang bar bgyur pa dang karing du 'tsho shing grags pa dang ldan pa dang [7 ]longs spyod dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/
gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ rtag tunadachad pa dang ldan pa dang/ brtson 'grus dpaldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su byon par gyur
ba dang/ lhathamasacad kyis bsams par gyur pa dang/ dge rab spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ dwag ba'i don la rab tung rtson pa dang/ snang bar byed par gyur
ba dang/ mchog tu dga' kha dang dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ mtshan phunasu mchogs par 'gyur ba dang/mjigs par 'gyur b.rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
ldan par 'gyura'o// lag na rdo rdzo' yod pazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba ma gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi gzhi
'dams gsungs shing/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis can gyis b+hArabs pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dar/'asems dar/'chen ro'agan rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das
'das la 'daskanyes ba sol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gsakyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongasasubaskyang r ba slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi
rnams shad par bakyago/ su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ras rnam grangs choskyong nga 'ig sngags bda'i mitsang/ nang pa ra langs nas klog la de tsam par 'tshe thamar cud las
khasrung bar bcag/ tad+ya thA/ ga kha shakhig kho ki/ tsatsamitsi/ b+ha g+ha d+ha g+ha/ 'ur ru ru/ dza dza dzaji/ gro kha gru gra/ hri hri grozigs/ hahahaha/ mam mam/ han han me/ sarba
bra tuny+dza kA/ da had hame/ sarba shutu ba/ pa tsa pa tsa ma/ sarba A i shun gA hA de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byung chub sems dar sems dpa' chen po laga' rdo rjel legs
so zhes ru bcu ti/lag na rdo rjesems can thams cad kyi don gaspyir/ dngos grub dmara'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi mas snus pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems
dpa' ' na rdo rjes gsolal/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'achos kyi rnam grangasatsho skyong ba'ig sngags 'di 'dzazhitsang nang ralangasanas klog pa de sdu'i
khung bu rnams su mdangs thamasacad stsal bar bgyib bshad par btsa/ tad+ya thA hi ma tsal sAhA/ brah+masna reswAhA/ bram+maa ra su gan+d+ha ma kawe 1 su kha saMsta reswAhA/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das 'dan gnang par langs nas klog ra ba'ages kyi du ma/ rigs kyi bu mo dang bsrung ba dngayongs su bskyang r sha gzungs sngagasakyig sems lags so//
denas bcom ldan 'dasal/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad cesagasol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang gi skyong ba'a'i ga sngagasan dig 'dzin
cing nang par langs nas klog ra'igasakyi du'am/ rags kyi bu mo de la bsrung pa dang 2 yongs subaskyang bab srid du 1 sangs rgyas kyis bya gyis brlabs pa gzungs sngags
kyi gi go rnams bshad par bya 'o// tad+ya thA/ bo d+ha[W]/ bar Na rim ra[？ ]/dpyod blogo'i/ gan+d+ha ris ra tan/ badzra tul// tshulamAlan/ tsakru bka/
shabarasha'i/ shamangashama'i sAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po na ro 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal pochen mo/
@#masam bzangagras/ bcom ldan 'das la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// btsun pa bcom ldashu'adas bdag cag rgyal
ro po bzhis kyang/ gang sgo bzang pa zhes bgyi'o' chos rnam grangs tshe skyo dar rig sngags 'di 'dzin cang/ nang pa ra langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi du'am/ gas kyi bu
na mo de la bsrung ba dang yongasasubaskyang ba slad du/ gzungasakyi gsang sngagasakyi gams brjod par ra bya'o// tad+ya thA/ puN+Dasu runy+tse/ god+ha saMshernyano/ rlu ma ba rihar/
Araprazhaste/ nAn+te/ rimake/ maM ga phye/ he'i lcagasgyu ( sta ra sta pa te swAhA/ dunas 'khyung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun
pabcom ldan 'dasebadag gis kyang/ ga[–]sgo bzang po chos kyi rnamagrangs che skyong 'di'i sngags 'di 'dzin cing/ na nga las langs nas klog pa dbaidel khagyis pakha rdzogs kyi
lub ma/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod ra ra bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ las de ral/ sal/ ma hA ba su
la ma la sa/ gur che 1 gu ru ga ru/ ma ha gu ru NasAhA 1 de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dwaron chen po lngas rtsen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su tha' ma sbyar ba btud de/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang sgebazang ra zhes bgyi ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'dzin cing nangam langs
nas klog ra ba'igs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar 'gyagro/ tad+ya thA/ urje phu bats+tshe phu/ nu phu 1 kun T+Thapu man shu/ muN+Da ta ha katshu 1 ga phu dz+hage lu/
tshage phu sAhA/ dunas bcom ldan 'dras la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dar chen rolag na rdorjes 'ad skadatsas gsol to// btsun pa ra com ldan 'das bdag lags kyang/
gang sgo bzang po zhas ragyi ra/'a chos kyi rnam grangs bdadzin tsange/ nangamaralangs nas klog rab rags kyi bu 'am 1'gas kyi dumo da' bsrung bar bgyi// yongs su gzung ba
dang yongs su bskyang ba dang/yos su bskyab pa dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang 2 chad pa spang ba dang/ dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// mtshams gcad r bar gyi'od
tad+yathA/ horadze/ har rjehAhA 1 ba sa ba sa ma hA kA sa mu sAhA/ de nas dwacom ldan 'dasal/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos bad skad ces gsol to// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang/ gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'achos kyi rnam grangs 'da' dza cade gnang rar langasanas klogal rigs kyi bu ma/ rags bu mo de bsrung
ba dungayongs su bskyang ba slad du/ gzungasasngags kyi gzhi mas brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu hululu/ saTi b+hu ta pra tu naM/ ka ra mi sAhA/ de nas sde
dpon gzhon nus/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thalam sgyur ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang
zla sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cinganang par langs nas klog rab rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyakhu mod la bsub dang yongs su raskyang r ra bgyi
ba' slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzha'ada rnams brjod par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ he he/ hil gyi la/ ba'i ha'i/ hal hil/ ma mal/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tun 1 sarba b+hU
te pra ta[R]dz+hanokaromi Any+tsa/denasalhabadu zla 'od kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba brten de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bzhi
mar bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang sgo bzang ngo zhes brgya re 'chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma bu'adzinatsang 1na nga rar langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyaru 'am 12gas kyi bu mo/
de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM ba// khaMg/ tshig/ hi// dad po co phu sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'dal/ byang chub sems dang bsems dar 'a
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'ad skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gangasgo bzang po zhes dgu ba 'chos kyi rnam grangs
choskyong ba'i rig sngags 'da'adzan tsang/ nang ralangasanasaklog pa' rabs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de labasrung bar bgyi'o/ tad+ya thA/ ha/ ba ha te/ nAha te/ sarba pra tu
rAkA pa skyu/ matra/ kun+d+he/ muk+ta/ mu ste/ ba muk+ta ]ba ma/nirma la 2 pra lhas re brab+haka re pusAhA/ donas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po
byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gsakyang/ ga nga sgo bzang pozhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam gru ngas mo skyong pa 'jig sngags 'di 'dzin cing/
nangarar langs nas klog ra 'ogasakyad kham/ rigs kyi bu mo de la rasrung bar bgyi// tad+ya thA/ dzAle dzuli/ ma hA dzAli ma hAdzA le 1 jilen uk+kamuke/ shame dra ga me/ ma hA pra sham[Y]
[s ]1@#// shamasamAn+te/ mahAsam D+ha/ sang d+hadzAl ma hA dzAle/ dzul ba me lu swAhA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyis// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs/
ka su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'daskad ces gsol to/ khatsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba chos kyi rnam grangs skyongang
sh+tsa gi las 'du 'dzin tsang/ nang pa ra langs pa klob pa'i ba su bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// tad+ya thA/ u dubar/ u durar/ [6]
ba du le/ bya ba tshe An g+ha[？ ]samuny+tse/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ nAle nA la ka she ke tokul kul/ mahA kule nIlakul/ sats+tshA/ san+d+hi/ mnar 1 e/ btse/ na/
kut+tA ti/ sam the/ ba ba la/ ku nan+d+he/ nAlaka shu/ kule/ nAloka she/ kule/ nAlakasha kule nAl tAn+taM d+hAdzIkule/ tusho/ mun bal she/ ha la 'apage/ phalam cu
AhA/ danas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i rigs gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legasauN+Dalam sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'dasala'adiskad ces gsol
u to btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gisakyang/ gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi mgrangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing/ nang ralangasanas kyang klog pa'i
'gas kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ am le/ bam le kun rje le/ mog la/ ha'i rgyu gany+nyo/ sarba karma sAn+tan kamany+tsan/ yu ba
radzo ka kuT/ kaMb lu/ bras+sa/ brah+mas re/ brah+masadan+ti/ sadaD+ha ma 1 nor phud+hAtA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdordzolu gu rgyud kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs suthal mo
rab btudad/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang/ ga nga sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ri Ti chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i
rig sngags 'da'adzan tsang/ nang par 'angs nas klog pa'igs kyi bu ma/ rab kyi du mo de la khasrung bar ng/ yos sur skyang pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs
sur skyang nga 'i slad du/ gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'da rnams brjod rar rago/ tad+ya thA brdzobadzra/ ma hA pAdze/ badzra Ni puN+Da badze 1 bud+d+ha a d+him+mo tu'adzra[7 ]su puSh+Tha/ na
bud+d+he/ subud+d+he/ ba chu bud+d+he/ bshaShA bud+d+ho/ shANaM 1 bud+d+hedud+d+he snyanipig gaman 1 jag la/ a las/ tal me/ ta lo// ta'o lo/ mdang shAnangashAn+ta gAnAzhi lus hA donas bcom
ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dar 'asems dpa' chen mo rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang sgo bzang po zhes
bgyi ba'i chos ma grangs che skyongs ba'ig sngags kazhi chung/ nyung par la ngas nas klog pa'igis kuru khag 2'gasAkyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi//
tad+ya thA/ tilobadz+dzaho'adzra/ ma bko'i/ badzrasAhA/ tan+ta/ ar 1 pat+tar/ byed/ paN+Darab sano/ re/ kar da/kau'i/ Acha su/ ta ta tut+tI/ nu// b+hu dze
rlujog ma/ b+hu dzapAl to/ b+hayab+haye/ b+ha yam gra ba te/ banob//ga ra/ pa tho/ hub ra wi (a da tapu ShA/ te dzati/ rdzob to/ A kA sha mthe bu sutA/ denus rdo rje pho nya mos//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thul mo sbyar la btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ gang sgobazang po zhes
bgyir 'chos kyi rnam grangasatshe skyong nga rag sngags 'di 'dzin cing Danang par langs nasaklog la 'gas kyi bu ma/ gsakyi bu mo dal bsrung ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ rtsa ba bgyi/
catha/ ga ku'i/ ku cinaku Ta ku re swAhA/ nAlana'i kanAlake gsAhA 1 pA ti// mAta keshenAhA[7 ]leha to/ 'ahi/ sbrul gyi ta shesAhA 1a ba da de/ ob nA da ki
ni kAhA/ maN+Dit+taM man+ti/ ma'i kengasAhA/ tsag tsagro 1 badzratsakra hAhA/ de nas racom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dogatan brgyanas/ brgya bshad ng//
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs sogs bya ba khyen te/ bzhazhi bzung dag de bzhin gshegs ra 'khyu'i gya se rags kyis// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba khyed kyis
sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzungs sngagasakyi gzhi 'di dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang
byang churasams dpa 2lor/na rdordzol bka' stsal pa// lagan do rdzong gsal du sham/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gang sgo bzang po zhes khyab chos kyi rnam grungs tshesbyong ba'i rig sngags
'da'adzami tsang/ nang par lang nas klogam des ngs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur/ lha'i dbang po dang [7 ]klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang/
lcam yazhigyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha' ldingag dbang ro dang/ mi 'am ci dbang mo dang/ lta'atshe chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams rar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
daskad ces bka' stsal nas/ lcang chub sems da pa'i ' ga na rdo rjod ng/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong thams cad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa de 'khor de dag
dang lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yAn dang/ drawar bcas pa'i 'dza'i rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya
ba'i gzungs rdzogs/ rgya gar skad du Arub hu'u tu pa tis pa nA ma d+hA Ni/ bod skad du/ 'bags
pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag ga sa thos pa dus gcun bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyul bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dang/ 'a ra ba na bzhugs te 1de tsho khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyashe nas 1bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dong 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thub rtsodamtshang brus te rakyi bar
gyu nA/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa la bgyi/ draskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// khyim bdagadre phyir khyed kyis bu mang re skon po zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub pa/ bkyan shig/ tad+yathA/ ba Dor daDa/
u pa da Da Dad ze 1kaM ba ra a ba d+ha ne/ na brtan/ d+ha hid+hahi/ a brtan/ bdamag gsargalan/ ka mi kan/ pra tu gnan/ pa ta ma tsiNan tsak+Sha han/ ka mi/ gro Ta mo ha
ka ro maM/ dzihAka romi/ hanaM ka romo/ dzaM b+hatsan/stot+tanAn/mo hAnAn/ pra mo Anan/ khyim bdag gapal la shog bu mang ro ston pa'i gzungs 'daskud pa dmar po la 'dun pa sngags
ta lag pa g.yon pa shisor mo gcig la bcangasan debalus 'dug dang/mchon dang/ nad dang/ rims nad dang/ rims drag pos mtshugasaso// 'thab ra dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/
chod pa rnams la lan thebs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim badag mgon med zas sbyin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungasam
la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa du mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso//! @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yasastare tuDa ka naman+tA
raNi bod skad du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dam thams cad la phyag 'tshal ga/ 'daskad bdag gras thos pa dus
ga na 1 bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ral/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ phyugazhan 'phrangara'i
dge sbyong tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dngayang thabs cig go/ de'i tshon mu stegs can kun tu rgyug rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la kha gnod par bya ba'i phyi'i golangs chen re 'dun btang
[n1 ]@#// bar gyur to// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gse glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed do// de dag gis glags masnyen/ dmigs pa/
marnyed nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba derasong sta phyizhas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' le'ilus l reg ga/ ragamakhag tu kun dga' bo ni sdug bsngal mi bzad
rgyupadrag pa/ tshar/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dasnyam du sems te/ bdag la sdug bsngal ma bzod ma// drug pa/ tshang/
sha la thug ra shar ba rnams dang ldan na// bcom ldan 'das resam dgongs so// bdag 'di ltar nyam nga la rgyun de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo// de'i nAtsho
dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi ru chen po tsho dang ldan rakun dga' bo dang zlag ma rung ba 'gan 'dug par gyur to// chodang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'anyi pa'i
nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'ga' gyi bu chen mosathos so// de nas de gnyis tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga 'kha der song ste phyi nas 'di
saA ]skad ces smras so// tshodabaldan pa kun dga' bosdug bsngal ma bslad pa/drag la/ tsha ba'i tshor myon gnas khadagal deba'i ga shogs rasamadagongs so zhes pa de skad skya 'am/ deskad
ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa na ]dpe phan sog legamag bo ga shags pa ltar kun
dpa' bol reg pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shage/ bdag cag gis khyod khra'i steng du bzhag ste/ dang zhi gshegs ra'i drung du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das des khyod la
yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ra'abu dang 'tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bun losatshodang ldan pa kun dga' re nyal khri stong du ma'a gnas / bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' ba la bkastsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyodatsa sdug
bsngal ma bzad pa drag pa/ tshapa'i tshor bas thabs sam btsun ra bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yide la zung zhag dang bshad
de kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa las chen po stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang na 'di lta sku 'phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang/ nor bu 'di dang/

gtum po dang/ gdol pa dang/ rma bya'i snying dang/ tshe zad dang/ la decan te/ lasachen po bdun po de dag na stobs che ba/gdul da 'i pa/ rasnyan par da dkar/rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu cheba'o// kun dga'
[s ]@#// bo relangasar res kyang 'dod n nang pa ba yonar 'the bos rgyal po pa'i ba kyang 'phan to// 'di la do yi ma yungs 'bru tsam du ma da la 'jig ge/ steng du bltas nas 'gas
par byed do// phyogs su bstas nu 'bar 'gyur ro// phyob/sa mtshams su yaltasanames sreg par byed do// de dag gis khyod la reg go/ dalta mod kyi de kha gshags pa'i chu dang/ chos thos pa'i sa
pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byin gyi skyabs kyis dadud du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yago/ bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol phyi'i zlog tu gsol// phyag rgya bcing du gsol/skud ra gang rung
dub/sol/kun dga' po du ba phyi legs par la btunyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan rab ru'o/ tar/ har/ ma hAgAr/g+ha sa ra pa ta/ d+ha ra d+har d+ha ra Ni tshor tshoraNi kar ti/ki to tamAd+hiNi/
! sam rasar Ni sa ra na ko tam tedasamab+ha pe/ b+haban nA ga re/ b+hadan sin+d+han tisAhA 1 kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag la lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlos brjod byas tra/ mdud pa lnga
bcurtsaganyisabor na brjod byed thams cad dang/ 'byung po thamasacad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur// gdon thams cad las thar pa 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs so// dun
chu mdzod cig// slar yang mamachingar mdzad du gsol[7]kun dpa' bo de'aphyarenyon la legs par yang zung shag/ tad+yathA 1 bad tsha la le 1 ma hA bad tsa le b.le 1 d+hi la b+hal/ mahAsgyur Ni/na mo'i
kha0 ni han han hatir/ matsatha/ mabatsar ya/ ste ri sbe ra mu le/ mtha narim than/tsalan/mAka/dzib+han/ pAdAn baya grwakraNi/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ta thA ga ta/ ba ta the1 ti'i g+hachu'i pa la pra de
ha ra tiSh+Tha kAnAl bsanaswAhA/kun dga' bo langs 'dra dga' bachog pa/ sdang ba/ gtum mor gyur pa/ gsod pa 'gyur pa'o/ dal 'gasngags 'dis ke mu ru ka'i skud pa lan
shurtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu gcig go// de nas 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdas thams cad kyang sngang bar 'gyur/ 'dzim par
gyur/ zhi bar gyurashang/ 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/ 'das byung ro lcams cad kyang rab tu 'bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' ba nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o//
tad+yathA/ daradaradar/ ka ra ka ra ka ra klomahAkak+kar/ tsa ra tsar/ tsa da tsar/mahAtsad tshor hal ha laha la/ hi hil khulu hu lu/ hareba'i/ hib ki re 1gi ri btsanaka ra ka/
rasarba b+hU tanAn/ pAdzaMb+han/nAl bar san/tsan+naM/tsaka/ Ayu rnyeswAhA/ kun dga' bo de dag gnod sbyin thamasacaradang/ sran po thams cad dang/ gsang sngags thams can dang/
yidagasadang/ byad dang/ sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang/ la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do// dal 'ag sngags 'di skud pa dmar ro'am sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas
/ @#/// brjod byus te/ mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad rengs par byas la 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung 'di// chos/
la legs khar rang tu yid la zung zhig/ rjesasu sbyor bar gyis shag/ delta rasan kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o// tut+tA/ d+ha ran+ta b+hat+tar kha la ramahAl 'a/
mahAr le/ bal gsha god na/ku Ta nA/ ku'u Ta// sam ha re 1 kA NA di 1 ka kha khare/ makuT/ d+ha ra Na mulu ka ka/ kaNe kaka/ sAm smashAn kan giraNi bogs re 1sAsA ba ta
Da muku mA raka/ kra tisAs/ kAnan pa sum+b+has 1ba runy+tsa/ bdu rgyu gro han b+he/ kr-ita g+hi rab/ ba kyi tub+he par/ ma smra ba// khaM tAn/ ha ras/ kun mA ra ya sa/ kAn sarbade la/ nA pa///
wI akA/ gan rda ra ba/ a sur 1 sarba a sur/ sajut+taya sha ma na/ ma tas 'a sAhA kun dga' ba rig sngags dad sbyin sreg gamasud ra/sa bcings na 'dod pa mthar gtogs pa thams
cad 'jug par byed/ltung bar byed/ zabar byed do// kun dga' khorolas thamasacadra rengs par byed ra'i rig sngagasazung zhig tad+yathA1 sam// mahA ha hale 1 har d+har/g+ho ra d+ha
ra d+hat+taM/ rit+taM/ ba rot+taM/ ku nit+ti kutan/ saM ga tsan/ ka tsa ri/ khatsar/ kha tsa ra 3ma ra Na/ du hu 1 mareN/ ma hAmA lan+d+ha ri/ nayo na ma ti sAhA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags
kyi tshig 'dadug dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thams cad rnam rar bshadi ga ra'i phyir ral gtsang ma skudaralalan nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te mdudar/
nyi ku rtsa bzha boran lega'adran thams cad kyasam tshugs par gyur go// kun dul ba lags ng sngags kyi tshod du 'ded gzung dag/ legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig/ kun
dga' bo gsang sngags 'dug ng yang rung bas gzung ba'am nusaso// kun dga' khodi lta ris legs par gzung bar gyis shig/ tad+yathA/ tsatatshar/ ma hAtsatatshor/ tsaratshor/bu
ru du ru ma sbyabu ru 1 saMchu le/ mahAsaM lhale 1 ma rgyud le swAhA kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ skye dgur bcas
pa'i 'jabag rtenanagashag gsang sngags 'ad lamitso ngani ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang rjes su 'brang bayan// gsang sngags 'don ma bod pa ste/ sreg par byed/
'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bag par phyed yan te/ rig sngal sa lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig kho na sdug
pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed do// danas bcom ldan 'das la/ cho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gso//
legs par gzung lags so// mdud pa bor du gsol/ phyag rgyagazhag par mdzad du gsol// kun dga' re dub phyir ta/ b+hag+ha re/ b+ha re/ sgyu ra Nihar bra ha re/
par Ni/ku thag taDa/lad tshad da ti/tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// darang phyug chen mos byas rig sngags gcad do// khyab 'jug gso byas pa rigasngagasagacad do/
brgya byan gyisacas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// rgyal po chen po bzhis rus pa'i rig sngags gcad do// gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon gyis kyus bab 'oge sngagasagacad do// zla ba dang nyims byas pa'i
gasngags gcad do// gza' dang nyi masamyasamarag sngagasagacad do// gza' dang rgyu skabyas byas khaba'ig sngags gcad do// phyagasas byas byas sa' yi sngagasad do// phyogs
mtshamasanas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// steng nas byas r dang 'og nas byas r rig sngags gcad do// lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcadra// klus t+yas ra ba'ig sngags gcad do//
gnod sbyin gyisabyas pa dnganam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// grul bum gyis khyasaradang/ rab pasabyas r dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram khre dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rdzobu'agis
a dang/ dmangs 'ges dang/ skyes pa dang bud med dang/gnol pas byas pa dang/ gla klo dang/ rikhrod mas byas pa dang/ seng ge dang/ sbrul gyi byas pa dang/ 'gro ldinge ba yid kyis byas pa dang/
g.yung posakhyasal dang/ tengasal bas byas pa dang/ murag ra khrod pas byas pa dang/ sems can thams cad rig sngags 'chang bsacos pa'i rig sngags gcad do// tad+ya thA ga ga gar
mahAg ga ga ra laphu/ bde ga pu/sha pa ra sid+hewa zla tsapa phu ma hA tsaN+Da lasu/ tsa go yu 1 tsa mar su/ tshoma'i phu 1 tsakra phu 16kra rgyu rayu kr-iShA yu/bskyaru pa pu ru'i lu sog
du pany+tsa ra A yu/ pany+tsale phu b+hum pu/b+halI pa le phu/ po ge la phu / pa ga la/ a kyA sku 1 A narje phu/ sa mnolu nu shan pu 1 ts+tshad lu/ d+hIts+tsaMd ni phu sa/ kris na ba kAn mAran/
ban da ni/ pan cunan bkA NaM nugan khud r+ya ka nan/ phyag la b+ha na dA hAm si b+hasma b+hasma na/ saman/banarnyanasAhA/ kun dga' bo gnodats+tshin gyi sde dpon por kha bcu
rtsaganying po 'di dag naman mo gza 'phrog par byed pa'o// kun dga' po nyi ma 'char ba'i cholas chen po gnon byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/doston gyi dus kyi ro nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi
rjes su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag bas gang tu rolag ru 'od zer gyi dra bas ' gnas arims su 'gyur tu de'ang ba gcad do// kun dga' bo rol das pa cig ra zhes bya ba zhig yod do//
dbang 'danyid kyin ng du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzan ces bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klathams cad dang/ grul bum thams cad dang/ yi dgas dang/ shaza thams
[; ]@#// cudakyang 'a dinyid kyin ng du bsdus nam mkha' ldange yaba'adanyid ni 'du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyis da dung sdus ]rlung lha'anga' danyidi la nga du bsdus sgyur len gyi bu

pa rongaDig red dro'ang 'danyid gnad du bsdus/ pung ro 'dzin dang mdung thung 'dzin yang de bzhin du bsdus/de nga zhan du khyan re dang bcas pa dang/ 'khor dang bcas sa'apard nyidakyin ng du bsdus so//
kun n sa dpag tshad brgya dpod tu// nga yis chod pa dag byas pas/ gang la 'byung pos byabacayod// g.yaso sdang ba thamasacadra bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po tsho// las dgags bu ci yod/
bdudag kyang n pa'i zhags pas// kun s yongs su bskor ra yAn// zhagos pakun gyis dedag kyang// rmugs shing shan tu rmongs par ras// 'dapas bdag ga na 'grub chung// gsang sngags

tshig rnams grub gyur cig// namasid d+ha nAn/sadats+tshanatumanAmA ra ga ltar me rdzas tunany+tsa swAhA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang// dgra bcom pa rnams kyi stobs dang// dmar ba chos kyag pa des/
bdalegs su da gyur cig 'phags pas nags rgyas kyagazayis// rtag tu 'jigs pa thamasacan l sAn+ta chogan lan drung ga cu rtsa gcig 'chusabarjod dus te/ kar ru dang la kha tsangan lasogasar
skud pa dmar re la mdud pa bor ro// de bzhin du byar ra 'dabyago 'byung po thamasacad dang/brjod byed dang/ sems rnams pa g.yang byed la sogs pa dang/ dugakhyadi pa dang/ dug byis pa dang/nang

za ba gnyis pa dang de nang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba thub pa'i mchog yane go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun du 'dod kalha dang me dang/ lha gan dang 'dra ba
bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs//ngacom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa grolangs bdunas zhes byara'i gzungs rdzogasas/rgyagagyi
mkhan po bsham+b+hasi hadang/ ban g+halo shesasnying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po btAka rasaM hadang/ khuran gya tsa ba ngan h+phaye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
grwa/ rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya b+ha dra ka tInA ma sU tra/ bdaskad du 'phags pa mchin mo bzang po zhes bya pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'dama'i tshalabya ka lan ta ka gnas pan bzhugs te/de'i tshe dge slong zhigargyal po'i khab kyi chu ta la po ta'i 'gram 'dug

go/ de nas lha kha dog bzang po mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong dag la ba der song ste phyin nas muta la ro ta 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te/ dge slong de la 'daskad cesasmras so// sa

srong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shesasam/ des 'di skad ces smras so// lhab dag gis na mtshan mo bzang po'amado snga ma 'tshal na/ lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang re'i mdo sde mkhyen tamami
mkhyen des 'dasudaces smras so// dge slong ba dag gis kyang mchin mo bzang ro'amadesdem shes so// lha 'onamtshan mabazang po'i mde sde 'tshal ba de lta bu sumachis// des
'di skad cesasmras so/ rgyal po'i khar 'od ma'i tshal byakalan ta ka gnas pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyi/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du songal zhus te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis de
khyodal lung bstanapa de bzhin du zung 'bartson par gyis shigaces skyas nas/ lca de de nyid du masnang ragyur to// de nas dge slong de nas langs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhangs lamagabos phyag 'chol tu phyogs ba gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skud ces gsol to/ btsun pa ma dang
dang rmongs nas dgagadir lha kha dog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba derams te/ char tal po rta'i 'gram thamasacud snang rgya chen pos khyab par bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchig
dpe slong khyed kyisemtshan makhazang po'i mdosdushes sam/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so// lha dpag gsanamtshan mo bathangaso' mdo sde ma 'tshalan/lha khyod kyisamtshan mo bzang mo'i
mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/ des bdagalana'i da skad cesam// dge slong padapa gis kyang mtshan mo bzang mo'i mdo sdum shes so// lha 'od mtshan mo bzang po' mdo sde 'tshal bad ltasu
mas/ des 'di skad cesamamago/ dge slong rgyal po'i 'bakyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa 'dan/bcom ldan 'dus kyi thad du songal zhus te 1bcom ldan 'das kyisad khyodal jaltar
lung bstan pa de bzhin du('dagazungal dartson par gyisashigaces smras sa lha de de nyidi dum gda' khar gyur to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'diyongs su zhu'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis ka'astsal ma dguslong khyod kyis lhadashes sam/ dge slong des gsol// btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma 'tshol to// bcom ldan 'das kyisaraka' stsalar lha'abu de nasum
curtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon de tsan dan zhes bya'o// dge slong des gsol pa/btsun pa bdag kyang mtshan mo bzang po'amado sde thos par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal
pa dge slong khyod do'its+tsalegs par nyon la yad la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ dag slong chos gsum dang ldan/ dgasungamtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya
gsum gang zhen/'di lta/'das paladzesasuphud par ma byed pa dang/ ma 'ongs par med pa dang/ de ltar khyung chos rnams kyasam 'phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/chos gsum
mo dedag dang ldan na/dge slong mtshan mo khazang po'amado sde la gnas pa zhes khya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skadacasal bstsal te/bdag cagashegasar sa de skad ces gsungs nas
ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsung ngo// 'das la rjes su phradam rtse// ma 'ongs pa la re ba med// 'dus pa gang yin de 'gag ste/ ma 'ongs de na ma shi la'o// gang dag du
ltar byung ba'i chos// dadang dul rab bltas na/ rnam pa rtog pasama'athog par// de dag mkhas pas khong du chud// sangatsamangashu'am sus shes kyis// de ring nyid dubastun te bya// 'chi bdag sde
sgratshan do dang ni// rtag tu bshes pa maya'ago/ sems can kun dang srog cha ga kun// 'byung po kun dwang thamasacad kyang// bde ba 'ba' zhig grub 'gyur te// thams cad nyon mos med par
shog/ thamasacad ng khrang ngo mthong 'gyur to// gang dgacig par mgyur cig/ de ltar M gnas shing rub btson ka/ nyana'atshan snyom las med pas// de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yodi/ mdo sde
tsit+taM thub pas rtag tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'drasakyisasems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di shAdran s/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags
kyi gzhu dug gsungs so// tad+ya thA/ nA ban/banamU lan/bud+d+hAmarANi/ mnanimAnani mAn ni/ Natsha kho Ni ge ga ba ga ba bsen Ta/gor/ gan d+ha ra tsaN+Dal 'am tragi/ puk+tas/b+haman/
a drab Do/dramo// sha ba ri/ sa ra la D+ha/ hinam rgu mor ta na/ ma ho la/da la bag da la ma ti/dal bat+taM/ ma hAd lani/ tsa lan/ uSh+Tha 1tsakrab ti/ma hAtsakra ba ti/ sha ba ra sha ba ra//

tha mahA shAkhar glu tshig sgyu tse ri gan/namin mi gi ran mi d+hi'i lhu ta nA swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ a zhu zhu zhu/ mi Ni/ka // mo ku/ sa ta ta ra tsal lu/ rna/narmi lta/ gawum nga cu nonaM/ sha kuni rtswa
radas lo turaka/ taMri/ tarod du/ nod du/ tule'akhu bluta pa ya/ nga tiya ya swAhA[7 ]tad+ya cha 3a ra gaD+ha/ pA su ka 1pAl ya/ka po taka pAyayi/ ta mo d+haN sAhAdage slong rigs kyi khu 'ar
rigasakyi bu mo ba/nga la la zhig gis/sems can thams cad rjes sugazungaba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i don dang/ tshig dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ 'gro ldang ba'i gsang sngags kyis/
gzhi 'chang ngam/'dzan tam klog gam/yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston n 1de'i sa'amasam tshugs par 'gyul dug gsamayin/
mtshon gyisamayAn/ chus ma yan/ rgyal po'i chad pas mayin/ rkun ma'i chadabasamayan te/ dus mayan rag 'chi ba'i dus khyad par yang mi 'gyur zhing/ des rang mya nas bdagamAr
mang nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes par yang/ mtshan ma bzang po'amador grags// skye ba dran dang dag bcom dang// dbang phyug tuyang nges ra ra 'gal/ 12na tsapa/gas ni
gas kun tu // dusatshan 'chi dang bar ma dor// bdag las bdag la ma sbyor la// dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin// sems can thams cad rgud 'di sel// nad dang mngon 'jags skye dang[4]
rmi lamam shes myunganadu// brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur// gang gas brase te skyes pa dang// bud med lus la btags na// skal khab brang dang gzi brjid dang// de
yod la yang skye bar gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid kyisasu// mi dgecu'adagad byas r/ da dugathams cad bazang po'amados// dusamayan ltas 'chales skyong// rgyal po chud mdang glog/
chom po nadadung dgra duganang// g.yul sprod pa dang 'thab pa yang// bzang podran n skyob du la byed// rig pa bzang po 'di dang// gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na// ma dag ma zhum nas
kun tu // dengs 'di ni yid kyisabarjod// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de ba'an khagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
phyag 'tshal sa mig sngags 'di dag brjod r rabya ste/ rig sngags 'das bdag 'byor par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ naman man d+hare/ trem ti mi ga lo/ta kan/ a lani/pishul d+ha ri NaM/ a ku
pa Ni kram kri ti/koli ko'i/ kutog rto/ 'ato/ kus/kA ti/u pu ti/ bdag dang sems can thams cad lagan rdo rje dang lhan calog tu'angags pa thamasacad dang/ nadaThamaMsacad dang/ dug
thams cad dang/ rims thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ gdug pas zin pa thams cad dang/ chom rkun thams cad dang/ ma dang/ ma mayan pa thams cad dang/ 'jigs pa dang//

tsa gnod pa dang/ nad la go ba thams cad dang/ 'thab pa dang/ reg pa dang/ sdig pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang sbrumatshaba'aru ba thams khur dang/ lus ngag dang yid kyis nganarar spyad pa thams
cad dang/ thamasacad du 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shami slung gag/ tad+yathA/ha li mi li tsal/ A la/ mal/ pa tsan paN+Da sha ra ra tsa la tsa la swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skudaces
bka' stsal nas/dag sor de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa 'a 'khor de dag dang lha dang/ ma dang/ lha mayAn dang/nam mdo' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi'am ca deng 1 lta 'phya
chen po dang/ gnod sbyin rang/ srin ro dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'bags
pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogasaso//rgya garngagyi mkhan po dzan ma tadang/ dAnaAl dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ra b+ha ya shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
skad bsar bcad kyisakyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/dag rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a dza pra kyahar mi masku dbod skad du/
'phagasar mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dara' thamasacad la phyag 'tshal// 'ad skad bdag gis thosar dus gtsagan ]btsan
ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'astsal ra/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mdungs phyir
'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gang la 'ag mdangu phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ngam/ston tum/
klog gam/ kun chub par byed// de'amadangu phyir ma 'phrog cing 'phrog par ma 'gyur ro// phrogs na'ang nga tshayang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
tshog sang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ phale ba'i ma/ phalu mo me// yalu ma ti b.lag ti/ sArab ta/ kA la ba ti 1 ku ru mA ti[7 ]u ta ra 'a[' ]gor/ gan d+ha ra/
tshor/ tsaN+Dal sku re sku ba re/ an+nAmA sin/ dza lanaso ba ko ti kA kha'e/ sAg re ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tsa ru tshur sa man/ do ba pa/ da dupha/ shulu lu swAhA/ rig sngags 'di bka'
stsal pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos 1 rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs/rus tu'akhrugs/ kun tu rab tu'akhrugasar 'i bar
sku dugyur to// gnod sbyin rnams kyang rkyema'o sdug bsngal lo// kyemanyam thag go zhes zhung skad chen mo zla chen po 'byin cing 'khod do khacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags la da gsungs pa' ran pa dang bdun pa'i tshig des ngas
bsrung bar smra'o// bde legs su 'gyur ba'i bar du bya'o// de'i mdangs dbrog par bya'o// phyir dbrog par bya'o// nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// gnod sbyin gyis rban nam mdangam ma
yan ras zanan ni dus de dang/ tshod re dang/ yud tsam del mdangs 'phrog go/ phyir dbrog go/ rnam par 'jog go/ gal ta'aphrog cing phyir 'phrog rar ma byad de 1 gnas na 'dug
pa'i n du rnam par ma 'jigatsangayang 'jig par 'dod dam 'phrog par 'dod par gyur na/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pany+tsanathos kyi tshogs dang racas to
ma mnyes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' khoya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//
phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzuk+ta bshadz+haganA ma brgya/ bod skad du/
'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rigasngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad dag gis thos pa dus ba/tsags//
/bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhagazhanAkya rnams kyi nang zhugs te/de'i tshe sta du sa zhes bya ba shAkya ba der zhes bya la sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa
zad ng chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang/ sangs rgyas la skyabs susong/ chos la skyabs susong/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song/ sangs rgyas lagacig tu phyogs tshes la gsub tu phyogs/
dge 'dun 'gacig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nemanur med cing the tshoma med/chos dang dge 'dun dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ la mkhanimanur med cing the tshom med la/
bden pa mthong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa/mngon par rdzogasar du grub pa/mtshon dang dbyig pa boragazhig gnas pa de'i mag la snang ba dang masnang nga 'gazugs rnams ma snang bar gyu gnas /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yidi 'khyedatsang/ sungasargyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad ra sgron ma 'dzan pa
gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshalal// bdabar gshegs pa thugasarjechen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdzad du gsol sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gam na rnam par sbyar dug la
wa zhes bya ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa ma las 'das pa/ shAkya bde bas tshig de skad ces brjod pa gsan to/ gsan nas kyang ting nge
wa[n ]'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshod ldan rakun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' s khyod song lamag rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'disagakya bde ba la srung bcas kyi// yongs su
gzung dang g.yos su bskyab pa dang/ gos su bskyang ba dang/ zhib dung bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa snang ba dang// mchog snang ba dang/ dug ga zhal ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/
mtshams ga ca da ra dang/ sar cing ba gyis sha bo dang/ de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dab slong rnamas+saM dang/ dge slong mnAms dang/ dge ba stong rnams dang/dge bsnyen ma rnams dang/ somasanyan
gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig sgyur sa rnam par sbyongs shig/ tad+yathA/hal mol kal molo/ gal teduAdu'aduyAmAn tu'u hu lubulu/ tudutud tudu tsagyur mu kha bgo ya
nAnA/ kun dga' bo yi sngagasakyirgyal pom rnam par sbyong ba 'dan mig bskyon dang rludag skyon dang mkhris pa 'askyon dang/ bad kan skyon dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyonasol te/ tshul
khrims kyi bdun pa dang/brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang/ drang srong rnams 'don pa dang/ ston tsang 'brel par 'byung nga' bden pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang/ kun 'byung ba bden pa dang/
'gog pa'i bden pa dang/ lamakhyabaden pa dang dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi dan ra dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyir don rag/ shAkyar de ga'i
mgan bu'amagyurag/ mchim 'dzag par gyur cig/ kun tu machim 'dzag sngar ma gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can tham cad kyi migam par dag par gyucag swAhA/
kun dga' bo rag sngagasakyirgyal chomag rnam par sbyong ba 'daniyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus drug gis gsus ra'o// 'ang da ltar 'chadad/ rgyal po rAn ro pa' nga/ wa rnams kyis nga so
bskyang dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i ng rjesasuyi rang bo/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'dadus gsum dubarjod na/ de la tharas por 'gyur ba dang 'ga'ar bam/ling gar ma man da
shu sngon mo pha mthong ba'am/ mig g.yul gyi skyon lhalas gyurar rnams sam/ ku las gyur pa rnams sam/dri za las gyur pa rnams sam gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams ma/ sha zalas gyur pa rnams
sam byad lasagyur pa rnams sam rolangs las gyur pa rnams sam/ rolas dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu lasagyur pa rnams sam kun tu rgyu dang rolas las gyur pa rnams
kyis tshugs par 'gyur na lha dang sa pa dung/ bdud du gnas pa dang/ tshos pa dang dmas pa dang/ dag sbyong dang bram thor a ba dang lhadang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa' dga' 'age
rten ngas ma mthong ste/ dan gnasam dade// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'dasiltar manyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin zhes gsol nas gsang sngags kyis zhi 'di rnams
bzung ste kun chub par byas nas/ shAkyarade ba ga la ba der song ste bdeb mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i de dag de bzhi'i gshegs pas khyod la bskul gyi de nyin re zhing dus gsum
dud+danakhar gyis shigaces de la rgyas par ny+tsasaso// shAkya'adebs thos thag kho'i mig rnam par dag ste/ mgo rnamarar dag pas dri ma med pa'i mgags thams cad mthong/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshodang ldan pa kunudraga' bo dang/ shAkya 'dar dang/ lha dang decas ra'i 'jig rten rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis la/sungs pa la mngon parur stod
do 'phags pa mga rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ri ga sngags rdzogs so//(spu rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Shar ka pra shaman sU tra/bod skad
du 'phags pa mig nad sa tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dpyang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdaskadang dug gis thos pa dus g.yin/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
khab na bya rgod phung bo'il bzhugs te/de aganod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen ponag po bcom ldanu'adas ga la ba der song snyashin s/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen mo 'dir/ mgo nad byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab nag po mgo nad kyi sngags rig 'di dag yod de/
tsa/ tad+yathA/ ru du ni rteraakA lu lud+hi ni g.yu/ ba taphub te yi phur te su tshAs ran+d+ha b+hiyung d+ma sa kI lu pad+madagir tshil lu AhA/bcom ldan 'das kyis des ces pa/
rtsamanus/gnod byasdodapochaton ya ras te bamaldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do tshog 'adalon te/sridabudakarapolan bdun bzlasalakhas mdud pa'i dun
boyo/ tshulalan bdun bzlas rakhyas lag pas khyabs rnamib nad 'gyu pago 'phags raman da rab tul pa byed ra 'a mad rdzogs so//
grona mchogagasum la phyag 'tshal// yabanadasel ba sngags/namo hetubi nAhA/ lug 'phrad byung nas nad khongaskams kyisab tag bsalayab nus ba tor te drug chu
g.yi gsas de'aluga'agayabasagadamed pa bgyur ro// kAyand sa'ang gzungs rdzogssha/ rgya gar skad du AtsAr pA/
gsuny+tsa/bodand du/ 'phags pa gzhang 'brumarab tu 'barabyed ma mdo/ sa rgyas dbyaratshugasems dpa' thamasacad la phyag 'tsho'a'a'o 'daskad bdag gis thos pa dus gagan/
ba com ldan 'das rgyal po'i 'od ma'i tsho'akhya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na/dge slong lnga'atshatsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang tha bsag tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
wa/ ratsalnga'i gsosbyong zla ba ltar de nyid 7 dge 'dun gyi mdun na ga dan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de 'a tshe dang ldan pa na dang/ 'a re bcom ldan 'dasasama'agasan rdzas thogs te/bcom ldan 'das
lagayod cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' grags phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deralogs su thal mo sbyar
ba tud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskyedaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyalaro 'khor 'ad de dag slong gzhang 'brum can mang ro dag gzhung 'khrumakhyabrond kya'aga'i ta/sdug bsngal ma da zad pa
drag po ma bdeb/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong par gyur na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dedag la dgags thaltar bsgrubasar ragyi/de skad ces gsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/chodang ldan pa kun
