dga' bo la 'dwaskad ces bka' stsal to// kun da ga' ngo khyod kyis gzhuba'athumasal ba'amado 'di lo bzhi'i// kun dga' bo gang la la zhale bas gzhang 'brum sal ba'i mdo'i mnge dang/ mi dang ma
gsan dzasrid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum ni dkyas btab par ma 'gyur/ dachorabs bdun gyi bar tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur po tad+yathA/a' amale/shAlan shasaMb+ha'o/
sAhA/kun dga' bo 'ad lta ste/byang phyogasan yi'argyal po gangs zhes khyab dan/ Al ba shing rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba de'i mag pasumayod do// ga zhi'apha'akha zhekhya gnyis la 'jam/
ba/ @#// zhes bya/ gsum ramasam ro zhes bu ste/ ji ltar de bskams pa diba'i du/sems can rnams kyi rlung gi'abrum bu bskams par gyur cig///'asama'athum bu la skamasalar
gyur khad ma'abrum bu bskams ra ba gyurayi// mi gtsang ba'i 'bum bu bskams pa gyur cig khrab ga 'azumakhu ba skalasar 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i 'icum du bskams pa gyuratsa///
dobazhin du bdag dang sems cas thams cad kyang da ka khya'abrum bu bskams par gyur cig/ mgatsang ba'i 'brumadu bskams pa gyur cig khrag 'brum bu bskamasaMka'agyuracig/ 'dusala'i
'brum bu bsamasapar gyurag/ ma' 'brumadu bskams par gyu cug 'phyang ra'i 'khrum khu bskams par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/sha mashamAmesAhA/ gam ka mAnasAhA/ na ra ma gyur cig/ gangs
ramagyur gi/ sgra'abyungab mgyur cig/ 'phrog par ma gyuracig/ sdug bsngal bar mgyur cig/ rab tu sdug khasngalarar 'gyur cig/ zag mar mgyur cig rar tu zag pa mgyur yi//
'di nyid du zad pa dang/ yongos su zad pa dang/ nadamadu par gyur cig/ 'og tu song zhig nAmab+ha ga ba te/bud+d+hAya/sa/ bAdAnaM/ sidat+tun/many+tsa/ pa dan sAhA/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
cesal bstsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' boyarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do// de la tshog na'adayate bkagasar sa 'gyur ra 'dasrid du
dmar po lan bdun ba zlas pa byas l/ mdud pa bdun bor tu mgul dug dgas so// 'phagasal gzhang 'brum rab tu 'a bar byed pa'i mdardzogs so//
mkhan po nga'i mi tra dang/ dAn yag la dang/ zhu chen gyalatsang ran d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus togatan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
sarbarog pra shamananA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/'phags pand thams cad rab tu zhirir khyad pazhes khyu ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dar 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
'dra skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dwazhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyae/ dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal ra/ dgeslong drug chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zubashig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shag/ nachub pa gyis shaleg/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston tsag/ tad+yathA/
la ma/ tsa ma/ saM na ko kili/ grim ti/ kule/ durlab+he/ in+dan/mu khe swAhA/ 'di dag na zas ma zhu ba dang/ lces pa dwang/ khrag dang mkhris pa'i dres pa dang/ gzhaba'abrum gyis btags
dang (gzhang nad can dang/ zagu dang/ lud pa can dang/ rims can dang/ klad ran pa dang/ gzhogs phyed nab dang yi dgas kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yonati/ kun dga'
gang gsang stsalas gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa de ni/ sa lha dang bcas ra'i 'jig rten na ma mthong// mo zad pa na ma gtogs go// gsang sngags
khazhi dus 'dir zhan gshegs padagu'acom layang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di sangs rgyas nasoms can thamasacad kyi chogag/ 'dod gsadang
bral ba ni chos thams cad mchog go/ dge 'dun tshogs thams cud kyi mchog go/ bden pa'i tshig dang nga den pa'i ngag 'das/ bdag gas khros radang/ 'thungs pa dang/
'chos pa dang/ myangs pa rnams legs par bader ra khur gyur caye swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dang/ song de dag yarangs te/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa nod thams cad rag tul bar byed pa 'a gajus rdzogs so//
mchol kha gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'od dpag med 'phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ ma ma ti mal/ pan sutan/ tsheg mo zhig rakhan rta me/ eka tikAn/ ha kaM tsha tu rtsa
kanatsAr+ya dzAran sAhA chog 'ad bras te mgul dub tags mas na dmadab khyad do rims nad zhing 'a gadzungs rdzogs//
ga sraskadadu[） ]Ar+yadzu 'apra shamananA ma d+hAr Na/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad sngar tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
la 'daskad bdug gsazos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dus rgyal po 'khrab dur khrod chen po bsil ba'atsha'akhan bzhugs te/ de nas dgacong zhag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba desong
sku phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhings la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nasems can rams nad kyis rnam pa/ ra gtsus pa rnams mnasin/ bcom ldan 'das de dgusrung du gsolasung du gsol/denas bcom ldan
'dasakyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khaka'astsalar/ kun dga' ra phyogs 'dan ma lce'i 'khreng zhes bya ba'arims nas te/ sems can rnams lanyin gcig la dang gnyan gnyis
pa drung/ nyin gsum ra dar 1nyin bzhi pa'i tshulakyi rnam par gatsarar byed dadasrung pu'i gsang sngags kyi gzhan le de dag yano/ tad+yathA/dzAlanadzul na pra tshu la ni/ pra tIpa ni dra gam bdag
rims nad song shog ma'adugasAhA/ bdon pa dang bden mchig gang gis 'jig rten na saargyas bla na med pa dang/ 'jig rten na chos dang dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i
'a@#// chig nges bdag gi rims nad song zhig 'dug cig swAhA/sid d+himan pado ra rub tan bram an mati swAhA skud pa nag red lan tshikurtsa gcig bzlas te/
mdung pa shurtsa gcig der ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slongad dag yi rangs te/ gsom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//ka// dkan mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalal// hastag pa//
many+dza[q] ku mA rasarba ta thA ga ta ba la bAd+hadz+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta'an/ nub gaste sang+ga tanAnasAhU/ 'brum bu'i nad zhi ba brgyus pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
mdangs phyir mi 'phrog ra zhes bya ba da me 'od la phyag 'tshal lekaM/ tad+yathA/ o mamarakA sA ga ra ma hAsAg re/ pu ru tsa ru tsu ru/ sa ma nam/ dab
zapa hu lu hu lu swAhA/ gla rtsi dang/ shu dag dang/ d+ha su nag ngo la lde gu byas ta lkog mar thagal byas sngagasan bdun bzlasan/ 'byung pa rnams kyis de'i
tsa ]mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/ blta bar yang minus so rdzogs so//
